<p>236b.3</p>pa'i/ /gri gug lha mo'i mdog bzhin bri/ /sgo bzhi rnams su 'ang de bzhin no/ /de dag tshon gyi cho ga'o/ /de ltar yid 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /lha rnams gzhal yas khang mdzes pa/ /de skad gsungs pa rdzogs par bya/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyal mtshan dang / /bla re la sogs bre ba dang / /
<p>236b.4</p>spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan cha che ldan bla ma yis/ /rang gi rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la/ /bde ba chen po ster byed pa'i/ /khrag 'thung rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog /rdul tshon bris pa'i khang pa la/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa bskyed par bya/ /

<p>236b.6</p>gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan zhing / /sangs rgyas thod pa'i cod pan can/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/ /sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang / /shin tu hUM sgrogs 'jigs byed
<p>236b.7</p>pa/ /gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs/ /mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mchod phyir thogs pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /thod pa gti mug rnam dag pa'i/ /phreng ba brgyus pas brgyan pa'i lha/ /mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang / /rkang gdub dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /gdu bu rked pa'i ske
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>rags dang / /dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan/ /'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso bo ni/ /hUM zhes bzlas pa byed par bsgom/ /de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams/ /sku mdog sna tshogs grags chen mo/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs

<p>237a.4</p>rim bzhugs/ /rim gsum sku yi 'khor lo la/ /sgrol byed ma dang 'jigs ma dang / /lha mo mi pham ma bzhi ni/ /shar phyogs lugs 'jug phyogs bzhir ro/ /dge ma 'dzur byed ma dang ni/ /dus mtshan ma dang grags chen ma/ /dbang ldan mtshams sogs lugs las

<p>237a.7</p>yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /mdog dang phyag mtshan cha lugs ldan/ /sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin bsgom par bya/ /sngar gsungs sta gon lha rnams ni/ /snying ga nyid nas rab sprul nas/ /dkyil 'khor la ni byin gyis brlabs/ /
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>yang ni snying ga'i sa bon gyis/ /ye shes lha rnams bkug byas te/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams byin gyis brlabs/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni aH/ khaM graM drUM shUM/ aHaH/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ rtsa yi 'khor lo 'dzag tshul gyis/ /dbang bskur rgyas gdab phun sum tshogs/ /ma lus pa ni

<p>237b.3</p>'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che/ /gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs dang / /tshogs kyi sbyor ba che ldan zhing / /nam mkha' ca co'i sgras bkang nas/ /bkra shis glu yis bstod bya zhing / /
<p>237b.4</p>bzlas pa yis kyang mgu bar bya/ /lto ba'i gnas su sbyin sreg bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad ldan du/ /khrag 'thung mkha' 'gro nyi shu lnga/ /ge sar pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bdag nyid lha yi dngos byas nas/ /sbyin sreg cho ga ldan byas na/ /sgrub mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ /
<p>237b.5</p>bza' dang bca' btung myong ba dang / /brtul zhugs can gyis ci spyod pa/ /ye shes bdud rtsi lnga nyid du/ /bsgrubs te thams cad spyad par bya/ /bdag nyid lha ni lha yi mchog /bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa/ /rang gi gzugs la ma chags pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du

<p>237b.7</p>legs gzhag ste/ /sbyang sogs rim gyis byin brlabs nas/ /zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /mchod pa'i bya ba rdzogs gyur nas/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga yis/ /dang po nyid du slob dpon gzhug /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs/ /khrus byas mdzes

<p>238a.1</p>pa'i gos gyon te/ /bu sdug de dag rnams kyi ni/ /gdong pa dar gyis g.yogs byas nas/ /gsol ba 'debs pa sngon du 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor gnas la
<p>238a.2</p>bdag phyag 'tshal/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor don
<p>238a.3</p>dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /lan gsum du ni gsol ba gdab/ /de nas slob dpon gyis/ kye khyod su zhes smra'o/ /slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /zhes smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /

<p>238a.5</p>sarba bI ra yo gi nI pU dzo pas+tha nA ya A t+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi nI/ At+ma ma le a b+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes brjod lus ni thams cad kyis/ /gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas shar gyi sgor gnas la/ /snying ga'i g.yon du thal mo sbyar/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI pU dzo pas+tha

<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>chu yis gtor/ /slob ma'i lag pa bzung byas la/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sdom pa mchog /brjod de thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yin te/ /sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje

<p>238b.3</p>rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyin re bzhin nam lan drug tu/ /chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung / /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /las kyi rigs
<p>238b.4</p>mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung nas ni/ /me tog phreng dang bcas pa yis/ /snying gar rdo rje rab bzhag la/ /oM badzra yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ oM su ra te sa ma
<p>238b.5</p>ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed do/ /yongs su sbyangs pa'i bu sdug de/ /las kun byed pa'i chus gtor la/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/ /oM A khaM bI ra hUM/ deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas

<p>238b.7</p>nyams par gyur ta re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyis/ /snying la yang dag zhugs pa ni/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /rjes su mna' chu blud pa ni/ /tsan+dan dang ni ga bur bcas/ /bde 'byung me tog chu dang ldan/ /blo gros brtan pa'i slob ma la/ /mtshan
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>ldan thod par blugs nas ni/ /gzi brjid can gyis 'di skad smra/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'gyur/ /oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta u da ka Tha Tha Tha hUM/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi ngas
<p>239a.2</p>gang 'di byos shig bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re/ de rjes slob ma'i gtso bo yis/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyis ni byin rlobs la/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor
<p>239a.3</p>ma/ /bdag la ye shes dbab tu gsol/ /sngar gsungs rgyan ldan bla ma yis/ /gzi ldan sbyin bcas slob ma la/ /mi 'chi bcu phyed ro ras dang / /byi brun gu gul nag po dang / /grir shi klad khrag tshil chen bcas/ /rang skra dang bcas zhib mor brdungs/ /pad+ma'i snod du rab bzhag
<p>239a.4</p>nas/ /dur khrod yi dgas mes gdungs la/ /gnyis med sngags kyis gcun par bya/ /dril bu'i sgra ni rab bsgrags nas/ /rang nyid 'od kyis mkha' 'gro gzhug /gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ /slob ma'i snying gar nyi ma la/ /sangs rgyas thod pa yum bcas shing / /

<p>239a.6</p>'jug /oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+hA A we sha hUM/ oM shrI he ru kA ya/ bid ma he bid+ya rA dzA ya b+hi ma he swA hA/ mkha' 'gro bskul bas nges par 'bab/ /lce la a ni dmar bsams nas/ /gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge /sku gsung thugs la phebs gyur nas/ /brtan pa'i
<p>239a.7</p>gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bu/ /lha rnams rigs kyi rim ji bzhin/ /'di ni dngos grub gang yin pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog /pra tIts+tsha dang badzra hoH/ /dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor/ /gang rnyed de yi rigs yin te/ /dbus sogs
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>mtshan ma shes byas la/ /slar yang slob ma'i mgo la bcing / /sha mig dag pa'i ltas kyi phyir/ /ci mthong dri ba'i cho ga bya/ /de nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ /mig phye dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas
<p>239b.2</p>thams cad mthong 'gyur te/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra nai tra ya a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIH/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro don phun sum tshogs kun dang / /
<p>239b.3</p>dngos grub kun mkhyen mngon du 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang / /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /lha yi sku mdog ji bzhin dang / /mtshan ma la sogs de bzhin du/ /slob ma rnams la bstan par bya/ /sna tshogs
<p>239b.4</p>pad+ma'i dkyil steng nas/ /gnyis su med par legs 'khyud pa'i/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /dngos grub ma lus stsol ba po/ /khrag 'thung che la bu khyod ltos/ /sna tshogs sde mas gtsor mdzad pa'i/ /phreng bzangs ma sogs lha mo lnga/ /thod pa bzhi por bcas pa yi/ /
<p>239b.5</p>rab zab thugs kyi 'khor lo dang / /dge ba'i ske rags can la sogs/ /gsung gi rnam dag 'khor lo dang / /sgrol byed mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/ /rnam dag sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma can/ /mdzes sdug la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /gzugs sogs dag
<p>239b.6</p>pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /lha rnams de nyid mtshan ma yin/ /de nas slob ma blo ldan gyis/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /yon gyi mchog chen phul nas su/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /he ru ka dpal dbang sgrub pa/ /'gro ba skyob cing gzi brjid
<p>239b.7</p>can/ /de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs/ /de bzhin bdag la deng stsol cig /dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid/ /'jug sgo lho yi phyogs su ni/ /bdag
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>nyid he ru ka dpal sems/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris steng du/ /seng ge'i khri ni bsham bya ste/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa'i stan bting la/ /gnyis med blo ldan der bzhag ste/ /he ru ka dpal sprul par bya/ /gdugs dkar steng du phub nas kyang / /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs
<p>240a.2</p>kyis/ /bkra shis sgra yis legs gang ba/ /rol mo snyan dang glu dbyangs rnams/ /nam mkha' ca co yis bkang ste/ /dbang bskur ba ni 'dod pa yin/ /de la bar chod zhi ba'i phyir/ /yungs kar rnal 'byor pa yis kyang / /bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin byas la/ /gsang sngags brjod
<p>240a.3</p>nas brdeg par bya/ /de 'og lag gnyis 'dab rtse yis/ /bum pa rnams bteg sngags pa yi/ /lus nang rtogs gyur dkyil 'khor la/ /cho ga'i tshul gyis dbang bskur bya/ /rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa'i chu/ /lhag ma med par bsdu byas la/ /glu blangs dril bu la sogs
<p>240a.4</p>brdung / /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lus kun/ /bsgoms la thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum pa yi gnas las byung / /khams gsum kun gyis phyag 'tshal ba/ /chu yi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes/ /brjod
<p>240a.5</p>de rang snying 'od las byung / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdud rtsi chu yis bkru bar bya/ /dbu rgyan rin chen rgyu las byung / /dar dpyangs bcings la dbang bskur te/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /rin chen dam pa'i dbu rgyan
<p>240a.6</p>dang / /dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra pa TaM ka badzra a ra li hoH/ rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /de nyid ldan pa byin brlabs nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu grub phyir rdo rje
<p>240a.7</p>zung / /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ lag tu byin la dbang bskur bya/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /de dus dril bu'i sgra bsgrags la/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams/ /srid pa'i dam pa byed par shog /oM shrI he ru
<p>240b.2</p>ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya/ dril bu g.yon du sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /g.yon bsnyems pa dang sgros gnon 'chang / /gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag /phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs/ /byin rlabs che ldan sngags kyis
<p>240b.3</p>ni/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ shrI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka te/ shrI yi sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /ming gi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
<p>240b.4</p>bcang / /he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+h+ya badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha rA ya mi hUM ha ha ha he hoH/ 'dis ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /kha T+wAM Da ma ru bzang bcas/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bya/ /he ru ka dpal kha T+wAM ga /rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma
<p>240b.5</p>ru/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing / /tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag /kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang / /sdang dang dbye dang mnan la sogs/ /bsad dang bskrad
<p>240b.6</p>pa ma lus pa'i/ /las rnams de ni sgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /mchil lham de bzhin ril bu ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub bsgrub/ /de nas ci dgar sgrub par gyis/ /shAkya thub par bsgom byas la/ /lag g.yon gyis ni chos gos mtha'/ /
<p>240b.7</p>g.yas kyis mi 'jigs phyag rgyar gnas/ /slob ma la ni lung bstan bya/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo ma lus rnam gnas shing / /he ru ka dpal lung bstan bzhin/ /mgrin gcig tu ni thams cad kyis/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan de/ /he ru ka
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>dpal de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /shrI he ru ka nA ma sarba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hu r+b+hu ba swaH/ de tshe he ru ka dpal dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang bla mar bcas/ /mgrin gcig lung ston bsam par bya/ /
<p>241a.2</p>de rjes dbugs dbyung sbyin pa ni/ /gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mthong ba dang ni bcug pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur bar/ /khyod ni shin tu de ring gnas/ /dbang ni bskur ba tsam gyis kyang / /slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur/ /slob dpon nyid kyi bde ba yis/ /brtan
<p>241a.3</p>dang g.yo kun dam tshig yin/ /sems dag tho rangs dus langs te/ /bza' dang bsrung ba la sogs pa'i/ /sdom pa'i bdag nyid can srung ngo / /lus dang srog la mi ltos par/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bsrungs/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /rtag tu bzlas la gzhol bar
<p>241a.4</p>byos/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams te/ /zla ba re re bsrung ba ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /tshes bcu dus su mchod par bya/ /sha dang chang sogs gang ci'ang rung / /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
<p>241a.5</p>yi tshogs/ /he ru ka sogs rab tu mchod/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yang mi spang / /mya ngan 'das la dgar mi 'gro/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /
<p>241a.6</p>mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig rab bsrung bsod nams kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /g.yon nas lan gsum bskor byas la/ /spyi bos phyag ni byas nas kyang / /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni ma
<p>241a.7</p>khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub 'byung bar du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas skyong / /gnyis med ye shes spyod ldan pa'i/ /bslab pa blang ba sngon 'gro bas/ /tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung / /dam tshig de la rtag gnas te/ /de sngon 'gro ba'i
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>gsang ba yin/ /spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i/ /yid la 'dod pa kun 'grub 'gyur/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bgyid par 'tshal/ /de ltar yongs smin slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/ /
<p>241b.2</p>shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid/ /dbang mchog thob 'dod slob ma yis/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang / /dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos/ /'di dag la sogs bla ma
<p>241b.3</p>mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin khrus/ /glu yi mchod pa rnam mang bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin che/ /'di dag gis ni bla ma mchod/ /na tshod ldan pa'i bu mo yang / /mtshan nyid ldan pa dbul bar bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/ /
<p>241b.4</p>slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis/ /shes rab ma la gsol ba 'debs/ /dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/ /maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa/ /bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs/ /shin tu dri med sems kyis ni/ /de nas 'dir ni gsol ba
<p>241b.5</p>'debs/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /dpung gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol/ /bdag ni stsol chung skal dman zhing / /sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs/ /kye kye ston pa bla ma che/ /mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod/ /de nas slob dpon che ldan pas/ /
<p>241b.6</p>lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /sngar gsungs cho ga bzhin du ni/ /chu sogs dbang rnams bskur bar bya/ /gsang ba'i go 'phang 'di brjod bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab gsungs pa/ /yid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /gang gis lus kun brtan byed pa/ /de ni phyag rgyar
<p>241b.7</p>rab tu grags/ /slob ma la ni de brjod nas/ /bdag nyid rig pa lhan cig tu/ /yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca'/ /btung ba la sogs rjes spyad cing / /kha la sogs par ga pur gyi/ /dri zhim mchog tu bsgos pa las/ /yid la 'phrog pa'i bgad pa dang / /sgeg dang rol
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>sogs sngar byas te/ /dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas/ /bde dga' rgya mtsho byung gyur pas/ /zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab/ /rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang / /yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes phyir/ /a ti su kha zhes brjod do/ /khams gsum
<p>242a.2</p>thabs dang shes rab gcig /bde chen gnyis med ye shes gsal/ /slob ma nus dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ltar dbang mchog bskur byas pas/ /mgon po sa bcu dang mnyam 'gyur/ /de nas gsang dbang thob gyur pa'i/ /slob ma bzang la bla ma yis/ /shes rab la brten ye shes
<p>242a.3</p>kyi/ /dbang bskur bzang po sbyin pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po'i phyi rol du/ /sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs bsgoms la/ /de yi dbus gnas bla ma ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa dang / /chang la sogs pa'i dga' ston gyis/ /

<p>242a.6</p>'byor ma/ /rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs/ /gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan/ /lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa/ /phyag g.yas byang chub sems gang
<p>242a.7</p>ba'i/ /bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas bsnams/ /zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras pas/ /chu sogs bum pa gsang ba dag /dbang bskur ces su shes rab kyi/ /dbang ni rab tu bskur bar bya/ /dper na pi wang sbyor
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>kun tshogs/ /rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung / /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur/ /lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni/ /tshul khrims ma nyams chags chung bas/ /thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/ /nad med snying rje dang ldan pa/ /sems can don

<p>242b.3</p>de yi dbus gnas pa/ /mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur/ /gal te byang chub bla med 'dod/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min/ /lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdul tshon tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin
<p>242b.4</p>chen dang / /de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid/ /byas nas slar yang 'chad byed pa/ /skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas spyan 'dren zhing / /gang gis gshegs su gsol ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/ /gang na'ang
<p>242b.5</p>bzhugs pa ma yin te/ /dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/ /gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol/ /de nyid kyis na brtag med na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/ /slob ma bzang ldan de la gtad/ /gang gis shes rab ma
<p>242b.6</p>mnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ /'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /gzhan gang dngos grub gtso bo dang / /snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig /mkha' 'gro ma kun de la bzhugs/ /gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni/ /bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang / /
<p>242b.7</p>gnyis ka gcig tu 'dus pa'o/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /de 'og slob ma stan bzang la/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/ /dga' ba la sogs bskyed byas nas/ /rnal 'byor dam pa mtshon par bya/ /gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ /bdag rtog rang
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>bzhin nyams pa ste/ /kye de lhan cig skyes gyur pa/ /bla ma'i zhal sngar gsal bar zhus/ /lhan cig skyes pa rtogs gyur pa/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /gang zhig 'char dus dbang po dang / /yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams
<p>243a.2</p>kyis snying sbas su sad pa/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig /rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par/ /bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /slob ma legs par ldan pa dang / /brtse
<p>243a.3</p>ldan sems gzhan med pa yi/ /gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang / /sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang / /glang po bud med dam pa dang / /ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni/ /yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams/ /sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de ni bla mar dbul bar bya/ /der ni

<p>243a.5</p>dang / /skye ba dman gyur 'gro ba rnams/ /rdul tshogs mthong bas grol bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu mngon zhugs pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang / /skye gzhan srid par dngos grub
<p>243a.6</p>'gyur/ /dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na/ /skye dang skye bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /de yi skye ba bdun la ni/ /ma bsgrubs par yang dngos grub thob/ /gang yang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing / /gal te dam tshig sdom la gnas/ /skye 'dir las dbang gang ma grub/ /re zhig dam
<p>243a.7</p>tshig nyams pa la/ /dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi /mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gang yang bla ma brgyud pa yi/ /rim 'ong de nyid rig pa yi/ /sgrub pa po yis 'grub snyam dgongs/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin slob ma'i mgor/ /bla mas gdugs phub bkra shis brjod/ /lan gsum
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>dkyil 'khor bskor byas te/ /shar nas phyag byas sa la ni/ /bde gshegs rnal 'byor ma tshogs la/ /bza' btung la sogs dga' ba yi/ /rol pa phul la smon lam gdab/ /de nas ci bder gshegs su gsol/ /tshon rtsi la sogs dngos po kun/ /tho rangs dus su bsdu byas
<p>243b.2</p>la/ /gser sogs bum pa'i nang du ni/ /bcug nas chu bo chen por dor/ /bum pa thams cad bsdus nas kyang / /chu bo che la bkru bar bya/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang / /sbyar ba'i sa ni byug par bya/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /me yi phrin las tshul bzhin du/ /bdag dang
<p>243b.3</p>slob ma'i tshogs rnams la/ /sdig pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /rigs mthun mdza' sdug bcas pa rnams/ /snod ldan skye bo 'dus pa kun/ /bkra shis glu dang rdo rje dril/ /mkha' 'gro mnyes phyir rol par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud 'di ru/ /bum pa'i dbang ni gsal mod kyang / /
<p>243b.4</p>gsang ba mdzod sogs rjes 'brangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis byas/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba rnams/ /sgrib pa'i tshogs dag spang byas nas/ /ye shes ldan pa'i sa gnas su/ /mi ldog par ni 'gro bar shog /dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim
<p>243b.5</p>pa gsal ba zhes bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog brnyes pa'i slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ga ya d+ha ra dang / gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ri gyA ral+li sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ri gi A ra li'i
<p>243b.6</p>sgrub thabs/ dpal he ru ka rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po re zhig sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la
<p>243b.7</p>sogs pa rnams bltas nas yang dag par mchod nas kyang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa/ raM las byung ba'i me'i
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa/ baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa/ laM las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de'i steng du re pha yongs su gyur pa'i chos 'byung / de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de la
<p>244a.2</p>gnas pa'i hUM yig las skyes pa rdo rje rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur gyi rang bzhin can gyis gzhi rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /hUM yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ze 'bru'i dbus su/ ri rab kyi rtse mor sna tshogs rdo rje las skyes pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la dbyangs bcu drug nyis 'gyur du
<p>244a.3</p>gyur pa yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ka la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ri gi dang hUM yig las skyes pa'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa'i ri gi A ra lir bsam par bya'o/ /nag po spyan gsum pa phyag gnyis zhags pa dang lcags
<p>244a.4</p>kyus lha mo ri gi la 'khyud pa phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang cang te'u bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis thod pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams pa/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis 'jigs byed mnan pa/ ri gi'i
<p>244a.5</p>zhabs kyis shing la 'dzeg pa bzhin dkris pa/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa'o/ /siM seng ge ma ljang gu/ kAM 'dod pa'i 'khri shing ma ser mo/ /aM e ma bde ba ma kha dog dmar mo/ shaM 'tshe byed ma nag mo/ thugs kyi 'khor lo sngon po la'o/ 
<p>244a.6</p>de'i grwa bzhir dur khrod rnam par dag pa'i thod pa bzhi'o/ /g+haM drag mo ljang gu/ tAM rnon po ma ser mo/ mAM sgyu ma chen mo dmar mo/ uM uM d+hung ga nag mo/ gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po la'o/ /grwa bzhir nye ba'i dur khrod rnam par dag pa'i thod pa bzhi'o/ /dze ce spyang ma ljang gu/ /hrIM
<p>244a.7</p>ma he ma ser mo/ rta mgrin ma dmar mo/ gAM glang chen rgyal mtshan ma nag mo/ sku'i 'khor lo la ste shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su lugs dang mthun pas dgod do/ /'di dag thams cad gcer bu mo skra gyen du grol ba/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis g.yas na gri gug /g.yon
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>na thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gis gar byed pa'o/ /rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i ye shes sems dpa'o/ /de'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang / lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dz+nyA na tsakraM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me
<p>244b.2</p>b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga ba ti ri gi swA hA/ dzaHzhes pa 'dis bkug nas/ hrIHyig gis rab tu bcug ste/ haM yig gis bcings la/ gaM yig gis mnyes par bya'o/ /mnyes par byas nas oM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes pa 'dis spyi bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte
<p>244b.3</p>ba dang / gsang gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /spyi bo dang / mchan khung dag dang / lte ba dang / kha dang / mig dang / rkang pa'i mthil dang / gsang gnas su ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai 'dis zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yan lag la dgod par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni mthe chung dag phan tshun
<p>244b.4</p>lcags kyu'i rnam pas gung mo gnyis dang mthe bong gshibs nas mthe bong gis btsir bar bya'o/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni/ sdigs mdzub mthe bong gis btsir bar bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas bzhir hUM yig lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin
<p>244b.5</p>gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par bskul nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki nI a nu ga tA ma h+yaM/ a b+hi She kaM da dan+tu zhes pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa lnga rnams kyis gtor bar bya ste/ 'dis lha rnams la dbang bskur ro/ /oM
<p>244b.6</p>sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki nI/ a b+hi She ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM A ral+li sh+ts+yo sh+yoHsh+yoHsh+yoHda ha ha/ sa sa sa/ u dAt+ta du gdon par nye ba'i snying po gnyis ni ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags ni/ oM A ral+li ri gi poM poM poM b+h+yo
<p>244b.7</p>swA hA/ oM kharga ti dza satwa naM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta hUM swA hA/ 'di ni gtor ma'i sngags so/ /ri gi A ral+li'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis rgya dpe ji lta ba bzhin du bsgyur ba'o// // 
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi DA ki nI mA yA sham+bA ra ta n+t+rA r+tho da ro TI kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
<p>245a.2</p>lo/ /dpal ldan rigs sku ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid rin po che/ /thams cad 'byung gnas gnyen gyur ma 'dres las mdzad nyi ma'i 'od/ /gnyis med rdo rje 'chang ba las byung brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor las spros grangs med rigs kyi lha rnams rgyal gyur cig /rgyud rgyal sangs
<p>245a.3</p>rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro sgyu ma yi/ /dngos po de nyid gsal byed dgongs mdzad rnam ston rjes 'jug la/ /mtshon byed rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis legs pa'i don bsdus bcu yi gzhung / /phyi ma rtog bsdus la sogs gsung gi tshogs rnams rgyal gyur cig /dus gsum
<p>245a.4</p>rgyal ba'i thugs 'dzin rjes 'gro rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag /sprul pas don mdzad gsang ba'i sgo 'byed 'dzam gling nyi ma rgyal/ /nyin mtshungs dbyer med dgongs pa'i tshogs dgrol sangs rgyas gnyis par grags/ /mgon mchog brgyud pa rnams la phyag 'tshal dgra yi tshogs las rgyal gyur
<p>245a.5</p>cig /bstan pa'i snying po dri med rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'i rgyal/ /yan lag lnga yi tshul ldan rgya mtsho las byung rin po che/ /tshig zur du ma'i sgron sbar chos rtags phyag rgya bzhis bsgrubs te/ /bla ma'i gsung bzhin 'gro la phan phyir rab tu bshad par bya/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bdag
<p>245a.6</p>nyid rdo rje 'chang / /bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar rab sprul nas/ /snod bcud brtan g.yo dngos po dag bya'i phyir/ /thugs rjes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad/ /skal ldan rjes 'jug lha tshogs gzung bya'i phyir/ /sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rjes mthun par/ /
<p>245a.7</p>mtshon cha'i rgyud don gsal bar bstan dgongs nas/ /ri rab rtse mor dkyil 'khor rnam sprul zhing / /dang po'i rgyud chen la sogs rim bzhin du/ /dag pa'i rnal 'byor la sogs rim bzhin bshad/ /gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs skal ldan gyis/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyi
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>dgongs pa rgya mtsho'i bcud/ /rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i sgo nas dbye mdzad cing / /dgongs don so so'i las gzhung mthun pa bzhin/ /legs bsdus mtshon byed tshig gi gzhung bkod de/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs don yun ring gnas pa'i thabs/ /sprul sku nyi mas 'dzam gling gsal mdzad nas/ /
<p>245b.2</p>sde snod gsum gyis 'dzam gling 'dul ba'i dus/ /blo dman 'phags pa'i lam la bkod byas kyang / /rang gi de nyid nges don gsal ma mthong / /ma 'ongs blo mchog grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mchog /dgongs pa'i dbang gis rmongs pa 'dul
<p>245b.3</p>ba'i tshul/ /dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rab snang mdzad/ /mgon po rnams kyi rjes su bslab bya ste/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gzhug /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bsgrub don gsal/ /gdul bya dag pa'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad/ /yun
<p>245b.4</p>ring gsang ba'i theg pa gnas bya'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i byang sems sme khro rgyal po la/ /gsang ba dam pa'i man ngag rab bkrol zhing / /rnal 'byor don phyir rab tu gdams pa mdzad/ /sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus zhig tshe/ /rgyal ba'i bka' gsang 'dzam gling gnas su shar/ /rgyal po'i
<p>245b.5</p>khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te/ /dga' zhing gus bstod legs bltas brda ma 'jal/ /thugs rjes 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin par grags/ /dam par gzung ste glegs bam gzigs par zhus/ /sgyu 'phrul thig le stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhung / /grub thob lhag
<p>245b.6</p>pa'i lha yis lung bstan mdzad/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs sna tshogs mtha'/ /dam pa rnams kyis gdams ngag ji bzhin pa/ /mi 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab bkrol te/ /'grel dang bsdus don sgrub thabs mang du bstan/ /rgyal ba kun gyis rgyud mang bshad mdzad
<p>245b.7</p>cing / /rjes mthun rnam par bshad pas 'di ci dgos/ /dam pa'i gzhung lugs rnam bkod rtogs dka'i don/ /rgya che'i don mang tshig nyung bsdus pa dang / /cung zhig gsal bar byas te dam pa'i gzhung / /'di la nyes pa'i skyon sogs ci zhig yod/ /snyigs ma lnga dus nyon
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>mongs rlabs 'khrugs pa/ /tshe thung brtson zhen rang gi grub mtha' can/ /las rnams kun la 'jug cing don med pa/ /rjes su gzung phyir bka' yi gsang don dgrol/ /gang zhig dgos 'brel yan lag ma tshang ba/ /de ni legs par brtsams pa ma yin te/ /gang
<p>246a.2</p>zhig bshad pa'i yan lag zur nyams pa/ /des ni rgyud don gsal bar ston mi nus/ /gang zhig lta bsgom spyod pa rmongs pa la/ /des ni yang dag bden don mi mthong ste/ /gang zhig lam gnyis sgrub pa'i yan lag bral/ /des ni legs bshad 'bras bu 'grub mi 'gyur/ /brjod
<p>246a.3</p>bya nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par bzhugs/ /bskal pa bzang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i sku/ /sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde/ /rgyud don ston pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul/ /sku gsum gnyis med rtog pa'i ngo
<p>246a.4</p>bor bzhugs/ /brjod pa gzhung tshogs tshig gi tshogs rnams te/ /rtsa rgyud chen po'i don tshogs rnams bsdus pa/ /phyi ma'i phyi ma phyi ma la sogs kyis/ /gsal bar ston pa'i rtog pa bcu bdag nyid/ /rgyud bzhi'i gzhung tshad khri las brgya stong lhag /bshad rgyud la sogs
<p>246a.5</p>grangs kyi 'bum sder grags/ /de ltar bstan kyang las su bya ba la/ /dgos med skyes bu 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ /las rnams bsdus bsgrub bya ba gang yang rung / /bstan bcos la sogs bshad pa'i rgyud dag la/ /ji srid dgos pa'i gtan tshigs ma smras par/ /de srid
<p>246a.6</p>skyes bu gang zhig 'jug par byed/ /dgos pa bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing / /de nyid lam zhugs 'jig rten las bsgrub pa'o/ /yang dgos phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste/ /tshogs gnyis thabs shes las byung 'bras bu'o/ /'brel pa dang po mtshon bya mtshon
<p>246a.7</p>byed tshul/ /gnyis pa rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung tshul/ /khyad par dgos don rgya mtsho 'khrugs 'dra la/ /sgrub thabs yan lag tshang bas bdud rtsi bton/ /rin chen snod bzang legs bcas 'gro la spel/ /nad mang zug rngu rab sel bde la bkod/ /yan lag dpe
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>don nyes pa'i skyon bsal zhing / /lung dang man ngag gtan tshigs mthun pas bsgrub/ /dpe yi 'thad pa gnas skabs dbye bas bdun/ /don tshogs bshad pa'i yan lag rnam pa lnga/ /nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rnam pa brgyad du bstan/ /rgyud lung mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rjes 'gro rnams/ /
<p>246b.2</p>man ngag sbas pa gsum 'byin brdas dgrol zhing / /gtan tshigs khyad par tshad mas legs bsgrubs te/ /shin tu brtag dka' nor bu rin chen gzugs/ /yan lag kun gyi sgo nas gtan la dbab/ /de dag rnal 'byor don snang gsal byed pa/ /rnal 'byor tshig gis rnam par dgrol
<p>246b.3</p>bya ste/ /mu stegs sogs sbas gsang ba'i brda don ni/ /sgra tshad rtog ge'i sgo nas shes pa min/ /de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud las kyang / /gsang sngags rgyud don shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /bshad rgyud cha mthun sogs kyis bsgrub byas te/ /de nyid brgyud pa'i gdams ngag
<p>246b.4\](]lags [,]legs [)]btsal bas/ /nges pa'i klong bskyed thag bcad rtogs par bya/ /de don ma 'ongs 'gro ba blo ldan pa/ /sgrub thabs bsdus don 'grel sogs 'thad pa yis/ /legs brtsams rnam par bsdus byas nga yi bka'/ /yun ring gnas phyir gus par gzung bar gyis/ /zhes
<p>246b.5</p>pas rtogs dka' bshad gsal 'gal ba gang / /gzhan yang rjes su 'jug pa bskul ba'i phyir/ /tshig gi thigs pas don gyi rgya mtsho gsal/ /de nyid rab tu sbyar ba'i sgra bzhin du/ /rnam par bshad pa 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ /de ni sgo nas 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /tshegs
<p>246b.6</p>med chung ngus chen po'i don 'grub ste/ /nor bu rin chen legs par mchod pa bzhin/ /dang ba'i dad pas rab brtson blang bar gyis/ /bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /mtshon byed mtshon bya rgyud kyi sgo nas so/ /re zhig tshig gi rjes su dpyad bya ste/ /zhes pa phyogs
<p>246b.7</p>gcig bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /dang po gleng gzhi 'brel tshul gleng bslang don/ /mtshan [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]sgo nas rgyud don mdor bsdus shing / /yongs su shes bya'i dngos po 'bring du bstan/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u gsum rnams bsdus/ /gnyis pas lta ba spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / /rtogs thabs
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>gtan tshigs spyod lam bzhi yi chos/ /gzhi lam 'bras bu kun gyi phan yon te/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bzhi pa bsdus pa yin/ /gsum pas grub pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / /don dang thabs dang khyad par phan yon te/ /thun mong mchog gi dbye ba gnyis su bstan/ /
<p>247a.2</p>des ni lnga pa'i tshig don bsdus pa'o/ /bzhi pas spyod pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / /gang zag bzhi yi sgo nas bdag gi don/ /gzhan gyi don dang 'bras bu phan yon can/ /rjes 'jug spyod pas lam gyi chos yin la/ /mthar phyin rgyal ba'i mdzad bcas 'bras bu'ang bstan/ /
<p>247a.3</p>drug pa'i tshig don rnam par bsdus pa'o/ /lnga pas rdor sems rnam snang he ru ka /gar dbang nyi ma rta mchog rol pa yis/ /dbugs dbyung rngub pa bsdus pa'i sgo rnams nas/ /khyad par gleng gzhi sngon byung dgongs mdzad dang / /rjes 'jug ting 'dzin nyams su blang ba'i thabs/ /
<p>247a.4</p>rtog pa drug gi tshig don bsdus te bstan/ /drug pas tshogs 'khor bshad par zhal bzhes shing / /lha yi mtshan nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'khor rjes su 'gro/ /slob ma'i bya ba phrin las 'bras bu bsdu/ /zhor la rten gyi mtshan nyid dam tshig dang / /
<p>247a.5</p>bcu gsum pa yi tshig don bsdus pa yin/ /bdun pas gzugs brnyan mdor bstan 'dod pa yi/ /phun tshogs dkyil 'khor cho ga 'jug pa'i las/ /dbang bskur rdzas kyi mtshan ma so so'i rgya/ /rjes 'jug zhar la 'phros tshogs bsdus pa yin/ /brgyad pas mchod pa mdor
<p>247a.6</p>bstan rgyas pa'i lam/ /phyag 'tshal phyag rgya'i sgo nas mchod pa dang / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas mchod pa ste/ /rtog pa kun gyi cho ga'i yan lag yin/ /dgu pas phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun tshogs/ /bsgrub bya'i cho ga kun gyi yan lag yin/ /dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos rgyas
<p>247a.7</p>btab pa/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa kun gyi yan lag yin/ /gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgyas brtan bya ba/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin phrin las yan lag yin/ /gsum pa bdag sogs byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig dbang gi yan lag yin/ /bzhi pa sbyor ba bzhi yi sngon
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>'gro ba/ /lta ba ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin/ /lnga pa sbyor ba sna tshogs bya ba ste/ /tshogs dang phrin las bskyod pa'i yan lag go/ /drug pa bzhin gyi 'gyur bas gnas bya ba/ /mchod bstod bsgrub pa phrin las yan lag go/ /bdun pa so so'i 'jug pa'i cha lugs rgya/ /
<p>247b.2</p>mchod bstod spyod pa'i rim pa'i yan lag go/ /brgyad pa so so'i lta stangs 'gyur ba'i spyan/ /sgrub pa phrin las kun gyi yan lag go/ /dgu pa lce la chos kyi snying po'i tshogs/ /rgyas gdab bzlas brjod cho ga'i yan lag go/ /bcu pa glu 'gyur skad kyi bye brag ste/ /mchod
<p>247b.3</p>cing bstod pa'i las kyi bye brag go/ /bcu gcig so so'i las bzhi bya ba dag /mchod bstod phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go/ /bcu gnyis gar thabs sna tshogs las bya ba/ /sgrub pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag go/ /bcu gsum rdo rje glu yi bye brag rnams/ /mchod
<p>247b.4</p>cing gsol 'debs bskul ba'i yan lag go/ /bcu bzhi mchod pa lnga yi rdzas bsham pa/ /tshogs bsags gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa'i yan lag go/ /bco lnga mgron mnyes bar chad zhi ba'i las/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub tshogs phrin las yan lag go/ /bcu drug lha dang slob ma
<p>247b.5</p>dbang bskur ba/ /ting 'dzin dbang bskur ba yi yan lag go/ /bcu bdun dngos grub shis par bya ba'i las/ /sgrub tshogs bdag don phrin las yan lag go/ /bco brgyad yi ge'i mtshan mas mnyes bya ba/ /tshogs bsrung bsgrub pa dbang gi yan lag go/ /bcu dgu rnal
<p>247b.6</p>'byor don rtogs mtshon pa ste/ /dbang dang dam tshig tshogs bsgrub spyod pa yin/ /nyi shu zag med mngon shes sgrub pa'i thabs/ /bsgrub pa phrin las dkyil 'khor mtshan rtags so/ /nyi shu gcig pa sra sre yo ga'i ltas/ /bsgrub pa phrin las dbang gi yan lag go/ /nyi
<p>247b.7</p>shu gnyis pa bdag gzhan bsrung ba'i las/ /bsgrub pa'i phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go/ /nyi shu gsum bzhi lnga dang drug pa ni/ /phrin las phyogs gcig dag pa'i yan lag yin/ /nyi shu bdun pa dngos grub las dbang byed/ /tshogs dang bsgrub pa kun gyi yan lag go/ /rtog
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>pa bcu bzhi pa nas bzhi bcu'i bar/ /rtog pa nyi shu rtsa bdun bsdus pa yin/ /bcu pa bsdus don 'bras bu phan yon de/ /bshad par dam bca' don bzhin bshad pa la/ /sbyor ldan gar gyi phyag rgya dgrol ba dang / /dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i don bzhin bsgrub pa
<p>248a.2</p>dang / /phan yon 'bras bu yon tan mdzad par bcas/ /rang nyid mchod cing phyag rgyas gdab pa'i thabs/ /dgyes shing yi rang mngon par bstod pa ste/ /mtha' ma rtogs pa gnyis dag bsdus pa'o/ /'brel tshul gleng gzhi rgyu ste thog mar bstan/ /gleng bslang rkyen te de yi
<p>248a.3</p>rjes la'o/ /rtogs sla'i don du mdor bsdus 'bring du byas/ /rgyud don ston pa gnyis med brjod bya'i tshul/ /lta ba phan yon shes bya gzhi yi chos/ /lnga pa'i khyad par gleng gzhi dag dang 'brel/ /de yi don bzhin bsgrubs pas gsum pa ste/ /de dang rjes mthun spyod pas bzhi
<p>248a.4</p>pa'o/ /dgongs mdzad dang mthun rjes su dpyad dgongs pas/ /ting 'dzin rim par lnga pa byung ba yin/ /sngon 'gro tshogs dbang dam tshig brtan pas drug /de yang gzugs brnyan la brten bdun pa'o/ /kun gyi yan lag mchod pa'i las yin brgyad/ /phyag rgya nyi shu bdun gyi kha
<p>248a.5</p>skong dgu /de ltar lam la spyod pa byas pa'i mthus/ /mthar phyin 'bras bu la sogs bcu pas bstan/ /mtshon bya don gyi 'brel tshul rnam pa gnyis/ /bdag don sgrub dang gzhan don spyod pa'o/ /gang zhig sngon 'gro phun sum tshogs ldan pas/ /shes bya dngos dngos
<p>248a.6</p>gnas lta shes byas la/ /gnas mchog phun sum tshogs pa gzhir ldan par/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang / /ting 'dzin phrin las spyod pa'i bye brag dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i rim pa dag /bdag gzhan don gyi dbye ba'i rnam grangs
<p>248a.7</p>kyis/ /rim pa gnyis su sbyar zhing shes par bya/ /lam gnyis nyams su blangs shing goms byas pa/ /'bras bu mdzad bcas yon tan snang ba yin/ /khyung chen mkha' lding spyi rgya rlabs kyis bcad/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po mi 'khor don la 'bebs/ /seng ge mchongs pas snor mtshams
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>'phen sdud shes/ /rus sbal nus 'gros yan lag 'bru la dbab/ /gna' bu brag gnas mi 'tsham 'tsham par bstan/ /bya lag gzan snyog gces ka dgongs pa 'dzin/ /rin chen sgron mas tshig zur du ma sbar/ /dpe don mthun pas le'u mtshams gtan la dbab/ /zab dang rgya chen
<p>248b.2</p>don gyi bye brag la/ /thun mong khyad par mtshan nyid gsang sngags gzhung / /dman pa dbyibs tshogs gsang sngags don gyi gzhung / /mthar thug chos kyi don du shes par bya/ /nyes pa'i skyon tshogs zhar la bshad pa ste/ /rgyud lung mi 'gal mthun gsal nges shes bskyed/ /man ngag tshig
<p>248b.3</p>don yi ge sbas pa 'byin/ /gtan tshigs brgal lan sgro 'dogs gcod par byed/ /de la spyir theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi rgyud mtha' dag bsdu na/ mtshon bya don dang / mtshon byed tshig go/ /dang po ni rgyud dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid can no/ /de dag kyang 'gro ba thams
<p>248b.4</p>cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i smin pa dang / grol ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i lam la spyod pa dang / bdag gzhan la snang ba'i sku dang ye shes yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i tshig ni bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi
<p>248b.5</p>rgyud dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do/ /de la bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyis phye ste/ dang po rgyud kyi rnam grangs bco brgyad du gsungs pa la/ 'di nyid sku'i rgyud thams cad kyi gzhi dang rtsa bar gyur pa ste/ de dag gi mtshan nyid dang dbye ba rgyas par ni dpal phreng ba dam pa'i 'grel
<p>248b.6</p>par bstan pas 'dir spro bar mi bya'o/ /da ni rgyud kyi don la 'jug par bya ste/ mtshon bya'i don ji lta ba bzhin mtshon pa'i sgo nas rnam par bshad pa la/ dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ma tshogs na gzhi med de ston pa la sogs pa gleng gzhi'i don bstan pa'i phyir gsungs te/ 
<p>248b.7</p>sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ zhes so/ /gzhan dag na re/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas khyed rnams
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>kyis dam pa'i chos rnams bsdu bar bya ste/ bka' thams cad kyi dang por 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi rgyas pa dang / zhabs su yi rang zhing bstod pa thogs shig ces gsungs pa la/ 'dir sdud pa po gsang ba'i bdag po
<p>249a.2</p>phyag na rdo rje ma smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rgyu ni gnyis te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs mdzad rgya cher slob pa'i rim pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par rgyas par gsungs pa dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rang bzhin du rtag tu
<p>249a.3</p>bzhugs te/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /zhes pas gsal lo/ /des na rgyud gzhan las ni gleng gzhi dang brjod bya so sor bstan la/ 'dir ni gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas rigs drug gi mtshan gyi don gyis gleng gzhi bstan te de nyid ni brjod bya'i don du gnas so/ /
<p>249a.4</p>'o na yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang khyad par med pas logs su gzhag mi dgos so zhe na/ de ltar yin yang gzhan yang cha mthun pa'am/ thog mar rgyu bkod pa'i tshul gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud bsdus pa'o/ /de la lung gzhan dang sgo mthun pa'i tshul du ni/ ston pa dang / gnas dang / 
<p>249a.5</p>'khor dang / sdud pa po dang / dus so/ /de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang rgya gram kun gyi bdag nyid
<p>249a.6</p>dam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rgya chen pos ston pa'i rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi tshogs dang / yon tan gyi snang ba dang / phrin las rgya chen po'i sgo nas gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa dang / 'phrul pa'i zhing khams dang / 
<p>249a.7</p>bshad pa'i gnas dang / de nyid las mi gzhan par 'phrul pa dang / tha dad rang rgyud pa'i 'khor phal po che dang / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sdud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dang / gsung gi sdud pa po byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / 'phrul pa dang
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>bshad pa'i dus rnam pa gnyis kyis mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan to/ /rtog pa bdun las kyang / gzhung gzhan mi 'gal bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa gnas dang 'khor tshogs dang / /sdud pa dus kyi bye brag gis/ /thun mong gleng gzhi rnam par bstan/ /zhes so/ /gsang sngags khyad par gyi don du
<p>249b.2</p>sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan gyi sgo nas phun sum tshogs pa'i don ston te/ rtog pa bsdus pa las/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun dngos ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir/ /gsang ba khrag 'thung
<p>249b.3</p>zhes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i lha/ /mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po/ /dam tshig dam pa shes ldan byed/ /dgyes pa nyi ma dam pa ste/ /sbyin pa la sogs mchog grub 'gyur/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /rdo rje rta mchog las nyid bdag /ces pa dang / 
<p>249b.4</p>rtog pa bdun pa las kyang / sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan gyis ni/ /khyad par gleng gzhi'i don gsal byed/ /ces so/ /de yang rnam par snang zhing ye shes gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i sems dpa' mdzad pa khyad par can gyi las kyis phun sum tshogs pa gnyis
<p>249b.5</p>mnga' bas sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid do/ /de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bye brag ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / bde ba chen po'i sku mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ste/ don rtags gnyis kyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni bde ba'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /yi ge gsum gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo
<p>249b.6</p>gsum ston cing / de mtshon par byed pa ni b+ha ga gru gsum pa gsang ba'i gnas kyi dbyibs so/ /de nyid ni chags pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral zhing / chags pa chen po'i bdag nyid rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral zhing dag par byed pas na mchog tu gyur pa ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi
<p>249b.7</p>rang bzhin no/ /bde ba byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid dgyes pa'i longs spyod thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa yon tan gyi bkod pa ste nyi ma'o/ /rta mchog ni phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid de/ 'khor thams cad dang / sdud pa po'i bdag nyid dang / dus kun du rang gi mtshan
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>nyid dang / gdul bya'i don du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi g.yo ba'i rten dang / gsang ba'i brten pa gnyis su med par gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin te sems dpa'o/ /de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rlung lnga'i dngos por bzhugs te/ gzhan
<p>250a.2</p>gyis mi shigs pa'i las mdzad pas rdo rje lta bur gnas shing / rang gi de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'i sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i ros rgyas pas/ de ni zag pa med pa'i lam ste mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba'i don sngags gsum gyi rnam pa 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i sgo nas 'phro 'dus las
<p>250a.3</p>mdzad de/ mchog tu gyur pa'i rtsa gsum dgang zhing bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis dgyes pas na chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gnyis med ye shes sems dpa' che/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag g.yo ba lnga/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>250a.4</p>bde chen rgyal/ /zag pa med pa'i lam mchog rgyas/ /gsang ba sngags gsum 'byung 'jug gnas/ /mchog gyur rtsa gsum bde chen dgyes/ /kun gyi bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dbyibs kyi sgro nas thabs dang
<p>250a.5</p>shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mtshon bya sems dpa'i rang bzhin de nyid 'byung lnga 'khor lo'i rnam par sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos por bzhugs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang / bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i mchog tha dad med cing / gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje
<p>250a.6</p>dbyings phyug ma'i phyag rgya dang / rin po che 'bar ba ka ta sbyar bas rlung dang me'i rkyen gyis bde ba'i mchog gis bskul te skad cig ma bzhi las dga' ba bcu drug tu 'phel bas dgyes shing tshim nas/ chos thams cad snang stong gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo la bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab
<p>250a.7</p>ste/ sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gnyis med sems dpa' sangs rgyas mchog /'byung khams 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas/ /yi ge gnyis med bde chen mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>nyid/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab sbyor nas/ /bde mchog rkyen gyis bskul bya ste/ /dga' bzhi bcu drug gnas spro zhing / /thams cad bde ba chen po'i sku/ /zhes so/ /chos kyi tshul du sems dpa' rang byung gi ye shes chen po rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba de nyid ni sangs
<p>250b.2</p>rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid do/ /de yang yul dang yul can gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bde ba chen po'i skur bzhugs shing / zag pa med pa'i ye shes las grub pas 'bral ba med do/ /chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sku nyams su bstar ba'o/ /de'i don dngos po kun la gnas kyang
<p>250b.3</p>rtog pa'i dri mas bsgrib cing rang gsang du gnas la/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pas dka' ba spyad kyang ma rtogs pas snang ba shin tu lkog tu gyur pa lta bur gnas so/ /de la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi lam pa dag ni sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu mchog dang ldan zhing / 
<p>250b.4</p>bde ba chen po'i ros dgyes te chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ snang ba nyid ni stong pa'i dngos/ /de nyid bde ba chen po yis/ /de nyid sems dpa' sangs rgyas dngos/ /de nyid chos rnams kun gyi dbyings/ /bde chen rdo rje sems
<p>250b.5</p>dpa' ni/ /snang khyab gsal ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /zhes so/ /de dag ni brjod bya'i don dang de 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyi ga yin te/ gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang rkyen med par ni rgyu tshogs pas kyang mi 'byung ste/ pr-i ka ta'i me tog gi 'bras bu bzhin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas gnyis
<p>250b.6</p>kyi mtshan gyi sgo nas gleng bslang ba'i le'u gnyis pa bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /zhes pa ste/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyi nang gi dngos po dag las rang gi de kho na nyid don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi chos su dran cing rtogs
<p>250b.7</p>pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang gi de kho na nyid don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi chos ston to/ /de'i phyir gsungs te/ de nas sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byin rlabs las/ 'od zer gyi snang bas stong gsum la sogs pa'i gnas
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>rnams gsal bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams bskul zhing / rgyud yongs su dag pa'i 'gro ba thams cad bsdus nas/ de dag gi mdun du dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa sna tshogs sprul zhing 'khod pa las/ nyid kyi mthus 'byung ba
<p>251a.2</p>dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i brtan g.yo dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi don/ bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid ston te gzugs kyi 'phrul pa
<p>251a.3</p>sna tshogs dang / sgra'i 'phrul pa sna tshogs snang ba mdzad do/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa skyes te/ sna tshogs rab tu bkod pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang / sna tshogs rnam par bsgyur ba'i bstod pas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad nas lan mang du bskor bas 'dud
<p>251a.4</p>cing phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yang dang yang du gsol ba btab cing gleng bslang ngo zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig don rgya cher gsungs so/ /tshig gi don 'di ni nye ba mngon sum pa'i tshig ste snang srid kyi
<p>251a.5</p>dngos po dbang po'i snang ba dag go/ /de nyid dbyings skye ba med pa stong pa nyid las rang byung ste yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung ba chen po lnga dang 'gro ba lnga dang phung po lnga la sogs pa so so'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang spyi'i rnam pa'i sgo nas mi mthun pa'i mtshan rtog gnas su dag
<p>251a.6</p>pa'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas drug gi spyod yul du snang ba'o/ /de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i rang byung gi ye shes chen po gnyis can gyi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i tshul bde ba chen po'i sku gcig pu ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid de dus gsum sangs
<p>251a.7</p>rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'o/ /de las rnam par 'phrul pa'i thugs rje chen po rab tu che ba'i lha dag ni so sor rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i tshul du phun sum tshogs par bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ 'di dag stong nyid rang byung ba/ /snang srid chos rnams
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis med ye shes gcig pu las/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs che ba'i lha/ /byin rlabs sprul pa'i sgra yis ni/ /rgyud don de nyid gleng slong mdzad/ /ces so/ /des ni zab pa dang rgya che ba'i don phyogs gcig tu bstan to/ /khyad par gyi dbang du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni
<p>251b.2</p>sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa po ste/ 'di ni rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba las grub pas bdud bzhi bcom zhing dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das chen po gnyis su med pa'i bdag
<p>251b.3</p>nyid gcig pu'i ngo bor gnas shing yon tan gyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba'i lhar gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /kun bdag rang nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis med ye shes gcig pu'i dngos/ /rnam 'phrul rab tu che ba'i lha/ /zhes so/ /
<p>251b.4</p>sngags dang dbyibs kyi sgo nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rlung zhu ba de gnyis dang bcas pa 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das te rlung rnam pa bcu dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi rtog pa 'joms shing rang bzhin bde ba chen po gcig pu'i ngo bor bzhugs pas rab tu che ba'i lha'o/ /de yang rtog
<p>251b.5</p>pa bdun pa las/ sngags tshogs dbyibs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis med rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /bde chen rab tu che ba'i lha/ /zhes pa dang / yang / dngos po de nyid la brten te/ /dkyil 'khor rab sprul sgyu ma'i tshogs/ /
<p>251b.6</p>sngags dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /chos kyi de nyid rab ston phyir/ /don de nyid kyi sgo nas ni/ /don de nyid ni gsal bar byed/ /brda yis gleng slong rkyen du mdzad/ /ces so/ /de dag ni gleng bslang ba'i don mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa'o/ /de ltar rgyu rkyen tshogs pa
<p>251b.7</p>las byung ba ni mtshon byed kyi rgyud do/ /des bsgrub par bya ba ni gzhi dang lam gyi chos te de las byung ba ni sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de'i phyir mtshon bya mtha' dag ni 'bras bu'i tshul du gnas skabs kyis gnas so/ /des na rgyud dang ston pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas
<p>252a</p>
<p>252a.1</p>yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po mdor bstan cing / rtog pa gsum pa'i don bsdu ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ces te/ de ltar tshig drug po des ni 'og gi gzhung rnam par bsdus pa'o/ /de la phyogs bcur
<p>252a.2</p>gnas shing dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos can dang chos nyid gnyis su med pa'i ngang du mnyam par sbyor la/ rtogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi bdag nyid de/ ye shes chen pos chos nyid la gnas shing thugs rje chen pos
<p>252a.3</p>sems can gyi don la mnyam par sbyor ro/ /mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas rang rang gi de nyid la gnas shing / sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis gdul bya'i don dang mthun par sprul cing / theg pa'i rim pa tha dad pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi khams dag theg pa thun mong gi lam lnga dang / 
<p>252a.4</p>khyad par gyi lam gnyis kyis nges par legs pa'i bde ba mchog /sku dang ye shes yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i gnas la 'jog par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje 'dzin mchog bde chen sku/ /phyogs bcu'i chos
<p>252a.5</p>rnams ma lus dang / /thams cad sku gsum mnyam sbyor zhing / /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs kyi las/ /rnam 'phrul bstan pas 'dul mdzad de/ /bde mchog 'bras bur bcas pa'i lam/ /zhes so/ /khyad par gyi dbang du sangs rgyas
<p>252a.6</p>kyi sgo nas mtshan med kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas mtshan bcas dang phrin las dang tshogs 'khor dang / mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas sgrub pa la sogs pa dang / mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang / sgyu ma'i sgo nas lta ba dang / spyod pa dang / bde
<p>252a.7</p>mchog gi sgo nas dbang bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rtog pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa las/ sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan gyi grangs/ /tshig drug rnam par bstan pa gang / /gzhir gyur ji ltar gnas pa dang / /lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshogs dang / /'bras bu mdzad bcas
<p>252b</p>
<p>252b.1</p>bsdus pa ste/ /mtshon bya'i de nyid gcig pa las/ /khyad par sgra yi tshig lam gyis/ /brda don nges pa'i gtan tshigs bstan/ /zhes so/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis srog dang stsol ba gnyis su med cing rtog pa'i dri ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid stsol ba lnga nas nyi khri chig stong drug
<p>252b.2</p>brgya'i bar du spro zhing / gnas bcu nas bye ba bzhi 'bum du bsdus te/ dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la mnyam par sbyor nas nyams su myong ba'i khyad par gyis srog stsol sngags kyi rnam pas mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rang bzhin a wa d+hU tIr zhugs te/ bde ba chen po'i ye shes zag pa med
<p>252b.3</p>pa'i mchog tu gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ srog stsol gnyis med sangs rgyas sku/ /dri med 'khor bcas gnas sbyor zhing / /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /bde chen a wa d+hU tIr zhugs/ /zag pa med pa'i ye shes mchog /chos kun de las gzhan ma
<p>252b.4</p>yin/ /zhes so/ /dbyibs kyi tshul gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i byang sems 'khor lo'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i snang ba las/ 'khor lo'i 'dab ma dang yi ge thams cad du bskor zhing / thabs dang shes rab me rlung sgrub pa'i rkyen gyis mnyam par sbyor te/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi
<p>252b.5</p>sems 'bebs pa dang / gzung ba dang / slar gyen du bzlog pas dga' ba'i rim pa 'khor lo'i gnas su skye ste/ lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa'i rnam pas mkha' 'gro'i tshul du zag pa med pa'i byang sems sgyu ma bde mchog tu gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa
<p>252b.6</p>bdun pa las/ bde chen lhan skyes 'khor lo'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun du 'khor lo'i tshul/ /thabs shes sbyor ba'i byang chub sems/ /'byung bzlog zag med bde mchog sku/ /chos kyi tshul gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnyis med ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /dngos sogs thams cad
<p>252b.7</p>mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /chos rnams bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ /zhes so/ /des ni rgyud kyi don mdor bstan pa'o/ /de dag ni dpe bdun dang yan lag lnga la sogs pas thun mong du bstan to/ /da ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po 'bring du bstan te/ 
<p>253a</p>
<p>253a.1</p>de yang dang po gcig pu'i sgo nas ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ chags med chags dang bral ba min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /zhes te/ sngags kyi dbang du srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam pas 'byung 'jug gi rim pa la spro bsdu'i chags pa dang / de rnam par spangs pa'i
<p>253a.2</p>dga' bde dang / mtha' thams cad spangs pa'i dbu ma dag gi yang rnam par mi dmigs te/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi sgo nas rab tu sbyangs nas bde ba chen po'i de bzhin nyid blta bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rim pa la/ /chags pa chags bral dbu
<p>253a.3</p>ma dag /kun spyod mtha' las rnam grol ba/ /bde ba chen po blta bar bya/ /zhes so/ /dbyibs kyi sgo nas lhan cig skyes pa'i chu rgyun rang gi gnas su bsdam pa dang / gzhan gyi gnas su gtong ba dang / shas cig gzung zhing shas cig gtong ba'i rnam par mi dmigs te/ rdo rje dbyings
<p>253a.4</p>ma dang rin po che 'bar ba ka ta'i mtshams su de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bltas nas ma zin pa zin pa la sogs pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gsal ba dang / slar gyen du drangs te lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bde ba'i byang chub sems
<p>253a.5</p>tshogs rgyun/ /chags pa chags bral dbu ma dngos/ /zhen chags mtha' las 'das pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i snyoms 'jug gnas/ /zhes so/ /chos su dbang po'i snang ba rab 'bring gsum gyi rnam pa mtha' dag gang la yang / so so'i skye bo'i rtog pa dang / nyan thos kyi
<p>253a.6</p>rtog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa gang yang mi dmigs te chags pa gnyis dang bral ba'i tshul gyis chags pa gnyis la longs spyod pa'o/ /de'i dus na chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba la dngos po dang blo'i chos ris su med de/ snang ba'i chos ni rang gi
<p>253a.7</p>rang bzhin dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du gnas la de la bde ba chen po'i rgyas thebs pas zag pa med pa'i sku cir yang snang zhing srid pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ chags dang chags bral tshul spyod cing / /dbu ma'i rtog pas 'ching 'gyur te/ /gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i
<p>253b</p>
<p>253b.1</p>ngang / /snang ba nyid na stong pa'i dbyibs/ /stong pa nyid na snang ba yin/ /dbang po drug gi yul la rol/ /chos rnams mngon sum bde chen po/ /gzugs sogs rab 'bring tha ma med/ /snang stong bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /dmigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /zhes so/ /da ni dmigs
<p>253b.2</p>pa'i yul de nyid kyi sgo nas 'di ni rang byung zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir/ bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /ces so/ /sngags kyi tshul du srog dang rtsol ba dag ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul du gnas la/ de las ni dngos po'i 'phrul pa thams
<p>253b.3</p>cad snang bas bud med lta bu'o/ /des thams cad kyi don mtshon zhing mtshan par byed pas na sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa gnyis can dang bral zhing theg pa mchog tu gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ srog rtsol gnyis med las byung ba'i/ /dngos kun
<p>253b.4</p>de bzhin nyid kyi dbyibs/ /bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya mchog /'di ni theg pa'i rnam grol chos/ /zhes so/ /dbyibs kyi tshul du las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba las byung zhing / dngos po'i de kho na nyid ston par mdzad pas sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don gsal bar byed pas phyag rgya
<p>253b.5</p>chen po'i rang bzhin theg pa'i mchog go/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /dga' bde sgyu ma 'joms par byed/ /chos kyi phyag rgya goms pa'i mthus/ /phyag rgya chen po gsal bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /chos kyi dbyings yum kun du bzang mo phyag rgya
<p>253b.6</p>chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid la bde ba'i phyag rgyas rol pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gzugs sogs chos rnams gnyis med pa/ /bud med kun gyi phyag rgya yin/ /zhes so/ /de dag ni lta ba'i mtshan
<p>253b.7</p>nyid chos thams cad ji ltar gnas shing / de rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya ba'i thabs te/ zab pa'i sgo nas rnam par phye bas rgya che ba'i tshogs kyis ni ma yin no/ /'dis ni le'u gnyis pa'i stobs lta ba rnam par bsdus pa ste/ khyung chen lding ba'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni sgyu ma'i sgo
<p>254a</p>
<p>254a.1</p>nas spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni des grub pa'o/ /zhes pas ni lta spyod zung du 'brel ba'i gtan tshigs bstan te/ de nas gzhi'i mtshan nyid ni dngos rtogs kyi sangs rgyas
<p>254a.2</p>gnyis las gyes kyang sgyu ma'i khongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad gtan la dbab par byed pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma dang / de'i rjes su dpag pa'o/ /de yang mngon sum ni gsal bar snang la/ rjes su dpag pa ni lkog tu gyur pa ste yid dpyod kyi shes pa'o/ /'dir sgyu ma'i dpe
<p>254a.3</p>brgyad dag ni mngon sum du snang la/ de'i rjes su gcig dang du bral dang / mu bzhi skye 'gag la sogs pas gzhal nas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med par 'dod pa ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i gzhung yin te/ des ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i sku sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can
<p>254a.4</p>rtogs shing mthong bar mi 'gyur bas/ nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni nams kyang bgrod pa ma yin no/ /'dir ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i gzhung gis mngon sum gyis mtshon byed gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa grol lam thabs kyi sgo nas dang / chags lam shes rab kyi sgo nas dang
<p>254a.5</p>gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgo nas bud med sgyu ma'i dga' ba nyams su myong bas/ bde ba chen po'i ros rgyas pa ni khyad par che ste/ de nyid rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i tshul du ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang / rang bzhin gyis de ltar grub pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rang gi rang bzhin
<p>254a.6</p>rtogs dka' ba/ /grol chags gnyis med phyag rgya che/ /bud med gsum la brten pa'i mthus/ /mngon sum bde ba nyams su myong / /de don lta ba'i yul dam pa/ /ting 'dzin spyod par bya ba'ang de/ /bsgrub cing 'bras bu sgyu ma'i tshul/ /de nyid nges pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>254a.7</p>sku/ /zhes so/ /de'i 'bras bu'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /zhes te/ 'jig rten 'dir yang yon tan thams cad 'grub cing / gzhan du che ba'i yon tan gyi rnam grangs bdag nyid chen po gus par
<p>254b</p>
<p>254b.1</p>byed pa'o/ /gang zag rnam pa bzhi'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis rgya chen po'i spyod pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa'i tshul dang / 'bring dang dman pa'i lam zab mor ston pa dang / shin tu yang zab mo'i tshul du gnas pa/ dbang po yul la dga' bar longs spyod pa'i phyir gsungs
<p>254b.2</p>te/ rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ gang zag las dang po pas ni rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya gang rnyed pa btsal zhing / sbyor thabs drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /ye shes la cung zhig dbang bas ni bde ba'i
<p>254b.3</p>ye shes ma skyes kyi bar du snyoms 'jug la gnas shing de nyid gzung bar bya'o/ /ye shes la yang dag par dbang bas ni rang nyid kyi phyag rgya mthong zhing dga' ba'i sems skyes pa tsam gyis bde ba chen po'i skur gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu rnam par grol ba'i gang zag
<p>254b.4</p>gis ni dbang po drug gi yul kun gyis zag pa med pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lta ba gnyis med kyi don bsgom pas nyams su blang zhing / ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyi grogs su ni spyod pa bya ste/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / gnas mal dang / las su bya
<p>254b.5</p>ba'i 'jig rten na smod cing ngan pa'i las dag spyod pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gang zag bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun spyod/ /rgya chen mchog gyur 'bring dman pa/ /zab mo shin tu zab mo'i tshul/ /dpe yi lhan
<p>254b.6</p>skyes bde ba yis/ /bde chen lhan cig skyes bde rgyas/ /de phyir spyod pa la gnas pas/ /yang dag ye shes rnyed par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'o na 'ching bar byed pa nyid kyis grol lam zhe na/ rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur nas/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub/ /ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i
<p>254b.7</p>phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to/ /zhes so/ /khyad par gyi don du stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog ste/ rang gi ngo bo yongs su bsgyur nas lha'i sku gsung thugs bud med nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas
<p>255a</p>
<p>255a.1</p>pa'i sgyu mas 'grub pa'o/ /des na ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di nyid mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'o/ /zab mo'i dbang du bzang rtog gi rnam pa de nyid kyang rang rang gi ngo bor bsgyur te/ bud med gsum gyi sgyu mas 'grub pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la gnas par
<p>255a.2</p>'gyur ro/ /des na ngo mtshar sgyu ma zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ skyes bu dug gis zin pa la/ /dug gi de nyid shes pas grol/ /de bzhin rtog pas bcings pa las/ /rtog pa'i de nyid shes pas grol/ /zhes so/ /'di ni lta spyod
<p>255a.3</p>zung du 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid las shas cher spyod pa bstan pas/ le'u bzhi pa rnam par bsdus te gna' bu brag la gnas pa'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ DA ki ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes/ khams las mngon du
<p>255a.4</p>brtags pa ste/ /nam mkha' kun du spyod grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /zhes te/ kun du 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can gyi rgya che ba'i sgo gnyis nas thugs rje chen po'i mdzad spyod rnam pa mtha' yas pas gdul bya'i don bya ba'i phyir/ sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i
<p>255a.5</p>sangs rgyas de nyid las rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston cing / ye shes kyi 'khor los 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dang / phyis 'jug pa po rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pa dang / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dag
<p>255a.6</p>ni mkha' 'gro nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid can dag gzugs brnyan las bsgrub cing gsal bar bya ste phyi nang gi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dngos po dag ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor drug gi bdag nyid du gnas shing / de las khyad par gyi las rtsom pa'i don du rdul tshon
<p>255a.7</p>dang / rten dang yum gyi phyag rgyas mngon du brtags te nam mkha' spyod pa'i las mtha' dag 'grub par byed do/ /des na sna tshogs su 'grub pas mkha' 'gro ma zhes grags so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ kun du 'gro bas rab tu gnas/ /sngon byung dkyil 'khor rtogs
<p>255b</p>
<p>255b.1</p>dka' ba/ /gsal mdzad rjes 'jug bya ba'i tshogs/ /gzugs brnyan phyi nang 'byung tshogs las/ /nye bar mtshon byed dkyil 'khor gsum/ /mkha' 'gro'i brda yis rab tu bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /zab pa'i sgo nas ye shes chen pos chos nyid kyi ngang du 'gro bar byed de
<p>255b.2</p>thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i bud med gsum gyi khams las mngon du brtags pas/ thabs kyi sgo nas dang / shes rab kyi sgo nas dang / gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas dang / gnyis su med pa'i sgyu ma bde ba chen po nam mkha' lta bu la kun du spyod pas 'grub ste/ /
<p>255b.3</p>mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma yi brda yis ni/ /zab mo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byed/ /ces pa dang / rtog pa bdun pa las kyang / thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i/ /bud med gsum gyi khams las ni/ /
<p>255b.4</p>gnyis med sgyu ma bde chen po/ /nam mkha' lta bur gnas 'gyur te/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi phyag rgya yis/ /gzugs brnyan la brten ye shes gsal/ /zhes so/ /de ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sgo nas bstan pa dag mjug bsdu ba'i phyir/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /
<p>255b.5</p>thams cad ma lus bde mchog gi /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /zhes te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ma lus pa dag phyag rgya gnyis kyi bdag nyid du snang ba la de dag thams cad ma lus pa yang
<p>255b.6</p>gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po'i sku'i rnam pa can no/ /de'i dus na blos btags pa'i mtshan ma can dang / dngos po'i chos thams cad gnyis su med pa sgyu ma'i gzugs can te/ de la ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma zhes brdar grags te/ 'di
<p>255b.7</p>nyid kyi le'u dgu pa las kyang / Di zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /khams gsum 'di ni rnam par brtag /nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad nam mkhar 'gro ba ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
<p>256a</p>
<p>256a.1</p>mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni/ /A ra li zhes rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang A ra li/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o/ /zhes so/ /ci snga na med pa cig gzugs brnyan gyis thob par byed dam zhe na/ 
<p>256a.2</p>de ni nam mkha' 'gro ma zhes/ /sangs rgyas khams las rnam par brtags/ /kun du 'gro bar grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /zhes te/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo bde mchog sgyu ma lta bu las/ 'gro ba rang rang gi rtog pas
<p>256a.3</p>bsgribs te gnyis can gyi chos sna tshogs la spyod kyang / de kho na'i rang bzhin la g.yo zhing bslad pa med de rang gi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'o/ /de yang gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis ye nas lhun gyis grub cing gnas pa ni rgyu/ de la dmigs shing spyod pa ni lam/ gsal bar nyams su
<p>256a.4</p>myong ba ni 'bras bu ste yul dang yul can dbyer med pa'i rnam pas rtag tu gnas pa'i chos kyi sku'o/ /de las kun du 'gro ba ni gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis so/ /de dag bde ba chen po'i sgyu ma'i rnam par grub pa ni mthar phyin pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /des ni sangs rgyas kun bdag
<p>256a.5</p>mkha' 'gro ma ste/ de gsal bar ston pas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ thams cad sku dang ye shes snang / /de nyid rang bzhin dngos po gsang / /sangs rgyas khams las rnam brtags te/ /kun du 'gro ba grub pa'i tshul/ /
<p>256a.6</p>gzugs brnyan stobs kyis nyams myong ba/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshan nyid las khyad par du gzugs brnyan gyi rim pa ste/ le'u bdun pa'i phyogs gcig bsdus pas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'phur ba'i dpes
<p>256a.7</p>bstan to/ /da ni bde ba'i sgo nas dbang bstan pa'i phyir/ sham zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog yin/ /sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba/ /mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog /ces te/ sham bar a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas gtan tshigs tshangs pa'i
<p>256b</p>
<p>256b.1</p>sgra sbyar ba bzhin du/ sgo gsum gyi dri ma 'khru zhing bde ba bskyed de nus pa khyad par can bskyed cing skad cig ma'i rnam pas rgyud yongs su smin nas grol ba'i lam la sbyor zhing / rten khyad par can du 'gyur te/ yon tan dang phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas dbang
<p>256b.2</p>dang po'i gnas skabs su sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyi'i bum pa dang / yab yum sbyor ba las byung ba'i bde ba chen pos 'od du zhu ba'i rgyun nang gi bum pa mchog tu gyur pas dbang bskur ba dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyis shes rab kyi sgyu ma dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i
<p>256b.3</p>bde bas dbang bskur ba dang / rang nyid kyis las kyi phyag rgya la brten te bla ma'i gdams ngag bzhin mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pa dang / bde ba'i mchog zag pa med pa'i ye shes bskyed nas/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la gnas pa'i dbang ngo / /de ltar dbang
<p>256b.4</p>tha ma gnyis rang la skye yang gdams ngag gi stobs kyis byung bas bskur ba'i dbang ngo / /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bde mchog ces bya'i sgra yis ni/ /sgo gsum dag byed dbang gi lam/ /bzhi po bskur ba'i thabs dag gis/ /bde chen gsal ba bsgrub pa'i
<p>256b.5</p>mchog /kun gyi bde mchog dang po ste/ /sgyu ma'i rab sbyor gnyis pa yin/ /mchog tu bde ba gsum pa yin/ /bde ba'i mchog gyur bzhi pa'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni dbang gi rim pa'i don mdor bstan te/ le'u drug pa dang bdun pa dang dgu pa'i phyag rgya bcu drug pa
<p>256b.6</p>bsdus pas/ seng ge dang gna' bu'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni sangs rgyas kyi sgo nas mtshan med kyi sgom pa bstan pa'i phyir/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por
<p>256b.7</p>bdag 'gyur te/ /zhes te/ thabs kyi sgo nas dang / shes rab kyi sgo nas dang / gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yul kun du dus kun nas dbang po'i snang ba thams cad ni rig pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid gnas skabs kun du mi 'gyur bar/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
<p>257a</p>
<p>257a.1</p>par zhal sbyor ba gsum gyi tshul du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ yul dus kun du ma nyams blos/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom par bya/ /sngags dbyibs chos kyi
<p>257a.2</p>phyag rgya yis/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi dngos por bsgom/ /zhes so/ /de nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa ni slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pas sgrub pa'i thabs su rgyud kyi dum bu bsdebs nas bkod pa las shes par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan te/ zab pa'i sgo
<p>257a.3</p>nas dbye zhing le'u lnga pa'i phyogs gcig dang / dgu pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bsdu zhing bya lag gi dpes bstan to/ /da ni thams cad kyi sgo nas mtshan bcas kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir/ sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin
<p>257a.4</p>bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /zhes so/ /de la bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing rang nyid dbang dang dam tshig tu ldan pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don bya ba'i bsam
<p>257a.5</p>pas gnas te/ stong pa nyid dang lha'i skur bsgom pa dang / sgo gsum nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bdag dang 'gro ba sbyar zhing gsal bar bya ba dang / dpa' bo bsam zhing 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can la tshogs bsags
<p>257a.6</p>pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor los bgegs tshar bcad cing slar bsrung ba dang / gzhi'i ting 'dzin dang / rten gyi ting 'dzin rnams bsgoms nas sbyor ba'i don bsam par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku 'phrul dga'i tshul du gnas pa las/ dbus kyi gdan thog tu byon
<p>257a.7</p>nas rnam thar sgo bzhi'i snyoms 'jug la gnas pa las/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslangs nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas sku yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /dang po dbyings dang ye shes zab pa dang rgya che ba'i mtshan ma nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ni/ 
<p>257b</p>
<p>257b.1</p>sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te byang chub kyi sems dang thugs rje chen po'i rtags so/ /de la gnas pa'i A li bcu drug dang / kA li bzhi bcu 'phro zhing 'du bas mtshan dang dpe byad mi ldan pa dang mi gsal bdag grub par mdzad nas/ nyi zla'i dkyil du g.yas g.yon gyi phreng
<p>257b.2</p>bas mtshan pa ni byang chub spyod pas sems can skyong ba'o/ /de la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bum par hUM gis mtshan zhing 'od zer lnga'i tshogs 'phro ba ni sna tshogs nyid do/ /de las byung ba'i rigs drug gi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdud bzhi dang / de'i rigs kyi phyogs rnams bcom nas
<p>257b.3</p>sku gsung thugs la bsdu zhing rang gi gnas su zhugs pas rdo rje chen por gyur to/ /de las rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur gyur pa ni byang chub kyi sems lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ zla ba sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /nyi ma sems dpa'i ting
<p>257b.4</p>nge 'dzin/ /A li kA li las gnyis tshogs/ /byang chub spyod pa sems can skyong / /rdo rje kha dog sna tshogs 'od/ /'phro 'dus bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /byang sems ye shes ldan pa yi/ /rgyu yi mgon po sangs rgyas mchog /ces pa dang / rtog pa bsdus pa las
<p>257b.5</p>kyang / ting 'dzin las kyi khyad par ni/ /sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste/ /sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa'o/ /rnam par shes la sems dpa' gnas/ /rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba'o/ /zhes so/ /rim pa rgyas par ni rtsa ba'i
