<p>257b.6</p>rgyud las/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan dag la/ /dpal mchog dang po bzhugs mdzad de/ /chos kun stong nyid mtshan mar bral/ /smon med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas kyang / /'gog pa'i rang bzhin la gnas la/ /phyogs bcu'i
<p>257b.7</p>rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yi rdzogs skur gyur/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /a yig bcu drug gnas pa la/ /thugs rje chen po shar byed pa'i/ /nyi dkyil ka yig sum cu bzhi/ /lce rtsa can bzhi mi gsal gnyis/ /skar ma'i
<p>258a</p>
<p>258a.1</p>gzugs 'dra bsgom par bya/ /de dag 'phro zhing 'dus pa yis/ /tshogs gnyis mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs/ /ye shes dang po gnyis ston cing / /byang chub sems gnyis mtshan nyid do/ /gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar gsal dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /
<p>258a.2</p>bum par hUM mtshan rnams gsal ba/ /tshogs gnyis 'bras bu yongs rdzogs rtags/ /kha dog lnga yi snang ba las/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor bsam byas pas/ /rang gi gnas rnams sbyor mdzad cing / /dkyil 'khor so so 'khor bcas pa/ /slar 'dus sku gsung thugs
<p>258a.3</p>zhugs pas/ /rdo rje 'od bcas chen por gyur/ /ye shes bar ma gnyis ston cing / /byang chub sems gnyis mtshan nyid do/ /lnga pa cho ga rdzogs pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhengs te/ /ye shes byang sems lnga pa las/ /phyag rgya chen po gsal ba yin/ /zhes
<p>258a.4</p>so/ /da ni 'bras bu'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dag bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang / /nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang / /de dag gi yang rigs yin no/ /zhes te/ rgyu'i rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang / he ru ka
<p>258a.5</p>gnyis ni rdo rje'i rigs so/ /gar gyi dbang phyug dang rta mchog gnyis ni pad+ma'i rigs so/ /ci las kyi rigs pad+mar 'gyur ram zhe na/ phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa dang rta'i skad dang bcas pa'o/ /rnam snang dang nyi ma gnyis ni rin po che'i rigs te sku dang yon tan rin po che'i tshogs
<p>258a.6</p>pa la longs spyod par mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gi rigs ni 'khor gyi lha mo rnams te/ sbyor ba'i rjes su sbyor ba dang shin tu sbyor ba chen pos sangs rgyas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bsgom par bya zhes pa'o/ /'di dag ni gsang sngags khyad par gyi don du bshad pa ste/ 
<p>258a.7</p>seng ge'i dpes bsgrub cing / le'u lnga pa'i phyogs gcig dang dgu pa'i cha shas bsdus pa'o/ /da ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi rnam par snang ba dang / thams cad kyi khongs su phrin las bsdu ba'i phyir/ de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags
<p>258b</p>
<p>258b.1</p>bral/ /'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /zhes te 'dod chags ni rigs drug gi sems can rnams so/ /de
<p>258b.2</p>dang bral ba ni theg pa 'og ma pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i dman pa'i rigs can no/ /'dod pa ni longs spyod lnga yis myos pa'o/ /grol ba ni de la yang ma chags pa'o/ /de dag gi rang bzhin yin pa dang / yang rang rgyud pa dag 'dul ba'i don du sprul pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o/ /des na rdo
<p>258b.3</p>rje 'chang chen pos ni srid pa dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ skyon med brtag pa'i gtan du ni/ /'dod chags thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /zhes so/ /
<p>258b.4</p>yang srid pa phyogs gcig gi don du/ dus gsum gyi rnam pas bsdus shing rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i srid pa'i chos kun gyi bdag nyid de/ 'jig rten gyi gnas mchog tu gyur pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang brgya byin gyi ngo bor yang bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gsum ni sa
<p>258b.5</p>'og sa steng sa bla ste/ de'i bdag po ni myos byed dang / rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa'o/ /khams gsum ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa'o/ /des na sna tshogs tha dad cing dbang po drug gi yul du gyur pa'i snod bcud kyi dngos
<p>258b.6</p>por gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /kun grub zag med bde ba ni/ /bde chen rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku/ /zhes pa dang / yang / 'jig rten gsum bdag mtha'
<p>258b.7</p>yas phyir/ /'dul mdzad srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum/ /'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin/ /zhes pa dang / yang / sems can bsod nams cher 'phags shing / /mi g.yo thams cad kho na'i bdag / 
<p>259a</p>
<p>259a.1</p>'dul byed sems kyi g.yo ba ste/ /'du byed thams cad kho na'i phyir/ /zhes pa dang / yang / snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang / /gang phyir sems can 'dul mdzad pa/ /des na kun du bzang po ste/ /byang chub spyod pas gzhan skyong mdzad/ /ces so/ /
<p>259a.2</p>theg pa thun mong gi dbang du bshad pa'o/ /khyad par gyi don du ni/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ grol bar mdzad pas zhi ba ste/ /'dod pa'i tshogs grub rgyas pa yin/ /'dod chags tshul gnas dbang gi las/ /chags bral drag pos gsad par mdzad/ /dus gsum sku
<p>259a.3</p>gsum rtag bzhugs shing / /srid gsum sku gsum thugs su dag /mchog gsum theg pas 'gro 'dul zhing / /lam gsum mdzad pas gzhan rgyud sel/ /sa gsum gnas dga' rab tu gnon/ /mdzad pa'i tshogs 'phrul dag mdzad cing / /sna tshogs phrin las
<p>259a.4</p>rab tu spyod/ /ces pa dang / yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi 'dod pa'i don chags shing / /drag pos chags bral gsad par mdzad/ /yon tan tshogs rgyas 'dod pa'i las/ /zhi bas rab tu grol byed pa'o/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /dbyings
<p>259a.5</p>kyi sgo nas gsang ba'i phrin las ni/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ 'dod pa dga' ba'i rnam pa can/ /'dod chags rjes su dga' ba'i tshul/ /chags bral dga' mtha' bral ba'i dngos/ /rnam grol lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /zhes pa dang / yang / dus gsum dag tu 'bebs
<p>259a.6</p>gzung bzlog /srid gsum yi ges rtsa gsum 'gengs/ /mchog gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang / /'jig rten khams rnams gsal bar byas/ /sna tshogs gnas pa'i chos rnams kun/ /bde ba che las gzhan ma yin/ /zhes so/ /de dag gi mjug bsdu zhing
<p>259a.7</p>gtan tshigs su/ 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun/ /thams cad du ni 'dir 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa/ /dngos po thams cad de yin te/ /zhes te/ rgya che ba'i
<p>259b</p>
<p>259b.1</p>tshul gnyis dang / dbyibs kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad nyid rnam par gnas par kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin no/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ rtag tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems nyid nges
<p>259b.2</p>pa'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u dgu pa'i phyag rgya shas cher bsdus te nor bu rin po che dang seng ge'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni rtog pa mngon du 'gyur ba'i kun rdzob dang / mnyam sbyor gyi don gyis tshogs 'khor bsdu ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje
<p>259b.3</p>sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog go/ /zhes chos can gyi dngos pos gang du khyab par chos nyid kyi rang bzhin de dag thams cad dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin no/ /de
<p>259b.4</p>ltar don gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i de nyid ni de bzhin du gshegs pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /gang zhe na dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo las bsgrub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa
<p>259b.5</p>bdun pa las/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing / /lha mo kun gyi bde ba bskyed/ /ces so/ /'dis ni le'u drug pa bsdus te gna' bu dang seng ge'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni mnyam sbyor
<p>259b.6</p>gyi sgo nas grub pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur ba/ /zhes te/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i gzhung du bskal pa grangs med par dka' ba spyad cing tshogs
<p>259b.7</p>bsags pas lam rnam pa lnga mthar phyin nas/ drang ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas 'grub par 'dod pa des ni nges pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa ma yin te/ rang gi de kho na nyid du mi shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis kyi don shes pas/ cho ga gang
<p>260a</p>
<p>260a.1</p>dag gis bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas/ tshe 'di nyid la thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub cing / mchog gi dngos grub kyi lam la sbyor bar byed pa dang / yang tshe 'dis mchog gi dngos grub rig 'dzin thob ste/ des na/ de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /
<p>260a.2</p>sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog /bdag nyid shin tu sgrub pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go/ /zhes so/ /de yang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas brtag par bya ste/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang / de nyid bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang gi mtshan
<p>260a.3</p>nyid bsgrubs pas de'i rnam pa gsal zhing nyams su myong ngo / /de yang rgyud las/ mtshan nyid theg dman lam zhugs pas/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi gnas don/ /rab gsungs theg pa'i byang chub 'grub/ /ces so/ /'dis
<p>260a.4</p>ni bsgrub pa'i rim pa le'u gsum pa bsdus te/ ngang pa dang seng ge'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni lha dang gnyis su lta ba dgag pa'i phyir/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /lugs ma la sogs
<p>260a.5</p>rnal 'byor skye/ /zhes te/ gang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par ston pa de la rnal 'byor te/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ thabs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul zhing / /shes rab dbyings su sbyor sgrub pas/ /rnal 'byor gsal bar mtshon pa ste/ /gnyis med phyag rgya de nyid
<p>260a.6</p>ston/ /zhes pa dang / yang / shes rab dbyings las byung ba yi/ /sbyor ba bzhi la legs gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /dus kun du ni rnam par spyod/ /ces pa dang / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang / thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/ /
<p>260a.7</p>rnal 'byor zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /shes rab rang bzhin med pa ste/ /mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul thabs yin no/ /zhes so/ /de la gnas pa'i sgrub po la ni 'byor pa zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig de dang mi ldan pa'i 'jug pa po dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis bdag dang lha
<p>260b</p>
<p>260b.1</p>gnyis su lta zhing dmigs par byed de/ rten gyi gzugs brnyan las rnal 'byor 'byung zhing skye bar 'dod pas ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de yang glang po rab 'gog dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba dag las/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang / sangs rgyas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /
<p>260b.2</p>sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /ces pa dang / 'di dag gzhan las kyang rgya cher gsungs so/ /de ni sgrub pa'i zhar la spros pa'o/ /da ni mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir/ yang dag mchog sems rnal
<p>260b.3</p>'byor pa/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing de'i don la gnas pas gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig rang gi
<p>260b.4</p>bdag nyid dang sbyor zhing / mi 'gyur ba dam par gnas na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ zab cing rgya che'i chos dag gi /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor gnas/ /dam tshig lha gnyis rab sbyor bas/ /rang gi rang bzhin gsal 'grub 'gyur/ /
<p>260b.5</p>zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u drug pa dang bdun pa'i dam tshig bsdus te khyung dang gna' bu'i dpes bshad do/ /da ni de'i zhar la theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/ gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la/ /rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /byang chub sems la rab
<p>260b.6</p>brtson na/ /de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro/ /zhes te/ gong du lha dang gnyis su lta ba dgag ste/ gang zhig nang du rang gi ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pas ni theg pa chen po 'og ma rnams las khyad par du 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ bsam 'das
<p>260b.7</p>rgya chen zab pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad zad med bde/ /kun gyi dri ma med pa ni/ /byang chub sems bdag brten pa yin/ /zhes pa dang / yang / sems de kho na bdud nyid de/ /sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs/ /rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni/ /bdag
<p>261a</p>
<p>261a.1</p>nyid bdud las rgyal ba yin/ /zhes pa dang / yang / rang sems so sor rig pa ni/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje yin/ /de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ /rang byin brlab mchog bsgom phyir ro/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni dbu zhabs kyi theg pa rnam par 'byed pa ste/ khyung
<p>261a.2</p>dang bya lag gi dpes bshad do/ /da ni phan yon gyi che ba bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sgo nas
<p>261a.3</p>byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni rdo rje lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin no/ /de lta bas na lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i don rnams shes shing nyams su blangs na sbyor ba'i stobs kyis thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud
<p>261a.4</p>las/ lta spyod ting 'dzin bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dam tshig tshogs/ /phrin las thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /zhes pa dang / rtog pa bsdus pa las kyang / gang gi rtog pa mchog 'di sgrub par byed pa la/ /bdud nyid nye
<p>261a.5</p>bar mi 'gro mi brten nyid kyang min/ /rtog pa'i tshogs bcas bdag gis gzhom mdzad de/ /myur ba mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir brten par mi byed de/ /gang gis bdag gi snying po bdag la rtag tu 'grub byed cing / /mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtog pa bde chen dang / /
<p>261a.6</p>chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas/ /yig chen yang mi brten par bdag gis 'gyur bar byed/ /ces so/ /des ni le'u gnyis pa'i sman dang le'u so so'i khyad par gyi phan yon bsdus te/ rus sbal gyi dpes bshad do/ /da ni mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas 'bras bu phrin
<p>261a.7</p>las dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no/ /de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /zhes te/ 'brel pa'i tshul du mjug bsdu ba'i phyir/ tshig dang po gnyis kyis ni
<p>261b</p>
<p>261b.1</p>gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ dngos rtogs kyis sangs rgyas gnyis kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang / dpa' bo byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i sku ni chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs yin pas rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'o/ /de nyid tshul gsum gyis
<p>261b.2</p>rtogs par byas nas/ de'i rjes su tshig gnyis kyis ni lam gyi yan lag ste/ ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas bdag nyid lhar sbyor zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nyid goms shing mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni/ de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang / /
<p>261b.3</p>rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ nges pa'i don rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad dang / dpa' bo 'khor gyi sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i tshogs dang / rig 'dzin gyi bye brag
<p>261b.4</p>bzhin du gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dag bsgoms shing bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis sgrub pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa yang gsal bar 'gyur
<p>261b.5</p>ro/ /de yang 'og nas/ 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /zhes pa dang / rtog pa bdun pa las/ tshe 'dis rig 'dzin thob byed cing / /de gnas rim bzhin goms pa'i mthus/ /nges pa'i don gyis sangs rgyas che/ /bde chen sku gsum gnyis med 'grub/ /ces so/ /
<p>261b.6</p>des ni le'u bcu pa bsdus te/ rin po che'i dpes bstan to/ /de ltar gsungs pa de dag kyang sdud pa po'i rang dga'i tshig ma yin te/ yid ches pa'i khungs bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so zhes te/ sngon byung 'phrul pa'i 'khor los
<p>261b.7</p>dus rnam pa drug tu gdul bya'i rgyud grol bar mdzad nas/ rjes su 'jug pa po dag gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ ri rab kyi rtse mor sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyud bshad pa'o/ /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu
<p>262a</p>
<p>262a.1</p>ma bde ba'i mchog las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dang po'o zhes pa la/ gdul bya rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyi don du/ /ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rgya chen po'i tshul du rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po gsungs nas/ yang
<p>262a.2</p>bsdus pa la dga' ba dang / rtog pa mi 'dra ba rnam par gcad pa'i don du rdo rje'i tshig dgongs pa du ma dang ldan pa brda'i don gyis rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di nyid gsungs so/ /'dir ni shes par bya ba dang / nyams su blang ba dang / 'bras bu mthong ba'i de kho na nyid
<p>262a.3</p>gsum gyi don snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa dang / dam pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa'i thabs gsal zhing rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de nyid la rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ shes bya lam sgrub 'bras bu'i chos/ /bden gnyis
<p>262a.4</p>mtshungs gnas de nyid gsum/ /snang gsal dam pa rnams kyi yul/ /phyag rgya rtog pa'i rang tshul can/ /zhes pa dang / yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ rnam par mi rtog chos dag las/ /sems can don du yongs su rtog /des ni rtog pa zhes bya ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag
<p>262a.5</p>phyir ro/ /zhes so/ /le'u dang po'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig dmigs su med pa stong phrag gis ni lam du 'jug cing rin po che brtag par mi nus la/ de nyid kyi bstan bcos dang phan yon mi shes pa dag kyang de la 'jug cing phrad par mi 'gyur
<p>262a.6</p>ro/ /de ltar spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa dag gis ni yang dag pa'i don mi mthong zhing / so so'i phan yon mi shes pas na ci'i phyir 'jug par byed/ de'i phyir le'u gnyis par shes par bya ba'i gzhi lta ba'i bye brag dang / de'i zhar la phan yon
<p>262a.7</p>bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyogs rnams ma lus rnam brtags shing / /rang bzhin ngo bo las grol bas/ /rags pa'i dri ma kun spyod de/ /rnam grol phra ba'i lta rmongs 'gyur/ /kye ma'o rang nyid ma mthong ba/ /gzhan gang mthong zhing shes par 'gyur/ /
<p>262b</p>
<p>262b.1</p>zhes so/ /de la dang po lta ba spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba
<p>262b.2</p>chen po'i sku 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid can te/ gnyis can du rtog pa'i mtshan ma bdud la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams rang gi ngang gis bcom zhing / legs pa'i yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad la mnga' brnyes pas yon tan gyi bye brag gzhan med de rang bzhin lhun
<p>262b.3</p>gyis grub pa dang / rtogs pas mngon du gyur pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing / don rtags gnyis kyi tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med par bzhugs shing / sku gsung thugs las 'das te rang gi de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la
<p>262b.4</p>gnas nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i ngang tshul la gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /
<p>262b.5</p>gdod ma tho ma med phyir yang / /dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod de/ /'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir na/ /dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /zhes te/ sangs rgyas gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs so/ /de yang kun rdzob phyogs gcig gi sgo nas/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ sku mchog
<p>262b.6</p>mtshan dang dpe byad dang / /yon tan ma 'gags gsal snang zhing / /dkyil 'khor dbang la sogs par ldan/ /gsung thugs phrin las gsal bar snang / /zhes pa dang / yang / dus gsum sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /mgon rnams bde chen gnas bzhugs te/ /
<p>262b.7</p>gsal ba'i stobs dang mi 'jigs tshogs/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med sna tshogs snang / /zhes so/ /de dag gi don dam pa ni stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis gnas pa dmigs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad las dben pa zhi ba chen po'i dbyings so/ /spyi'i mtshan nyid ni gnyis
<p>263a</p>
<p>263a.1</p>su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i sku'o/ /de ltar gnas skabs kyi dbang du na bden pa gsum du bshad cing / rang gi mtshan nyid la gang du mi phye'o/ /des na/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /thams cad ma lus bde mchog gi /zhes te gong
<p>263a.2</p>du gsungs so/ /don de nyid kyi lta bas thag chod nas bsgom pas nyams su blangs nas 'grub pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor na/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /ces te/ phyag rgya gsum gyi sgo nas gnyis su med par sbyor na mchog tu gyur pa'i don phyin ci ma
<p>263a.3</p>log pa'i rnam pa dag 'grub par 'gyur te/ rang gi de kho na nyid las shar ba'i phyir ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad bde chen rdo rje sems/ /ma 'gags rol pa phyag rgya'i sku/ /kun rdzob snang zhing dngos med pa'i/ /don dam las 'da' sgyu ma'i dbyings/ /rang
<p>263a.4</p>bzhin gsal bar sbyor byas pas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /ces so/ /de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i thabs ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /gang zhig la dang por sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
<p>263a.5</p>sbyor ba ni dbyings ye shes kyi 'brel tshul te le'u dgu pa las/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg
<p>263a.6</p>par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul/ /zhes pa dang / yang / yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /zhes so/ /don de dag
<p>263a.7</p>rnal 'byor dam pa'i mtshan nyid de/ dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /de yang thabs kyi sgo nas dang / shes rab kyi sgo nas dang / gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya ba ste/ de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ 
<p>263b</p>
<p>263b.1</p>thabs kyi sgo nas bde ba che/ /thig le phra mo las 'das shing / /rlung gi gnas la gnas mi mdzad/ /gsang sngags kyi ni dmigs bral ba'o/ /shes rab las la brten pa'i mthus/ /'khor lo'i byang chub 'bebs dang gzung / /rang gi gnas sam gzhan du spro/ /rtsa sogs
<p>263b.2</p>dman pa dbyibs las 'das/ /gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i ngang / /snang ba nyid na stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid na snang ba yin/ /dbang po drug gi yul la rol/ /zhes so/ /de'i gtan tshigs ni/ /de bas bde ba nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo/ /zhes te/ 
<p>263b.3</p>rgyu bde ba'i sgo nas lam bde bar bsgrubs te/ 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i skur 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ chos rnams mngon sum bde chen po/ /gzugs brnyan rab 'bring tha ma med/ /snang stong bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /dmigs pa kun las rnam
<p>263b.4</p>par grol/ /zhes te/ mngon sum du chos thams cad la bde stong gnyis su med pa'i rgyas gdab pa'o/ /'dis ni rtogs pa'i yon tan yang bstan to/ /da ni lus ngag gi dka' ba spyad mi dgos par bstan te/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor
<p>263b.5</p>dbang phyug bde chen po/ /'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos/ /rang gi rtog pas bcings pa'i bram ze dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i khrus dang bza' bsrung gi spyod pa dang / sdom pa dang sbyang ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi
<p>263b.6</p>dka' thub dang / me lnga bsten pa dang dbyu gu gsum pa dang khye'u'i dka' thub dang ba lang gi dka' thub la sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas lam rnam pa lngar dka' ba spyad mi dgos te gnyis med kyi don la gnas na spyod lam kun gyis tshogs gnyis
<p>263b.7</p>rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /des na/ dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang / /bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub/ /de bas ji ltar 'dod spyad cing / /kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod/ /spyod pa ci dgar 'dod par byed/ /g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed/ /gang la theg pa 'og
<p>264a</p>
<p>264a.1</p>ma pa'i gzhung du spyod pa'i rim pa dag ched du gnyer zhing dgag pa med de/ bram ze dang mu stegs la sogs pas dben pa'i spyod pa gang yang rung bas sems bde ba dang / lus dga' ba'i sgo nas 'grub ste/ des ni sdig pa ma sbyangs pas kyang mnyam pa'i don
<p>264a.2</p>bsgrubs na 'grub par 'og nas gsungs so/ /de nyid rtog pa bdun pa las kyang / gang la ji ltar spyod kyang rung / /gnyis med bde chen grogs su 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de yang gang zag las dang po pa dang / ye shes la cung zad dbang ba dang / yang dag par dbang ba dang / shin
<p>264a.3</p>tu rnam par grol ba'i sgo nas shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin sems can gyi don du 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba med par ngan pa'i las la spyad kyang nyes par mi 'gyur zhing / kun zas te dam zas bcu'i rnam pa dag gnyis su med pa'i don dang ldan pas longs spyad pas dngos
<p>264a.4</p>grub 'grub pa'i yan lag tu 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad ni thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig ma lus pa'i tshogs so/ /de bzhin du lus ngag gi sgo nas spyod pa ci dga' dang / sems kyi sgo nas g.yo ba ci dga' ste dgag pa dang sgrub pa med do/ /des ni theg pa
<p>264a.5</p>dman pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i mtha' bkag par 'gyur ro/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang / sngags pa seng ge bzhin du rgyu/ /'di la mi bya ba dag dang / /mi bza' ba ni gang yang med/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan/ /zhes so/ /de ltar na chos thams
<p>264a.6</p>cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa las/ ma rtogs pa'i sems can kha cig 'khrul pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu de nyid la spyod de/ de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs shing / /gzhan du 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba dag / 
<p>264a.7</p>yul drug rang rgyud brtags pa yis/ /sna tshogs gnyis kyi chos su snang / /mi mthun bde sdug gnas la spyod/ /chos brgyad mtshan mas g.yengs gyur cing / /nyon mongs yan lag dang bcas pas/ /'gro drug gnas rnams so sor snang / /sdug bsngal gsum
<p>264b</p>
<p>264b.1</p>dang brgyad kyis gdungs/ las kyi 'brel pas dngos la chags/ /zhes so/ /yang log par blo gros 'khrul pa'i gang zag kha cig mu stegs kyi lam dang nyan thos kyi lam dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod de/ rang gi de kho na nyid las nyams shing bde ba chen po'i ro ma myong
<p>264b.2</p>bar gnas te/ de nyid la snying rje chen pos gzung bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ kye ma'o log par rtog pa yi/ /kha cig lam ngan log zhugs pa/ /rgyu las 'khrul dang lam las 'khrul/ /'bras bu'i dngos las 'khrul gyur dag /'jig rten 'dir yang
<p>264b.3</p>sdug bsngal te/ /khyi dang ba lang dbyi gu gsum/ /me lnga sogs kyis lus gdungs te/ /tshe zad ngan song gsum du 'gro/ /rigs ngan dman pa'i lam zhugs pas/ /bde 'dod de nyid lam las gol/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes spong 'dod/ /phyir zhing sdug bsngal kun
<p>264b.4</p>'byung gnas/ /'gog lam mngon par sgom byed cing / /'phags pa'i lam la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /kye ma'o yang dag bden las gzhan/ /'khrul pa'i bden pa bzhi ru brtags/ /rkyen rtogs dgra bcom sa 'dod pas/ /rten 'brel la spyod de nyid spong / /nyon mongs
<p>264b.5</p>las dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /rang bzhin rmongs pas de spyod pa/ /de nyid mtshan mas 'khrul 'gyur te/ /thams cad ma rig las byung ba/ /de nyid rgyu gzhan gang las byung / /thams cad rang byung ye shes yin/ /kye ma'o dgra bcom sa 'dod pas/ /rgyun zhugs lan
<p>264b.6</p>cig 'ong ba dang / /mi ldog spyod sogs dka' ba yis/ /dgra bcom lam zhugs grol mi 'gyur/ /yang dag bden pa'i don med par/ /kun du brtags par gnyis 'dzin pa/ /bskal pa mang por dka' spyad kyang / /yang dag sangs rgyas thob mi 'gyur/ /kye
<p>264b.7</p>ma'o nges don ma rnyed pas/ /lam gzhan g.yengs pas tshi chad de/ /gyad kyi nor bzhin kun du chol/ /sku gsum 'bras bu skye mi 'gyur/ /kye ma 'di dag snying re rje/ /bde chen gnas las 'di ltar gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'di gzhan gang las byung / /nam zhig
<p>265a</p>
<p>265a.1</p>rang gi de nyid mthong / /nam zhig rang byung ye shes 'char/ /nam zhig bde ba chen pos brgyan/ /zhes so/ /'o na de dag gis theg pa chen po'i lam du zhugs na mi 'grub bam zhe na/ gang zhig rang gi lta ba rnam par gtong zhing shes rab dang snying rjes gzhi bzung nas
<p>265a.2</p>byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas ni 'jug tu rung zhing 'grub par 'gyur te/ langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang / /'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung / /dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung / /gang na ji ltar gnas kyang rung / /zhes te/ de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ skye bo gzung 'dzin rags
<p>265a.3</p>pa'i rgyun/ /rtog pa langs pa kun du 'khor/ /mu stegs spyod bcas 'gro byed cing / /sdug bsngal rmongs tshogs sdug bsngal bsgrubs/ /yul drug 'gog cing gnas byed pa'i/ /blo dman gol ba'i lam la zhen/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i rang rgyal ba/ /gcig tshugs mang pos
<p>265a.4</p>dgra bcom lam/ /dgod pa'i sgo nas bram ze'i smrang / /smra byed byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /de dag rtog gnas lam ldog cing / /'di don spyod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'o na de dag gis tshogs ma bsags gzugs brnyan du ma bsgrubs par 'grub bam zhe na/ 
<p>265a.5</p>dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing / /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung / /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na/ /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /thog mar bla ma dam pa la brten te/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gdams
<p>265a.6</p>ngag la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon du byas na sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la ma brten pa dang / sngon du sdig pa'i las spyad pas kyang rang gi lha gnyis su med pa'i don dang sbyar na lus ngag gi tshogs bsags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /da ni lta ba rtogs pa'i phan yon
<p>265a.7</p>gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir/ de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par byed pas na/ /ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/ /nyes pa dag tu yongs mi 'gyur/ /zhes te/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta ba mchog la 'jug sbyor ba'i/ /sku drug lhun grub rnal
<p>265b</p>
<p>265b.1</p>'byor pas/ /dngos bcas chos tshogs rnam grol rgyar/ /thams cad rab tu 'grub byed cing / /ngan pa'i spyod pa rnam dag chos/ /'grub byed nyes par yong mi 'gyur/ /rma bya'i gzi mdongs gsal ba ltar/ /rang bzhin ngo bos rnam par dag /ces so/ /de dag ni lta ba rnam par
<p>265b.2</p>dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /da ni de'i zhar la lam dang 'bras bu'i chos dag gi phan yon bstan te/ de yang so so'i gnas skabs su ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin la/ 'dir ni shes par bya ba'i yul bsdu ba dang / yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ dang por
<p>265b.3</p>mchog bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo nas ni/ bskal pa bya bar mi 'thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /bsgrubs na kun du 'thob 'gyur ba/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i dngos grub gang zhig sku drug lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa de nyid ni nges pa'i don
<p>265b.4</p>gyi sangs rgyas dam pa ste/ theg pa dman pas bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rgyu rkyen ma shes pas ni 'bras bu sgrub pa'i thabs dang bral ba'o/ /thabs khyad par can gyi sgo nas bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dkyil
<p>265b.5</p>'khor gang yang rung bar bsgrubs na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang las she na/ bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /zhes te/ yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas sku gsum mam drug gi bdag nyid de ni rang gi
<p>265b.6</p>mtshan nyid de/ nam zhig ye shes kyis gsal bar byas na rang gi rgyud la skye zhing 'grub ste de ni rang gi rgyud la brtag par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi yi don/ /sangs rgyas dam pa 'grub byed pa/ /de nyid phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /
<p>265b.7</p>rang nyid dkyil 'khor bdag por blta/ /rig 'dzin lam gyi bye brag las/ /mchog gi dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje
<p>266a</p>
<p>266a.1</p>sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis/ /zhes te/ mchog gi dngos grub la sbyor bar byed pa'i yan lag tu 'jig rten gyi las tshogs dang thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya ste/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rten dang sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin
<p>266a.2</p>gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar sbyor zhing / le'u dgu pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i las rnams dang las gzhan dag ni gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po bsal zhing bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa dang ldan pas rten dang rdzas kyi sgo nas cha lugs ji bzhin du rang
<p>266a.3</p>rang gi las dang mthun par bsgyur ro/ /des ci zhig sgrub ce na/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba phal pa la yod pa'i stobs dang rang rang gi las rnams dang / thun mong du lha'i rgyal
<p>266a.4</p>po dang klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i rgyud la mnga' ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rin po che sna bdun dang / chu la mi 'bying bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' la skas bzhin 'dzeg pa dang / ri brags la thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / sa 'og gi gter dang gser 'gyur gyi
<p>266a.5</p>rtsi dang / bum pa bzang po dang ral gri dang dril bu dang mig sman dang bcud kyis len dang rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i las rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thun mong gi dngos grub rnams sngon du sdig pa can gyi gang zag
<p>266a.6</p>tshogs ma bsags shing yun ring du ma sbyangs pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur byas te/ /las tshogs dngos grub mang po dag /thams cad sna tshogs
<p>266a.7</p>phyag rgya yi/ /lam gyi grogs su bsgrub par bya/ /zhes so/ /de dag gis ni le'u gsum pa'i sgrub pa'i phan yon bstan to/ /mtshan bcas kyi tshogs dang rang bzhin med pa'i don rtse gcig pas ni de nyid gsal bas/ rgya 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs
<p>266b</p>
<p>266b.1</p>rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/ /zhes te/ phyag rgya gnyis kyi sgo nas goms par bsgoms pas phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam pa gsal ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de las phyag rgya bzhi dang / 
<p>266b.2</p>sngags dang phyag rgya gzhan dag dang rang gi de kho na nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis/ /gang zhig bskyed pa yong bsgoms na/ /bsgom na thams cad bdag nyid du/ /tshe 'di
<p>266b.3</p>nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang / /rang byin brlab 'di grub mchog ste/ /de nyid nyin re grub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo/ /zhes so/ /de'i gtan tshigs ni/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
<p>266b.4</p>mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo la rang gi rig pa ye shes kyis phyag rgya gnyis kyi tshul du sbyor bas phyogs dus kyi dkyil 'khor
<p>266b.5</p>thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /des ni bdag gi rgyud la sku dang ye shes gsal zhing grub par bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bde chen sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas las/ /rang gi ye shes kyis 'jug cing / /phyag rgya gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug gis/ /
<p>266b.6</p>dkyil 'khor kun dang skal mnyam 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /des ni le'u lnga pa'i rjes 'jug gi bya ba dang / dgu pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa'i don ston par byed do/ /gang dag lam du 'jug pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gnas
<p>266b.7</p>te/ gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / /rnam pa kun du mchod byed la/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /dang por ni kun du 'gro ba'i tshig yin te/ skye bo gang yang rung ba zhig gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor
<p>267a</p>
<p>267a.1</p>mthong zhing / sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa gsum po 'dir bzhugs te/ mthong zhing rnam pa kun du mchod na/ de yis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /
<p>267a.2</p>dkyil 'khor mthong zhing mchod byas pa'i/ /bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor de bzhin no/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u bdun pa'i phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi zab pa dang rgya che ba 'grub ste/ 'di dang sangs
<p>267a.3</p>rgyas thams cad la/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang / /bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang / der brten pa'i lha'i 'khor lo rigs kyi sangs rgyas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
<p>267a.4</p>du bzhugs pa thams cad dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas nas/ reg bya'i bde ba sbyor te bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gi sgo nas mthong ba dang reg pa'i mtshan mas 'grub par 'gyur te/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dag kyang bden pa chos nyid kyi
<p>267a.5</p>dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bsod nams dkyil 'khor mthong byas shing / /ye shes dkyil 'khor reg pa yis/ /tshogs kyi dga' bde'i sgo nas ni/ /bde ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /des ni le'u drug pa'i don gyi phyogs
<p>267a.6</p>gcig mtshon par byed do/ /smin cing rgyud gsum gyi dri ma dag par byed pas/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /ces te/ dbang rnam pa bzhi po dag slob ma'i rgyud la bsgo ste/ 
<p>267a.7</p>sdig pa dang dri ma'i tshogs bzhi grol zhing dngos grub rnam pa bzhi thob par mdzad do/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ phyi yi rgyan sogs mthong mdzad cing / /lha yi chu yis dag par byed/ /nang gi dbang bskur reg pa yis/ /smin pa'i lam la rab tu gnas/ /gsang ba'i don
<p>267b</p>
<p>267b.1</p>bshad thos byas pas/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas la sbyor/ /de don nyams myong dran pa'i mthus/ /rang gi ye shes rnam par grol/ /sdig pa'i dri ma bzhi dag cing / /sangs rgyas dngos grub bzhi thob 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u drug pa dang bdun pa dang dgu pa'i
<p>267b.2</p>phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /gnas pa dang 'jug pa'i sgo nas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /snang ba
<p>267b.3</p>dang srid pas bsdus pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po thams cad dang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun gyi rang bzhin la thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig gnyis kyi sgo nas sbyor na lus dman zhing shes rab dang snying stobs zhan pa'i bud med dag kyang grol
<p>267b.4</p>na gzhan lta ci smos zhes pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rtag tu rang gi dam tshig gzung / /rtag tu lha dang bla ma mchod/ /chos rnams kun la mnyam sbyor bas/ /bud med dman pa grol bar 'gyur/ /zhes te/ kyang gi don blta bar bya'o/ /de ni le'u drug pa la sogs pa'i
<p>267b.5</p>don phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /legs pa'i lam dang 'bras bu mdzad pas don spyod de/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag par thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub pa/ /de yi bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes te/ bdag dang
<p>267b.6</p>gzhan gyi don du dus kun du'am gzhan yang gnas skabs kun nas phrin las thams cad de/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang gso ba dang gnon pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang dbye ba dang drag po dang rengs pa dang rmongs pa dang 'jums pa dang bskrad pa dang / 'khrugs pa la sogs
<p>267b.7</p>pa'i las rnams ni bdag nyid sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rim pas brtsam par bya ste/ rtag par dus thams cad du spyod na phrin las kyi sgo nas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ kun du kun nas spyod pa'i las/ /phrin las nyi shu la sogs stobs/ /sbyor bcas
<p>268a</p>
<p>268a.1</p>rol ba'i brtul zhugs mchog /sangs rgyas kun gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u dgu pa'i smad nas las tshogs rnams bsdus so/ /cho ga kun gyi yan lag tu mnyes pa'i las kyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas
<p>268a.2</p>pa'i/ /mtshon pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis/ /bkod pa'i rab 'byam mchog dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par mdzad/ /ces pas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu sbyangs pas rang gi de kho na nyid gsal te/ phyogs dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
<p>268a.3</p>bdag nyid du gnas shing / mchod pa thams cad sprul par mdzad pas/ 'dus byas kyi rdzas las byung ba ma yin te/ rang nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin lta bu thams cad kyang stong gsum gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po thams
<p>268a.4</p>cad bkod pa rab 'byam mchog tu gsungs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas mchod par mdzad do/ /de nyid kyi yon tan ni/ thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /
<p>268a.5</p>bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /chos thams cad la tshul rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sbyor zhing / dbang po drug gi snang ba mtha' dag 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas rol zhing mchod na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi dngos grub zag pa med pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas
<p>268a.6</p>kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rang las byung ba'i mchod pa yang / /rang gi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor ba'i mthus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen 'grub/ /ces so/ /chos nyid dngos po'i
<p>268a.7</p>rang bzhin gsal bar 'grub pa'i grogs ni tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod pas de nyid 'bras bu 'grub par byed de/ rnal 'byor thams cad nyer sbyor mdzad/ /dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa ste/ rnal 'byor dang / thams cad dang / nye bar
<p>268b</p>
<p>268b.1</p>sbyor ba dang dpal bzhir 'gyur ro/ /de nyid rgyas par dang po spyod pa'i rim pa ni don gsum gyis bsdus pa ste/ rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi nye bar sbyor ba yin/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad do/ /gang zhig thabs dang
<p>268b.2</p>shes rab gnyis su med par mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rgyal zhing rang gi yon tan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs snang bar mdzad pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen po ste tshul rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas khams
<p>268b.3</p>gsum ma lus pa thams cad la nye bar sbyor ba'o/ /de yang gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas rgya che ba'i spyod pa gnyis dang zab pa'i sgo gsum nas 'jug par byed do/ /tshul ni kun gyi longs spyod kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar rten byed cing / /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag
<p>268b.4</p>nyid rab tu mchod par bya/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing / rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag /bdag nyid kun du myong byed na/ /shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ni ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'i sgo nas dus dang gnas skabs la lar don
<p>268b.5</p>du 'gyur na spyod cing / de las gzhan pa dag ni dgag ste tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod pas 'dod pa'i longs spyod dug la ji ltar bde bar bstan cing bslab par bya'o/ /ye shes la cung zad dbang bas ni rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang mi 'bral bar bde ba'i ye shes gzung ba'i phyir/ 
<p>268b.6</p>bdag nyid las byung ba'i dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyi bde ba spel te mchod par bya'o/ /ye shes las yang dag par dbang bas ni rnal 'byor gyi bde ba rjes su sbyor ba'i mchod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha mnyes par bya ba dang / 'gro ba sbyong ba dang / rnal 'byor sbyong ba
<p>268b.7</p>la sogs pas rang gi de kho na nyid gsal bar nyams su blang ngo / /shin tu rnam par grol bas ni dbang po drug gi snang ba mtha' dag la bdag nyid kyis kun du myang zhing / lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par gsal bas longs spyod de/ de'i dus na de nyid kyi rnam pa las bde ba chen
<p>269a</p>
<p>269a.1</p>po'i sku gsal bar byed do/ /yun ring du goms pa'i mthus ni 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ de bzhin nyid gnas gsal byed pa/ /de grogs spyod pa'i rim pa ste/ /gang zag bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /'jug pa'i cho ga don
<p>269a.2</p>bzhin bstan/ /las dang po yis spyod bya ba/ /longs spyod kun la ci bder gnas/ /de rjes lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gzhan gzung ba'i don phyir spyod/ /gsum pas mnyes shing dag byed de/ /rnal 'byor gsal bas bde chen rgyas/ /dbang po yul dus kun du spyod/ /
<p>269a.3</p>rnam grol ye shes zag pa med/ /ces so/ /gsal ba nyams su myong ba'i nus pa mngon sum du gsal ba las ni sku drug lhun gyis grub par gnas par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /lang tsho
<p>269a.4</p>nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /mdor bstan pa yi dpal bzhi 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i don yin te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kun dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ de'i rnam par sbyor ba'i
<p>269a.5</p>tshul gyi mthus 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsis bde ba chen po'i dpal bzhir gyur pa 'grub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal yangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sku gsum rtag pa'i rnam pa thog ma
<p>269a.6</p>dang tha ma med par gnas shing 'gro ba'i don spyod pa dang / nyid kyi sku la mtshan dang dpe byad stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dbang dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa lang tsho mnga' ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i tshogs dang / gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa'i sdug bsngal spangs te bde ba'i
<p>269a.7</p>mchog 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /lang tsho nad med bde mchog gi /mchod pa kun gyi gnas 'jug cing / /bdag dang gzhan don rol par mdzad/ /de yang gnas skabs lan re tsam du gnas sam zhe na/ 
<p>269b</p>
<p>269b.1</p>kun du kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus kun du gnas skabs kun nas rnam pa thams cad du yon tan gyi mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ 
<p>269b.2</p>chags pa kun gyi tshul bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /rtag tu bdag gi gnas 'jug cing / /'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs/ /rang gi ngo bo gsal ba'i mthus/ /dgongs pa rgyud la snang ba yin/ /zhes so/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun du sbyor ba ni
<p>269b.3</p>chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang de dang mthun pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas so/ /le'u gnyis pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig snying rje chen po'i sgo nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar dbyung bar 'dod pa dag gis ni sgrub pa gnyis kyis
<p>269b.4</p>las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ci mchog tu gyur pa'i yan lag yin pas zhar las skyes te logs su gzhag mi dgos so/ /rten gyi sgo nas yun ring du dka' ba ma spyad pa rnams kyis ni dngos dang por thun mong gi lam gyi gzhi bzung dgos te/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub
<p>269b.5</p>pas dngos grub las la sbyor/ /mchog gi phyag rgya grub pa las/ /bdag gzhan don gyi bya ba yi/ /'bras bu phun sum tshogs gyur yang / /las dang po yis spyad bya ba/ /thun mong dngos grub sgo nas yin/ /bsgrubs pas yon tan 'phel 'gyur zhing / /bsgrubs
<p>269b.6</p>pas las la sbyor bar byed/ /yun ring bla ma mnyes byas shing / /cho ga'i yan lag tshogs pas brtsam/ /blo dman dad brtson med pa dang / /byang sems snying rje shes rab bral/ /the tshom rtog pas bslus pa dag /yun ring bsgrubs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zhes
<p>269b.7</p>so/ /de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /nye bar mngon sum du gnas pa'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag
<p>270a</p>
<p>270a.1</p>bzhi'i sgo nas rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i thabs rtog pa gnyis kyi dra ba 'joms shing yon tan gyi snang ba gnyis dang ldan par byed pa 'di ni brjod bya'i don ji bzhin par mtshon pa'i thabs dam pa ste gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid can no/ /ci 'dra ba zhig na dpal rdo rje
<p>270a.2</p>sems dpa'i sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid de la sbyor bar byed pa'i lam yan lag dang bcas pa'i tshul can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i ngang tshul can no/ /de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud
<p>270a.3</p>las/ lam mchog bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis/ /rang nyid 'dod pa'i las la sbyor/ /thabs kyi sgo nas 'jug pa'i mthus/ /bcom ldan de ni gsal bar byed/ /ces so/ /brjod bya'i don 'bras bu gang la dmigs te sgrub pa tsam zhe na/ sku drug ye shes drug
<p>270a.4</p>rigs drug gi gnas la sbyor zhing de dag mthun pa'i mdzad pas yul drug las kyi sgo nas rnam par dag pa'i phrin las kyi rang gi ngang la sbyor ro/ /dang po dbang phyug bde sgo nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde/ /sangs rgyas
<p>270a.5</p>thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med kyi tshul gyis stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po gang yin pa de la ni rdo rje sems
<p>270a.6</p>dpa' zhes bya ste rgyu'i mtshan nyid can no/ /de la 'jug pa'i lam dag ni rnal 'byor pa'i sgra can te/ shrI'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan zhing de dang sbyor ba'i bde ba las byung ba'i don ni dam tshig gi bde ba'o/ /de nyid 'grub par byed pa ni khyad par gyi tshul dang sngags dang dbyibs dang
<p>270a.7</p>chos kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba chen po'i don sgrub pa ste/ de'i tshul du gzhan dag la yang rgya cher sbyar ro/ /gnyis pa bde ba chen po ni/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba'o/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /
<p>270b</p>
<p>270b.1</p>phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun/ /so so'i rjes su rab 'grub 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin stong pa chen po'i sku las snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po las snang ba ste/ sbyor ba'i rnam par
<p>270b.2</p>bkod pa sna tshogs su sprul zhing / mtshan dang mthun pa'i las kyis kun du 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can rang gi las rnam par bsags pa las byung ba'i mthu nyid kyis chos thams cad phyag rgya bde ba chen po'i rnam par rjes su 'grub par mdzad do/ /bde ba mos pa'i sgo nas/ dpal rdo rje
<p>270b.3</p>sems dpa'i sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /ye shes kyi sku las me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen pos khro bar mdzad pa dpal
<p>270b.4</p>he ru ka ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs la snang ba ste/ gsal ba'i 'od zer gyis zag pa med pa'i ye shes spel zhing / bcas bcos rnam pa gnyis kyi mthus dregs byed kyi tshogs thams cad zhi bar mdzad cing / rnal 'byor dam pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba mos pa'i tshul gyis so so'i
<p>270b.5</p>rjes su 'grub par byed pa'o/ /bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kyi sgo nas/ dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba'i/ mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
<p>270b.6</p>kyis snang ba'i gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid rnam par dag pas/ sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs kyi mtha' gcod par mdzad pa'i dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung gi bdag nyid de/ thabs dang shes rab kyi de kho na nyid la 'phrul zhing pad+ma'i rigs kyi phrin
<p>270b.7</p>las kyi mthu nyid kyis thams cad dga' bar mdzad de bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kyi sgo nas so so'i rjes su 'grub par mdzad pa'o/ /bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug ni/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug
<p>271a</p>
<p>271a.1</p>kun/ /so so'i rjes su rab 'grub 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes las snang ba'i dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ mtshan dang mthun pa'i mdzad pas
<p>271a.2</p>kun du khyab par gdal zhing rnam par bkod pa las byung ba'i mthus kun du brgyan te bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mkha' dbyings mtha' yas ni/ dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /
<p>271a.3</p>bud med mchog rnams skyes par 'gyur/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rta mchog rol pa ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid sbyor ba'i mthu las snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas chos thams cad dag par bya ba dang / dregs byed
<p>271a.4</p>kyi tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i tshad dang mnyam par dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams 'phrul par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas drug gi tshul gyis ni/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor don ston mdzad/ /ye shes sku yi rnam grangs
<p>271a.5</p>dang / /rigs dang mdzad pa'i phrin las tshogs/ /sbyor ba mthu yis thams cad du/ /dbang phyug bde ba la sogs 'grub/ /so so'i rjes su 'grub mdzad cing / /rang gi de nyid gnas la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /ci gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin la so sor gzhag ce na/ lam pa'i
<p>271a.6</p>dbang du byas te gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis dbye ba'o/ /ci ye shes kyi bye brag gzhan dang mi mthun par bstan zhe na/ sku'i dbang du dgongs pa dang / ye shes kyi dbang du dgongs pa dang / rigs kyi dbang du dgongs pa dang / phrin las kyi dbang du dgongs pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud
<p>271a.7</p>las/ rnam par snang mdzad stong nyid sku/ /ye shes chen po he ru ka /gnyis med mnyam pa gar dbang phyug /longs spyod rdzogs sku nyi ma ste/ /sprul pa'i sgo nas rta mchog go/ /bde chen rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med lhun
<p>271b</p>
<p>271b.1</p>gyis grub pa'i sku/ /zhes pa dang / yang rigs kyi sgo nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad mchog /thub pa chen po'i don bzhin bstan/ /rdo rje 'dul ba he ru ka /khro rnams khro ba'i mchog gis so/ /dag mdzad pad+ma gar dbang phyug /chags bral chags pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /
<p>271b.2</p>rin chen rigs drug nyi ma mchog /mkha' la rin chen char chen 'bebs/ /las kun mdzad nyid rta mchog ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor/ /rigs rnams kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen mchog /ces pa dang / ye shes ni rtog pa bsdus pa las/ me
<p>271b.3</p>long khrag 'thung rgyal po ste/ /mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog /so sor kun rtog nyi ma yin/ /bya ba la ni rta mchog ste/ /chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /zhes so/ /
<p>271b.4</p>phrin las ni rtog pa bdun pa las/ zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das zhen rnams/ /'dul mdzad rnam snang srid gnas bzhugs/ /zhe sdang ru tra sogs 'joms phyir/ /drag po he ru ka dang ldan/ /gti mug sgro skur mtha' bral mdzad/ /dag pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dbang / /srid
<p>271b.5</p>zhen las chags zhugs pa rnams/ /'dul mdzad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /le lo nga rgyal phrag dog sogs/ /mthu yis gnon pa'i rta mchog dpal/ /nyon mongs spyi yi lam gnas pa/ /dbugs 'byin rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /zhes pa the tshom med do/ /sgrub
<p>271b.6</p>pa'i thabs ni don de dag nyams su blangs pa ste/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pas rig ma la brten te nyams su blang ba'o/ /las dang po pa'i dbang du 'od kyi rig ma la brten te/ sgrub pa ni/ de yi dam tshig de byung ba/ /sdug bsngal dam tshig
<p>271b.7</p>bdag rjes 'brang / /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/ /thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog /sbyor ba'i yan lag bzhi ni sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba dang shin tu sbyor ba dang sbyor ba chen po'o/ /ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga mtshon par
<p>272a</p>
<p>272a.1</p>byed pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga ste 'od kyi dam tshig go/ /de las byung ba ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtso bo drug go/ /de'i rjes su ye shes kyi yul rigs dang mthun pa'i yul 'od kyi snang ba la myu gu la grib ma 'khor ba'i tshul du
<p>272a.2</p>bskyed/ rgyan dang cha lugs dang / mtshan ma'i bye brag gis sku gsal bar grub nas/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa ni yid du sdug pa'i dam tshig go/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas rol par mdzad cing / byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bdag rjes
<p>272a.3</p>su 'brang ba ste rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /de la 'od zer gyis 'gro ba sbyang ba dang / rnal 'byor sbyang ba dang / rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni shin tu sbyor ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa rnams kyi skye mched drug dang gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu bsam
<p>272a.4</p>pa ni sbyor ba chen po ste/ de ltar snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid du bsgom zhing de la gnas pa ni dam tshig go/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /sbyor ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod/ /
<p>272a.5</p>bzhugs pa rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin/ /[(]phyin [,]byin [)]brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa/ /sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhes so/ /tshul dang yon tan ni/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ /lhan cig spyod pa'i rjes
<p>272a.6</p>spyod sdug /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar/ /'di ltar tshogs kyi sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa dang / rdzas kyi bsgrub pa dang / sman gyi bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa dang / rig 'dzin bsgrub pa dang / phyag rgya
<p>272a.7</p>chen po'i bsgrub pa dag la ni/ rigs bsdus pa dang / dkyil 'khor rim bzhin pa dang / dkyil 'khor gcig pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pas bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
<p>272b</p>
<p>272b.1</p>'gro ma'i mthu dang gzi brjid mchog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te/ /'od kyi rig ma la brten nas/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub/ /bsnyen dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / /
<p>272b.2</p>sgrub dang sgrub chen tshul bzhin bya/ /bsnyen pa las la 'jug pa ste/ /nye bsnyen gcig bzhin spyod pa'o/ /lhan cig spyod pa sgrub pa'i las/ /rjes spyod sgrub chen 'bras bu'i mchog /ces pa dang / yang bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas/ sgrub pa rnam bdun las la 'jug / 
<p>272b.3</p>tshogs sgrub phyag rgya'i sgrub pa dang / /rdzas dang sman dang mngon shes dang / /rig 'dzin sgrub pa phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i lam dag gam/ /dkyil 'khor drug gam gcig pa'am/ /dpa' bo gcig las 'jug par bya/ /zhes so/ /gang zag mchog tu gyur pas
<p>272b.4</p>ni dbang po yul dus kyi sbyor ba la brten te sgrub pa'i phyir/ thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i/ /phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che/ /rtag pa pad+ma lha mo yi/ /rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog /nang gi phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang / phyi'i dbang po yul dus kyi rnam pa
<p>272b.5</p>thams cad yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom zhing / dbang po yul drug la 'jug pa'i tshul/ gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas dga' ba ma lus pa ste zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po 'phel zhing / phyag rgya thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i
<p>272b.6</p>rang bzhin no/ /de nyid rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pas rtag pa dam pa ste thams cad mnyes par mdzad pas na mchod pa'i mchog go/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ yul drug phyag rgya rnam 'phrul ba/ /thams cad gnyis med rol pa'i yum/ /zhes pa dang / yang rtsa ba'i
<p>272b.7</p>rgyud las kyang / gzugs phung chos dbyings ye shes che/ /mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rnam gsum gzugs dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /tshor ba kun rtog ye shes che/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /rnam gsum sgra dang rol
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du shes mnyam nyid ye shes che/ /lce la pad+ma gar dbang rgyal/ /rnam gsum ro dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du byed bya ba grub pa'i las/ /sna la rta mchog rol pa ste/ /
<p>273a.2</p>rnam gsum dri dang rol mdzad cing / /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /rnam shes me long ye shes che/ /yid la rdo rje he ru ka /rnam gsum chos dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /kun khyab stong pa'i ye shes che/ /lus la rdo rje sems
<p>273a.3</p>dpa' gnas/ /rnam gsum reg dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /zhes so/ /des ni bde ba chen po'i sku yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sbyor bar byed do/ /ye shes la cung zad dbang ba dang yang dag par dbang bas ni phyag rgya'i
<p>273a.4</p>rig ma la brten te bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ shrI rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba dang / thams cad lha mor 'dus pa ni/ /ma lus skal ba bzang po kun/ /bde ba so sor rjes su 'grub/ /bsnyen pa dang nye bar bsnyen pas gsal bar byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas
<p>273a.5</p>dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i tshul bzhin du rigs kyi phyag rgya mo dag byin gyis brlab cing rol pa brtsams te/ sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i rim pas longs spyod na/ de nyid kyis ni dngos grub ma lus pa kun gyis skal ba bzang po kun so sor rjes su 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa
<p>273a.6</p>las/ gang zag 'bring pos spyod bya ba/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi cha lugs gsal ba yis/ /sgrub pa so sor rjes su sgrub/ /ces so/ /phyag rgya rol pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha/ /bsnyen sgrub
<p>273a.7</p>yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas phyag rgya dang rol pa'i tshul du spyod pa'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha mo thams cad snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo bde ba chen mo kun/ /thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos/ /sdig med stobs
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>kyis mngon mthon du/ gang zhig thugs byams pa dang snying rje'i chus brlan zhing byang chub kyi sems kyi ro la chags pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni/ sdig pa byed pa'i mngon mthon du phyag rgya mo thams cad bkug ste longs spyod pas zag bcas kyi bde ba la brten te/ zag pa med pa'i bde ba skye
<p>273b.2</p>bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang bdag nyid gcig pu'am zhe na/ phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed/ /chags pa'i ros dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba bskyed de 'gro ba'i dpes nye bar sgrub bo/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ phyag rgya rol pa'i snyoms
<p>273b.3</p>'jug gis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes mdzad cing / /lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /shes rab dbyings la gzhug byas nas/ /rab tu dga' bde'i mchod pa yis/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis longs spyod do/ /zhes so/ /de las byung ba'i sgrub pa byang chub
<p>273b.4</p>sems kyis mchod pa ni/ dbang po kun las byung ba yi/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed/ /lus zungs rnam pa bdun las khyab pa'i brten pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste/ dbang po rnam pa lnga la
<p>273b.5</p>gnas shing so so'i las thams cad la 'jug pas gsal ba'i bdag nyid rlung rnam pa bcu dang / phyogs gcig tu rgyu zhing srog gnas pa'i rten byed de/ rtsa gsum nas ba spu bye ba bzhi 'bum gyi bar du 'phro zhing 'du ba'o/ /de las byung ba'i mtshon par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems kun
<p>273b.6</p>du spro zhing rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ srog dang rtsol ba'i rten mdzad pa/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yin/ /byang chub sems sogs bde ba'i rgyun/ /ba spu kun gyi gnas nas spro/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang / /'gro
<p>273b.7</p>ba'i don le sbyor bar mdzad/ /ces so/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag bzhi'i thog ma dang bar dang dngos grub blang ba'i dus su ni las dang mthun pa'i dbang sbyin par bya ste/ rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyis/ /dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba/ /rin chen tshogs rnams thams
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>cad kyis/ /rab tu myong bar dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bde ba ni/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don rtags gnyis kyi bde ba dang ldan pa ste/ des ni dri ma'i tshogs thams cad 'khrud par byed cing / b+ha ga dang ling+ga mtshan ma las nges
<p>274a.2</p>par byed pas rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan te/ spyi bo dang lce steng dang snying ga la sogs pa'i dbang po dang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas bde ba'i ye shes kyis rgyas shing myong ba'i tshul du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zag pa med pa'i dga' bde yi/ /ro myang
<p>274a.3</p>bde chen gnas la bzhugs/ /de rtags dbang bskur las byung ba/ /zhu bde gnyis kyi chu bo'i rgyun/ /rin chen tshogs kun gyis brgyan pas/ /rang gi ye shes gnas la sbyor/ /dbang bskur gsang ba bla na med/ /gnas kun dga' byed 'bras tshogs bskyed/ /ces
<p>274a.4</p>te/ 'dis ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshogs kyi 'khor los slob ma dbang bskur ba'i bye brag tu yang shes par bya'o/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas lha mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams la spyad pa'i phyir/ lha mo kun gyi longs spyod pa/ /ci
<p>274a.5</p>bde bar ni bsten bya ba/ /gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas 'od kyi rig ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mo dang longs spyod kyi tshogs la dus dang rtogs pa'i bye brag dang khams dang grogs la sogs pa'i sgo nas ci bde bar bsten par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor longs
<p>274a.6</p>spyod thams cad la/ /dus la sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ /bdag gzhan don du 'gyur ba'i las/ /ci bde bar ni bsten par bya/ /zhes so/ /de yang sbyor ba bzhi'i rnam pa gsal bas nyams su blangs te/ dang po'i sbyor ba ni/ bdag nyid che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ /
<p>274a.7</p>bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod/ /mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur gyur pa ni che ba'i lha ste sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid do/ /de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar sbyor zhing / rgyan cha dang cha lugs dang dbang bskur zhing byin gyis
<p>274b</p>
<p>274b.1</p>brlabs pas bdag la bdag gis mchod pa'o/ /rjes su sbyor ba ni/ rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing / /rigs dang mthun pa'i yum bskyed pa ni/ dper na 'od kyi snang ba dang ldan pa'i dus su myu gu la grib ma skye ba bzhin ye shes kyi snang
<p>274b.2</p>ba chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par 'phrul te/ dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ brda la sogs pas bskul zhing rol par mdzad de/ rnal 'byor thams cad kyi don la bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas shing / rjes su sbyor
<p>274b.3</p>ba'i mchod pas rgyal ba mnyes pa dang 'gro ba dag par mdzad do/ /shin tu sbyor ba ni/ kun la myong bar byed pas na/ /shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'od kyi bde bas phyi'i mtshan ma sbyangs nas gsang ba'i gnas su rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o/ /
<p>274b.4</p>sbyor ba chen po ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na'i bde ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe 'grub cing / /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /skye mched drug byin gyis brlab pa dang / gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbu rgyan gyi mtshan ma
<p>274b.5</p>dang / lha mo'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing khrus byas te/ byang chub sems kyi rgyun ra sa ya na'i bde ba des dpal bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi yis/ /'bras bu nyams su blang bar bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi rim
<p>274b.6</p>pa yis/ /de yi lam la rab tu sbyor/ /zhes so/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor thabs kyi sgo nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /rten gyi bye brag bzhin du zab
<p>274b.7</p>pa dang rgya che ba'i rim pa la sbyor ba bsgrub par bya'o/ /de yang khyad par gyi don du sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsum mchod cing bsgrub par bya ba ste/ sku'i sgo nas rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /gsung gi sgo nas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rta mchog rol pa'o/ /
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>thugs kyi sgo nas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang he ru ka'o/ /sngags kyi 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i 'phro 'dus yi ge gsum gyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'o/ /dbyibs kyis ni rtsa rnam pa gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi'i sgo nas sku gsung thugs kyi gnas sbyong zhing mchod pa sgrub
<p>275a.2</p>pa'o/ /chos kyis ni gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'i thabs bde ba chen po'i don mtshon par byed pa ste/ gzugs snang ba dang / sgra grag pa dang / sems kyi rtog pa dag de nyid kyi sgo nas bde ba chen po'i ye shes zag pa med pa'i lam mtshon par byed pa'o/ /de yang
<p>275a.3</p>rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /de nyid spyod pas 'jug bya ste/ /bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /lam gyi 'bras bu bde ba 'grub/ /ces pa dang / yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /rlung gsum gnas la
<p>275a.4</p>dbang mdzad cing / /bcom ldan kun du khyab mdzad de/ /rang gi ye shes rnam grol ba'o/ /zhes pa dang / yang / sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum gyis/ /'khor lo'i bde chen dga' ba bskyed/ /mgon po rab tu bzhengs nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad do/ /zhes
<p>275a.5</p>pa dang / yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snang srid mgon po zag pa med/ /rnam par grol ba grol ba'i sku/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtog pa'i tshogs/ /sgyu ma lhun grub phyag rgyas 'debs/ /zhes te/ lam de dag gi sgo nas ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs
<p>275a.6</p>drug gi sbyor thabs kyi sgo nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang po kun gyi gtso/ /rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'dzin pa'i rgyal po'o/ /
<p>275a.7</p>rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni khro bo'i tshul du he ru ka ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid do/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis 'gro ba thams cad la spyan gyis gzigs pas 'jig rten dbang po
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>ste/ gsung gi rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgyal srid rin po che'i tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad las 'byung ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'o/ /rta mchog gis ni 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnams kyi gtso bo mdzad de/ phrin
<p>275b.2</p>las rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis lha mo rnams kyi gtso bor bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag kyang rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zag rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyis spros pa'i tshul du sgrub cing nye bar sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor drug po dag bsnyen sgrub kyi rim pas phye ste bsgrub
<p>275b.3</p>cing sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gcig gi dbang du bsgrub cing sbyor ba dang / shin tu yang bsdus pa la dga' ba la rigs gcig gi sgo nas bsgrub cing sbyor ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i yan lag rnam bdun du/ /gsal bar nye bar sbyor byas te/ /rjes mthun
<p>275b.4</p>'jug pa'i tshul bzhi yis/ /las spyod nye bsnyen zhes bya'o/ /snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur nas/ /rigs mthun gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /lam mthar 'bras bu las sbyor bas/ /sgrub chen dngos grub tshul bzhin snang / /zhes so/ /de'i phan yon ni/ /de dag dang
<p>275b.5</p>ni dga' spyod na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang / /lha mo kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pas sgrub pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs pa bzhi la sogs pa bya ba'i yan lag rnams dang bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i rim pas rigs
<p>275b.6</p>drug gi dkyil 'khor nyams su blang zhing sbyor bas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu skye ste 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang ba dang lha mo chen po'i dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas le'u gnyis pa las/ sangs
<p>275b.7</p>rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis/ /thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pas dkyil 'khor
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>gnyis kyi tshul du sbyor bas dga' zhing longs spyod na/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang thun mong gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu de de nyid sgrub pa'i yan lag tu rtsom mam zhe na/ de la brten nas mchog kun kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par byed de/ le'u
<p>276a.2</p>dang po las/ bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /bsgrubs na kun du 'thob 'gyur la/ /bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dngos grub
<p>276a.3</p>'di las gzhan gong na med par bstan pa'i phyir/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pa/ /de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med/ /chos thams cad kyi dngos po sna tshogs dang / chos nyid kyi rnam
<p>276a.4</p>pa dag mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas bsdus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa dag gi nang na dngos grub kyi dbang phyug ni sku drug lhun gyis grub pa ste/ de nyid la bde bar mos shing gsal bar byas pa las lhan cig rgya che ba'i 'bras bu gzhan med pa'o/ /de dag thams cad
<p>276a.5</p>kyang tshe 'di la 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des/ /'di las tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun du mi 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pa/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi
<p>276a.6</p>mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /dbang phyug kun gyis bde mos pa/ /rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang / rkyen phun sum tshogs pa dang / lam phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul gyis tshe 'di la rig 'dzin gyi
<p>276a.7</p>'bras bu 'thob cing des ni dngos grub kyi mchog skye bar byed pa ste/ mos pa spyod pa'i rig 'dzin dang / las la sbyor ba'i rig 'dzin dang / lam la spyod pa'i rig 'dzin dang / lam smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang / bya ba mthar phyin pa'i rig
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>'dzin gyi tshul gyis gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'od dang / pad+mo spyan dang / yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs chen gyi sa dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / ye shes bla ma'i sa dang / bde ba chen po'i sa rnams rim pa bzhin du sbyangs shing cig car thob par byed pa'o/ /
<p>276b.2</p>de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi rim pa yis/ /'dod pa'i don la rab sbyor zhing / /de dag dang ni dka' spyad na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang / /rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba yis/ /gtso bo gang yang rung ba 'grub/ /tshe 'dis rig 'dzin 'thob byed
<p>276b.3</p>cing / /des ni bde ba chen po 'grub/ /ces pa dang / yang / rig 'dzin rnam pa bdun gyis ni/ /rang gi ye shes gnas sbyor zhing / /gsang sngags mthun pa'i khyad par gyis/ /mos pa'i blo dang don mthun ston/ /rnam grol zag med sangs rgyas la/ /mthar phyin 'di yis
<p>276b.4</p>thob par byed/ /kun du 'od dang pad+mo sbyin/ /yi ge 'khor lo rdo rje 'chang / /ye shes bla ma'i sa non nas/ /zag med rtag tu bde bas bzhugs/ /zhes pa dang / rtog pa bdun pa las kyang / /sangs rgyas tshe 'dis bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sku gsum sa la goms par bya/ /zhes
<p>276b.5</p>so/ /de nyid gtan tshigs nges par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun du mi 'grub med/ /ces gsungs so/ /lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba
<p>276b.6</p>bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa zhes te/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas mnyam par sbyor ba/ dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyi skal ba dang ldan pa de'i bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
<p>276b.7</p>gsal bar byed pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /le'u gsum pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig de kho na nyid kyi don shes pas/ de nyid nyams su blang zhing bsgom pa dang bsgrub pas gsal bar bya'o/ /de'i grogs ni spyod pa'i rim pa
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>ste/ de yang gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i shes byed thabs/ /bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /grogs mchog spyod pa'i rim pa ste/ /gang zag bzhi yi tshul gyis 'jug /ces so/ /dang
<p>277a.2</p>po spyod pa spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog snang ba dang srid pas bsdus pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po 'di dag ye shes rang byung ba'i
<p>277a.3</p>mtshan nyid la snang ba ste/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phrul pa rang gi de kho na nyid dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das nyid du bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo las gzhan du g.yo ba rdul tsam yang med pa ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad kyis bskyod
<p>277a.4</p>par mi nus pas na/ de la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i tha snyad sna tshogs su grags te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do/ /de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgo gsum nas bya ba'i las thams cad gsang sngags kyi don bzhin du sangs rgyas
<p>277a.5</p>thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i tshul bzhin du spyod do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rang gi ye shes de nyid mthong / /rang gi cha lugs rnam gsal bas/ /de nyid spyod dang mthun pa'i las/ /rnal 'byor pa yis don mi bya/ /ngang tshul 'di la
<p>277a.6</p>gnas pa yi/ /blo ldan de nyid skal ba bzang / /zhes so/ /dang po gang zag gsum gyi thun mong gi spyod pa phyogs gcig tu bstan pa ni/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /skal ba bzang mo mchog 'dod pa/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba/ /'dod chags ther zug brtan pa
<p>277a.7</p>can/ /las dang po pas ni rigs drug gi dbye bas rnam par phye ste thabs dang shes rab drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo nas lha mo kun dang mnyam par sbyor zhing dbang bskur ba dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dang / srog rtsol gzung ba'i don du skal ba bzang po
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>mchog gi 'dod pa la longs spyod de/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i chu rgyun dbab pa dang bskyil ba dang slar gyen du bzlog pa'i bde ba myong nas/ chags pa gnyis dang bral ba'i tshul du chags pa gnyis la longs spyod cing ther zug tu brtan por gnas so/ /ye shes la cung zhig
<p>277b.2</p>dbang ba dang / ye shes la yang dag par dbang bas ni don gong ma'i tshul gyis las kyi phyag rgya la brten te/ bde ba'i ye shes ma skyes kyi bar du bde ba gzung ba dang / thabs dang shes rab mthong zhing dmigs pa tsam gyis skal ba bzang po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang / zhu ba de
<p>277b.3</p>rnam pa gnyis las skyes pa'i don rang gi gnas thams cad nas bsdu zhing thams cad du spro ba dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhan dag kyang tshul bzhin du rang gi phyag rgya la longs spyod cing yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba myong bas bde ba chen po'i sku ther zug tu brtan pa'o/ /
<p>277b.4</p>de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i sgo/ /'jug pa'i las kyi blo gros mchog /rten gyi rim pas legs sbyor zhing / /'dod chags chen po brten par gnas/ /dang pos gnas skabs tshul rig rnyed/ /bdag dang 'gro ba'i las la sbyor/ /gnyis
<p>277b.5</p>pas de nyid mthong gyur te/ /gsum pa dran pa'i yan lag bskyed/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /skal bzang sbyor bde la gnas mchog /ces so/ /mchog tu gyur pa bzhi pa'i spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang / /dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang / /
<p>277b.6</p>sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bya'i mchog /rang gi spyad par de spyod do/ /dbang po drug gi yul du spyad pa dag gi dngos rtogs kyi mtshan ma dag ni ye shes kyi snang ba yin te/ gang zhig gnyis su med pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis de dag lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du
<p>277b.7</p>longs spyod na/ bde ba chen po'i sku gsal bar byed pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dbang po gang dang gang lam 'byung / /de dang de yi ngo bo nyid/ /mnyam par shes pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>snang / /mig la rnam par snang mdzad mgon/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma rgyal/ /sna ni rta mchog nyid yin te/ /kha ni pad+ma gar dbang phyug /yid la rdo rje he ru ka /lus ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /de ltar yang dag sbyor ldan pa'i/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis spyad/ /ji ltar
<p>278a.2</p>'dod pa'i bya ba yis/ /kun za kun byed de bzhin gnas/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /yang las dang po pas ni thun mong gi sgo nas bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa/ /gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin
<p>278a.3</p>du/ /dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i/ /skal bzang bud med smos ci dgos/ /mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang thun mong gi sgo nas tshogs bsag cing lam sbyangs te 'bras bu mngon du bya'o/ /de nyid gang zhe na/ drang ba'i sangs rgyas sa bcu pa'i rgyud la gnas pa dag gi yon tan gyi rnam
<p>278a.4</p>pa gzung ba'o/ /lam ni sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyis rnam par bsdus pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o/ /des ni mthun pa'i 'bras bu so sor
<p>278a.5</p>'grub pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo bzhi dang sa bcu rnams dga' bar sbyor ba'i mthus skad cig la 'grub par byed do/ /lha dang mi'i bud med la sogs pa ni smos kyang ci dgos so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas/ /rgyu rkyen lam dang 'bras bu dang / /
<p>278a.6</p>rgya chen thun mong spyod pas spyod/ /thams cad cig car rdzogs pa'i tshul/ /zhes so/ /de yang mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ltar yun ring du dka' ba spyad pas 'grub pa ni ma yin te/ skad cig ma gcig la rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phan yon ni/ lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang / /
