<p>278a.7</p>sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /skal ba chen po bde myong ba/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /spyod pa'i sgo nas rjes sgrub ste/ /dman pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten phal pa dag gis 'grub par dka' ba dang / mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bde
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>chen rdo rje sems dpa' skal ba bzang po'i dngos grub dag thabs so so'i sgo nas rjes su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /spyad par bya ba'i thabs ni dngos po thams cad ni rigs kyi gtso bo gang yin pa'i yab yum du dmigs la/ rang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal bas bsgrub
<p>278b.2</p>cing longs spyad par bya ste/ dngos grub thams cad las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /skal ba bzang po'i longs spyod kun/ /rang gi spyod par de spyod do/ /'dir dang po'i tshig ni kun la snyeg go/ /rten dang rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu mdzad pa'i dngos grub gang
<p>278b.3</p>yang rung ba dag la longs spyod pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ skal ba bzang po'i sbyor mthu las/ /dngos grub bcu drug 'bras bzang dpal/ /bsnyen sgrub bcu drug gnas las skyes/ /dngos grub thams cad las byung ba/ /de bzhin skal bzang longs spyod mchog / 
<p>278b.4</p>bcu drug rten gyi bye brag gis/ /mtshan nyid rim pa'i gnas bzhin du/ /rang gi spyad par de spyod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rigs kun bdag /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan/ /bcu drug sa la spyod pa'i mthus/ /chos rnams ma lus bde bar spyod/ /ces so/ /
<p>278b.5</p>dang por rten bcu drug ni gang zag bzhi'i dbye bas phye ste/ las dang po pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nas bzung ste/ sbyor ba'i bar du gsal ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba'i bar du gsal ba dang / shin tu sbyor ba'i bar du gsal ba dang / sbyor ba chen po'i bar du gsal ba'o/ /ye shes la
<p>278b.6</p>cung zhig dbang bas ni yang gong ma'i gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang / mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang / phyag rgya bzhi'i 'phro 'du la dmigs pa'i bya ba'o/ /ye shes
<p>278b.7</p>la yang dag par dbang bas ni bzlas brjod dang thig le dang phra mo dang rnam dag la rim gyis sam gzhan yang sku gsung thugs 'phro 'du dang bzhi po gsal ba'i rnam pas so/ /shin tu rnam par grol bas ni dbang po yul dus thams cad dkyil 'khor rags pa'i rnam pa dang / cha
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>phra ba'i rnam pa dang / snang stong gnyis med du gsal ba dang / bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /de ltar rten gyi sgo nas phye ba'i lam bcu drug des ni rig 'dzin rnam pa bdun yang bsdus so/ /gsal bar gyur pa ni rtags lnga po mthar phyin pa'o/ /yang rgyud la las
<p>279a.2</p>ni rtags lnga'i sgo nas gang zag bzhi dbye zhing bstan na 'dir ni gsal bar bshad pa med do/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bcu drug rten gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /de gsal lam grangs bcu drug ste/ rig 'dzin gnas mchog bdun rnyed nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams drug la sbyor/ /zhes
<p>279a.3</p>pa dang / yang / sbyor ba bzhi yi bye brag las/ /las dang po yi ting 'dzin bsgrub/ /dmigs pa bzhi yi tshul gyis su/ /cung zhig ye shes dbang ba rnyed/ /yan lag bzhi yi 'phro 'du las/ /ye shes sems dpa'i gnas mchog gsal/ /rags phra stong nyid bde ba'i rgyas/ /shin
<p>279a.4</p>tu rnam par grol ba yin/ /zhes so/ /bsnyen sgrub bcu drug ni rigs kyi lha gang yang rung ba cig la dmigs pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba cig la dmigs pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang / rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
<p>279a.5</p>bsgoms pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang / rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ mngon byang sbyor ba'i sku bskyed de/ /rigs rgyan gsal ba bsnyen pa'i las/ /'od bcas myu gu'i grib ma bzhin/ /
<p>279a.6</p>grogs gsal nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur bskul mdzad cing / /sbyor ba sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems tshogs kun 'byung gnas/ /las tshogs sgrub pa chen po'i tshul/ /zhes pa dang / yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal
<p>279a.7</p>bsgoms shing / /mnyes mdzad bzlas pa gnyis kyi las/ /rdzogs pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bsnyen/ /bsnyen pa gsal bas nye bsnyen yin/ /phrin las yan lag kun ldan pas/ /'dod don sgrub pa'i las sbyor zhing / /'bras bu shes pa'i las dag gis/ /dngos grub
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>sgrub pa las chen tshul/ /zhes pa dang / yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag /bsnyen pa'i don du de dag gis/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul
<p>279b.2</p>bzhin blta/ /phrin las bzhi yi dkyil 'khor las/ /nye bar bsnyen pa goms byas nas/ /snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /dngos grub chen po blang ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ /mtshan ma brtan po
<p>279b.3</p>mthong ba ni/ /sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya/ /zhes pa dang / yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi'i tshul/ /rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /ye shes tshogs kyi 'khor lo yis/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo rab
<p>279b.4</p>mdzes pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las kyis sgrub/ /ces te/ bsod nams kyi tshogs la bsdus pa dang / rgyas pa bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa ye shes kyi tshogs la bsdus pa dang / rgyas pas sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'o/ /dngos grub bcu drug ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ral
<p>279b.5</p>gri mig sman rkang mgyogs shugs/ /bum pa ril bu gser 'gyur rtsi/ /bdud rtsi bcud len rig 'dzin te/ /thun mong las mchog dngos grub yin/ /bkra shis dngos grub bzang po ni/ /kun du sku gsung yon tan thugs/ /'phro zhing khyab mdzad dpal gyi gzhi/ /mi
<p>279b.6</p>'jigs stobs mchog rgyal po'i tshul/ /zhes so/ /sa bcu drug ni yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rig 'dzin rgyal po tshul dag gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes mthun gus/ /theg pa thun mong ba spangs te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing / /sa mchog bcu drug gnon mdzad
<p>279b.7</p>de/ /rang gi bde chen gnas la zhugs/ /zhes so/ /ci skabs 'dir de dag bstan par mdzad ce na/ spyod pa ni lta ba dang bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i grogs kyi yan lag ste/ des na tshig gi zor yang ba'i gnas su bsdus pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin no/ /de las byung ba ni de
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste de la ni skal ba bzang po zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyi yon tan gyi snang ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi spyad par spyod do/ /de ltar bdag gi don du
<p>280a.2</p>rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag la'ang sbyor zhing btsun mo dang dngos grub la sogs pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang / /'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpal/ /sangs rgyas dag pa'i bde dam pa/ /phrogs nas nyes par spyod par byed/ /dpal
<p>280a.3</p>he ru ka rdo rje'i rigs las khro bo chen po'i skur snang ba'i yum grub mchog kro d+hI shwa ri ma dang / ye shes kyi byin stobs rnams bkug cing bdag gi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni 'jig rten dbang po dang / de'i yum mchog dpal na bza' dkar mo dang / 
<p>280a.4</p>sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum bde ba dam pa sangs rgyas spyan ma bkug pa'o/ /yang gsungs pa/ khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun/ /rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon du/ /phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /dpal rdo rje
<p>280a.5</p>nyi ma'i rgyud la mnga' ba'i che ba'i yon tan dang / khams gsum gyi rgyal srid dang / yum mA ma kI dag phrogs pas nye bar longs spyod par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas phrogs te bde spyod na/ /longs spyod gzhan
<p>280a.6</p>lta ci zhig smos/ /dpal rta mchog gi che ba'i yon tan dang / ye shes dang / yum sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen mo dang mchog gi dbang phyug ma bkug ste longs spyod do/ /de dag ni bdag gi don du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i longs spyod pa ste sngags dbyibs chos kyi don
<p>280a.7</p>bzhin shes par bya'o/ /da ni 'jig rten pa la longs spyod pa'i tshul gyis gzhan don bya ba'i phyir/ mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan/ /'phrog las grub dang dran las dga'/ /mngon mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang / /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /lam pa'i dbang du bsgrub
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>pa'i mthu yis 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po dag gi chung ma sngar bsdus nas bdag gis spyod pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan la sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang 'jig rten gsum gyi drag po dang / drag mo'i tshogs thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i lha chen po rnams yin la/ de dag
<p>280b.2</p>gi slob dpon ni khyab 'jug yin te mthu chen po dang / de'i chung ma bkra shis brtan ma'i dbang phyug ma sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pas bkug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po ma hA de ba skye 'gro thams cad kyi mdangs 'phrog par byed pa'i chung ma dka' bzlog grub pa mo bkug
<p>280b.3</p>pa dang / 'dod pa'i lha dran pa'i dga' rab dbang phyug gi chung ma dpal ldan phreng ba ma dga' ba mo bkug pa'o/ /de la ngo mthon gyi stobs kyis 'phrog pa'i rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te/ gang zhig snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
<p>280b.4</p>pa rlabs po che'i sgo nas/ rang gi dam tshig skyong zhing gzhan la phan pa'i don du ma yang brtsam par bya ste/ lha chen po'i mtshan ma yod pa'i gnas su phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pas/ sgo gsum byin gyis brlabs pas rigs kyi lhar bsgom zhing / bdag dang 'gro ba sbyangs pa
<p>280b.5</p>dang gsal bar bya ba dang / dbang po bsam pa dang / 'phags pa la yan lag bcus mnyes par bya ba dang / tshad med pa'i 'jug pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo dang / gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / 
<p>280b.6</p>mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs nas bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i mtshan rtags gsal ba dang / khyab 'jug gi dkyil 'khor bri ste ba'i rnam lnga la legs par sbyar bas byugs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon po la
<p>280b.7</p>me tog sngon po bkram zhing mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas rnams dang / khyad par du lce pog dkar po bdun sbyor du byas pa'am spyan ras gzigs kyi ril bu dang / rus sbal gyi snod du gi wang dang mngar
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>gsum sbyar ba'i rgun chang dang / g.yos sna dgu las sbyar ba'i gtor ma brtsam par bya'o/ /der rten gyi 'khor lo khyab 'jug gi sngags kyis bskor ba dang ba so'i mchod rten du sbyor zhing me tog sngon po dang / bdug pa la sogs pas bkang ba'i rin po che'i snod dam
<p>281a.2</p>kham phor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rang gi sa bon dang sngags kyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgug gzhug dang mchod pa la sogs kyis mnyes par byas te/ rang gi sngags kyis brtan par byas na mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis me tog
<p>281a.3</p>sbyin par byed de gnas pa las/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan zhing mchod nas/ sngags dang phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan cing mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste/ snod kha sbyar ras sngon pos dkri bar bya'o/ /yang lha mo gnyis bkra shis ma'i rten gyi 'khor lo'i sngags kyis brgyan par gur gum
<p>281a.4</p>gyis byugs te/ rin po che'i snod du me tog dkar pos bkang nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug par bya'o/ /sngags 'bum gyis me tog gi char 'bebs shing sgra sang sang sgrogs te/ gsang sngags 'bum gyis ni gzugs ston par byed do/ /de nyid zil gyis mnan cing dam tshig
<p>281a.5</p>gi phyag rgya bstan par byas la/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab pa byas na dga' ba'i bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mos sgrub pa po la a la la zhes brjod cing rin po che sbyin par byed de mdun du gnas so/ /de la bka' bsgo ba byas pas bdag gi dbang du 'gyur te
<p>281a.6</p>'dod pa'i las 'grub par byed do/ /des ni sngags kyi tshul gyis 'jug cing rang gi lha chen po la yang gsol bar byed de 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha chen po'i gzhan gyi chung ma la sogs pa dbang du byed do/ /rgya cher rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs
<p>281a.7</p>pa/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam sbyor zhing / /bsgom bzlas cho ga gsal ba yis/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde ba'i mchog /bzung zhing gzhan la sbyin par byed/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis sbyor ba
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>yis/ /mthu chen la sogs rmongs mdzad cing / /longs spyod tshogs dang chung ma dag /bdag gis spyod cing gzhan la sbyin/ /sgrub pa'i gnas mchog nyams dga' zhing / /lha chen mtshan ma'i gnas yod pa'i/ /'bras bu me tog ljon pa'i tshal/ /chu bo'i ngogs su bsgrub
<p>281b.2</p>bya ba/ /phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas/ /rdzas dang sa gzhi cho ga brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po gru bzhi la/ /sgo bzhi phreng ba khams dang bcas/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /me tog sngon pos mngon par brgyan/ /sna tshogs mchod gtor nyer sbyar zhing / /khyad
<p>281b.3</p>par mchod pa dgram par bya/ /'khor lo ras la legs bris pa'i/ /rtsibs brgyad mu khyud nyis rim mdzes/ /gi wang sna ma'i khu ba dang / /rams dang ren de'i rdzas bzhi yis/ /dbus dang rtse mo mu khyud byug /khru gang tshad du bca' bar bya/ /dbus su haM maM he raM be k+Sha/ /shar
<p>281b.4</p>du ma no ri ba suM/ /lho ru bruM k+Sha kruM tata Ta/ /nub tu suM bag Shan tsa ra/ /byang du ni raM d+haM me ha/ /mtshams su kruM d+haM ru baM si/ /uM thA shu Ta khaM b+ha be taT/ /na mo sarba su ga ta k+Sha/ mtha' lnga lnga yi mtshan ma bri/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed mu khyud la/ /khams kyi rgyud las grub pa yis/ /
<p>281b.5</p>gnod mdzes me tog lnga ldan par/ /ba so'i mtshan ma 'khor lor bcas/ /legs gzhag bdug pa'i dri sbyor bsags/ /rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba yis/ /mthu chen 'khor bcas dgug bya ste/ /dam tshig rdzas kyis mnyes pa dag /sngags dang phyag rgyas
<p>281b.6</p>brtan par bya/ /sde tshan dgu yi gsang sngags la/ /oM dang swA hA thog mthar sbyor/ /rtsa gcig gsal ba'i bzlas brjod kyis/ /rim bzhin dgug sogs las la sbyar/ /des ni mtshan ma 'jigs tshul ston/ /nag po drag chen khros pa'i tshul/ /'khor lo
<p>281b.7</p>rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /sgra sgrogs mkha' la 'pho ba las/ /rdo rje brjod gnon phyag rgyas bcing / /mdun na me tog sbyin par byed/ /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya bstan/ /mchod cing dam tshig bsgrag par bya/ /rang gi gnas su phyin pa las/ /slar nyid mnan cing phyag
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>rgyas bsdams/ /yul dang phye ste rin chen sgrom/ /mchod rten ras sngon dag gis dgab/ /oM aM b+hu ba ga ta na ra ya ni dza dzA/ dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas nas/ /'khor lo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /snga ma bzhin du brtsams pa las/ /gur gum
<p>282a.2</p>bzang pos byug par bya/ /dbus su de bi sid+d+hi dzaH/ /phyogs mtshams mu khyud sngags mthun bri/ /gnod mdzes me tog dkar pos dgang / /oM dang swA hAs mdzes brgyan pa'i/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug /gsang sngags 'bum gyi grangs tshang bas/ /mkha' las me
<p>282a.3</p>tog char pa 'bebs/ /sgra skad sna tshogs sgrogs par byed/ /'bum tsho gnyis kyis mi sdug gzugs/ /gsum gyis legs pa'i gzugs ston 'gyur/ /gzugs 'dzin bkra shis pad+mo'i mdog /dmar gsal rtse gsum pad+ma 'dzin/ /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya
<p>282a.4</p>bstan/ /dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par bya/ /dga' ba'i bzhin mdangs rgyas pa yis/ /sgrub pa po la slar smras pa/ /ngo mtshar chen po a la la/ /lag gi rin chen sbyin par byed/ /mdun nas bsgo ba dbang bskur te/ /'dod pa'i las rnams grub par byed/ /
<p>282a.5</p>sngags kyi sbyor ba'i mthu nyid kyis/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba'i cho ga yis/ /mthu chen lha la gsol 'debs shing / /slar yang 'khor bcas tshogs pa yis/ /dran bzhin 'dod pa kun grub mdzad/ /oM haM tsakra na ya ra ni
<p>282a.6</p>bisnu kam+ba lad+ha ha rU pa hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na mo bi mu sa ma de bi kaM pa la ra da nan hUM smr-i ta ya phaT swA hA/ 'khor lo rtse gsum phyag rgya che/ /sgrub pa'i las la sbyor bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug bde ba gnas mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dkyil 'khor sngo nag gru
<p>282a.7</p>gsum la/ /dbus su tri shUl mtshan mas brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo dang mtshams su bcas/ /pad+ma me 'od phreng bas bskor/ /mchod pa'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyis/ /sna tshogs nye bar mdzes byas te/ /nyi ma mu tig sgron ma'i rdzas/ /rus sbal snod du gzhag ste dgram/ /dri sna
<p>282b</p>
<p>282b.1</p>lnga yi bdug pa dang / /dri sna bdun pa'i ril bu dag /bdud rtsi gi wang mar dkar dang / /nya phyis snod bcas gzhag par bya/ /gro ga sogs la bris pa yi/ /'khor lo rtse gsum mtshan ma can/ /lte ba rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gnyis/ /sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /dbus
<p>282b.2</p>su kaM shI shwa ra ya/ /shar du ma hA de ba ho/ /nub tu ba ri su tha g+ha/ /lho ru par+Na sha ba ri/ /byang du hUM phaT taT thu muM/ /mtshams su lam ba g+hu g+hu hUM dza/ /pra mo sa ra b+hin+da ya/ /ni nur rat+ta bri ha ra/ /hUM mthar swA hA thog mar oM/ /mu khyud yi ge lnga bcu can/ /rin chen snod mdzes
<p>282b.3</p>sbrang rtsi can/ /me tog dri bcas gzhag bya ste/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis lha chen dbab/ /dgug gzhug 'khor lo la gnas bya/ /dbang phyug chen po drag po'i gzugs/ /rin chen nyi zla'i snyan cha phreng / /sngo skya rab 'jigs thod pa thogs/ /mig gsum ral pa'i mtshan ma
<p>282b.4</p>can/ /tri shUl dgra sta ral gri dang / /thod pa sha khrag bkang ba 'dzin/ /'khor bcas sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra/ /sum 'bum sngags kyis gzugs ston 'gyur/ /dam tshig zil gnon phyag rgya sngags/ /las kyi rjes su mthun pas bsgrub/ /gnod brjid
<p>282b.5</p>sngags kyis brgyal mdzad nas/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rmongs par 'gyur/ /lha mo ljang skya thod pa thogs/ /rgyan phreng na ra'i mtshan ma can/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs dga' mdzad nas/ /snyoms 'jug phyag rgya'i tshul du gnas/ /lha mo chags pas yid g.yos te/ /
<p>282b.6</p>sgrub pa po la lhar gsol pa/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ci bzhed pa/ /myur bar bskang ste bran du bgyi/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /bde ba'i ye shes bstan du gsol/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba'i las rnams kyis/ /dbang phyug chen pos bslang byas nas/ /
<p>282b.7</p>dbang bskur dam tshig rab sbyor mthus/ /bde ba'i ye shes bskyed par mdzad/ /gtso bo bde chen a la la/ /rdo rje gsum mchog a la la/ /bdag cag ngo mtshar bde skyed mdzad/ /ci 'dod dgos pa bsgrub par bgyi/ /oM na mo bi tsa ra Ni ma hA de ba/ ma hA ru kaM ba la
<p>283a</p>
<p>283a.1</p>hi ha ha ha ha hUM phaT swA hA/ tri shUl phyag rgya sngags bcas kyi/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /sna tshogs gnas kyis brgyan dga' bar/ /sna tshogs lha mo'i tshogs 'phrul zhing / /me tog dmar pos nyer mdzes par/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po bri bar bya/ /
<p>283a.2</p>dbus su mda' yis mtshan phreng mdzes/ /bar khyams sgo dang bcas pa bri/ /gang ba'i bum pa rgyan tshogs tshang / /rin chen snying po can nang du/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo gzhug par bya/ /rtse brgyad mda' yis mtshan byas pa'i/ /lte ba mu khyud phreng ba can/ /sor mo bcu
<p>283a.3</p>drug ras la bris/ /dbus su d+haM haM hUM hUM hUM/ /shar du phreM phaT phaT tad twAM/ /lho ru sid+d+ha gre ta su/ /nub tu raM ta ma hri hi/ /byang du g+ha g+ha sa ra druM/ /mtshams su hu lu hu lu he/ /nA ga te sh+tsa ra ru ka /saM b+ho ga ta tra ta tar/ /haHsde lnga lnga phyogs dang mtshams/ /mu khyud dbyangs dang gsal
<p>283a.4</p>byed tshogs/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsngags sbyor bas/ /lha chen phyag rgya gsal bar gdab/ /ser skya rin chen rgyan phreng mdzes/ /snang ba'i mda' 'dzin myos pa'i dpung / /drag mo gnas rgyal rin chen skyes/ /'dod pa'i gnas la longs spyod 'phrul/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos
<p>283a.5</p>bskul mdzad nas/ /sum 'bum grangs kyis gzugs ston 'gyur/ /oM d+haM kA ma de ba ru lu b+h+yo na mo b+h+yo/ ha ri sany+tsa ra g+haM saM b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ mda' yi phyag rgya sngags bcas mthus/ /rang gi las la bskul bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rab tu nyer sbyor nas/ /'dod pa'i
<p>283a.6</p>las rnams gnas 'jug ste/ /mchod pa kun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam bya ste/ /gru bzhi dbang chen dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa gser gyi mdog /dbus su pad mtshan mu khyud can/ /bar khyams sgo dang bcas par bri/ /
<p>283a.7</p>rtse brgyad 'khor lo mu khyud kyi/ /phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /dbus su oM i iM sarba/ /shar du pra ma bri shaM ru/ /lho ru shAn+tiM nA gaM hUM/ /nub tu hUM phaT bri gu ti/ /byang du tri ga mu raM su/ /mtshams su bram ze ku ma ru/ /ga tra ru paM laM ba saM/ /ba ra ba ra saM ba ra/ /phaT kyi mthar
<p>283b</p>
<p>283b.1</p>thug sde dgu pa'o/ /gnas rer lnga lnga bri par bya/ /mu khyud yi ge lnga bcas mtshan/ /'khor lo'i rtse mor brgyan pa bri/ /gur gum dri bzang bsgos pa'i snod/ /rin chen rgyan gyis spras pa ru/ /'khor lo 'bras dkar sngags bcas gzhug /rang sngags phyag rgya dgug
<p>283b.2</p>cing gzhug /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya bstan/ /mchod cing las la bskul bar bya/ /zhi ba gser mdog gdong bzhi pa/ /rgyan mdzes 'khor lo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /gsang sngags sum 'bum grangs kyis ni/ /rnam pa gsum gyi rtags ston 'gyur/ /rmongs shing brgyal bar
<p>283b.3</p>byas nas ni/ /lha mo dbang du bsdu bar bya/ /tshangs ma rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /mdzes pa kun gzugs gser gyi mdog /dbang bskur byin brlabs rol par mdzad/ /lus bskyod dga' bde'i ye shes rgyas/ /oM pra ma ni g+ha ta pa ra hri na d+ha ya/ oM AHhUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'khor lo'i phyag
<p>283b.4</p>rgya sngags bcas mthus/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /bzang po kun spyod rnal 'byor gyis/ /sa stengs rgyal po'i gnas bsdus phyir/ /dkyil 'khor dkar po rgyan ldan par/ /me tog dkar po gtor bar bya/ /dbus su pad+ma rdo rtse gsum/ /mu khyud bar khyams sgo
<p>283b.5</p>bcas bri/ /'khor lo'i rtse mo brgyad dag la/ /rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan pa ni/ /ras la sor tshad bcu bzhi pa/ /rams dang lhang tsher bsres pas bri/ /dbus su a a bi ma le/ /shar du in+d+ra b+hi ha ha/ /lho ru b+h+rUM su a a aM/ /nub tu tsaN+Di shwa ri twaM/ /byang du he he rut+ta ne/ /mtshams
<p>283b.6</p>su na mo sha ke lu/ /he he mu ni taM T+ra T+ra/ /ba ra sa mo ba ra hUM/ /hUM gi mthu can gnas dgur dgram/ /mu khyud gnyis la gsal byed dbyangs/ /rgun 'brum la sogs me tog gis/ /dus gsum du ni mchod byas te/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos gzhug byas nas/ /sngags dang
<p>283b.7</p>phyag rgyas brtan par bya/ /dbang po gangs ri mig stong pa/ /rdo rje rtse gsum rgyan phreng mtshan/ /sum 'bum sngags kyis las sbyor zhing / /lha mo kun dang rol par mdzad/ /oM in+d+ra ye sang+g+ha ma nu ra ga k+Sha in+d+ra b+h+rUM/ g+he tat+ta g+he taTU ha ma ha no phaT swA hA/ rdo rje rtse gsum sngags kyi
<p>284a</p>
<p>284a.1</p>mthus/ /ci 'dod dngos grub thob par mdzad/ /gang zhig bzlas dang bsgrub pa dang / /bsgom zhing gzung bar ma byas kyang / /phyag rgya 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi/ /tshad gzung ba ni nus ma yin/ /bsrung dang rgyas sogs las rnams la/ /dbus mtha' lha dang bsrung
<p>284a.2</p>sngags dang / /yi ge brgya pa ming sngags spel/ /khyim du legs par mchod byas na/ /bu 'dod pas ni bu rnyed cing / /dpal 'dod pas ni dpal thob 'gyur/ /tshe dang bang mdzod rgyas pa dang / /nad med rtag tu bde bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs te/ de ltar lha chen po'i tshogs rnams
<p>284a.3</p>dbang du mdzad nas bran bzhin du 'gyur te/ bdag gi 'dod pa thams cad skong zhing de nyid las dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhan la yang sbyin par mdzad do/ /yang 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod pa'i phyir/ ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /'jig rten
<p>284a.4</p>dbang phyug kun dang bcas/ /mngon 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang / /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa na yod pa'i rgyal srid lha'i rgyal po dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i yon tan
<p>284a.5</p>rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rang gi las las grub pa'i rdzas dag kyang bsdu bar mdzad na gzhan ni lta ci smos/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /bzlas bsgom cho ga rdzogs
<p>284a.6</p>mdzad cing / /'jig rten bkod pa nyams dga' bar/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /rin chen bum pa bzang po mdzes/ /cha rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun ldan/ /dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu pa yis/ /gnas dgur mchod pa'i rgyan bcas dgram/ /bsnyen sgrub
<p>284a.7</p>bzhi yi rim pa yis/ /rang rig lha yi gsang sngags la/ /sbyor ba spel te brjod byas na/ /'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ na maHar+tha sid+d+hi g+ha ha na lo tsa na ma ma sid+d+ha ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ /bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa dgu yis/ /las la sbyor zhing dngos grub
<p>284b</p>
<p>284b.1</p>blang / /bum pa bzang sogs las rnams kun/ /'di yis 'grub par the tshom med/ /ces so/ /de ltar na las chen po dag kyang 'grub na gzhan ni lta ci smos te/ tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas phyogs te myur sbyin na/ /longs
<p>284b.2</p>spyod gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /khams gsum kun gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / lha rnams kyi slob dpon 'jug sel dang / 'dod khams kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po dang / sa steng gi bdag po sbyin bdag gi mchog ste dbang po dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po dga' rab
<p>284b.3</p>dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /'dod par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni mchog gi las la spyod pa ste/ de yis mi sbyin ci yang med/ /sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin/ /de kho na nyid kyi don la gnas shing bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag ldan pa'i spyod pa 'dis ni
<p>284b.4</p>rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu skyed cing thams cad 'grub bo/ /mchog gi dngos grub kyi don du thams cad la longs spyod de gzhan la yang sbyin par bya zhes pa'o/ /ji ltar de dag 'grub bam zhe na/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /phyogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na/ /las mchog dag ni
<p>284b.5</p>rab 'byam dang / /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ 'jig rten pa'i lha klu mthu bo che dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kyang 'grub par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan las byung ba dag
<p>284b.6</p>rnal 'byor pas 'grub par byed de/ ci de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin shes pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zag med ye shes las byung ba'i/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas sbyor ba/ /de yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dka' ba min/ /rang
<p>284b.7</p>nyid byang chub sems sbyor bas/ /rang gi rang bzhin 'grub phyir ro/ /de yang / 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa yis/ /lta dman so so'i rgyud 'grub min/ /zhes so/ /de dag spyod pa'i phan yon bdag gi don du/ dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za/ /sde rnams thams cad rab
<p>285a</p>
<p>285a.1</p>'joms pa/ /gang zhig 'dod pas bya ba'i 'bras bu las mchog tu gyur pa de ni bde ba chen po'i sku las byung ba dag go/ /ji ltar na lam dang 'bras bu thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste/ nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan zag pa med pa'i ye shes la snang bas mi mthun pa'i bdud rnams sde
<p>285a.2</p>dang bcas pa 'dul bar mdzad pas so/ /de yang gzhan gyi don du ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dpal ldan dngos grub mthar phyin rgyal/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyas pa'i tshogs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
<p>285a.3</p>mdzad cing / /bya ba thams cad ma lus grub/ /ces so/ /tshul ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug /le'u gnyis pa'i lta ba'i don bzhin du shes shing rtogs par byas
<p>285a.4</p>nas lnga pa'i sgo nas yid ches par 'jug cing gsal bar gyur pas/ gsum pas phyag rgya chen po'i lam sgrub cing / bzhi pas don bzhin du spyod na/ sku drug lhun grub kyi snang ba las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po drug la sogs par
<p>285a.5</p>'phrul cing / de la dbugs dbyung ba grangs med pa'i snang ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don spyod pa la/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la slob pas 'dul ba'i lam pa dag gi phyir/ la lar byang chub sems chen pos/ /la lar spyod dang
<p>285a.6</p>mthun par 'gro/ /zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te/ gang zhig dus la lar thugs rje chen pos gzhi bzung ste/ byang chub mchog tu thugs rin po che rnam pa gnyis bskyed cing sbyangs pa dang / dus la lar bsod nams kyi tshogs mang pos gzhi bzung ste/ lam rnam pa lnga
<p>285a.7</p>sbyang ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / dus la lar dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar por gyur nas lha rnams las mngon par mtho ba'i gnas su bzhugs te/ 'od zer spros shing ting nge 'dzin gyi snang
<p>285b</p>
<p>285b.1</p>ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa ston par mdzad pa dang / dus la lar sngon gyi smon lam dang / 'phral gyi thugs rje chen po mtshungs pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu nas bskul ba'i sgra gsan nas nyid kyi sku glang po che'i gzugs kyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lhums su zhugs nas
<p>285b.2</p>'khor rnams la chos ston pa dang / dus la lar yul ya rabs lum+bi'i tshal du yum gyi mchan khung g.yas pa'i sgo dral te mun rum nas glog 'gyu ba bzhin du bltams te phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun bor ba dang / gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa la sogs pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba
<p>285b.3</p>mthar phyin par mdzad pa dang / dus la lar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste dka' ba chen po spyod pa dang / dus la lar byang chub kyi shing drung du rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad dag ste tshogs rdzogs pa dang / dus la lar bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom
<p>285b.4</p>zhing rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / dus la lar gdul bya'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rim gyis bskor bar mdzad pa dang / dus la lar mu stegs kyi ston pa drug la sogs pa rnams thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod kyis tshar bcad pa dang / dus la
<p>285b.5</p>lar sprul pa'i sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis gdul bya le lo can gzung ba dang / chos thams cad 'dus byas kyi tshul du bstan pa'o/ /gzhan yang sprul pa'i dbang du byas na cig car stong gsum gyi 'jig rten rnams la thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pas don spyod do/ /yul la lar sems
<p>285b.6</p>can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa nas bzung ste/ yul la lar mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gi don ni rgya che ba'i sde snod dag las rgyas par gsungs so/ /gang zag dbang po khyad par du gyur pa dag la gsang sngags kyi theg pas don
<p>285b.7</p>spyod do/ /skus 'dul ba rnams la ni/ la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /dus la lar dang yul la lar sems can gyi don du ji ltar 'gyur ba bzhin du sku bstan te/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ la lar zhi la tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /la lar drag po gshin
<p>286a</p>
<p>286a.1</p>rje'i tshul/ /la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin/ /la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /la lar skye dgu'i mgon mdzad cing / /la lar skye dgu 'joms par mdzad/ /la lar dkyil 'khor grangs med tshogs/ /la lar dpa' bo gcig par snang / /la lar snod
<p>286a.2</p>bcud bkod mdzad cing / /la lar snod bcud stongs par byed/ /la lar zhi khro'i gzugs spro zhing / /la lar dkyil 'khor sdud par mdzad/ /ces te gdul bya'i tshogs rnams la dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi sgo nas don bzhin du dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'o/ /gang zhig gsung gi theg
<p>286a.3</p>pas 'dul ba dag la ni/ la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog /grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med/ /phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du/ drang ba dang nges pa'i don gnyis las brtsams te theg pa rim pa mang du spros shing gsungs so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta dman byis
<p>286a.4</p>pa 'dren don du/ /rtog pa dman pa'i lam bstan te/ /gnas ngan dka' spyad zhan pa'i shugs/ /'khor ba'i ngan song gnas mi mthong / /rtog pa'i sgrib tshogs gnas mtha' yis/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong mi 'gyur/ /cung zhig rnam grol las gzung ba'o/ /shes rab snying
<p>286a.5</p>rje gnas mos pa'o/ /grol mdzad theg pa mtha' yas sgo/ /rnam thar sa la rab sbyor mdzad/ /bya dang spyod pa la mos pa/ /gsang sngags don spyod theg chen mchog /rang gi ye shes gnas 'jug cing / /sngags spyod rgya chen lhar sbyor ba/ /'jig rten bya ba rab grub ste/ /
<p>286a.6</p>gdags pa'i 'bras can gyis mthar phyin/ /rab sbyangs shes rab blo mchog la/ /gsang ba zab mo'i tshul bstan te/ /rang gi bde chen dbang phyug mchog /sna tshogs bkod pa grol bar snang / /zhes so/ /yang mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sangs
<p>286a.7</p>rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /rnam par 'phrul pas dgyes shing rol/ /mngon du nyams su myong bas grub pa'i yon tan gyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas gzhan du spyod de/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po bde ba chen po'i sku de nyid la/ sku
<p>286b</p>
<p>286b.1</p>gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyis 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam par grol bas nges pa'i don bstan cing spyod par mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang / /sna tshogs las byung phrin las kyis/ /'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /thams
<p>286b.2</p>cad don la rnam par grol/ /zhes so/ /gang spyod pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la bdag don lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag /gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin/ /lam la
<p>286b.3</p>rnam par spyod pa'i mthus/ /dngos grub chen po'i mchog 'grub ste/ /rtag tu rang gi rgyud la gnas pa'i dbang phyug brgyad dang / dpal bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa'o/ /de'i yon tan gzhan yang / 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /lha mo kun gyi
<p>286b.4</p>dpal ldan mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dngos grub thob pa 'di la/ khams gsum gyi skye 'gro kun dga' ba'i sgo nas bsnyen bkur byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis ni mchod par mdzad cing lha mo kun gyi gtso bor
<p>286b.5</p>'gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin no/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu yon tan dang bcas pa'i sgo nas gzhan don mthar phyin pa'i tshul ni/ sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs/ /lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams/ /brtan par sems can dag la sbyin/ /rnam
<p>286b.6</p>par shes pa dang ldan pa'i phung po'i tshogs dang ldan zhing / byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos can dag ni sems can gyi khams so/ /de dag ma lus pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas 'debs shing lha'i dngos grub dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub dag brtan par
<p>286b.7</p>sems can la sbyin par mdzad do/ /ci dus lan re tsam du'am zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed cing / /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /bskal pa kun du srid par gnas/ /sku drug gi 'phrul pa de nyid kyi sgo nas sems can kun
<p>287a</p>
<p>287a.1</p>gyi don mdzad cing / gcig tsam gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir yang bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'o/ /de dag ni lam gyi sgo nas rnal 'byor pa'i mdzad spyod dang / mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i mdzad pas sems can gyi don bya ba'i rim pa bstan te/ de nas khyad par du le'u
<p>287a.2</p>drug pa dang / le'u bcu pa'i don yang 'brel to/ /de dag bsdus pa'i tshul du le'u'i mtshan nyid ni sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal ba bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas spyod pa dang sgrub pa'i las sna
<p>287a.3</p>tshogs la sbyor zhing longs spyod pas na skal ba bzang po'o/ /de nyid 'bras bu'i mchog la longs spyod pas na mchog gi dngos grub ste/ lha mo'i dkyil 'khor dang mi 'byed pa'i dam tshig la longs spyod pa'o/ /le'u bzhi pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// // 
<p>287a.4</p>gang dag gi don du gang gis gang ltar byung zhing gang zhig bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad dang / khyad par gyi gleng gzhis yid ches par bya ba dang / rjes su 'jug pa'i bya bas don nyams su blangs pa'i phyir/ le'u lnga pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa gsungs so/ /de yang
<p>287a.5</p>rtog pa bdun pa las/ cho 'phrul bkod pa'i gling gzhi yis/ /'jug pa po rnams yid ches mdzad/ /rjes mthun bsgrub par bya ba'i chos/ /ting 'dzin ye shes gnas la sbyor/ /mtshan bcas mtshan med rim pa bzhin/ /khyad par mngon sum gsang gsum sku/ /zhes so/ /
<p>287a.6</p>de yang cho 'phrul bkod pa'i gleng gzhi ni bskal pa bzang po rgyan gyi dus su/ sangs rgyas dpal sde bzang po'i bstan pa la dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la log par spyad pas dregs byed sde can chung ma nyi shu dang bcas par byung ngo / /
<p>287a.7</p>de la sogs pa nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam pa dag gdul ba'i don du stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas par rnam par 'phrul te snang ngo / /de dag gi
<p>287b</p>
<p>287b.1</p>gleng gzhi rgyas par ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las rgya cher bstan to/ /'dir ni cung zhig tsam gsungs pa'i don bshad par bya ste/ dang po sku dang ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'di yi rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /
<p>287b.2</p>mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /nye bar mngon sum par snang ba'i dbang po drug gi spyod yul 'di dag rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba yin te/ de nyid la rang gi ye shes chen pos rnam par sbyor bas rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas che ba'i yon tan thams cad la mnga' brnyes nas/ 
<p>287b.3</p>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i skur snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no/ /de nyid kyi tshul ci zhig ce na/ gang zhig sangs rgyas gnyis kyi rnam pa'i sgo nas thams cad la mnyam par sbyor zhing mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi ngang tshul can no/ /sa ma yo
<p>287b.4</p>ga'i sgras thams cad mtshon pa'i dbyings can te/ sen d+ha pa'i sgra bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro'i rnam pa'i gnas skabs lngar 'jug par byed de/ ye shes shugs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang / grub pas mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rang bzhin
<p>287b.5</p>gyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang / las kyis mkha' la 'gro ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyang bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin no/ /de las sku rnam pa drug gi tshul du snang ste/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /chos thams cad dbyings skye ba med pa rang
<p>287b.6</p>gi mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i tshul rnam par gnas pa de nyid ji bzhin pa'i ngo bo shes par bya ste/ shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas rtogs shing grub pa la gnyis su med pa'i don gyis gcig pu nyid du gnas pa'o/ /de nyid las rang nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan mi zad pa'i snang ba dang / 
<p>287b.7</p>gzhan gyi rgyud la snang ba'i don grub pa'i tshul du/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sku rnam pa gnyis kyi snang ba sna tshogs kyi rnam par sbyar ro/ /de nas sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid de bsdus pa'i don gyis gnyis su med pa'i sku dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku dang / bde ba
<p>288a</p>
<p>288a.1</p>chen po'i sku dang gsum du'ang sbyar te/ de dag sku gsum spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku dang ye shes gnas sbyor ba'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /sangs rgyas kun
<p>288a.2</p>gyi bdag nyid yin/ /zhes pa dang / rtog pa bdun pa las kyang / yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa/ /rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde/ /zhes so/ /da ni ston pa'i mdzad pa las dgongs pa'i don bstan
<p>288a.3</p>pa'i phyir/ rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la/ /grub pa'i dam pa mchog gi mchog /gzhi las 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba dang / /lam las 'khrul pa'i mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i lta ba'i ri bo lnga dang / ri bo drug dang / ri bo nyi shu dang / ri bo drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / ri bo bcu gnyis
<p>288a.4</p>dang / ri bo bzhi dang / ri bo bcu drug dang / ri bo gnyis kyi mtshan ma de dag gnyen po'i rtog pas bcom zhing / de la brten te 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang / thun mong gi dngos grub kyi sgo nas mchog gi dngos grub kyi lam la sbyor ba'i phyir/ grub pa dam pa mchog gam/ mchog gi mchog
<p>288a.5</p>bstan par mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rtog pa de nyid gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang / /sna tshogs rgyud don gsungs mdzad cing / /mchog gi dngos grub mchog la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /de yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul dang mthun par sprul pa'i
<p>288a.6</p>tshul ni/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang / /bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de dag gdul bya sems can gyi/ /rnam par rtog pa mtha' yas te/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug nas
<p>288a.7</p>bzung ste/ grangs med pa'i bar du gnas pas/ de dag 'dul zhing bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas las kyi sbyor ba so sor bstan cing / dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag
<p>288b</p>
<p>288b.1</p>'dul bar mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs/ /gcig nas bzung ste grangs med par/ /spyi yi lam pa gdul don du/ /rigs bdag sku la sna tshogs ston/ /cho ga sna tshogs bye brag gis/ /bde chen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /zhes
<p>288b.2</p>so/ /'o na thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang po ji ltar zhe na/ bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas/ /sems can kun don rnam sprul na/ /myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yang sku'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo nas 'phrul pa
<p>288b.3</p>dang / rigs kyi sgo nas 'phrul pa dang / gdul bya'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang / de dag thams cad mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang / mi mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul mdzad/ /
<p>288b.4</p>sku dang ye shes rigs dang ni/ /phrin las mthun dang mi mthun tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor gcig la'ang sna tshogs skur/ /rnam 'phrul rang gi bya ba yis/ /sems can kun don rnam 'phrul zhing / /zag med ye shes de bzhin nyid/ /ces so/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'byung gi dus su
<p>288b.5</p>dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul zhing don mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /da ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du byas te le'u gnyis pa nas 'byung ba bzhin du shes pas de nyid kyi don la 'jug cing sgrub pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la spyod par bya ste/ 
<p>288b.6</p>dang por rab 'bring gi dus su ni/ nyin re'am yang na zla re'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo rer ni/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las gsungs pa bzhin du/ 'gro ba
<p>288b.7</p>thams cad la snying rje chen po'i blos dmigs te/ bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas lus ngag yid gsum sbyor zhing nus mthu bskyed do/ sgo gsum byin gyis brlab cing gsal bar byas nas 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can la tshogs bsags pa
<p>289a</p>
<p>289a.1</p>dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo dang gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin rjes su 'gro ba'i [(]rnam [,]rnal [)]'byor la sogs pas dus rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi sgo nas phyag rgya'i rig ma byin gyis brlab
<p>289a.2</p>par bya ste/ gnyis su med pa'i bde bas 'phags pa mchod cing sems can gyi don byas nas bde ba'i ye shes gzung bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ g.yon phyogs gnas las tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya/ /de
<p>289a.3</p>yang 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal/ /'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /thim pas rgyal mor byin brlabs nas/ /ye shes dam tshig chen po yis/ /bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te/ /pad+mo rin chen ldan byas nas/ /
<p>289a.4</p>dbyings kyi bde chen byung ba na/ /rang rig ye shes de la 'od/ /ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag /dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher/ /byang chub sems de kun du dag /khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang / /ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas/ /'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes/ 
<p>289a.5</p>'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung / /de dag dngos grub chen po bas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i nan tan bya/ /zhes so/ /de la tshogs bsags pa'i rten ni/ khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung / /rang gi lha yi cha lugs su/ /sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab
<p>289a.6</p>tu bya/ /dang po rgya chen po las khyad par gyi sgo nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa po dag gis dmigs pa'i don gsal zhing grub par bya ba'i phyir/ gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa rin po che'i khams las byas pa'am/ srog chags kyi rgyu las byung ba rwa dang ba so
<p>289a.7</p>dang rus pa las byas pa'am/ rtsi shing gi rgyu las byung ba'am/ rang gi lha'i cha lugs dang mthun pa'i sku dang / phyag mtshan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya zhes pa'o/ /yang zab mo'i dbang du byas te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa rnam pa gsum gyi
<p>289b</p>
<p>289b.1</p>sgo nas/ rlung rnam pa gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi dang dbang po drug gi snang ba dag ni khams kyi ngo bo yin la/ de la yi ge rnam pa gsum gyi 'phro 'du dang / dga' ba bzhi'i 'phro 'du dang / dbang po yul gyi 'phro 'du dag ni srog rtsa las byung ba'o/ /de ltar thabs dang shes rab
<p>289b.2</p>gnyis su med pa'i rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas par bya'o zhes so/ /de nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ /mchod pa byas nas de sgrub
<p>289b.3</p>po/ /rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung bar dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i lha de nyid lhag pa'i lha ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar gnas shing / sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya las 'phrul pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod de bsgrub par bya'o/ /
<p>289b.4</p>de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sgo nas tshogs bsags shing bsgrub par bya ba bstan te/ des ni le'u drug pa dang gsum pa'i don yang 'brel to/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rang gi ting 'dzin gsal ba yis/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te/ 
<p>289b.5</p>de nyid sgrub pa'i las kyis ni/ /bde chen mtshan ma med pa'i sku/ zhes so/ /de ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid las rang gi dkyil 'khor dang mthun par rgya chen por sprul pa'i tshul bstan te/ de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul
<p>289b.6</p>ba/ /ci rigs pa ni sprul byas pa'i/ /gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad dang 'di las rnam par spros te/ thams cad kyi spyi'i bdag nyid du gnas pa dang / yang khyad par du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
<p>289b.7</p>drug gi bdag nyid du gnas pa dang / de las kyang khyad par du rang nyid kyi rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang / rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang / rgya cher sprul pa'i dkyil
<p>290a</p>
<p>290a.1</p>'khor sum cu rtsa drug gi byung tshul bsgrub par bya ba'i rim pa dang bcas par rtsa ba'i rgyud las rgya cher bstan te/ 'dir ni bsdus pa tsam zhig gis lo rgyus bshad par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su snang ba yang sangs rgyas drug gi rnam par 'phrul ba yin la/ de
<p>290a.2</p>nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba ste/ de nyid ni sangs rgyas drug gi dbugs dbyung gi mtshan nyid do/ /des na/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'dod chags chen po'i
<p>290a.3</p>sgo nas nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag /rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste sangs rgyas drug gi rnam pa can no/ /de dag gi rang bzhin ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/ /rtag tu
<p>290a.4</p>da ltar byung ba bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'/ /sku drug lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid can te bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nyid rtag tu rang gi rang bzhin gyis gnas shing 'gro ba'i don du bzhugs te bde ba chen po'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis ma
<p>290a.5</p>'gags par bde ba chen po rtag pa chen po'i dbyings su gnas pa dang gnyis su med pa'i sku ni gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnam par rtag par gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis rtag par gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi sku ni gsal ba rtse gcig pa dang bcas pas
<p>290a.6</p>rtag par gnas pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rten gyi sgo nas rtag par gnas pa dang / sprul pa'i sku ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sgo nas rtag par gnas pa'o/ /des na rtag pa dam pa brtan pa'o/ /de ltar sku drug gi rnam pa'i tshul
<p>290a.7</p>gyis gnas pas na dam pa brtan pa'o/ /de nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhugs pas na rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin du mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pas 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /sku drug lhun
<p>290b</p>
<p>290b.1</p>grub rtag pa yis/ /rang bzhin ngo bo la gnas te/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/ /zhes so/ /de nyid kyi thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i tshul ni/ cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin
<p>290b.2</p>la sogs/ /'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /gang zag bsdus pa la dga' ba dang / shin tu yang rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga sna tshogs kyi sgo nas lha bsgom pa'i rim pa mi 'dra ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya mi 'dra ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa dang / phrin las kyi
<p>290b.3</p>rim pa mi 'dra ba'i las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i skus kun rdzob tu 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir byas pa yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar 'gro ba la/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /
<p>290b.4</p>sems can don la rab tu sbyor/ /zhes so/ /da ni phan yon bstan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ phyi nang snod bcud kyi dngos po 'di dag rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin
<p>290b.5</p>te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /gzhan dag ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs dbyung ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni chags pa'i mtha' dang bral ba ni zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la zhugs pa rnams dang / blo chung zhing
<p>290b.6</p>shes rab zhan pa'i skye 'gro mtha' dag dang bskal pa gzung dka' ba'i dus su sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge'i bstan pa la/ dge slong bzod pa can zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag pa'i don phyin ci log tu spyod pa'i dbang gis drag po mun pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba chung ma nyi shu'i
<p>290b.7</p>tshogs dang bcas pa byung ngo / /de dag gdul ba'i don du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snang zhing dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de ltar byung ba'i dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa
<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>yis/ /gdul bya dang 'dul byed gnyis ka'i don du gsungs te/ 'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa gzung dka'i dus su sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge'i bstan pa la/ drag po'i mun pa'i tshogs can byung ba'i gnyen por sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sngon
<p>291a.2</p>du byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las byung zhe na/ bdag nyid chen por rtag pa'i lta ba 'dzin pas 'khor ba dag la sku gsung thugs rtag pa'i sgo nas don mdzad do/ /de las spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba/ /rkyen gang
<p>291a.3</p>gis byung zhe na/ don log par spyod pa dang / log par rtogs pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas so/ /tshul ni nyon mongs pa spyi dang / khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i 'gro ba'i tshul dang / de 'joms par byed pa'i gnyen po'i tshul lo/ /yang thugs rje skyed pa'i yul de nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ de tshe
<p>291a.4</p>sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson/ /'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas/ /'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /bskal pa gzung dka'i tshe na sems can snying stobs chung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dbang po dman pa dag las kyi dbang gis phyogs
<p>291a.5</p>gcig tu smin nas zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas rang gi don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rgyu'i sgo nas shin tu stong pa nyid kyi lta ba la brtson pa dang / lam gyi sgo nas 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ phung po lhag
<p>291a.6</p>bcas dang lhag med kyi tshul du 'khor ba'i dngos po thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'o/ /de la thugs rje chen po skyes pa'i tshul ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /
<p>291a.7</p>sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed/ /'khor ba las grol bar 'dod pa'i lta ba dman pa de dag rnam par sbyong ba'i don du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs bsdus
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang / rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang / rgya cher sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug dang / bkod pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa brgyad de spyi'i
<p>291b.2</p>grangs kyi dkyil 'khor bdun brgya bcu gsum la rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor bdun cu rtsa gcig /rnam par snang mdzad dang / he ru ka dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje nyi ma rnams la ni mtshungs par dkyil 'khor brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad du shes par byas la/ rta mchog rol pa la
<p>291b.3</p>ni dkyil 'khor brgya sum cur shes par bya ste/ de dag gi grangs dang dbye ba rgya cher bstan pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dang / bcu gcig pa dang / bcu gnyis pa dang / drug pa las bstan te/ 'dir ni cung zhig bsdus pa'i rgyud yin pas de
<p>291b.4</p>dag spro bar mi bya'o/ /des na sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed/ /ces bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par bstan pa de dag las/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gang gi gnyen por byung zhe na/ de nyid 'gags pa'i gnyen por ro/ /de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na/ 
<p>291b.5</p>zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa'o/ /de dag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi don bstan te/ stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ /mu stegs kyis brtags pa nyi tshe ba la sogs pa'i lta ba bsgrubs pa'i stong pa dang / nyan thos kyis brtags
<p>291b.6</p>pa'i gang zag gis stong zhing zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang / mdo sde pas brtags pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi mtha' chad pas bsgrubs pa'i rang gi lta bas rnam par dben pa'i chad lta dang / rang rgyal bas bsgrubs pa'i ma rig pa bkag nas chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig
<p>291b.7</p>bdag med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid du 'dod pa dag ni don bzhin du gnas pa ma yin te/ thun mong gi mngon sum pa dbang po drug gi yul du snang ba dang / khyad par gyi mngon sum gsal bar nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/ /'o na stong pa nyid chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i lta ba
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>bkag pas rtag pa ther zug par gnas pa zhig gam zhe na/ de nyid ni so so'i skye bo'i rtog pa'i lta ba ste gzung 'dzin gyi rnam pas gnyis su brtags pa la spyod pa'o/ /de'i phyir sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo de yod par bden pas stong pa ma yin la/ de nyid rtog
<p>292a.2</p>pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i mi stong pa yang ma yin zhes pa'o/ /'o na mtha' rnam pa gnyis dang bral ba'i lta bas dbu ma'i don bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la spyod dam zhe na/ de yang zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs las byung ba bya ba'i don du
<p>292a.3</p>kun gyis ni rang gi de nyid gsal bar byed pa ste/ lus ngag gi spyod pa rnam par bsgrubs pa las byung ba bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i yan lag de dag ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa grogs su 'gyur ba'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs de ni yang rang gi rang bzhin gsal bar ston pa'i sgo nas mthong ba
<p>292a.4</p>zhig na/ 'dir ni de mthong ba'i thabs med de/ mu bzhi skye 'gog dang gcig dang du bral la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag ni rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas gzhal bar byed de/ de nyid ni yid dpyod kyi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad la
<p>292a.5</p>rag las te/ de tsam gyi sgo nas ni nyams su myong ba'i don med par bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon par mi nus so/ /de yang bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis mtshon zhing rang gi mtshan nyid thabs la brten pa dang / shes rab la brten pa dang / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sgo nas gsal
<p>292a.6</p>bar nyams su myong zhing yid ches pa'i phyir ro/ /yang gang zhig mtha' la ltos nas/ dbus grub pa las mtha' ma grub pa'i phyir dbus kyang 'grub pa med de/ thams cad rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba gnyis su med pa'i bde bas khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/ dbu mar
<p>292a.7</p>yang ni mi dmigs so/ /de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs kyis snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de nyid snying rje'i thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal/ /chos thams cad ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i don la phyag rgya
<p>292b</p>
<p>292b.1</p>gsum gyi sgo nas pha rol tu phyin par sbyor te/ bde ba chen po'i sku dang gnyis su med pa las thabs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can rnam par ston pa'o/ /de bas na de nyid la snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
<p>292b.2</p>phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i don can te/ sku gsum gnyis med kyi tshul du gsal ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta dman rnams kyi stong nyid dang / /brtag pa'i ri bo gzhom pa'i phyir/ /chos kun dbu ma tsam sgo nas/ /de 'jug don phyin bstan par mdzad/ /drang ba'i lam la spyod byas
<p>292b.3</p>pas/ /nges pa'i 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gsum la sbyor ba'i mthus/ /lhun grub snang gsal rang bzhin med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don las/ /thugs rje thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /zhes so/ /'o na don de nyid ston par mi mdzad cing dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i
<p>292b.4</p>rim pa dang / sna tshogs bshad pa'i bye brag rtog pa sna tshogs bstan pa ci las dgongs she na/ 'jug pa po'i gang zag dbang po dang khams kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa rnams tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las bzlog ste/ rtog pa'i sgo nas mi rtog pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir/ rtog pa med
<p>292b.5</p>pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don du yongs brtags la/ /rnam par mi rtog la mos pas/ /thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya/ /de yang tshig dang pos ni rang bzhin bstan to/ /tshig gnyis pas ni dgos pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to/ /gsum pas ni lam la gzhug par bstan
<p>292b.6</p>to/ /bzhi pas ni gnyen po'i nges tshig bstan te/ de dag ci'i phyir bstan zhe na/ rtog pa zhes pa'i nges tshig tu sbyar ro/ /de'i don ni rtog pa bdun pa las bstan te gong du bshad zin to/ /da ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du lha ma nyes par bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'i glu gsungs pa las dang por yon
<p>292b.7</p>tan brjod pa ni/ brag ca yi ni sgra 'dra ba/ /chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te/ /de las theg pa chen po yi/ /yon tan yang dag rgyas pa glu/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams la/ /nyid kyi yon tan gyi sgo nas tshigs su bcad pa dag brag ca'i rnam pa bzhin du sgra mthar stong pa gzung zhing
<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>'dzin pa med pas/ chos kyi de kho na nyid dam tshig gsum ston pa'i tshig tu de 'gyur te/ de nyid las de kho na nyid mtshon par byed pa'i theg pa chen po'i glu yang dag pa'i yon tan thams cad rgyas par byed pa 'di ltar dmigs pa chen po dang / lta ba chen po dang / ye shes chen po
<p>293a.2</p>dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / phrin las chen po dang / 'bras bu chen pos gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i don rjod par byed pa'o/ /des ni sgra'i mtshan nyid dang / don gyi mtshan nyid bstan to/ /des gang zhig la bstod ce na/ dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
<p>293a.3</p>bstod/ /mi 'da' ba'i don gyis na dam tshig ste/ dus gsum du mi 'gyur zhing rtag par bzhugs pa'i sku gsum gnyis med kyi sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa la bstod pa'o/ /de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
<p>293a.4</p>shes las byung ba/ sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas don mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad par ston pa'i phyir/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos
<p>293a.5</p>grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad ni don chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi sku ste/ yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi sgo nas ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba/ gsal
<p>293a.6</p>ba'i sgo nas ni ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste/ de gnyis gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas ni chos kyi sku'o/ /de la ni mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang g.yo bar mi nus pas mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar snang ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe [(]byed [,]byad [)]dang / stobs dang mi
<p>293a.7</p>'jigs pas brgyan pa la ni mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can zhes so/ /sprul pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa dang mtshan dang mi ldan pa'i rnam pas thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sel bar mdzad pa dang / yon tan mtha' yas
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'gro ba la sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar na sku drug po 'di dag ni dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can no/ /da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sgo
<p>293b.2</p>nas mchod pa'i dpe dang bral bar bstan pa'i phyir/ yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa min/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /
<p>293b.3</p>bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa ni ye shes rnam pa drug gi bdag nyid de/ de dag ni shin tu phra zhing rtogs par dka' bas na tshad gzung du med de/ dpe ni nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa tsam gyis kyang bskrun du yod pa ma yin pas na/ dngos grub mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i
<p>293b.4</p>gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chos gang yang mtshungs shing mnyam pa med pa'i dpe dang bral ba de las sems can gyi don du dngos grub kyi mchog bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang ye shes mi slu bar sbyin par mdzad do/ /rin po che'i rigs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin
<p>293b.5</p>yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas smon lam dang thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas snang ba ni/ rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po bdag nyid
<p>293b.6</p>rtag tu rnam par snang / /bskal pa mang por dka' ba spyad nas sgrib pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal zhing / tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i mthus thugs rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pa dang / lam sbyang ba'i dus su sems can gyi khams la dmigs te smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i
<p>293b.7</p>mthus de dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa gdul bya'i rgyud la snang ste phrin las mtha' yas pas 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa la brtson te/ yon tan gyi ngo bor sbyor bas thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang ba'o/ /yang pad+ma'i rigs so so kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
<p>294a</p>
<p>294a.1</p>gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis don dam pa'i dngos grub mchog mtshon pa'i phyir/ tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang / /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs
<p>294a.2</p>rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur/ /lam mchog tu gyur pa la zhugs pa'i nus pa'i mthus 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa brnyes te/ rang gi mdzad pa mthar phyin te bzhugs kyang 'gro ba'i don du thugs rje chen po dri ma med pas gzigs te don mdzad pa'o/ /yang las kyi rigs bya ba
<p>294a.3</p>grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub myur bar ston pa la sogs pa'i phyir/ e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pas/ /khams gsum rnams la rtag tu dngos grub mchog
<p>294a.4</p>stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig don gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /thar pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lam gyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa ni 'di nyid kyi sgo nas/ mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu skye ba gcig gis rab tu sbyor zhing brnyes
<p>294a.5</p>par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /des na ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan pa'i don to/ /'bras bu'i mdzad pa yon tan dang bcas par de nyid las snang bar bstan te/ khams gsum gyi skye 'gro thams cad la yang dngos grub kyi mchog stsol bas byang chub chen po'i
<p>294a.6</p>lam la sbyor bar byed cing / dus rnam pa gsum dag tu sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i rnam pa kun mkhyen te thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol zhes pa'o/ /de ltar bstod pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir/ 
<p>294a.7</p>'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgya chen te/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku dang ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa'i yon
<p>294b</p>
<p>294b.1</p>tan rgya chen po rjod par byed pa ste/ lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub par byed na/ rang nyid rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgoms shing / don bzhin du bsam pa dang ldan pas dam tshig gsum gyi sgo nas brjod na smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /'bru'i
<p>294b.2</p>don ni go sla bas ma bshad do/ /de dag ni ston pa'i dgongs mdzad yon tan gyi bstod pa dang bcas pas bstan pa'o/ /da ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du byas te bsgom zhing bsgrubs pa las byung ba'i dngos grub kyi tshul bstan te/ sku ni lta bas mi ngoms pa/ /thams cad bdag nyid
<p>294b.3</p>bstan nas kyang / /legs so zhes ni grub pa yi/ /mchog rnams kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa lta bas mi ngoms pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs bstan te/ legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i gsung sgrogs shing lung ston pa dang dngos grub
<p>294b.4</p>kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na/ thams cad bdag nyid grub dga' dang / /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas grub pa'i mchog kun dang / /rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad/ /'jig rten pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad kyi
<p>294b.5</p>bdag nyid ji ltar grub pa dga' ba bzhin du 'byung zhing / bsam pa'i las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / thugs bde ba chen po'i ye shes rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gis ni 'bras bu la brod pa bskyed pa'i tshul
<p>294b.6</p>du rjes su 'jug pa po'i gang zag gis gzhung bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o/ /da ni nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan te/ de nas de yi sgrub pa dang / /shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub dag /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag thob
<p>294b.7</p>bshad/ /de nas thung ngu'i sgra de ma thag tu 'gyur la ring po'i sgras bkra shis kyi tshig tu 'gyur te/ de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i bkra shis kyi don to/ /dngos grub rnam pa gnyis las byung ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /de 'grub par byed pa'i thabs ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i cho ga'i
<p>295a</p>
<p>295a.1</p>rim pa'o/ /des ni srid pa 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la spyod par byed pa'o/ /bsnyen sgrub kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i cho ga ni/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan gsum
<p>295a.2</p>rnam par brdab/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pas lce lag byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis/ rdo rje se gol lan gsum gtogs shing badzra sa mA dzaH'i sngags brjod pas ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsdus shing byon par 'gyur la/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i dus
<p>295a.3</p>su dgyes pa'i thal mo lan gsum brdab cing badzra tu Sh+ya ho zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /de ltar ye shes kyi lha rnams gshegs pa'i rjes la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dag kyang rim pa bzhin du bdag la bsdus te/ de nyid kyang nA da'i tshul
<p>295a.4</p>du spos me'i du ba yal ba ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid la gzhag par bya'o/ /de las slar rigs kyi lhar bsgoms nas/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs te/ go cha dang go chings kyis bsrungs shing thun mtshams kyi mthar ldang bar bya ba'o/ /de nyid kyi spyod
<p>295a.5</p>lam ni/ dbang po gang dang gang las gyur/ /de dag de yi ngo bor bya/ /rnal 'byor pa rang nyid spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi sgo nas dbang po drug gi snang ba dag /thabs
<p>295a.6</p>dang shes rab yab yum gyi sku dang / dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel pa'i tshul gyis mnyam par sbyor zhing gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mig la sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa dang / yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ dbang po yul du snang ba dag /bde
<p>295a.7</p>ba'i ye shes rnam par spyod/ /mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa yi/ /rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug /rang gi ye shes gnas sbyor zhing / /mtshan rtog kun las rnam par grol/ /zhes so/ /da ni bsgom bzlas kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /
<p>295b</p>
<p>295b.1</p>sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang / /sha ta pa la sogs pa yis/ /ci nas yongs su mi skyo bar/ /rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya/ /mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas mnyam par gzhag cing / de nyid la sbyor ba'i
<p>295b.2</p>tshul gyis dngos rtogs kyi sangs rgyas gnyis kyi sgo nas mnyam par sbyor te/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas ji ltar mos pa'i glu dang sil snyan dang bro gar gyi phyag rgyas chags pa'i tshul du mngon par spyod cing / sha Ta pa'i glu dang sha ta dza ko ha'i glu dang / tso sha pany+tsa ma'i glu
<p>295b.3</p>dang ni ri dan+ta ka'i glu dang / ri ta si ta'i glu dang / surna pi pa ri'i glu rnams blangs te/ thun mtshams kyi bar skabs dag tu bzlas brjod gnyis sam thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis sam rnam dag gnyis kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba dag ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du byas te/ rtags rnam pa lnga
<p>295b.4</p>mi gsal gyi bar du rtag tu gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsgom dang bzlas sogs cho ga yi/ /mtshan rtags gsal bar ma gyur par/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor gnas te/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya/ /zhes so/ /de nyid nyams su blangs pa'i rim pa
<p>295b.5</p>rgyas par ni/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /de nyid kun du mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir/ kun du bkug nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun
<p>295b.6</p>du dngos grub pa/ /rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub thob/ /dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par bsgoms nas/ dngos grub rab dang 'bring thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ kun du kun nas thams cad du/ /
<p>295b.7</p>sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de dag nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon ni nges pa'i theg pa'i gzhung du spyad pa po dag gis nges pa'i sangs rgyas dang / dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro
<p>296a</p>
<p>296a.1</p>ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs 'dzin pa'i gnas rnams tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni rjes su bstod pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che
<p>296a.2</p>ba/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di lan cig glur blangs pas/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa yin te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi rigs dang / mtshan ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya chen por ston par byed
<p>296a.3</p>pa'i glu 'di lan cig tsam blangs pas kyang dngos grub mi zad pa'i bde ba 'thob pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pas sems can gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar mdzad do/ /dpal rnam
<p>296a.4</p>par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni gdul bya zhe sdang la spyod pa dag gi rgyu'i lam pa dang / rkyen gyi lam pa dang / 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid can dag thun mong dang khyad par gyi don du rnam par gdul ba'i phyir thugs rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu'i ye
<p>296a.5</p>shes la snang ba rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du bstan te dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de yang dang por ni dus bstan te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal
<p>296a.6</p>pa drug 'dzin gyi dus su sangs rgyas dpa' bo'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de'i bstan pa la slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo la slob ma dge sbyong nag po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des yang dag pa'i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum du skyes shing / de
<p>296a.7</p>las thar nas bdud ma trang ru tra zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing / /lha la sogs pa dang / bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed do/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor sngon du byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las she na/ rtag par
<p>296b</p>
<p>296b.1</p>ther zug pa'i sgo nas 'khrul par spyad pas na ru dra nag po byung la/ sku gsum rtag pa'i ngo bo las ni dpal he ru ka'i ngo bo byung ba'o/ /de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /zhes pas gdul bya dang 'dul byed gnyis ka
<p>296b.2</p>la sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul ru dra'i mtshan nyid ni/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yis/ /'o dod 'bod par ltung bar gyur/ /rgyu'i lam la gnas nas nyon mongs pa zhe sdang gi sgo nas log par spyad pa'i dbang gis thun mong gi
<p>296b.3</p>lam dang / khyad par gyi lam pa dag lus shin tu khro ba dang / ngag shin tu gtum pa dang / yid shin tu gdug pa'i dbang gis 'o dod 'bod pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar gyur to/ /de las thar nas snga ma'i rgyu rkyen dang 'bras bu rig pa'i rnam pa zad cing rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
<p>296b.4</p>smin pa'i mthus/ bdud ma trang ru dra ru gyur pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas 'phos nas sems can de/ /bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas/ /shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur/ /blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas/ /drag po'i las rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis drag po'i
<p>296b.5</p>gzugs su byung ste/ yang drag po'i las kyis myos par gyur nas gdug pa chen po'i sbyor bas sems can la 'tshe bar byed do/ /ji lta bu'i sgom pa'i sgo nas she na/ rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /phra men ma dang gnod sbyin gdon/ /bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid/ /shin
<p>296b.6</p>tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur/ /kha rlangs ngan pa las byung ba'i sbyor bas sems can gyi tshe srog rmongs par byed pa'i rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa nas bzung ste/ sna tshogs pa'i bar du snang ba dang / dri rlangs ngan pa las byung ba'i dug gi sbyor ba lta ba dang / reg pas
<p>296b.7</p>gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / rin po che'i tshul gyis gzhan slu bar byed do/ /rnam par 'joms pa dang phra men gyi sbyor sngags dang / lus kyi sprul pa sna tshogs par 'phro ba dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin pho mo dang / bdud dang log 'dren la sogs pa'i gdug pa chen po'i tshogs
<p>297a</p>
<p>297a.1</p>rnams myur du dbyung zhing gnas thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o/ /de'i las ni/ gnas gsum po ni 'jig byed cing / /sgrub pa po rnams la yang za/ /lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed/ /bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed/ /ces pa'o/ /de ltar spyod pa'i las
<p>297a.2</p>kyis 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams rim pa bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul bstan te/ de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong / /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te/ ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang nye
<p>297a.3</p>dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa rnams tshangs pa la skyabs su dong ngo / /tshangs pa nyid kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi nus te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams khyab 'jug chen po'i drung du nye bar dong ngo / /de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par ma nus te/ lha chen po mig gsum pa
<p>297a.4</p>la skyabs su dong ngo / /de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par ma nus te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la skyabs su gsol lo zhes pa dang / de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ de nas ru tra de nyid kyis mkha' 'gro dang / phra men gyi tshogs chen po bsdus te sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rbod gtong byed cing / sngon gyi
<p>297a.5</p>las la grub pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs dang drag po'i gsang sngags kyis rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams bcom nas sa steng gi ya thog tu song ste/ rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal na gnas shing sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs na yang rgol bar brtsams so zhes pa la
<p>297a.6</p>sogs pa'i tshig rgya cher gsungs so/ /yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis su gsungs te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku
<p>297a.7</p>gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje se gol gyi sgras sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad de/ dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bsnol te/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa'i sgras thams cad snyan gsan dbab pa ni/ ci se gol gcig tsam gtogs pa'i sgras sangs rgyas thams
<p>297b</p>
<p>297b.1</p>cad bsdu bar nus sam zhe na/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las byung ba yin pas khyad par gyi mthu dang ldan te/ de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ /'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcas pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /zhes
<p>297b.2</p>gsungs pa yin te/ de ltar spyod la spyan drangs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar til gyi gang bu til 'brus bcer ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'i tshul du bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje
<p>297b.3</p>'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang de dag gis gdan 'dzom chen po'i bka' bgros mdzad nas/ thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pa bstan par dgongs te/ shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo
<p>297b.4</p>yi/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /ru tra nag po la sogs pa'i khro bo'i gzugs can de dag la zhi ba'i skus 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang / thabs snying rje chen po'i rgyu las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis 'bras
<p>297b.5</p>bu'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /'o na zhi ba'i skus mi 'dul ba khro bo'i skus kyang gdul bar nus sam zhe na/ khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /nyon
<p>297b.6</p>mongs pa rang ka mar 'dzin cing spyod pa'i khro bo rang rgyud pa dag gis kyang sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i 'jig rten gsum dag kyang sreg par nus na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skus ni bcas bcos rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis
<p>297b.7</p>khro bo'i cha lugs su bsgyur te/ khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang skad cig tsam la sreg par byed pa ni smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /de dag gis ni sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul bstan te/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang
<p>298a</p>
<p>298a.1</p>mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su de bzhin du bslab par bya'o/ /da ni sngon byung gi mtshan nyid dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya ba dag thun mong du bstan pa las dang por lha bskyed pa'o/ /de nas sne yi rtse mo la/ /yid ni yang dag
<p>298a.2</p>brtan par gzung / /sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung / /gnas skabs gsum gyi bye brag gis/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sna'i rtse mo la yid rtse gcig pa la brtan pa'i rnam pa yang dag par gzung ste/ yi ge hUM ring po tsheg drag can drod rnam pa
<p>298a.3</p>gsum dang bcas pa las bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i phyag rgyas dpal he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya'o/ /da ni 'bras bu mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid las dang por gtso bo'i cha lugs
<p>298a.4</p>bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje khro bor gyur nas phyung / /dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka /'bar bas thal bar rab tu 'jig/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las rdo rje khro bo chen po'i skur bsgyur zhing phyung ngo / /
