<p>298a.5</p>de nyid ji ltar zhe na/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan zhing sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bcom zhing / rnam thar sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyis dgyes chags phrin las kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa don ye shes
<p>298a.6</p>lnga'i mtshan las/ 'bar ba chen po'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis thams cad bsregs shing rlog par mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan yang sku mdog dang 'od zer la sogs pa'i sgo nas/ sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar/ /'jig pa chen
<p>298a.7</p>po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra/ /thugs ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan pas/ rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar bas chags pa gnyis dang ma bral ba'i rtags mtshon pa snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ me la sogs pas
<p>298b</p>
<p>298b.1</p>sna tshogs 'joms pa bzhin du drag po'i skur gnas te/ dur khrod kyi me dang 'dra ba'o/ /gzhan yang khro bo'i cha lugs dang rgyan chas kyi rnam par brjid pa ni/ 'bar ba chen po skra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po dbu rgyan can/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod
<p>298b.2</p>bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang / /smin ma khro gnyer bcas par bsgyur/ /'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas/ /dpal chen po'i sku la rang nyid kyi yon tan snang ba las grub cing / gzhan 'dul ba'i
<p>298b.3</p>don du byung ba'i rngams brjid sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang / gar rnam pa dgu'i mtshan mas brgyan te/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i skra gyen du brdzes shing / spyan mig nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'bar ba las 'od 'phro ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa
<p>298b.4</p>dbu rgyan rgyan cha sna tshogs kyis mtshan pa/ dur khrod kyi chas chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pas 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag cing / dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal bzhi khro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs par 'gyur zhing / drag po dang / rmongs pa dang / 
<p>298b.5</p>chags pa dang / zhi ba'i tshul du rab tu gnas la/ smin ma'i rtse mo gyen du bteg cing dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis gnas la stobs bcu'i sgo nas khro gnyer bcu'i brjid pa/ 'bar ba'i gar thabs rnam pa bzhis bskyod cing gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ khrag
<p>298b.6</p>'thung mthing nag 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer can/ /zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar/ /dbus ma mthing nag drag po'i zhal/ /g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste/ /rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar po'o/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer glog bzhin
<p>298b.7</p>'gyu/ /spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /dbu skra sma ra ser nag mdzes/ /spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung / /dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar
<p>299a</p>
<p>299a.1</p>thabs can/ /zhes so/ /gtso bo'i phrin las kyi mdzad pa ni/ gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig /dbang phyug chen po gu lang gi gzugs
<p>299a.2</p>kyis 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa dang / lha'i dbang po sa stengs kyi dbang po ste/ nga rgyal gyi lam la gnas pa dang / dga' rab dbang phyug gis thams cad gsal bas nyi zla zhes grags pa phrag dog la gnas pa dang / khyab 'jug khro bas gshin rje lta bu zhe sdang la gnas
<p>299a.3</p>pa dang / tshangs pa gti mug gi lam pa dag bcom ste/ gnas gsum po'i tshogs rnams bsreg cing thal ba bzhin du gzhig par mdzad do/ /ci gang du 'di dag phyogs re 'dul ba'i don du bstan pa las 'dir kun 'dul bar mdzad ce na/ shas che ba'i dbang du dgongs pa
<p>299a.4</p>dang gcig gi cha shas las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /yang phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /'dir ni phyag dang po gnyis kyi mtshan ma smos te/ lhag ma
<p>299a.5</p>dag ni le'u dgu pa'i gnas skabs nas ston to/ /de dag gsal bar ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan te/ g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang / /rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas/ /de 'og gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi/ /pags pa rlung gi tshul gyis bskor/ /gsum pa gnyis na
<p>299a.6</p>mda' dang gzhu/ /g.yas kyi bzhi pas dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa bzung / /snying rje chen pos bkang ba'o/ /zhes so/ /yang gnas skabs la lar ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas snang bar mdzad de/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ la lar
<p>299a.7</p>zhal gcig phyag bzhi la/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM se ral kha/ /la lar rdo rje b+han+d+ha dmar/ /kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten bcas/ /zhes so/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po las byung ba'i he ru ka de nyid sku mdog
<p>299b</p>
<p>299b.1</p>dang zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / phrin las dang / phyag mtshan gyi rnam pa dag gsal bar bstan pa'i rjes la/ cha lugs dang rgyan gyi mtshan nyid/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /zhes pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ glang chen stag gi pags pa yis/ /stod
<p>299b.2</p>smad sku yi na bzar mnabs/ /klu rgyal thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sku yi gnas brgyad rnam spras shing / /lha chen dpa' bo'i g.yang gzhi dag /tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa las/ /khrag dang zhag gi ri mos mtshan/ /phyag rgya lnga yi mtshan pa
<p>299b.3</p>las/ /snyan gong nyi zla rin chen phreng / /zhes so/ /de ltar 'bar ba chen po'i sku 'jigs pa'i chu lugs rnam par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis/ bdud dregs byed dang lha chen po'i tshogs thams cad dbang du byas te drag po'i tshogs btul nas/ sha khrag rus pa kun gsol zhing 'khor ba na
<p>299b.4</p>gnas pa dag kyang brgyal bar mdzad de/ de ltar thal bar gyur pa dag thugs rje chen pos mi gtong zhing rnam par shes pa slar gzung bar byas so/ /ci dga' ba sna tshogs kyi las grub par byed de/ gong du lha chen po rnams kyis rnam par bstan cing / yang de nyid dang mi 'dra ba'i rnam
<p>299b.5</p>pa gzhan ston pa dang / yang de dag gi skyabs mdzad cing / de dag sgrog par byed ce na/ 'gal ba med de de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / de 'dul ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gyis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal la skad cig tsam gyis bde bar gnas pa'i skyabs
<p>299b.6</p>mdzad pa dang / yang de dang de nyid gnyis ka rnam par grol zhing byang chub chen po'i gnas su bkod pa la nyes pa'i skyon ci zhig yod/ che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par las snang ba'i mtshan ma'o/ /de yang shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs mi srid de 'od kyi snang ba dang bcas pa'i myu
<p>299b.7</p>gu las grib ma skye ba'i tshul du yum bskyed cing las la gzhug pa'i phyir/ de yi 'bar ba'i nyi ma las/ /byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa/ /bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs/ /gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus/ /de yang de'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rang nyid ngo bo
<p>300a</p>
<p>300a.1</p>las byung ba'i/ /kro d+hi shwa ri 'jo sgeg stabs/ /sku mdog sngo skya nam mkha'i lus/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon pas thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag /rin chen 'bar
<p>300a.2</p>ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan/ /phyung nas byin gyis rlob mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur/ /dregs byed bdud la sogs pa yi/ /'byung po thams cad rmongs mdzad de/ /gdug pa'i tshogs kyi sha dang khrag /ma lus yud tsam cig la gsol/ /zhes so/ /de dag kyang
<p>300a.3</p>ston pa'i dgongs mdzad kyi dbang du ni de kho na ltar snang ba yin la/ rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni sbyor ba'i yan lag dang / rjes su sbyor ba'i yan lag gis rgyas par bsgom par bya'o/ /da ni shin tu sbyor ba'i rim pas 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir/ rgyal po de ni de dag dang / /lhan
<p>300a.4</p>cig dur khrod rnam par rol/ /thams cad rdo rjer mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis/ /dpal he ru ka ni chos bdun gyi bdag nyid dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /'khor gyi lha mo dag ni de nyid kyi sku dang ye shes dang yon tan gyi snang ba las
<p>300a.5</p>byung bas/ de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas shing dur khrod brgyad du rnam par rol lo/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ gau rI ma la sogs pa'i ma mo chen mo brgyad dang / mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i phrin las kyi lha mo bzhi dang / me tog ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi
<p>300a.6</p>dang / rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa'i sgo ma bzhi ste/ lha mo nyi shu thams cad sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag gi phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na/ shin tu gdug cing khro drag
<p>300a.7</p>pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing khams su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod/ /bdud ma trang ma ru tra la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa dag gi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong zhing / 
<p>300b</p>
<p>300b.1</p>sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa'o/ /de yang ji ltar zhe na/ dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing la sbyor ba ste dpal he ru kas ni zhe sdang las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam pa dag 'dul bar mdzad pa dang / lha mo gau rI mas zhi ba'i sgo nas thugs kyi phrin las kyis sems can zhe
<p>300b.2</p>sdang gi khams la gnas pa dag rnam par sbyong zhing / rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'god pa'o/ /lha mo gzhan yang des 'gre ste tsau rI mas nga rgyal gyi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / 
<p>300b.3</p>pra mo has 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / bai ta lIs phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / puk+ka sIs gti mug gi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / tsaN+Da lIs nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / g+hasma
<p>300b.4</p>rIs log par lta ba la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / sma sha nIs the tshom dang yid gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa dag sbyong bar mdzad pa'o/ /yang mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyis/ /rtog pa bla med thams
<p>300b.5</p>cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /dpal he ru ka la khro bo chen po bcus bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / khro bo re res rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rnam par spros te sems
<p>300b.6</p>can gyi rgyud sbyong bar mdzad pa'o/ /rjes su sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /dpal he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni gti mug gi rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i lam la nyon mongs pa spyi
<p>300b.7</p>dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rtag chad kyi mtha' can log par lta ba la gnas pa rnams gdul ba'i don du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la snang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung pad+ma'i rigs dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyis don mdzad pa'i
<p>301a</p>
<p>301a.1</p>tshul bstan pa'i phyir/ dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus bstan te/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /'das pa'i tshe bskal pa bcud ldan gyi dus su sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de'i bstan
<p>301a.2</p>pa la dge slong rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya bas bka'i don phyin ci log tu spyad de/ rtag chad kyi mtha' la gnas shing / log pa'i lta ba dang ldan pas ngan song rnam gsum du 'khor zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo / /de las thar nas dregs byed mtha' la gnas pa zhes bya ba nyon
<p>301a.3</p>mongs pa'i lam la zhen cing rang gi lta ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku las dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par 'phrul pa'i gar thabs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par byung ngo / /ci zhig las she na/ rang gi lta
<p>301a.4</p>ba rtag par 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis ni gdul bya'i rnam pa thun mong dang khyad par gyi tshogs snang zhing / sku gsum rtag pa'i sgo nas 'dul byed kyi bde bar gshegs pa byung ngo / /des na gdul bya 'dul byed spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ 
<p>301a.5</p>'gro ba'i don ni sngon byung ba/ /bka'i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i dus thugs rje chen po skye ba'i yul 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab ji bzhin par spyad pa'i mthus thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid de dang mthun pa 'phrul pa'o/ /de la
<p>301a.6</p>thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /log par lta ba gnas par 'gyur/ /shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis/ /'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung / /bskal pa bcud ldan gyi dus kyi tshe de nyid na las kyi dbang gis skye 'gro ma lus pa thams cad
<p>301a.7</p>nyon mongs pa gti mug gi lam la gnas shing log par lta bas kun du rmongs te/ rtag chad kyi mtha' la gnas pa dang / de dag gi nang nas kyang dge slong rgyal ba mchog dang / de'i rjes su 'brang ba dag ste de dag gi rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa dag gzigs
<p>301b</p>
<p>301b.1</p>pa'o/ /de dag gi gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ji ltar skyes pa ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems ni rnam sbyong phyir/ /pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chos su gnas par gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis gsung gi rnam
<p>301b.2</p>par 'phrul pa ni pad+ma'i rigs te/ gang zhig rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo las gzhan 'dul ba'i thabs su rdo rje chos su snang ste/ ji ltar zhe na rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku mdog dkar la dmar zhad chags/ /zhal mang brgya phyed phyag gis
<p>301b.3</p>mdzes/ /g.yas kyi pad+ma rdo rje dang / /'khor lo rin chen dbyug sogs kyis/ /mtshan zhing g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /pad+ma rkyang pa'i sdong bu 'dzin/ /mtshan sogs dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od zer 'phro/ /rin chen la sogs rgyan phreng
<p>301b.4</p>tshogs/ /dar gyi gos rgyan cod pan dpyangs/ /bkra shis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing / /bsnyems bcas chags pa'i tshul du gzigs/ /zhes so/ /de yang rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni/ pad+ma chags par sbyor ba'i tshul du yang / rtog pa bdun pa las/ byin rlabs
<p>301b.5</p>rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis/ /rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang / /dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug /cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur/ /zhes so/ /ci skabs 'dir sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la rdo rje chos la sogs pa ming gi bye brag mi mthun pa 'dogs she na/ de ni rang
<p>301b.6</p>bzhin gyi bye brag chos zhes bya ba phrin las kyi sgo nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / phrin las sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces so/ /de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /chags pa'i nyes pas
<p>301b.7</p>mi gos pa/ /de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi/ /nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag /dper na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'dam rdzab las skyes shing de dag gi dri mas ma gos pa bzhin du/ gsung pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo rnam
<p>302a</p>
<p>302a.1</p>par dag pa las byung ba'i sku 'di yang khams gsum gyi nyes pa sna tshogs las rnam par grol ba'o/ /des na chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ma bral ba'i tshul gyis spyod cing gnas pas na rdo rje chos zhes bya'o/ /de yang thabs kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 
<p>302a.2</p>pad+ma 'dam bral skam 'thas rul/ /de ltar 'khor ba spangs spyod min/ /mtha' gnyis las grol rnam spyod pa/ /kun du snang ba mtha' yas sku/ /gsang ba theg chen bla med gzhung / /de nyid dkyil 'khor rnam gsal ston/ /zhes so/ /de nyid kyi phrin las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'di
<p>302a.3</p>ni kun du gzigs pas na/ /rgyal ba'ang dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /gdul bya'i las ji lta ba bzhin du dbang po dang skye mched kyi bye brag rgya cher gzigs nas/ mthun pa'i sku gsung thugs
<p>302a.4</p>kyi phrin las kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad par dgongs nas/ nyid kyi yon tan rnam par bkod pas bdud rnams bcom zhing / dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas thugs rje chen po rtse gcig pa dang ldan te/ dus dang rnam pa thams cad du kun du gzigs par mdzad pa ni rdo rje
<p>302a.5</p>sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'o/ /de'i tshul ni/ 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na/ /mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /phyin ci log gi rtog pa las byung ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la/ 
<p>302a.6</p>la las de nyid la spyad pas grol bar 'dod pa dang / la las spangs pas grol bar 'dod pa dang / la las sbyangs pas grol bar 'dod pa ni/ rnam par dag pa ma yin te/ de dag ma spangs par dag pa'i rang bzhin du mkhyen pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i don te/ de nyid la spyod
<p>302a.7</p>pa'i sgo nas dngos grub mchog sbyin zhing dam pa grub par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das so/ /yang phrin las sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas/ 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar mos/ /kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal/ /pad+mo
<p>302b</p>
<p>302b.1</p>gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /'gro ba'i tshul du 'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi cha lugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhal phyag mang po dang / sku las snang ba'i gzugs brnyan mang por ston pa'o/ /de yang le'u dgu pa las/ gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur
<p>302b.2</p>zhing gar byas pas/ /pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor byas/ /phyag ni brgyad rnams 'khor lo bskor/ /zhes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /des na gang zhig kun du gzigs pa'i ngang
<p>302b.3</p>tshul dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de ltar phrin las sna tshogs kyi ngo bo de gang las byung zhing ji lta bu zhe na/ pad+mo sgyu ma rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo thabs dang shes rab las byung ba de
<p>302b.4</p>nyid ni sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no/ /de nyid kyi snang ba pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog go/ /yang phrin las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas mdzad pa rgya chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ dpal pad+ma gar dbang la sogs pa/ /rtog
<p>302b.5</p>pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /gang zhig rang gi lta ba sna tshogs kyi rtog pa la spyod pa'i 'gro ba ni grangs med de/ de dag gi don du sngon byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / rjes 'jug gi sgrub
<p>302b.6</p>pa'i rim pa mang por bstan zhing gsungs te/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa grangs mang du snang ba dag kyang dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum gyi snang ba yin te/ de nyid kyang dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'o/ /de lta bu'i skus skye 'gro
<p>302b.7</p>ji snyed du rnam par sbyong zhing / sgo gzhan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pas sems can gyi khams ni rnam par sbyong bar mdzad do/ /de dag rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba'i rim pa ni dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par
<p>303a</p>
<p>303a.1</p>bya'o/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni sred cing zhen pa dang gdug cing rngam pas shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi 'gro ba dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
<p>303a.2</p>las snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i rigs dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs dbyung ba'i tshul bstan te/ de las dang po dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /bskal pa mi gnas pa'i dus su
<p>303a.3</p>sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de'i bstan pa la dge slong 'byor pa can zhes bya bas bka'i don log par spyad de/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bos g.yengs nas ngan song rnam pa gsum du 'khor zhing / de las thar nas dregs byed 'jungs pa can zhes bya
<p>303a.4</p>bar skyes so/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku las/ dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs gsungs so zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las she na/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa las so/ /de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de bzhin
<p>303a.5</p>gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /gdul bya dang 'dul byed kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i don log par spyad pa dang ji bzhin par spyad pa'i dbang gis las dang thugs rje 'brel par gyur pa'o/ /de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan
<p>303a.6</p>nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu gdug cing bskam par gyur/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs so/ /bskal pa mi gnas pa de nyid kyi tshe na bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis blo bslad pa'i 'gro ba
<p>303a.7</p>thun mong dang / khyad par tshogs rnams lus shin tu gdug cing ngag shin tu bskam pa dang sems shin tu 'jungs par gyur pas/ yi dgas gshin rje'i dmyal bar ltung zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de nyid las zad pa'i dbang gis grol nas mi'i gnas su shin tu dbul zhing
<p>303b</p>
<p>303b.1</p>phongs pa dang / bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ phan tshun gcig gis gcig gsod par byed do/ /de'i las zad nas yi dgas kyi srin po dregs byed 'jungs pa can zhes bya bar gyur nas/ skye 'gro thams cad kyi tshe srog 'phrog cing 'jig rten gyi khams
<p>303b.2</p>phung bar byas so/ /de gdul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po/ /rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur/ /gzhan gyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur
<p>303b.3</p>ba'i dregs byed kyi tshogs sde dang bcas pa de dag sgo kun du sbyang ba'i phyir/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku dpal rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur te/ de nyid ji lta bu zhe na rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gser gyi ri le
<p>303b.4</p>nyi shar bzhin/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi rnam mdzes pa/ /g.yas na mda' dang ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gzhu nyi dkyil rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna lngas bskor/ /'dzum bcas g.yon mig gyen du bteg /ces pa dang / yang zhi bas mi 'dul ba la khro bo'i
<p>303b.5</p>skur yang snang ste/ la lar cung zhig khros pa las/ /byi ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku/ /zhabs gnyis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing / /snga ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'o/ /zhes te/ de lta bu'i sku yum dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa nyi ma'i dkyil
<p>303b.6</p>'khor gyi mdangs dang ldan pa 'gro ba'i don du phyung bar mdzad pa'o/ /da ni rang bzhin gyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs/ /kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' la rin chen thams cad
<p>303b.7</p>'bebs/ /gang zhig rang bzhin dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi rnam pa dag dang ldan pa de nyid la ni de dang mthun pa'i mtshan btags te bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan nyid la nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / 'jig rten gsum rgyal
<p>304a</p>
<p>304a.1</p>zhes grags so/ /de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / gter gyis re ba rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzugs can dang / mchod pa rnam par 'phrul ba la sogs pa'i tshul du lha mo dag gi rnam par 'phrul pas/ nam mkha'i snying po bzhin du
<p>304a.2</p>gnas thams cad du khyab par mdzad cing phyogs kun gyi re ba dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /ji lta bu'i rnam pas she na/ btsun mo rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang / dmag mi rin po che dang / rta rgyal rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / 'khor lo rin po che
<p>304a.3</p>dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams nam mkha' las char bzhin 'bebs pa'o/ /de lta bu zhi bas mi 'dul ba dag la khro bor bsgyur zhing phrin las lhag pa'i sgo nas don mdzad pa'i phyir/ shin tu gdug cing khro ba la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs
<p>304a.4</p>kyi nyi mas ni/ /rab tu gdungs pa kun sgrub pas/ /'jungs pa yi dgas kyi srin po gshin rje'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag ni thabs gzhan gyis gdul bar mi 'gyur te/ mthun pa'i gnyen pos khro bo'i sku bstan cing nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid dang bcas pa'i thabs dang shes
<p>304a.5</p>rab thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i gdung ba thams cad gcod cing skems par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang ji ltar zhe na/ bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du/ brgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi/ /nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed/ /mda'
<p>304a.6</p>la sogs pa'i mtshon cha la la dag 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa la brten te 'phangs shing dge ba'i las la gzud pa dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dag la gab pas 'phangs shing sdig pa'i las la bzlog pa dang / zhags pa la sogs pas slar yang drangs
<p>304a.7</p>te mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad dbrog pa dang / khyad par gyi phrin las kyis mi mthun pa'i rgol ba thams cad bcom zhing khams gsum las rgyal bar byas te/ nor gyi tshogs rnams sdud par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdo rje nyi ma rgyal chen pos/ /rang
<p>304b</p>
<p>304b.1</p>gi 'od kyi snang ba'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun du gsal mdzad cing / /rab tu gdung ba sel bar mdzad/ /dge ba'i bya ba la gzud cing / /mi dge lam las bzlog pa dang / /yon tan thams cad 'phrog mdzad de/ /khams gsum kun las rgyal bar mdzad/ /slar nyid
<p>304b.2</p>yon tan che ba'i mthus/ /de 'dod kun la sbyin par mdzad/ /ces so/ /da ni phrin las rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rab tu
<p>304b.3</p>bkrol/ /gang zhig 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa'i mthu dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ de nyid rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mi 'dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ste/ khyad par gyi phrin las ji lta ba'i rnam pas mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid
<p>304b.4</p>do/ /de dag ni sngon byung ba'i dgongs mdzad bstan te/ de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgo nas rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba'i rnam par yang snang ste/ 'di ni thun mong du bstan pa yin no/ /de dag gi sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /
<p>304b.5</p>dpal rdo rje nyi ma dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de ni sems can phrag dog gi lam la gnas shing rang gi lta bas bsnyems pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa le lo'i las can yang dag pa'i lam la ma gus pa'i lha chen po dregs byed kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i spyi'i lam
<p>304b.6</p>pa rnams dang / khyad par dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa can sde dang bcas pa dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rgya chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil
<p>304b.7</p>'khor 'phrul pa'i tshul bstan te/ dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba zhes bya ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de'i bstan pa la dge bsnyen zla ba zhes bya
<p>305a</p>
<p>305a.1</p>bas bka'i don log par spyad de ngan song gsum du yun ring du 'khor ro/ /de las thar nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa can zhes bya ba chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa byung nas/ lha chen po dag gi nyon mongs skyed par byed do/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje
<p>305a.2</p>'chang chen po nyid kyi sku las/ rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las she na/ mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i sgo nas rtag pa gnyis las so/ /de dag gi spyi'i tshul ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /bka'i
<p>305a.3</p>don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i rkyen dang / ji bzhin par rtog pa'i mthus/ gdul bya 'dul byed gnyis kyi mtshan nyid 'gro ba'i tshul du byung zhes so/ /de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur/ /shin
<p>305a.4</p>tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis/ /mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung / /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba'i dus de nyid na sems can thams cad le lo dang snyom las kyi dbang gis rang nyid brtson 'grus dang bral zhing / gzhan la brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag la yang smod
<p>305a.5</p>par byed do/ /de'i rgyus ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing de las grol nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa'i tshogs su gnas pa'o/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo
<p>305a.6</p>rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu/ /rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur/ /pha rol gnon pa'i mthu rtsal dang ldan pa'i rta mchog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bstan te/ de yang tshul ji ltar zhe na/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zhal bzhi pa la phyag
<p>305a.7</p>brgyad pa/ /de bzhin zhabs kyang rnam pa bzhi/ /zhal rnams dmar dang nag po dang / /dkar zhing rta mgo ljang gu ston/ /sku yi kha dog ljang gu dang / /phyag rnams dmar la zhabs nag po/ /g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa bsgreng / /sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri mda'/ /
<p>305b</p>
<p>305b.1</p>g.yon pa khu tshur sna tshogs dang / /mdung dang dbyug pa gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pas gru gsum dpal mo mnan/ /gnyis pas grol ma dga' ma'o/ /g.yon pas mig gsum khyab 'jug dang / /gnyis pas tshangs pa dga' rab gnon/ /khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig
<p>305b.2</p>dang / /'bar ba chen po'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /zhes so/ /da ni mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas ngo mthon du las spyod pa'i phyir/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig byed stobs kyis ngo mthon du/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsa lag gis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro gtum
<p>305b.3</p>pa'o/ /sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /gang zhig byams pa dang snying rje'i chus brlan zhing 'gro ba thams cad bu gcig pa ltar dgongs pas/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhe sdang gis bsad pa dang / gti mug gis dman pa'i
<p>305b.4</p>rtog pa dang bral te/ sdig pa med pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon du las mdzad cing / dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa pha rol po dag gnon pa la sogs pa'i mthu dang rtsal gyis bsgral zhing / sha khrag kun gsol ba dang / lha chen po dag gis so/ 
<p>305b.5</p>so'i nga rgyal zhi bar byas te/ gti mug can gyi mchog tu gyur pa tshangs pa dang / 'dod chags can gyi mchog tu gyur pa dbang phyug chen po dang / zhe sdang can gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyab 'jug dang / nga rgyal can gyi mchog tu gyur pa brgya byin dang / phrag dog can gyi mchog tu gyur pa
<p>305b.6</p>dga' rab dbang phyug rnams 'khor g.yog sde ris dang bcas pa rnams brgyal bar mdzad do/ /yang mthun pa'i spyod pas thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ byi ba rkun po chom po yis/ /thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed/ /brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang / /ngo 'thon stobs kyis
<p>305b.7</p>de bzhin du/ /dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /gnas skabs la lar byi thabs kyis tshul gyis gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod cing 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bar byed pa dang / yang gnas skabs la lar rkun po'i tshul du yon tan
<p>306a</p>
<p>306a.1</p>la sogs pa'i snod du nor gyi rnam pa bsdu bar mdzad pa dang / chom po'i tshul du mngon sum du 'phrog pa dang / dor thabs kyi tshul du brid pa dang / mig 'phrul gyi tshul du sgyu ma la spyad pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing / dgra cha lngas brgal nas 'jig rten
<p>306a.2</p>gsum las rgyal bar byed pa'o/ /de la dgra cha lnga ni le'u dgu pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu pa las bshad de/ 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang / /de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang / /'phangs nas slad du bzung ba dang / /stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te/ /rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i
<p>306a.3</p>dpyad/ /phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas/ /zhes so/ /de lta bu'i mdzad pa de phyogs gcig pa yin nam zhe na/ skye 'gro gnas dang 'gro ba rnams/ /mtha' dag btul nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye ba gnas bzhi'i tshul du snang ba dag ni skye 'gro'i gnas so/ /de las byung
<p>306a.4</p>ba'i 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams so/ /de dag gi mtha' thams cad ma lus par bsdus shing rtog pa mtha' dag rnams btul zhing / rang rang gi 'bras bu grub par byas pa'o/ /de nyid kyi tshul ni/ gdul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu
<p>306a.5</p>skyong / /g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur/ /khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag pos gnon/ /gang zhig 'dod chags kyi lam la zhen pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni zhal dbus ma dmar po dang / khro ba zhe
<p>306a.6</p>sdang gi rgyud la gnas pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni g.yon pa nag por bstan pa dang / zhi ba gti mug gi lam la gnas pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni g.yas pa dkar por ston pa dang / nga rgyal dang phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa drag shul can rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni
<p>306a.7</p>rta mgo ljang gu khro gnyer can du bstan pa'o/ /da ni lha chen po rnams zhabs kyis mnan nas chung ma rnams lngar bsdus pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa las/ dbang phyug dam pa ma hA de ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa de nyid zhabs
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>kyis mnan nas lha mo dka' thub bzlog ma lha chen po'i mig nas sprul pa mo 'gugs shing longs spyod pa dang / khyab 'jug 'khor lo nag po mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog dang ldan pa mnan cing lha mo ru mig ma snying las sprul pa mo bkug ste longs spyod pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo
<p>306b.2</p>tshangs pa mnan te lha mo sgrol ma zhi ba mo sbyor ba las byung ba dgug cing longs spyod pa dang / 'dod pa'i lha dga' rab dbang phyug mnan nas mdangs las sprul pa'i lha mo dga' sdug ma'i dbang phyug ma 'gugs shing longs spyod pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa dgu pa las/ rab kyi
<p>306b.3</p>rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon dbang phyug gnon/ /sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum drug drongs/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /da ni phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig rkang pa drug gsungs pa las/ phrin
<p>306b.4</p>las thams cad mthar phyin par mdzad pa ni rdo rje rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas te/ de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin zhes pa'o/ /de dag gi phrin las bya ba'i thabs ni/ thabs dang rtsal gyis bsgrub pa yis/ /drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs nas ni/ /
<p>306b.5</p>khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de thob nas/ /byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog /drag shul sbyor bas sgrub par byed/ /rta mchog ni las khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor te/ zhi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor
<p>306b.6</p>gnas pa dang / dbang gi dus su pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang / rgyas pa'i dus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang / drag po'i dus su dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi
<p>306b.7</p>bdag nyid kyi dus su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pas na/ phrin las thams cad kyi bdag nyid can te/ khams gsum gyi rgyal srid ma lus pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par byed cing / /byang chub kyi sems mtha' yas pa dag drag shul gyi sbyor
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>bas sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ haM las bskyed pa'i rta mchog ni/ /kun gyi spyi la rol pa'o/ /zhes pa dang / rtog pa bsdus pa las kyang / dkyil 'khor gang gi dbus la ni/ /rta mchog 'di ni gzhag byas nas/ /de nyid de yi dkyil
<p>307a.2</p>'khor te/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /zhes so/ /de yang rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas spyod par mdzad/ /'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i go 'phang la dgongs par mdzad pas na/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du/ /rtsal gyi pha
<p>307a.3</p>rol gnon pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de dag gis mdzad pa'i phan yon ni/ lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /go 'phang mchog ni rtag pa dang / /rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob
<p>307a.4</p>nas/ /dang po rang gi don du dngos grub thob pa'i tshul ni thun mong gi dngos grub mchog brgyad la sogs pa lha'i dngos grub grub par dka' ba dag dang / mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bde ba chen po'i sku zag pa med pa'i go 'phang mchog tu gyur pa/ rtag
<p>307a.5</p>par gnas pa dag rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /yang gzhan gyi don du/ sems can khams ni ma lus dag /ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing / /'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag /sems can rnams la brtan pa sbyin/ /rigs rnam pa drug gi
<p>307a.6</p>phrin las rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas 'debs shing / rang rang gi rigs kyi byang chub la rab tu sbyor zhing ston par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rta mchog rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /bskal pa kun du srid
<p>307a.7</p>par gnas/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /rigs kyi phrin las ji ltar gdul bas rtag tu sems can gyi don la gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /da ni mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas/ de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rigs gcig las rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo mi mthun pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sku gsung thugs kyi rtog pa bla na med pa'i tshul gyis/ nam mkha'i
<p>307b.2</p>dbyings kyi mtha' klas par spro zhing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs shing sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal rta mchog gi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /dpal rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /
<p>307b.3</p>gzhan yang dbugs dbyung sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya chen po'i 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don mdzad pa'i tshul ni rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las rgya cher bstan te rigs bsdus pa'i thun mong gi dkyil 'khor dang / so so'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mang
<p>307b.4</p>por bstan pa bsdu ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa las/ dang por dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ji ltar byung zhing de nyid spros pa'i gnas dang gdul bya 'dul byed kyi lo rgyus dag ni/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /
<p>307b.5</p>nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags/ /gang gi sku dang ye shes thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi ye
<p>307b.6</p>shes dang / rigs kyi bye brag las snang ba'i mgon po sangs rgyas drug go/ /de re re las byung yang rigs dang ye shes las snang zhing yon tan dang phrin las kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mtha' yas par byung zhing / sangs rgyas dang sems
<p>307b.7</p>can gyi gnas su chos can dang chos nyid kyis gar khyab pa'i mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dag tu rnam par spros shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' klas par khyab cing rgyas so/ /de yang gdul bya'i ris so so'i las kyi sgrib pa dag sbyong ba'i gnyen por rang byung gi 'phrul
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>pa dag ji ltar snang ba ni/ gtam gyi lo rgyus sna tshogs kyis mtshon pa de dag nyid/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa dag bsdus te bshad pa/ dang por dregs byed sde tshan la sogs pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>308a.2</p>ji ltar snang ba ni/ sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyis sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs par bzhugs te/ bsnyems tshul gyis rab tu gnon pa'i 'od zer spros shing / sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthus rang nyid dang cha lugs 'dra
<p>308a.3</p>ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi sku rnam pa gnyis phyung ngo / /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa aHdzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ nyid kyi sku bde ba chen po'i ro la longs spyod cing / dgyes pa'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi cho 'phrul yan lag bdun rnam par bkod pas dregs
<p>308a.4</p>byed kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jigs par mdzad de/ de dag gi gtso bo chen po'i nga rgyal gzhom zhing gnyen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /yang 'khor gyi dregs byed gzhan rnam par 'joms pa'i bkod pa'i yan lag bdun rnam par bstan cing / shes rab kyi snang ba mo yum
<p>308a.5</p>kun du bzang mo dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa las 'khor gyi lha mo nyi shu rnam par spros shing / de dang mthun pa'i gdul bya de nyid rab tu gzhom par mdzad do/ /de yang me long lta bu'i ye shes las snang ba'i thugs rje'i rigs thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i lha mo dpal bde
<p>308a.6</p>mchog ma'i sku phyung zhing rang gi gsang sngags kyi rnam par spros so/ /dzaHbadzra dr-iSh+Ti sa ma ya ma Ta dur khrod kyi mun pa mo'i gnas sbyong zhing rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su gnas te/ zhi ba'i phrin las kyis gzhan dag rnams kyang phrin las rgya chen po la rnam par sbyong zhing / 
<p>308a.7</p>rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par mdzad do/ /'di nyid kyi tshul gyis ni lha mo gzhan dag la yang rigs dang ye shes dang / mdzad pa'i phrin las dang / gdul bya dang 'dul byed kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1</p>bzhin yon tan rin po che'i rigs las snang ba'i lha mo/ e ma ho bde ba mo phyung ste/ /hUM badzra kI li kI li hUM zhes pas rin chen dpal 'phrog ma lus 'dul bar mdzad do/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las snang ba'i gsung pad+ma'i rigs thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa lha mo snang mdzad
<p>308b.2</p>ma'i sku phyung ste/ baM badzri Ni sma ra raT ces pas pad+mas lus kun du klubs pa mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin phrin las kyi rigs thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i lha mo slob ma mo phyung zhing / hoHbadzra kA me shwa ri s+t+waM zhes pas gnas 'joms drag po
<p>308b.3</p>'dul bar mdzad do/ /de dag ni ye shes rnam pa bzhi'i snang ba yin te/ rigs rnam pa bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi yum chen mo rnam pa bzhi las sprul pa'i lha mo gzhan yang phyung ste/ oM aM ma d+hu badzri g+huM g+huM zhes pas lha mo sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
<p>308b.4</p>'dzin ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra me g+he gu lu gu lu b+hUM zhes pas chos kyi 'khor lo mas sde 'dzin drag mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /oM ma he shwa ra tsa badzri oM oM zhes pas khams gsum rnam par rgyal mas gsum sgrub sdig byed ma'i tshogs 'dul bar byed do/ /oM khaM
<p>308b.5</p>badzra she shi ri hUM hUM zhes pas lha mo 'dod pa'i lcug ma mos yid myur gzugs can mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de dag ni rtsa ba'i dregs byed kyi tshogs rnams rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul bar mdzad pa'i gleng gzhi'o/ /yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro ma dag ni phyi'i
<p>308b.6</p>dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mas 'dul bar mdzad pa'i rdo rje gling bu ma byung ste/ oM he ra ti badzra bi lA si ni traT ces pas 'brug sgra rab tu 'byin pa mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje pi wang ma phyung ste he re ti badzra gI te te he zhes pas rgyud gsum gyis drag mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /
<p>308b.7</p>rdo rje rnga chen ma phyung ste he re ti badzra tra se ha ha baM zhes pas ming tshig kun ldan ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje rdza rnga ma phyung ste he ra ti badzra nr-i t+ye be pa be pa dzaM zhes pas sgra skad drag mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje me tog ma phyung ste/ oM badzra puSh+pe zhes pas 'dod pa'i lha mo
<p>309a</p>
<p>309a.1</p>gzugs 'dzin ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje spos me ma phyung ste/ oM badzra d+hup+pe zhes pas rtse gsum dri ldan ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje mar me ma phyung ste/ oM badzra A lo ke zhes pas glog gi phreng ba mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje dri chab ma phyung ste/ oM badzra
<p>309a.2</p>g+han+d+he zhes pas drag byed g.yo ba mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma phyung ste/ oM badzra aM ku shi dzaHzhes pas drag mo 'gugs pa can 'dul bar mdzad do/ /phag gdong zhags pa mo phyung ste/ oM badzra pA she hUM zhes pas drag mo sdom pa mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje snang
<p>309a.3</p>ba mo phyung ste/ oM badzra shaM kha le baM zhes pas gzung 'dzin dka' zlog ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /thal 'jig ro langs ma phyung ste/ oM badzra g+haN+De hoHzhes pas gtum mo thal byed ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las sprul pa'i lha mo'i rigs rnams
<p>309a.4</p>kyis dregs byed kyi gtso mo rnam par sbyong zhing / yang de'i rigs dang 'khor na gnas pa'i sde dang ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ lha mo re re las kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sgo nas don mdzad pas rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su dkyil 'khor mi 'dra ba bdun cu rtsa
<p>309a.5</p>gcig byung ba yin no/ /de ltar rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan yang rnam par dbye ste/ de nas gong nas bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbye bas grangs med par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gtso bo tsam gyi sgo nas bstan pa ni/ dbugs dbyung ba bsdus pa'i rim pa ste rgya cher spros
<p>309a.6</p>pa ni rgyas pa'i tshul du shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir drag po mun pa'i tshogs can la sogs pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku yab yum rnam
<p>309a.7</p>pa gnyis su phyung zhing / oM b+h+rUM khaM zhes brjod pas dregs byed kyi gtso bo de nyid 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang 'khor gyi tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i don du sangs rgyas byang chub ma dang dpa' mo dang / kun du bzang mo dang / zag med kyi snod 'dzin ma dang / sangs rgyas kun ldan ma dang / 
<p>309b</p>
<p>309b.1</p>mdzes pa mo dang / sprin chen mo dang / nam mkha'i spyan ma rnams phyung ste/ so so'i sngags brjod pas nga ro cher sgrogs pa ma dang / dpa' bo mtshon cha ma dang / mdzes pa'i phreng ba can dang / yid mchog rgyal mo dang / kun gzugs ma dang / mdzes chen mo dang / drag mo sgra chen mo dang / 
<p>309b.2</p>'gyur ba'i spyan can rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang 'khor lo'i pi wang ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis phyung zhing / rang rang gi gsang sngags brjod pas me tog gsum 'dzin ma dang / 'gro ba'i yid 'phrog ma dang / rgyal mtshan gsum 'dzin ma dang / rab tu gtum pa mo
<p>309b.3</p>dang / me tog gi mda' 'dzin ma dang / nag mo chu la spyod pa mo dang / dmar mo'i phreng ba can dang / dri mchog sna tshogs zab mo dang / drag po'i gzugs kyis 'dren pa mo dang / rab gtum yid mo dang / keng rus sdom pa mo dang / rmongs byed mo chen mo rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /
<p>309b.4</p>gzhan yang dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyis don mdzad pa'i tshul ni/ ru tra la sogs pa'i gdul bya spyi dang khyad par gyi lam pa rnams te/ de nyid kyi gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku las/ dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya chen po gnyis su med pa'i tshul du byung ste/ rang nyid kyi sngags
<p>309b.5</p>brjod pas de nyid kyi gtso bo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang lha mo gau rI dang / tsau rI dang / pra mo ha dang / bai tA li dang / puk+ka sI dang / tsaN+Da lI dang / g+hasma rI dang / sma sha nI rnams phyung ste rang rang gi sngags brjod pas tshig gsum drag mo dang / mche ba'i sde can dang / mi sdug
<p>309b.6</p>gzugs can dang / gnas 'joms mtshon cha mo dang / kun du rgyu ma dang / tshe 'phrog ma dang / 'jigs pa'i las mkhan ma dang / don byed kyi pho nya mo rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'o/ /yang lha mo mda' 'dzin ma dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang / sna tshogs ba dan
<p>309b.7</p>'dzin ma mo rnams phyung ste/ so so'i sngags brjod pas srin mo mi khrag 'thor ba mo dang / drag mo rtse gsum ma dang / yid myur gcod pa mo dang / sna tshogs mda' 'dzin ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang khro mo me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad phyung ste so so'i sngags
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>brjod pas/ keng rus 'thor byed ma dang / bdug pa'i dri ldan ma dang / dbang po'i phreng ba ma dang / srin mo khrag 'thor ma dang / dur khrod kyi phreng 'dzin ma dang / myur du 'ching ba mo dang / rab sdom chen mo dang / rgyud gsum rlog byed ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan
<p>310a.2</p>yang dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgo nas dregs byed mtha' la gnas pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya sna tshogs kyi don du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sku phyung ste/ rang gi gsang sngags brjod pas bdud kyi rgyal po
<p>310a.3</p>'dul bar mdzad do/ /de nyid kyi 'khor rnams gdul ba'i phyir lha mo rnam par gzigs ma dang / sgrol ma dang / sa 'dzin ma dang / khro gnyer ma dang / pad+ma gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / sna tshogs pad+mo dang / pad+ma'i na bza' mo dang / rdo rje pad+mo'i dbang phyug mo rnams phyung ste so so'i
<p>310a.4</p>sngags brjod pas/ phyogs kun mthong ba mo dang / dka' zlog ma chen mo dang / gnas bdag mo dang / 'jigs pa'i gdong pa can dang / 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byin ma dang / me lce'i gshog can dang / mi lpags kyi gos can ma dang / kun du 'khrug byed ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /
<p>310a.5</p>pad+ma'i gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis phyung ste/ so so'i sngags brjod pas glu mkhan ma dang / nor srung ma dang / 'joms ma dang / kun byed ma dang / me tog gdugs 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / kun du spyod pa mo dang / lam gyi gnas 'jig mo dang / brtson 'grus
<p>310a.6</p>'jig 'khrug mdzad ma dang / gnas kun sdom pa mo dang / 'jigs pa'i las spyod ma dang / 'jigs byed drag po rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dregs byed 'jungs pa can la sogs pa gdul bya rnams kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang ba ni
<p>310a.7</p>dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po las/ rdo rje nyi ma yab yum gyi sku snang bar mdzad cing rang gi sngags brjod pas dregs byed kyi gtso bo de nyid 'dul bar byed do/ /de nyid kyi 'khor rnams gdul ba'i phyir lha mo dbang bskur ma dang / gter ldan ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog ldan ma dang / 
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>mchod chen ma dang / mda' 'dzin mo dang / kha T+wAM 'dzin ma dang / nyi ma mo dang / rdo rje rtse mo ma rnams phyung ste/ so so'i sngags brjod pas ma mo rgyan can ma dang / mi thub dpa' mo dang / kun spyod ma dang / kun za mo dang / phyag brnyan mo dang / g.yul las rgyal ba mo dang / nyi ma'i mig can
<p>310b.2</p>mo dang / 'jig rten sreg byed ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /phyi rol gyi lha mo rin chen gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis phyung ste so so'i sngags brjod pas/ yi dgas lto mo che dang / dgra 'dzin ma dang / rlung gi shugs can mo dang / gnod sbyin mche ba can dang / kun 'dzin dam
<p>310b.3</p>byed mo dang / mi mthun sgyur ba mo dang / rang 'od gsal ba mo dang / dri ngan 'thor byed ma dang / 'gugs pa mo dang / 'ching ba mo dang / drag mo nad bdag mo dang / nag mo be con ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dpal rta mchog rol pa'i sgo nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul
<p>310b.4</p>pa can la sogs pa gdul bya sna tshogs kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las rta mchog yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sku phyung ste rang gi sngags brjod pas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid dang / lha chen po dregs byed kyi tshogs rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /
<p>310b.5</p>de dag gi 'khor thams cad ni khyad par gyi lha mo gnyis dang / thun mong gi lha mo sna tshogs kyi sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad do/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang / phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi chags chen rgyal mo dang / phrin las kun spyod ma dang / de dang rigs
<p>310b.6</p>mthun pa'i sde rnams 'joms par mdzad do/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul zhing de re re la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang gdul bya'i tshogs grangs med pa 'dul bar mdzad pas na/ 'di ni dbugs dbyung sna tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag gang las
<p>310b.7</p>byung ba'i rang bzhin ni nam mkha'i dbyings skabs na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrubs/ dper na til gyi gang bu til 'brus bcer zhing de dag la mar gyis khyab pa dang 'dra bar snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar mtshams med par khyab cing / de dag ni
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa'i tshogs 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i sgo nas/ grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed/ /so so'i phrin las kyi sgo nas las su bya ba'i cho ga rnams
<p>311a.2</p>rnam par spyod pas yon tan gyi snang ba thams cad gsal zhing rang bzhin gyi gnas la sbyor bar byed do/ /gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa ni sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi tshul rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/ /le'u lnga pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig
<p>311a.3</p>bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi lam du bya ba ni/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bya ba ste/ theg pa gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i don lam gnyis phyogs gcig tu spyod pa'i dus su yon tan thams cad kyi gnas la sbyor zhing sgo gsum gyi bya ba
<p>311a.4</p>thams cad mthar phyin pa'i sgo nas lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa thams cad skye zhing nyid kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po/ /rab tu sbyong ba'i mthu dag gis/ /'bras bu
<p>311a.5</p>thams cad rdzogs byed de/ /rang gi ye shes gnas la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /de la dang por tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par zhal gyis bzhes pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang thams cad du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /
<p>311a.6</p>mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bshad/ /mtshon bya'i dbang du 'gro ba'i yan lag phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes la/ tshogs kyi rim pa rtsom pa dang / /tshig gi dbang du le'u lnga pa'i rjes thogs su byung bas mtshams sbyar ba'o/ /de yang rnal 'byor pa gang gis spyod pa'i bye brag
<p>311a.7</p>gis lam bsgrub pa'i phyir/ tshogs kyi cho ga sna tshogs pa la rang gi mos pa dang 'byor pa'i sgo nas 'jug par bya ste/ gnas dang dus la sogs pa'i bye brag bzhin du shes par byas la/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang tshogs kyi sgrub pa dang / tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / he ru ka'i dus
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>ston dang / dpa' bo'i dus kyi ston mo'i rim pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag chos so so'i cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du nyams su blang zhing spyod pa'i mthus/ rgyu rkyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog tu gyur pa'i mthus/ lam sbyong zhing 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa la sbyor bar byed de/ bla na med
<p>311b.2</p>pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i ngo bo nyid yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa 'dis sgrub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de'i phyir rtog pa bdun pa las/ gang zhig rnal 'byor las sbyor ba/ /de nyid tshogs kyis 'grub par byed/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs sbyor
<p>311b.3</p>bas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog tu 'gyur/ /de sbyor thabs ni rnam lnga ste/ /brtan gnas dus gsum sngon 'gro dang / /sgrub pa lnga yi cho ga ste/ /de spyod las rnams mthar phyin 'gyur/ /de phyir lam gyi yan lag mchog /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen yin/ /gang
<p>311b.4</p>sngon tshogs lam ma sbyor bar/ /bsgrub byas las kyi rim pa dag /rten dang bral ba'i sa bon bzhin/ /legs smin 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes so/ /de'i don ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'bring gi las la mkha'
<p>311b.5</p>'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi tshul gyis spyod pas de nyid kyi don bshad pa'i phyir/ le'u drug par gsungs pa yin te/ grub pa'i rim pa dag ni so so'i cho ga las shes par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /tshogs kyi dga' bde'i longs spyod kyis/ /
<p>311b.6</p>mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba sgrub/ /thams cad don phyir rnam sprul mchog /tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa dang / /mchod tshogs ston mo rnam gnyis kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i don sgrub mdzad/ /gsang ba gsang chen nyid kyi sku/ /rdo rje lta bu'i gnas la bzhugs/ /tshogs kyi
<p>311b.7</p>dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog /sgrub byed yan lag gnyis kyi tshul/ /gar thabs 'khor lo rab bshad bya/ /zhes so/ /de ltar bshad pa'i don bzhin du dkyil 'khor dngos bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dang por lha'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1</p>rdo rje sems dpa'i bde byung ba/ /gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /gang zhig lha mo'i tshogs kyis mi 'bral bar bskor ba ni dpal dang ldan pa'o/ /de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku thabs dang
<p>312a.2</p>shes rab zhal sbyor gyi tshul du gnas pas/ mtshon bya dang mtshon byed du 'brel pa'i bde ba la longs spyod cing / rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa bstan nas/ gdul bya'i gnas la longs spyod de/ gsang ba lnga'i dgongs pa mnga' zhing mchog tu gyur pa'i las
<p>312a.3</p>rnam pa drug gis dgyes shing / longs spyod bzhi'i dgyes pas 'khor lo thams cad kyi bdag nyid du 'phro 'du mdzad pa'i las la rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /bde chen gsang ba'i
<p>312a.4</p>gnas bzhugs te/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa lnga dang ldan/ /las drug mchog tu gyur pa yi/ /dgyes mdzad dgyes pa bzhi la spyod/ /'khor lo thams cad bdag nyid mchog /las mdzad 'phro 'dus rtag tu bzhugs/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor sku yis ni/ /rigs
<p>312a.5</p>mthun tshogs kyi gtso bo mdzad/ /ces so/ /de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las sgrub pa dag la ni dang por sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga dgos te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>312a.6</p>pa'i lha rdzas mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /dngos su 'byor pa dang / yid kyis sprul pa dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che bai DUr+ya dang / karti ka
<p>312a.7</p>dang / asma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / pu sha ra ga dang / spug dang / rdo rje dang / rdo'i snying po dang / aN+Da rnyil dang / ni man dang / shel dang / gzi dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / dra bas mdzes pa dang / ras dang / dar la sogs pa'i gdugs
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / yol ba dang / zar tshags la sogs pa dag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba las byung zhing bde ba de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ste/ yon tan gyi chags pa dang phrin las kyi snang ba mi 'bral bar gnas pa'o/ /gzhan yang de
<p>312b.2</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rin po che'i rta babs la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'i khang pa chen po dril bu la sogs pa 'khrol ba'i sgra las zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rnam par sgrogs par mdzad pas/ rang rang gi de kho na nyid mtshon zhing gsal bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i
<p>312b.3</p>tshogs rgya chen po thams cad dgod pa'i phyir/ rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par sprul/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dag /mar me dri la sogs ldan par/ /mchod pa'i lha mo dag dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs gzugs kyi bye brag rin po che sna bdun
<p>312b.4</p>dang / mchod pa'i dngos po brgyad dang / bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang / bum pa bzang po dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / 'dod 'jo'i ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu la sogs pa'i 'dra 'bag gis bcos pa'i lha mo dag kyang gzhag par bya'o/ /sgra'i bye brag gling bu dang / 
<p>312b.5</p>pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / dung dang / zangs dung dang / mu tig ha ra dang / dgu po rgyud mangs dang / cha lang dang / pheg rdob pa la sogs pa dngos su sgra 'byin pa dang / rol mo dang gzugs brnyan gyis bcos pa dag kyang gzhag par bya'o/ /dri'i tshogs la a ka ru dang
<p>312b.6</p>du ru ka dang / spos la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang / goR+shi sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po dang / bsung ldan dang / ga pur la sogs pa'i rdzas khyad par can dag kyang gzhag par bya'o/ /sbyar ba dang rang bzhin gyi rgyu las byung ba rnams kyang so so'i gnas su dgod par bya'o/ /ro'i tshogs
<p>312b.7</p>mngar ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa'i ro drug dang sbyar ba'i rdzas ston mo'i g.yos kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa dag kyang dgod par bya'o/ /reg bya'i bye brag stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs dang / cod pan dang / rna rgyan dang / dpung rgyan dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / phreng ba la
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyang gdags par bya'o/ /gzhan yang bsrung ba'i rdzas thams cad kyang mda' dang phur bu dang / ral gri dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / thal ba dang / rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang / bye ma dang / dri chu rnams kyang so so'i gnas rnams su dgram
<p>313a.2</p>par bya'o/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rdzas dang mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du sbyar zhing dgod par bya'o/ /spyi'i mchod pa'i yan lag me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab
<p>313a.3</p>dang / zhal zas dag kyang gnas brgyad du dgram par bya'o/ /de dag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o/ /de ltar spyod pas las su bya ba ci zhig sgrub ce na/ sgrub pa'i don bshad pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /
<p>313a.4</p>mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub/ /rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas brtsam par bya ba dang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rim bzhin pa'i sgo nas brtsam par bya'o/ /de yang dang por ni bsod nams kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas sgrub cing / de dag mthar phyin pa dang ye shes kyi
<p>313a.5</p>tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang / /dkyil 'khor rim bzhin sgrub pa dang / /rigs gcig dpa' bo gcig pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba dag /sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyor/ /
<p>313a.6</p>bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po'i/ /rim par 'jug pa bstan pa yin/ /zhes so/ /de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i don de dag kyang rten gyi gang zag yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su sgrub par bstan pa'i phyir/ yang na bde ba'i gnas dag
<p>313a.7</p>gam/ skyed mos tshal la sogs par sgrub/ /gang zhig rang gi sngon du brtsams pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa dag gis ni rang gi mos pa'i gnas ji ltar bde ba dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /der bsgrub par bya ba'i las
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>bya ba la/ dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs la ni sngon du sa'i cho ga dang sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab cing bris nas/ so so'i gnas su rdul tshon ma dgye bar gdan tsam dgod pa'i phyir/ der ni dang por gdan bshams te/ /'jam zhing reg na bder
<p>313b.2</p>'gyur ba'i/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs/ /de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas lha'i grangs bzhin du rnal 'byor pa du yod pas so so'i gdan du yod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /stan de nyid kyang dngos su pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs
<p>313b.3</p>pa'am/ ras de nyid pad+mas mtshon par bya'o/ /de yang rnal 'byor pa'i grangs dkyil 'khor gyi lha grangs pas mang ba zhig na ni mchod pa'i lha dang / phrin las kyi lha'i gnas su gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi'i grangs kyis gdab cing gal te grangs nyung ba zhig na ni 'dra 'bag gi
<p>313b.4</p>bcos ma dag kyang gzhag par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bzhin/ /phyag rgya'i cha lugs gnas par bya/ /gang zhig rang gnas las lhag 'gyur/ /mchod dang phrin las lha mi yis/ /gnas su btab ste gzhag par bya/ /ma tshang ba dag
<p>313b.5</p>brnyan mas bsabs/ /de dag so so'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /pad+ma la gnas mtshan ma 'dzin/ /zhes so/ /de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa des ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa la 'jug par bya ste/ dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir/ sgom pa'i rim pas
<p>313b.6</p>dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /de nas rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ /rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du lha nyis brgya drug cu rnams dang rigs so so'i dkyil
<p>313b.7</p>'khor gyi rim pa'i dbang du lha brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor dang kha yar ba'i sgo nas lha nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rta mchog gi lha mo gnyis kyis lhag pa dang / dpa' bo yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha sum cu po dag rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /de nyid gang gi sgo
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>nas she na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo las byung ba'o/ /tshul ji ltar zhe na/ sbyor ba'i dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo nas so/ /rkyen gang zhig gis she na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha las byung
<p>314a.2</p>ba'o/ /'bras bu ci zhig gis mdzad pa la spyod ce na/ dkyil 'khor gong ma dag gis gong ma'i so so'i bya ba grub par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po dag kyang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug tu 'dus te/ de las rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'phrul pa'i tshul ni/ 
<p>314a.3</p>dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi rang bzhin las snang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang / dung dang kun+da zla ba'i bzhin gyis mdzes pa ye shes kyi mdangs la rin po che sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro zhing / de la sangs rgyas rigs drug gi sku byung bas mdzes pa dang / 'jo sgeg dgyes pa'i 'dzum mig
<p>314a.4</p>dang bcas pas chags pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa dkar po dang mthing ga dang ser po dang dmar po'i zhal bzhis mtshan zhing rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / cod pan du bcas pa phyag g.yas g.yon gyi dang pos rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bsnyems pa'i tshul du gsor zhing kha T+wAM ga dril bu dang bcas pas
<p>314a.5</p>'khrol ba'o/ /'og ma gnyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras shing phyag rgya lngas mdzes pa/ sku stod dar dkar gser gyi dang ris stod g.yogs su mnabs shing sku smad tshe gu'i na bza' can rin po che'i phreng ba'i rked chings can
<p>314a.6</p>mgur chu dang do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu dang / se mo dos mtshan pa/ rang nyid kyi cha 'dra ba'am/ lha mo bde mchog ma lta bu'i kun du bzang mo dang zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i phyogs bzhir gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rang nyid kyi cha 'dra ba'i 'od kyi skyes
<p>314a.7</p>bu bzhi la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs te/ shar du lha mo bde mchog ma sku mdog dkar mo sna tshogs kyi gos dang rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ 'gying bag gis phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs su e ma bde ba mo gser gyi mdog
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>can phyag na b+ha ga dang ling+ga'i mtshan ma 'dzin cing rdo rje dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs su lha mo snang mdzad ma dmar mdangs can phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin cing bdag po'i sku la 'khyud nas g.yon pas thod pa'i snod bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs te/ kha T+wAM ga gru mor
<p>314b.2</p>bcug pa'o/ /byang phyogs su slob ma mo in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can g.yas pas bdag po la 'khyud cing g.yon na sangs rgyas kyi skus mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi shar gyi re'u mig la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma dkar dmar gyi mdangs can
<p>314b.3</p>tshangs pa'i mgo bzhis mtshan pa'i mda' bzhi dus gcig tu 'phen pa'o/ /lho phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo ma dkar ser gyi mdangs can phyag g.yas kyi gung mo la 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang / sngon po rtsibs brgyad pa gnyis brtsegs pa'i tshul du brgyud cing
<p>314b.4</p>'debs pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ g.yon pa 'gying bag gi tshul gyis khu tshur dku'i gnas su brten te bzhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su khams gsum rnam rgyal ma dmar skya'i mdog can g.yas na tri shU la rtse gsum bstod pa'i tshul can 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa
<p>314b.5</p>thugs kar brten pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'i mdog can phyag gnyis na dpag bsam gyi shing lcug ma dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin zhing gar mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun kyang rin po che'i rgyan dang cha byad kyis
<p>314b.6</p>mdzes shing / rang 'od kyi rig ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis zhal sbyor te 'gying bag gi rnam pas bzhugs pa'o/ /me mtshams kyi re'u mig la rdo rje gling bu ma baiDUr+ya'i mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gling bu sgrogs pa'o/ /bden bral gyi re'u mig la rdo rje pi wang ma
<p>314b.7</p>gser gyi mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pi wang glu dbyangs drug gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje rnga chen ma asma rA ga'i mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rnga zlum brdung ba'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje rdza rnga ma in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rdza rnga
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>brdung ba'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi me mtshams su rdo rje me tog ma dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog gi gzhong pa thogs pa'o/ /bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje spos me ma dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan pa'i spos me thogs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje mar me ma dmar mo rdo rjes
<p>315a.2</p>mtshan pa'i mar me 'degs pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dri chab 'thor ba'o/ /yang shar gyi sgor rdo rje rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma chu shel gyi mdog can/ g.yas na lcags kyu g.yon na thod pa'i bdud rtsi rta mgo dang bcas pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor
<p>315a.3</p>phag gdong ma bai DUr+ya'i mdog can g.yas na mche ba g.yon na zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor snang ba mo dmar gsal gyi mdangs can phyag gnyis na lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshan pa'o/ /byang gi sgor thal byed ma ljang gu g.yas na dril bu 'khrol zhing / g.yon pas b+han+d+ha
<p>315a.4</p>bdud rtsi'i nang nas sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku phyung ba'o/ /lha mo nyi shu po de dag kyang rgyan dang cha lugs dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par gyur to/ /bsdus pa'i dbang du ni lha mo kun kyang kha dog 'dra bar le'u dgu pa las gsungs pa'i don bzhin bstan pa'o/ /yang rnam par
<p>315a.5</p>snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i sangs rgyas de nyid gser gyi mdog can nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od dang ldan pa'i gangs ri'i lhun po ltar bzhugs pa/ gser dang ka rti ka dang / in+d+ra nI la dang asma rA ga'i mdog can gyi zhal bzhi dang ldan pa/ phyag bzhi
<p>315a.6</p>na chos gos dang lhung bzed dang 'khar sil dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs can rin po che sna bdun dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis nye bar mdzes pa/ rang 'od kyi rig ma yum sangs rgyas spyan ma dang gnyis su med par zhal sbyor gyi tshul du
<p>315a.7</p>bzhugs pa'o/ /de nyid kyi shar du sangs rgyas kun brjod ma chu shel gyi mdog can rin po che'i rgyan kun gyis mdzes par byas pa/ phyag na me lces mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su dpa' mo shin tu rgyal ma gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis na cha lang 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs na kun tu bzang mo
<p>315b</p>
<p>315b.1</p>pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can phyag gnyis na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs na mi bzad rin po che'i snod 'dzin ma/ sna tshogs kyi mdog can rin po ches bkang ba'i snod dang chos kyi dung 'dzin pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi shar phyogs kyi re'u cha la sangs rgyas kun 'dzin ma gur gum
<p>315b.2</p>gyi mdog can sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i sku thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs na lha mo zhal bzangs ma me long gi mdog can phyag gnyis me long dang rnga yab 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs su lha mo sprin chen ma bai DUr+ya'i mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje sprin gyi dkyil 'khor las ser ba 'bebs pa'o/ /byang
<p>315b.3</p>phyogs su nam mkha'i spyan ma ser skya'i mdog can phyag gnyis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la mig gis mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /phyi rol gyi lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
<p>315b.4</p>'khor las bstan pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa las/ cung zhig gi khyad par ni zhi ba'i cha lugs 'dzin cing rgyan dang phyag mtshan la 'khor lo'i rnam pas mtshan pa'o/ /yang dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka de nyid sku
<p>315b.5</p>bai DUr+ya'i mdog can 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer dang bcas pa/ zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar po dbus mthing nag drag po'i cha lugs can/ rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar po'i zhal g.yon pa rmongs mdzad ser por bzhugs pa/ smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer bcu 'gyur zhing spyan mig dmar po
<p>315b.6</p>las 'jigs pa'i me stag 'phro ba dang / dbu skra dang sma ra ser nag tu 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa ba spu rnams rdo rje'i tshul gyis g.yas su 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang / ljags 'dril ba dang / rkan brdab pa dang / 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gnas pa dang / 
<p>315b.7</p>sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / dgod pa dang / gshe ba dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / snying rje dang / rngam pa dang / zhi ba'i mdangs kyis gnas pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gyi dang po na rdo rje dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril bus mtshan pa 'dzin pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis 'jigs byed
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>chen po'i pags pa rlung gi tshul gyis bskor ba/ gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi bzhi pa na dung chen po khrag gis bkang zhing gsol ba'i stabs kyis gnas pa/ g.yon gyi bzhi pa na dung chen po snying gis bkang ba'o/ /yang la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi
<p>316a.2</p>pa la g.yas gnyis rdo rje dang dung khrag gis bkang ba/ g.yon gnyis na thod pa dang zhags pas mtshan pa/ rdo rje kha T+wAM ga se ral khar thogs pa'o/ /yang la lar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa la rdo rje dang dung chen po khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin cing / kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten mdzad pa'o/ /de dag kun gyi
<p>316a.3</p>sku la glang chen gyi ko rlon dang / sbrul gyi chun po dang / stag gi pags pa dang / lha chen po'i g.yang gzhi dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / thal ba'i ri mos mtshan zhing phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa nyi ma dang zla ba dang rin po che'i phreng bas snyan cha byas pa yum kro d+hi shwa ri dang zhal sbyor gyi tshul du
<p>316a.4</p>bzhugs pa'o/ /de nyid kyi mdun gyi shar phyogs su gau rI dkar ser zhi ba'i mdangs can/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad na mda' dang gzhu 'gengs pa las tshangs pa'i mgo bo bzhi sbyangs pa g.yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /lho phyogs su tsau rI dmar ser drag po'i mdangs can g.yon na
<p>316a.5</p>lcags kyu 'dzin zhing g.yas pa'i gung mos 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bstod cing 'dzin pa/ kha T+wAM ga la brten bcas nas zhabs g.yas pa bteg pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /nub tu pra mo hA dmar nag zhal gnyis kyis gong ma phag gi gdong can phyag bzhi la dang po gnyis na rdo rje dang kham phor
<p>316a.6</p>chang gis bkang ba/ 'og ma gnyis kyis khu tshur bcings te 'khor lo 'degs pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs shing rmongs byed kyi mdangs dang ldan pa'o/ /byang phyogs su bai tA li dkar mo shi ba slong ba'i tshul can dga' ba'i gar stabs kyis gnas shing / g.yas na thod pa
<p>316a.7</p>mtshan ldan bdud rtsi'i bkang ba/ g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya can no/ /me'i phyogs su puk+ka sI drag mo sna tshogs kyi mdog can/ g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa gsor zhing g.yon dpag bsam gyi shing lcug ma dang bcas pa 'dzin cing / gar gyi gzigs thabs kyis 'gyur ba'i bzhin dang bcas
<p>316b</p>
<p>316b.1</p>pa'o/ /bden bral gyi mtshams su tsaN+Da lI sngo nag dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul can g.yas na ras sgye rlung gis bkang ba rdo rjes mtshan zhing 'thor ba/ g.yon na tri shU la 'dzin cing gar byed pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su g+hasma rI ser nag ro ldag pa'i tshul can g.yas na ral gri dang / g.yon na me thab 'dzin
<p>316b.2</p>pa g.yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sma sha mthing nag he ru ka phyag bzhi pa dang 'dra bar g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang dung khrag 'dzin cing / g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang zhags par bcas pa kha T+wAM ga se ral khar thogs pa'o/ /lha mo de dag kun kyang thod pa'i phreng ba
<p>316b.3</p>dang / sbrul mdud kyis brgyan cing zhing lpags rlon pa dang dar gyi na bza' gsol ba/ rin po che'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi me mtshams su mda' 'dzin ma chu shel gyi mdog can phyag na mda' dang gzhu thogs pa'o/ /bden bral du kha T+wAM 'dzin ma ser mo phyag na kha T+wAM ga dril bu ba dan dang bcas
<p>316b.4</p>pa'o/ /rlung mtshams su 'khor lo 'dzin ma dmar ser mo phyag na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du sna tshogs gdan 'dzin mchu shel gyi mdog ljang gu phyag na ba dan dang dril bu dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhan yang phyi'i lha mo me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma
<p>316b.5</p>la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba las/ cung zhig gi khyad par ni khro bo'i cha lugs su gnas shing khro bo'i rdo rje sngon pos nye bar mtshan pa'o/ /yang dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las sprul pa'i
<p>316b.6</p>sku dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar gsal shel gyi ri bo lta bu zhal bco lnga 'od mdangs dang ldan pa/ phyag lnga bcu phrag gnyis zhabs nyi shu rtsa bzhis mdzes par pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ phyag kun gyis pad+ma 'dzin pa las/ g.yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs
<p>316b.7</p>pas brgyan pa/ g.yon gyi pad+ma dag kyang kha dog so so'i mdangs dang ldan pa/ sku las kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od 'phro ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang gos kyis spras shing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'o/ /la lar zhal bzhi phyag brgyad byed pa dang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rnam pa can dang / byi ru'i
<p>317a</p>
<p>317a.1</p>sdong po lta bur gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i mdangs can no/ /de nyid kyi snang bas yum gos dkar mo 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /shar du rnam par gzigs ma pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dmar po bsnyems pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing g.yas pas
<p>317a.2</p>kha 'byed pa'o/ /lho phyogs su sgrol ma ljang gu g.yon pa pad+ma ljang gu'i sdong bu nas bzung ste/ dku'i gnas su brten cing g.yas 'dren pa'o/ /nub phyogs su sa 'dzin ma sngon mo g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po dang / g.yas pas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs su khro gnyer ma
<p>317a.3</p>ljang gu g.yon pas pad+ma mthing ga'i sdong bu 'dzin cing / g.yas pas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya bstod pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su pad+mo gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma mthing ga g.yon pas pad+ma dmar po bzung zhing / g.yas pas rdo rje gyen du bstod pa'o/ /lho phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma sngon mo
<p>317a.4</p>g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma 'dzin cing / g.yas pas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gyen du bstod pa'o/ /nub phyogs su pad+ma'i na bza' ma ser mo g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing / g.yas pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs su pad+ma dbang phyug ma dmar mo g.yon pad+ma dmar po 'dzin cing / 
<p>317a.5</p>g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar gsor ba'o/ /lha mo 'di dag kyang rin po che'i rgyan chas dang / dar gyi na bzas bklubs pa'o/ /gzhan yang gling bu ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / me tog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa'i sgo ba bzhi dag ni dpal
<p>317a.6</p>rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa bzhin du gnas pa las/ cung zhig mi 'dra ba'i khyad par ni/ chags pa'i bzhin mdangs dang bcas shing pad+ma'i phreng bas bklubs pa'o/ /yang rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'chang chen po las rdo rje nyi ma'i skur phyung ste/ gser gyi ri bo la
<p>317a.7</p>nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od shar ba bzhin du mdangs gsal ba zhal bzhi pa spyan mig g.yon gyen du gzigs pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi dang pos mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi 'og mas ral gri dang g.yon gyi 'og mas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'i pad+ma la rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa/ che ba'i yon
<p>317b</p>
<p>317b.1</p>tan rin po che sna bdun la sogs pas brgyan cing / gdan pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing yum mA ma kI dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba'o/ /gnas skabs la lar drag po'i tshogs dag gdul ba'i phyir sku mdog dmar po'i 'od kyi snang ba dang bcas pa cung zhig khros pa'i bzhin gyis gnas shing rin po
<p>317b.2</p>che sna tshogs kyi phreng bas bklubs pa'o/ /shar du lha mo dbang bskur ma dmar gsal gyi mdangs can phyag na rin po che'i dbu rgyan la rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su lha mo gter ldan ma ser mo phyag na rin po ches bkang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan
<p>317b.3</p>ma dkar dmar gyi mdangs can phyag na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan tog dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du mchod rten ma ljang sngon rin po che'i snod rin po che'i rdzas kyis bkang ba 'dzin pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi shar du mda' gzhu ma dmar ser phyag na rang gi mtshan dang mthun pa'i rtags 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su
<p>317b.4</p>rdo rje kha T+wAM ma sngon mo phyag na ral gri dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs su rdo rje nyi ma mo dmar ser phyag na de nyid kyis mtshan pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje me mo ljang dmar phyag na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me thab 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo de dag thams cad las kyang 'od kha dog sna lnga 'byung zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan
<p>317b.5</p>gyis brgyan pa'o/ /phyi'i lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis po de dag kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba las cung zhig gi khyad par ni yon tan rgyas pa'i sgo nas rin po che'i chags pa 'phro zhing mdangs dang ldan pa/ sku dang phyag mtshan gyi bye brag las nor bu rin po ches mtshan pa'o/ /
<p>317b.6</p>yang rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas de nyid sku ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / dmar ba'i zhal gsum dbu'i steng na rta mgo ljang gu mgrin pa bstod de sgra 'byin pa/ sku mdog ljang gu la g.yas pa bzhis ba dan gsum pa'i
<p>317b.7</p>phyag rgya dang rdo rje rgya gram dang / ral gri dang / mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa bzhin ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang / shak+ti rtse gcig dang / be con dang / gzhu 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas kyi rmig pa dang pos dngos grub gsum dang / dpal mo gnon pa gnyis pas zhi ba mo dang dga' ba ma gnon pa/ g.yon gyi dang
<p>318a</p>
