<p>396a.5</p>gsungs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang pU dza dang yon tan dang lnga ste/ lnga po de mdor bsdu na rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung dang / rin chen dbang phyug sku'i bdag nyid yin no/ /de dag dang ni dga' spyad na/ /zhes pa rigs lnga'am
<p>396a.6</p>gsum gyi lha mo de rnams dang dga' ba gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin spyod na/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro lding zhes pa lha'i rgyal po'i dngos grub dang / chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mi mnyam pa zhes pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'di
<p>396a.7</p>nyid la thob pa yin no/ /de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ bskyed rim rdul tshon gyi maN+Dal mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'am/ rdzogs rim lus dang b+ha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi maN+Dal tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / zhi ba'i btung ba dang / pho nya'i gtsang sbra
<p>396b</p>
<p>396b.1</p>gnyis kyis dngos grub sgrub pa na sgrub pa'i thabs ni lam dang po de nyid snang ba gnyis pa thabs mang ba/ gsum pa zab pas dngos grub 'di blangs nas sems can gyi don phrin las zhes bya bar gsungs pa yin no/ /brtag pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o// // 
<p>396b.2</p>de ltar zab pa bstan nas dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa mchog gi dngos grub bshad pa ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
<p>396b.3</p>sbyor ba'i bde mchog yin no/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o/ /skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste/ /zhes dbang bskur ba'i gang zag gi dngos grub 'dod pa'o/ /yang dag sbyor bas bde myong ba/ /
<p>396b.4</p>zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin zag med kyi bde ba myong ba'o/ /'dod chags ther zug rtag pa can/ /zhes pa 'dod chags ni zag med kyi bde ba'o/ /ther zug ni mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i don de ltar 'ba' zhig
<p>396b.5</p>rtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa zhig pa dang / ma byung ba med pas na rtag pa'o/ /de'i spyod pa bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen du/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ zag med kyi gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la spyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
<p>396b.6</p>pha rol phyin grub pa/ /zhes pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs dang sa rnams kyis bskal pa gsum gyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ lha dang mi'i ris su skyes pa'i skal ba bzang po'i ye shes las skyes pa'i sngags dang zhing skyes las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /
<p>396b.7</p>lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang / /zhes pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos grub/ sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /zhes pa mchog gi dngos grub/ skal ba bzang po bde ba stong zhes pa/ zag med kyi bde ba 'dod pas phyag rgya'i bde ba so sor des zag pa
<p>397a</p>
<p>397a.1</p>med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni/ las dang po pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa ni/ dngos po thams cad las byung ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ kun du bzang mo'i
<p>397a.2</p>rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la spyad par bya'o/ /he ru ka yi spyod pa ni/ /rdo rje can gyis mchog grub dang / /zhes pa ni khro mo dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dang zag med kyi bde ba bskyed pa'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi spyod
<p>397a.3</p>pa ni/ 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpa'/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ gos dkar mo dang mthun pa phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rnam snang gi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas dag la bde ba dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i rigs dang
<p>397a.4</p>mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i spyod pa ni/ khams gsum dag na ma lus pa/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mA ma kI'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rta mchog gi spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas
<p>397a.5</p>kun gyi grub chen po/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sgrol ma dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar mchog gi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi lha mo bshad nas/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi bsam gtan gyi lha mo bshad pa ni/ mthu chen
<p>397a.6</p>la ni bkra shis brtan/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mthu chen ni khyab 'jug go/ /bkra shis brtan ni de'i chung ma'o/ /'phrog las ni dbang phyug chen po'o/ /grub pa ni lha mo u ma'o/ /ngan pa las ni 'dod pa'i lha'o/ /dga' ba zhes pa de'i
<p>397a.7</p>chung ma'o/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas zhes pa mngon sum du bkug nas bdag nyid longs spyod pa dang / sems 'dzin pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dad pa la sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar btsun mo rin po che bsgrub pa bstan nas/ 
<p>397b</p>
<p>397b.1</p>rgyal srid sgrub pa ni/ ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ khams gsum gyi bdag po la longs spyod thams cad phrogs nas bdag nyid kyang longs spyod cing dad pa la sbyin par byed do/ /rgyal srid bsgrub pa bstan nas/ 
<p>397b.2</p>bdag po sgrub pa ni/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen gyi/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po phrogs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing dad pa la yang sbyin par byed do/ /des 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bstan nas
<p>397b.3</p>'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ni/ sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas/ phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa las mi bya ba gang yang med do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub
<p>397b.4</p>sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sngags kyang rgyud dang yan+t+ra'i thabs gsum gyis phrogs nas gzhan la sbyin par byed na/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'i mthus dngos grub mchog thob pa dang / bdud
<p>397b.5</p>thams cad 'joms pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dngos grub chen po dang / 'khor los sgyur ba yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba bzhugs pa bstan pa ni la lar byang chub
<p>397b.6</p>sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gdul bya btul ba'i thabs 'grub pa'o/ /longs sku'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni 'dis/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i
<p>397b.7</p>lha'i gzugs dang bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsgyur ba sku'i tshe dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i kha dog dang / stobs bcu la sogs pa'i stobs dang / zag med kyi snang ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin
<p>398a</p>
<p>398a.1</p>dang / 'gro ba bzang po thams cad kyi bsnyen pa bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'o/ /longs sku de yang gcig tu nges pa ci yin snyam na/ lha mo bzhi ka'i dbus na rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang / rigs drug 'khor lo'i
<p>398a.2</p>tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyas 'debs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lha dang nges par legs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sems can rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang / 'khor ba ji srid par gnas kyi bar du bskal pa mang por sems can gyi
<p>398a.3</p>don du srid pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /brtag pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //de ltar rtog pa thams cad thun mong du sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang / thabs mang ba dang / zab pa dang / dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
<p>398a.4</p>le'u bshad nas/ da ni gdul bya so so'i bye brag gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor b+ha ga wAn/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ 'dod chags chen po'i gang zag 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
<p>398a.5</p>sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje dngos grub rtog pa lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gis gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang gcig yin te/ sngon 'dzam bu gling du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i skur bshad pa dang / 
<p>398a.6</p>rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du byas na/ gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas/ las dang po pa'i dngos grub dang / mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub len pa dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gang zag la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor
<p>398a.7</p>gsungs pa yin no/ /sngon 'dzam bu gling du byung ba'i sprul sku'i lugs kyi rim pa gsungs pa ni/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ces gsungs te/ 'og min du byang chub pas chos kyi sku brnyes pa'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /zhes pa byang chub pa lnga pa
<p>398b</p>
<p>398b.1</p>la longs sku'i rgyu rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ rgyu'i rnam snang ngam/ rgyu'i rdo rje nyi ma'am/ rgyu'i pad+ma gar dbang ngam/ rgyu'i he ru ka'am/ rgyu'i rta mchog tu snang ba'i rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad la'o/ /grub pa dam pa mchog gi chos/ /zhes pas sngon sangs rgyas kyi
<p>398b.2</p>lam du grub pa zag med dam pa mchog gi lam ni de nyid du gsungs pa dang / kha sbyor thig le nas 'byung ba bzhin du zla ba dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / rdo rje dang / khams zhugs pa dang / sku gyur pas rtog pa drug po thams cad la 'og min du byang chub pa'i tshe
<p>398b.3</p>bsgom par bya'o/ /sna tshogs lam gyi sbyor ba yis/ /zhes bya bas 'og min du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bzhugs nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phrin las la gzhag pa'o/ /cho ga sna tshogs pa 'dod
<p>398b.4</p>pa'i/ /sems can rnam par gdul ba dang / /zhes pa rtog pa drug gi gdul bya 'dod chags chen po dang / gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang / log par lta ba dang / ser sna dang le lo chen po can 'dul ba'i phyir/ ye shes drug gi bde ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 
<p>398b.5</p>b+ha ga wAn sngon bde ba can du sprul sku'i 'bras bu ni/ rdo rje 'chang drug pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul sems can gyi don du sprul nas/ phyag rgya bzhi la mos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de yang thabs gang gis myur ba yin zhe na/ byin rlabs
<p>398b.6</p>kyi lam gyis ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sngon byung ba sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad nas rjes su 'jug pa gsungs pa ni/ nyin re'am yang na zla re'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo re na/ /ji bzhin
<p>398b.7</p>byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ bsnyen sgrub bzhi bsgoms pas bsnyen pa byas nas zhag gcig 'jog pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am/ zla ba gcig 'jog pa'am/ lo gcig 'jog
<p>399a</p>
<p>399a.1</p>pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i rim pas 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskyed na pU dza byas la sangs rgyas
<p>399a.2</p>bde mchog gi zlos gar bsgom par bya'o/ /yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi 'dod na cha lugs byas nas sgrub pa bstan pa ni/ khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ gser dngul zangs lcags la
<p>399a.3</p>sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung / /zhes pa srog chags las byung ba'i ba so dang rwa las byas pa dang / rtswa las byung ba'i shing la 'bur du brkos nas rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bya'o/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab
<p>399a.4</p>tu zhes pa smos te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnam snang dang / he ru ka dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / pad+ma gar dbang dang / rta mchog gzugs su bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bstan pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ rigs drug
<p>399a.5</p>gi rnal 'byor pa khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'am skyes pa'am bud med kyi rtog pa drug gi 'khor lo gang dang gang ston pa'o/ /de yang gang zhig dang lhan cig bsgom zhe na/ slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ /mchod pa byas nas de bsgrubs so/ /
<p>399a.6</p>zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i tshogs dang / gdong rgyan gyon la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi rgyud bshad nas/ da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sngon byung gi gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni/ 
<p>399a.7</p>de nas gzhan yang rtog kun gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i rigs drug sprul par bya'o/ /gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /de yang ston pa su zhig la gnas gang zhig tu su zhig dang lhan cig tu
<p>399b</p>
<p>399b.1</p>dus nam gyi tshe thos she na/ ston pa sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog /ces bya ba ste longs sku dang sprul sku'i ngo bo nyid do/ /gnas ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o/ /'khor ni thams cad bdag
<p>399b.2</p>nyid do/ /dus ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /der bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ngo bo ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/ /rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'da' dka' ba/ /zhes gsungs
<p>399b.3</p>so/ /bshad pa'i chos ni/ cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /gdul bya'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /zhes pa rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi rnam rtog
<p>399b.4</p>sprul pa dang / sgra'i rnam rtog bshad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bas snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang dang / bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar bskyed pa'o/ /sems
<p>399b.5</p>can kun gyi don mchog rnams/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub/ /ces bya ba phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi sems can gyi don du sprul par bshad pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel
<p>399b.6</p>pa'o// //de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ de ltar sprul sku mi yul du babs pa'i thabs nyams su blang ba'i rim pa bshad nas/ da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i yan lag gi don dang / brtag
<p>399b.7</p>pa drug gi nyams su blang ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no/ /da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /zhes bya ba sngon sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang bsdu ba dang / 
<p>400a</p>
<p>400a.1</p>gnas pa dang brten pa'i tshul lo/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi'i yang thog tu/ rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul
<p>400a.2</p>gyis sbyor nas dpal mchog la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs pa dang / de bstan pas sems can rnams gzugs sku la sogs par zhen pa sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs la sogs pas
<p>400a.3</p>dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pas sgro 'dogs bsal bar mdzad pa yin no/ /de la sems can rmongs pas stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la zhen pas sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa las bzlog pa'i phyir thabs kyi bla na med pa dang / shes rab kyi
<p>400a.4</p>bla na med pa'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i le'u dang po las go rims ji bzhin bshad pas the tshom mi bya'o/ /shes rab kyis bla na med pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud stong phrag bco brgyad pa'i dbang du byas nas bdag nyid chen po rtag pa
<p>400a.5</p>chos kyi sku las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi ngor rgyu'i rnam snang gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phrin las mdzad pa yin no/ /sngon rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi bskal pa dang po la bsam
<p>400a.6</p>gtan bzhi pa'i yang thog dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas dang / ri rab ri'i rtse mor dpal mchog de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'dul ba'i don de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sngon byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling
<p>400a.7</p>du bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang / 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang mthun par rab byung gi tshul du sngon byung nas sde snod gsungs so/ /de tshe sems can thams cad shin tu stong
<p>400b</p>
<p>400b.1</p>pa nyid la sogs pas ye shes rgyun chad 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bar shes pa'i rgyun 'gags nas phung po lhag ma med pas mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /dor bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor de nyid mkhyen pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin
<p>400b.2</p>gshegs pa 'gro ba stong pa nyid phyogs gcig la zhen pa de dag stong nyid las 'grol zhing / phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngal skyes kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad pa yin no/ /bai
<p>400b.3</p>ro'i dkyil 'khor des lta ba lhag na ci zhig ston snyam na/ stong pa'ang ma yin mi stong pa'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ don dam par sgyu ma lta bu dang / rab tu mi gnas pa lta bu'i stong pa yang ma yin zhing / rnam bcas dang
<p>400b.4</p>rnam med lta bu'i mi stong pa yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med pa'i zung du 'jug pa dbu mar yang mi dmigs pas/ shes rab stong pa nyid dang / thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi chos sku rtog med las dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes su yongs su
<p>400b.5</p>brtags pa'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mos pa yang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad brag ca'am sgra brnyan gyi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o/ /'gro ba rmongs pa lha'i sku la zhen pas sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs mi bya'o zhes pa'i dgongs
<p>400b.6</p>pa bstan pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang lha'i de nyid gsungs pa yin la/ ma 'ongs pa'i sgo gsum sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi tshe/ theg pa chen po yon tan rgyas pa'i
<p>400b.7</p>glus dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod par bya'o/ /de yang mnyam nyid mi g.yo ba/ /zhes bya ba nas/ mchog chos can zhes pa'i bar gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang / yon tan
<p>401a</p>
<p>401a.1</p>shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang zhes pa nas/ nges par gsol gyi bar gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang / rtag tu dri med thugs zhes bya ba nas/ rtag tu rnam par zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang / 
<p>401a.2</p>tshad med tshad dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas yong mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang / e ma'o shin tu bzang po zhes pa nas bdag la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang / slob dpon klu sgrub ni bsnyen pa'i
<p>401a.3</p>dus su phra mo'i sa mA d+hi la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul bar bzhed do/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti rgyu'i rnam snang zhu ba las 'bras bu'i bai ro bskyed pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bzhed/ rab zhi bshes gnyen dang / kun dga' snying po ni dkyil 'khor sgom pa rdzogs
<p>401a.4</p>nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba nas bskul par 'dod do/ /ye shes zhabs ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog la bstod par the tshom mi za'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do/ /de nas de yi sgrub pa dang / zhes bya
<p>401a.5</p>bas rjes 'jug gi don bshad pa yin te/ sgrub pa ni mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsnyen sgrub gnyis lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub bdag /ces pa mtshan ma thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa'o/ /gang gi srid pa
<p>401a.6</p>'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa 'thob/ /ces pa ni/ mchog gi dngos grub bud+d+ha bo d+hi'i ye shes grub pa'o/ /de sgrub pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ bai ro'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
<p>401a.7</p>bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa byin gyi rlabs kyis lam ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o/ /thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan gsum nges par brdab/ /ces pa ye shes sems dpa' byon pa la phyag byas nas snying gar bcug ste dbang bskur ba'i mthar pheg brdabs mnyes
<p>401b</p>
<p>401b.1</p>par bya'o/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /zhes pa bud+d+ha'i dbang po dang rang gi mnyam par sbyor bar ro gcig par bsgom pa'o/ /ji ltar mos pa chags pa dang / /zhes pa lha la dang ba'i dad par mos par bsgoms na sha dza ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying
<p>401b.2</p>po dang / sngags kyi glu len cing bstod par bya'o/ /kun du gnas pa'o/ /kun nas ni dngos po'o/ /thams cad ni rnam pa'i bye brag go /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /zhes bya ba dus so/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub 'dzin/ /rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub bo/ /zhes bya ba
<p>401b.3</p>rang gi lus dang lha tha mi dad mthong ba dang reg pa dang / thos pa'i mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dngos grub ma thob na bskyar chos gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas mtshan
<p>401b.4</p>thog thag lha la bstod na de kho na nyid bskul ba yin pa dngos grub grub par gdon mi za'o/ /bai ro'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o/ /de ltar bai ro'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad nas/ he ru ka yi dbugs dbyung ni/ /'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'das pa'i dus nas
<p>401b.5</p>zhes bya ba la sogs bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /zhes bya ba 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can thams cad gdug cing gtum par 'gyur ro/ /gdug par 'gyur du zad mod nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na/ shin tu khro zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ de'i rnam smin gyis
<p>401b.6</p>ngu 'bod du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe 'phos nas 'byung po gtogs 'dod can gyi bu 'byung po dge ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de legs ldan byed nag por gyur nas/ des grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig pa'i phyir/ rims dug dbyig dug la sogs pa log 'dren gyi las byed pa
<p>401b.7</p>dang / 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po rnams la 'tshe ba dang / lha la sogs pa tshe 'pho bar byed pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'jig par byed do/ /de'i tshe drag po 'jigs byed kyis gdug pa de ma bzod nas dbang po dang
<p>402a</p>
<p>402a.1</p>bcas pa'i lha tshangs pa la skyabs su song ngo / /tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug la skyabs su song ngo / /khyab 'jug kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu chen po la skyabs su song ngo / /lha chen po des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba'i rang bzhin shes nas de nyid la skyabs su
<p>402a.2</p>song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de nyid kyis rdo rje se gol brdabs nas rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad de/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin gang bar gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpas gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can la zhi
<p>402a.3</p>bas phan par mi 'gyur bar gzigs nas/ shes rab thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thabs shes rab kyi snying po hUM gsungs pas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khros nas khro bo'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas/ khro bo'i ched du brjod pa ni/ khro bo'i
<p>402a.4</p>tshul can khros pas ni/ /'jig rten gsum yang sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo la/ /yid ni yang dag brtan par gzung / /zhes pa dpal he ru ka yab yum thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i yab yum gyi
<p>402a.5</p>mkha' gsang du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhu ba'i thig le yi ge hUM gi gzugs su snang ba la sems bzung nas/ gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse'i dbugs yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ring zhing dro bar gyur pa las he ru ka'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya gau rI ma la sogs pa mngal skyes kyis byung bar gyur pa yin no/ /
<p>402a.6</p>de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mngal skyes kyi rim pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnal 'byor pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mdog ji lta bu
<p>402a.7</p>zhig ce na/ sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas zhi zhing dkar ba/ g.yon chags pas dmar ba/ dbus ma'i zhal drag pa/ rgyab ma rmongs par mdzad pa ser po/ phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu/ 'og ma
<p>402b</p>
<p>402b.1</p>gnyis na 'jigs byed kyi pags pa bsnams pa/ gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu/ bzhi pa gnyis na mdung dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ /des phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na/ 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /ces pa nas/ thams cad pham nas slar
<p>402b.2</p>yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byed pa'i bar gsungs te/ ma rungs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la sdug bsngal phab nas slar yang shi bas thal bar gyur pa las slar 'tsho bar mdzad pa yin no/ /slar yang ci zhig mdzad ce na/ de'i 'bar ba'i nyi ma las/ /zhes gsungs te/ rang gi
<p>402b.3</p>nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar ba las byung ba'i dur khrod kyi zhing skyong du sprul nas/ grib ma bzhin du sprul pa'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas ma lus pa'i bdud las grags pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gdug pa la sogs pa'i khrag za bar nus pa dur
<p>402b.4</p>khrod kyi rgyal po he ru ka dang lhan cig rol pa yin no/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs nas 'gro ba thams cad byang chub la bkod de/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sbyangs pa yin no/ /he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung
<p>402b.5</p>bshad nas/ da ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung bshad par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba/ /zhes pa nas 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba'i bar du bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /zhes pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can
<p>402b.6</p>thams cad rmongs pa'i dbang gis log par lta ba can du gyur to/ /de nas chags pa'i dbang gis ngu 'bod chen por skyes par gyur to/ /log lta can gyi shes rab de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyi
<p>402b.7</p>nyes pas mi gos pa bzhin te/ khams gsum pa'i sems can 'od gsal glo bur gyi dri ma'i nyes pas ma gos pa gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur bskyed pa yin/ de yang su zhig yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rigs
<p>403a</p>
<p>403a.1</p>drug gi dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rtsa ba'i sprul sku yin zhes shes par bya'o/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des log lta las byung ba'i 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir/ so sor rtog pa 'dod chags dag pa'i mchod sbyin te/ pad+ma gar
<p>403a.2</p>gyi dbang phyug thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba'i mngal skyes kyi rim pas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sna tshogs pa 'dul ba la kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po snang ba mtha' yas su gyur pa yin no/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs
<p>403a.3</p>dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar gar gyi dbang phyug gi 'grel pa bshad nas/ da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba'i tshigs bcad gcig bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /zhes bya ba ni bud+d+ha 'od srungs kyi
<p>403a.4</p>bstan pa'i rjes la ser sna'i sems kyis 'dug cing nor la shas cher bsgom par gyur pa dang / shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i dbang gis yi dgas kyi gnas su lhung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe 'phos nas mi dbul por skyes nas bkres pa dang skom pa dang / phan tshun gsod par
<p>403a.5</p>gyur pa dang / shin tu gdug pa'i ser sna can gyi rnal 'byor de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mnyam pa nyid kyi nor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying
<p>403a.6</p>po rdo rje nyi ma des phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bud med rin po che la sogs pa'i char phab nas/ sems can thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid ster ba yin no/ /gang gi phyir gdug cing ser sna can gyi nga rgyal gyis khro ba la zhi
<p>403a.7</p>bas phan [(]phar [,]par [)]mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje nyi ma las/ mngal skyes kyi rim pas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis ser sna can rnams rab tu gdungs nas ser sna med pa'i lhar bsgrubs so bya ba dang zhes bya ba lus ngag sems kyi dbang du bya ba'o/ /zlog pa dang zhes
<p>403b</p>
<p>403b.1</p>bya ba srog dang rnam shes thim pa'o/ /dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du/ /zhes pa btsun mo la longs spyad pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyad pa'o/ /de ltar gzhan las rgyal bar byas te/ sa 'og sa bla sa stengs kyi gnas gsum po mtha' dag gi rang dbang yod pa'i
<p>403b.2</p>nor gyi tshogs thams cad kun du sdud par byed cing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //da ni rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba bshad de/ 'das pa'i dus na zhes pa'i sh+loka ni bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can
<p>403b.3</p>thams cad ni/ /zhes pa 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la'o/ /brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur pa shes pa/ le lo dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'o/ /le lo des cir 'gyur snyam na/ mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung / /zhes bya ba smos te/ mnar med pa ni nye bar
<p>403b.4</p>mtshon pa ste brgyad do/ /de nas shi 'phos te mir skyes kyang byi bo dang / chom po dang / rkun pos dge ba'i phyogs la bar du gcod pa'i las byed pa yin no/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mkhyen nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin drag shul gyi sbyor
<p>403b.5</p>ba'i tshul rta mchog gi tshul du skyed par byed pa yin no/ /gdul bya sems can thams cad dag par mos pas sdig pa med pa'i thugs rje'i stobs kyis mngon sum kho nar ro/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /zhes pa dbang bya ba dang longs spyad pa thim pa'i mdzad
<p>403b.6</p>pas zil gyis non par mdzad pa'o/ /ji ltar zil gyis non snyam na rta mchog yab yum mnyam par sbyor ba mngal skyes kyi rim pas shin tu le los gdug cing phrag dog gis gtum pa'i sems can rnam pa mang po'i 'jig rten thams cad 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi
<p>403b.7</p>'khor lo sprul pa yin no/ /des ci zhig mdzad ce na/ byi bo chom po rkun po yis/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ byi bo ni gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'o/ /rkun po ni ma mthong bar nor 'phrog pa'o/ /chom po ni mngon sum du nor 'phrog pa'o/ /brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang / /zhes pa brid
<p>404a</p>
<p>404a.1</p>pa ni tshig gis so/ /sgyu ni rang gi nyes pa 'chab pa'i thabs sems gya gyu ba'o/ /thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed/ /ces pa/ gdul bya de dag sprul pa'i 'khor los sbyor ba'o/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis de bzhin du/ /zhes pa mngon sum du brtson 'grus kyi stobs
<p>404a.2</p>kyis dbang du bya ba longs spyod pa thim pa'o/ /dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni/ /zhes bya ba/ rdo rje ral gri mda' gzhu mdung rtse gcig pa be con gyis btul nas/ de'i tshe 'jig rten kun las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbus kyi gtso bo rta mchog gi dbang du byas nas gdul bya rnams
<p>404a.3</p>'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis rang gi rgyal srid skyong ba zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /khams kyi rta mchog gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad nas/ g.yem pa rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dang / g.yem pa'i dbang gis sku dang khro bo rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ khro ba mngon spyod
<p>404a.4</p>kyi sku dang / zhi ba 'dul ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sku dang / drag shul can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i sku bstan pa yin no/ /rta mchog de bzhir gang btul ba yin zhe na/ sdig pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis mngon sum du mnan nas lha mo byi ma 'phrogs pa yin no/ /
<p>404a.5</p>mthu'i tshe khyab 'jug mnan nas lha mo drug ma ni 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa mnan nas lha mo rab tu zhi ba 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /'dod pa'i lha mnan nas mi'i dbang phyug ma 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /de ltar sngon byung gi
<p>404a.6</p>dus su ma rungs pa thams cad mnan nas lus ngag sems dbang du byas te/ lha mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa 'gags nas srog thim pa dang / mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes nas ye shes thim pas na/ de la
<p>404a.7</p>sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa nas/ rdo rje las chen rnam ston pa/ /zhes pa'i bar du sprul pa'i skus sems can gyi don bya ba gsungs pa yin no/ /sems can de dag 'dul bar mdzad pa ni gang / thabs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur/ /'bras bu ni gang thob snyam na/ nam mkha'
<p>404b</p>
<p>404b.1</p>kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas/ /zhes pa ston pa ni/ thabs dang rtsal gyis sgrub pa yis/ /zhes pa dbang du bya ba'i thabs dang longs spyod pa'i rtsal gyis mngon spyod kyi sbyor ba'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pas khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ma lus pa la dbang
<p>404b.2</p>ba rta mchog gi gzugs su rdo rje 'dzin pa de yis thob par mdzad nas mngal skyes kyi rim pas rigs bsdus pa'i 'khor bzhis bskor ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog sprul nas mngon spyod kyi drag shul gyi sbyor bas sgrub par mdzad pa ni thabs yin no/ /'bras bu ni/ thams cad
<p>404b.3</p>rnam dag mos pa'i sa/ /zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis mchog gi dngos grub dang / lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang / /zhes pa nas 'jig rten gyi sid+d+hi grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che/ /zhes pa nas/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis
<p>404b.4</p>thob nas/ shes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi sku bstan/ sems can thams cad dri ma dag /ces pa nas/ sems can khams la bstan par sbyin/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis longs sku bstan pa dang / rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yin/ /zhes pa nas sems can gyi don yang byed
<p>404b.5</p>ces bya ba'i bar gyis sprul sku bstan to/ /rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar dbugs dbyung drug bshad nas/ de rnams kyi mjug bsdu ba ni/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa gsungs te/ dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ni rnam
<p>404b.6</p>pa drug yin la/ dngos grub len pa'i 'khor lo ni lha brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dpa' bo gcig pu'i brgya rtsa brgyad sprul nas/ sngon byung gdul bya btul ba rnams rang byung gi gtam dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no/ /dkyil 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad po de rnams
<p>404b.7</p>dang po sbyor ba'i rtsa ba'i lha gang gis sprul zhe na/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun du gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dngos grub len pa'i rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyang grub pa'i dbang phyug rab tu grub pa ste/ 'jig rten thun mong dang mchog gi
<p>405a</p>
<p>405a.1</p>dngos grub rnams so/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed/ /ces pa dngos grub thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa phrin las thams cad la 'jug par byed do/ /gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa bskal pa dang po dpal mchog gi lo rgyus dang / bar gyi bskal pa sangs
<p>405a.2</p>rgyas gsum gyi lo rgyus dang / bskal pa tha mar mnyam sbyor gyi dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor drug gi brtag pa sprul pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug gi rjes 'jug bsgom pa gsungs pa'o/ /brtag pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi
<p>405a.3</p>dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor drug bshad nas/ da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i tshogs skal ba dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas gzhan yang thams cad du/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba med na dngos grub thob par
<p>405a.4</p>mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad/ /ces bya bar sbyor ba gzhan yang zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor snga ma drug la ltos nas skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams smin par bya ba ni gzhan yang ngo / /thams cad du zhes pa phyogs thams cad du skal ba dang ldan
<p>405a.5</p>pa'i gang zag rtog pa drug pa la mos pa la'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa ni rigs drug gi 'khor lo bshad pas gdul bya rnams btul ba'o/ /de thabs gang gis yin snyam na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ces smos te/ 
<p>405a.6</p>rigs drug gi sangs rgyas zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang / so so'i skye bo'i rnal 'byor pa glo bur gyi dri ma dang bcas pa rnams mnyam par sbyar bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa ste/ de yang zhi gnas bde ba dang / lhag mthong stong pa nyid rgyu rkyen tshogs
<p>405a.7</p>pas bde mchog ste/ zag med kyi bde ba sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /bde mchog de gnas gang du sgrub/ /dngos po gang zhig /sgrub thabs ji lta bu zhig gis sgrub snyam na dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de'i gnas ni phyi dang nang gcig yin la/ phyi'i
<p>405b</p>
<p>405b.1</p>gnas yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'am/ nang lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / b+ha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gsum la yin no/ /phyi rol gyi gnas yid du 'ong bar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bris nas bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni brtag pa bdun pa las ston par 'gyur ro/ /'dir
<p>405b.2</p>ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bzhi pa bskur ba gsum bshad par bya'o/ /de la
<p>405b.3</p>lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bzhed nas/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde byung ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pas na/ /zhes pas gnas gsungs pa yin no/ /zhi gnas bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / 
<p>405b.4</p>lhag mthong zag med kyi bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /bde ba de 'byung ba'i gnas ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o/ /sar+b+ba bdag nyid ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang
<p>405b.5</p>ldan pa'i bdag nyid rlung gnyis 'gog pa'i dus su dga' ba bzhi'i dus na rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni ye shes lnga
<p>405b.6</p>thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus rtag tu bzhugs so zhes sbyar ro/ /bsgrub pa'i dngos po gang zhe na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'da' bar mi bya ba ni dpal stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu ro gcig pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' der snang ba'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o/ /thams
<p>405b.7</p>cad kyi khyad par ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bzhi'i dpung rgyan do shal la sogs pas brgyan zhing spras pa'o/ /de yang bde mchog las/ dri sbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan/ /shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa/ /
<p>406a</p>
<p>406a.1</p>zhes pa ni dmangs rigs kyi bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i dpyid kyi dus kyi re ta dang ldan pa'o/ /bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /zhes pa gos sar pa bgos pa'o/ /rdo rje tshig dang mchod pa la sogs so/ /zhes pa brda dang 'khyud pa dang / 'o byed pa la sogs pa kar
<p>406a.2</p>na'i mchod pas mchod pa'o/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul/ /zhes pa glu bzhi len cing gling bu dang pi wang la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad bcus bskor ba'i gnas so/ /yang na sgra ji bzhin bshad pa ste go sla'o/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dri lha bshos la sogs pas
<p>406a.3</p>brgyan zhing gnas su lus dang b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la sgyu ma'i bde mchog bsgrub par bya'o/ /yang na bde ba'i gnas skyed mos tshal la sogs par rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas gdan nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bshams te/ nang tshangs dang bcas
<p>406a.4</p>pa'i 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i stan tshogs pad+mas brgyan pa'i ras kyis g.yogs la de thams cad kyi gdan la bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i rim pa dang po rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed la phyis rten de thams cad las 'khor gyi lha sprul par bya'o/ /de yang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma nyi
<p>406a.5</p>shu tham pa mngal skyes kyi rim pas so sor rang gi lha sgom du gzhug go/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang du ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /zhes pa nas/ sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de rnams kha dog dang dbyibs
<p>406a.6</p>ji lta bu zhe na/ rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i zhes gsungs te/ bud med rnams ni legs pa zhes pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas/ rang rang gi lha mo bsgom pa'am/ gdong rgyan dang do shal dang bcas pas rang gi mu dras mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya'o/ /tshogs
<p>406a.7</p>kyi 'khor lo dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rdzas ni/ mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la/ /dmar chen zhes bya bar bshad ces gsungs te/ rang 'byung gi khrag go/ /de ci dgos snyam na/ ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ gtso
<p>406b</p>
<p>406b.1</p>bo rtsa ba dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa ka ma ta twa dang / be shAn ta twa zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang / de'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi rtog pa med pa ni ne reny+dza tat+t+wa zhes pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin no/ /de ji ltar myang snyam na/ rdo rje chu dang rdo rjer bcas/ /zhes gsungs
<p>406b.2</p>te/ dri chen dri chu bcas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang mtshal chen po ste sha dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rang bzhin gyi mthus nus pa dang ldan pa thod pa'i snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa yin no/ /de ni
<p>406b.3</p>gang zag gcig gis ma yin par/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis myang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bstan pa ni/ /de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang / /zhes gsungs te/ /mtshal ni rang byung gi me tog go/ /khu ba ni sa bon no/ /mtshal chen po sgrub pa ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'o/ /
<p>406b.4</p>ci'i phyir na/ bdud rtsi lnga la mtshal chen po/ /zhes khyad par gyi ming gang gis gdags she na/ bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i chags pa chen po las byung bas na dmar chen zhes bshad do/ /de'i byang chub sems dang / tsan+dan dmar po ste sha chen bcas pa tshogs kyi dbus
<p>406b.5</p>su bzhag pas lha thams cad kyis myong ba'i ra sa ya na shi ba slong ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar myong zhe na/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pa/ /zhes gsungs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srin lag dang / mthe bo'i
<p>406b.6</p>rtse mos zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na rtag par zag med kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rdo rje gdan bzhi las/ mthe bos gzhir bskyed nas srin lag ri rab tu bsams te/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por bsgoms dkrugs te sprul pa/ ri bo ba di ra las
<p>406b.7</p>btus pa'i rtswa so ma ni zhes pa gi wang yod pa'i ba ser mo'i ko bar rig byed kyi sngags zlos shing brdungs nas 'thungs pas sdig pa dag par 'dod pa de bzhin du myang bar bya zhes gsungs so/ /de'i 'bras bu ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go
<p>407a</p>
<p>407a.1</p>sla'o/ /de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bshad nas/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni/ de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus/ /zhes smos te/ khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la ci 'byor pa'i gos dang rgyan btags te/ me tog
<p>407a.2</p>gi phreng ba gdags shing kha dri zhim pos bkang la rigs sna tshogs pa'i bud med skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang / a wa d+hU tI'i sgo sbyar nas reg bya'i bde ba la stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes pa skyes nas/ sngon po gnyid log pa'i tshul du gnas pa la dkyil 'khor
<p>407a.3</p>gyi lha mos ye shes phab nas rnam rtog nub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na slob dpon gyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i shi ba slong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blang zhing / btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga'i gos kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje dga' ba'i sbyor bas bdag gi byang chub
<p>407a.4</p>kyi sems bskul bar bya ste/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i nam mkha'i rtsa'i dbus su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma zla ba zhes bya ba thabs shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo bzhi'i ri las 'das nas dung can ma'i nam mkha'i dbus su shar ba dag bla ma'i man ngag gi
<p>407a.5</p>stobs kyis nges shes drangs nas ma bying zhing nyams su myong bas/ sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur zhing bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni/ nges pa'i lam zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ nges pa'i lam ni kun dang ldan/ /
<p>407a.6</p>zhes pa zhi gnas bde ba rtog med par nges pa lhag mthong bde ba stong pa nyid du nges pa'i lam dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan/ /zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas na dga' ba bzhis brgyan pa'o/ /de ltar na bde ba chen po grub pa de las slong bar
<p>407a.7</p>byed pa ni kun nas slong ba zhes bya ba ni shi ba slong ba'i glu gsungs pas sad par byas pa yin no/ /de'i glu ni/ stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor pa/ /zhes pa nas/ dpal khyod bdag ces pa'i bar du bstan to/ /phan yon ni/ 'di dag nyid glur blangs pa nas/ /zhes pa nas/ ci
<p>407b</p>
<p>407b.1</p>zhig smos zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa de lam dus dang ldan pa yin snyam na/ lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pas/ /rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas/ /zhes pa smos te/ dga' ba'i dus su stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / mchog
<p>407b.2</p>dga'i dus su shin tu stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / lhan cig skyes dga'i dus su chen po'i stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / 'od gsal ba'i dus su rnam pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa ni lam bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas gnyis
<p>407b.3</p>su med pa dang gnyis su brtags pa nub nas/ kun brtags dang / gzhan dbang gi rtog pa dang bral te gnyis su med pa rang bzhin du mdzes par byas pa yin no/ /de yang bde mchog las/ mchod pa de bzhin rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /
<p>407b.4</p>snyoms par 'jug pa'ang de nyid 'dzin/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kyang / sems snang ba rnam pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'jug par gsungs pa dang / 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang / sems can bsod nams cher
<p>407b.5</p>'phags shing / /rnam gnyis mi g.yo de nyid bdag /sems kyi 'du byed g.yo ba ste/ /'dus byas thams cad nyid du snang / /zhes gsungs so/ /dga' ba bzhi'i dus bshad pa ni/ sna tshogs 'brang ba shin tu grub/ /ces gsungs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rjes
<p>407b.6</p>su 'brang bar rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum ni rab grub pa/ /zhes pa ni/ sems snang ba gsum 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /zhes pa/ ji ltar chu la
<p>407b.7</p>chu bzhag dang / /ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du/ /rang gis rang gi ye shes ni/ /'dir mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin/ /zhes bshad do/ /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po ni sems kyi de kho na shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten
<p>408a</p>
<p>408a.1</p>kun la bskyed sbyin pa/ /zhes pa shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus ngag sems bde ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrub/ /ces pa/ thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor pa/ /lha mo kun dang
<p>408a.2</p>'grogs pa yin/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po/ /a ra li kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pa/ chags lam pa las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba dang / grol lam chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor bas dga' ba gsum gyi rol pa a ra li kun du grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas
<p>408a.3</p>pa'i/ /lha mo kun dang bde mos pas/ /zhes pa phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa dgu stong nyid kyi lha mo dang / sgyu ma lta bu ci bde ba ro gcig par mos pas zag pa med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang dag par rdzogs par
<p>408a.4</p>'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi ye shes dang dbang bzhi pas lan cig nyams su myong nas dus thams cad du stong pa nyid ji ltar shes par 'gyur snyam nas/ nyi ma gsal bar 'char ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor/ /zhes gsungs te/ 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems
<p>408a.5</p>nyi zla'i tshul du gsal nas a wa d+hU tI'i sgor 'char ba'i tshe/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gsungs/ /zhes bya ste/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma bde ba stong pa nyid kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs pa 'byung ba la/ lan cig bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis nges pa drangs
<p>408a.6</p>shing dmigs pa la dus phyis dus thams cad dang / dngos po thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad la bde ba'i dngos grub kun gsungs pa yin no/ /gal te bde ba stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la dmigs nas srog a wa d+hU tIr chud nas brtan zhing grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe ji ltar
<p>408a.7</p>bya snyam na slong bar byed ces gsungs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed ba dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i glu gan+d+har+b+ha ste/ dri za can zhes bya ba dang / sardza ste drug ldan zhes bya ba'i 'og nas 'byung ba'i glu blangs pas bde ba
<p>408b</p>
<p>408b.1</p>chen po'i ting nge 'dzin slong ba yin no/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las ye shes phab nas nye bar bsdu ba bzhin du 'dir yang blta bar bya'o/ /rjes su chags pa rnam mang zhes pa nas/ bde ba grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar du me long lta bu'i zung 'jug bshad do/ /kye mchog
<p>408b.2</p>ces pa nas rol cig ho zhes pa'i bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi zung 'jug bshad do/ /kye mchog tu gsang ba zhes pa nas/ gsal bar mkhyen zhes pa'i bar du so sor rtog pa'i zung 'jug bshad do/ /dam tshig thams cad ces pa nas/ rab tu bsgrubs la ston pa zhes
<p>408b.3</p>pa'i bar du bya ba nan tan gyi zung 'jug bshad do/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa nas/ a la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi zung 'jug bshad do/ /de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du sgra brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas rnam par shes pa'i 'od gsal ba'i
<p>408b.4</p>rang bzhin dbang bzhi pa 'jug pa yin pa de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis slob ma gzhug par gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs pa yin no/ /de ltar sgra brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas chos kyi dbyings dbang bzhi pas rang
<p>408b.5</p>gi sems kyi chos nyid rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs nas bde ba chen pos rgyas gdab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam 'phrul ma lus shing lus pa med par snang ba zhes bya ba glu'i rgyal po gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi
<p>408b.6</p>gnas/ /zhes pa/ sems 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so/ /sgyu ma kun gyi bde mchog ces pa/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma las snang srid lha'i 'khor lor rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang / lus kyi dkyil 'khor las gsang ba'i dbang gi sgyu ma las snang srid sgyu mar
<p>408b.7</p>rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang / b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi sgyu ma las yum gyi stong pa nyid kyi bde mchog rtogs pa dang / rang gi sems kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang bzhi pa'i sgyu ma las rnam par mi rtog pa zag pa med pa'i bde mchog rtogs pa
<p>409a</p>
<p>409a.1</p>yin no/ /da ni chos thams cad la khyab pa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i kun du 'gro ba'i bde mchog ston pa'i glu ni rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyi zhes pa nas/ te na te te hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid me long lta bu'i zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes bstan pa yin
<p>409a.2</p>no/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud/ /ces pa nas/ hUM hUM hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid mnyam pa nyid kyi zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes bshad do/ /rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud/ /ces pa nas/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
<p>409a.3</p>zung 'jug bstan to/ /rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud/ /ces pa nas/ hUM shi ya A be sha hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid thams cad bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi zung 'jug bstan to/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i skad kyis me long lta bu'i chos nyid ni 'dod chags kyi
<p>409a.4</p>rgyud yin la/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud yin zhing / so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid ni khro bo'i rgyud yin te/ bya ba grub pa'i chos nyid ni srog gi rgyud ces bya ba/ rang byung thams cad kyi la glu'i mu dra zhes grags so/ /de la sogs
<p>409a.5</p>pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa'i sgra brnyan lta bu'i glu mtha' yas pas gdul bya mtha' yas pa 'grub pa'i dbang phyug sems 'od gsal grub nas/ snang srid thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyis rab
<p>409a.6</p>bskul nas/ /zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i glu gnyis so/ /de dag nyid bde mchog ma dang / ngo mtshar bde ma dang / snang mdzad ma dang / slob ma mo dang bzhis glus bskul ba yin no/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis gsang ba shes rab ye shes dbang bzhi pa
<p>409a.7</p>thob nas/ da ni slob ma rnams la dkyil 'khor drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo mi 'dra ba drug mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor drug la slob ma drug dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni/ dbang po kun las phyung ba'i zhes smos
<p>409b</p>
<p>409b.1</p>te/ rgyu'i he ru ka drug gi thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mkha' gsang las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa dang / me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi bkod pas bdag nyid yab yum mchod la/ b+ha ga dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs
<p>409b.2</p>rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog rigs bzhi'i dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid kyi lus su snang srid thams cad ma lus par 'grub pa yin no/ /de ltar rigs drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa mdor bstan nas/ rgyas par
<p>409b.3</p>bshad pa ni/ ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis/ /zhes gsungs te/ rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bskyed la ye shes phab nas bsnyen sgrub bzhis bud med dag lha mor bsgrubs la/ rdo rje 'khor lo thod pa rin po che/ sna tshogs rdo rje
<p>409b.4</p>bsnams pa'i lha mor 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang rang gi lha mo 'dra bar ye shes phab nas bsgrubs na ye shes babs pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i rol mo sil snyan gar dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes babs na sngon ma byung ba'i lha'i gzugs sgra
<p>409b.5</p>dri ro reg bya'i bde ba gang yin pa yid la mos par rang nyid lhar mthong ba'i tshe mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog med skal ba bzang po mchog gi bde
<p>409b.6</p>ba stong pa'i 'dod chags can/ slob ma kun la skal ba bzang po'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sgyu ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas zag med kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba dang mnyam par sbyor ba rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi
<p>409b.7</p>bde ba rnams/ dkyil 'khor drug gi mthong ba las dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba myong ba'i mthu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor drug gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor skal ba bzang po brgya rtsa brgyad rang rang gi lha'i lus ngag yid kyi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub pa yin
<p>410a</p>
<p>410a.1</p>no/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i dga' bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bstan nas tshogs kyi yul chos kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs can dang / /zhes gsungs te/ lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i yid du 'ong ba'i bdag nyid la
<p>410a.2</p>dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba bsgoms pas dngos grub ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar tshogs 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshe/ rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ched du brjod pa ni/ oM sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog gsang / /
<p>410a.3</p>sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar/ /rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang / /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang rang gi yum bzhi'i glus 'khor lo drug la bstod pa gsungs pa ni/ de nas yang dag rab gsang ba/ /zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
<p>410a.4</p>la bde mchog ma dang / ngo mtshar bde ma dang / snang mdzad ma dang / slob ma mo'i bud med bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor la/ dbyangs can ma/ dpa' bo ma/ kun bzang ma/ mig bzang ma dang bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /he ru ka'i
<p>410a.5</p>dkyil 'khor la/ gau rI/ tsau rI/ pra mo ha/ be tA lIs bstod par bsam mo/ /pad+ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ sa chen ma/ sgrol ma/ rnam par gzigs ma/ khro gnyer ma bzhis bskul bar bsam mo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ma/ gter ldan ma/ 
<p>410a.6</p>rgyal mtshan ma/ las mchog ma bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod kyi lha mo bzhis bskul bar bsam mo/ /de'i glu ni/ rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas thams cad 'grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis
<p>410a.7</p>bshad do/ /glu de dag gi phan yon ni/ glu'i phyag rgya 'di yis las rab 'byam la 'byor ba'i yang bstod pa dang / dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur pa'i tshe bstod pa dang / yo byad ma 'byor pa'i tshe byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe
<p>410b</p>
<p>410b.1</p>glu'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang / sngar bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi po dag gis me tog la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas slob ma thams cad dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe mchod pa bya'o/ /de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor drug ni slob dpon gyi cho ga bshad nas/ /
<p>410b.2</p>da ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad de/ mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub 'dod pa'i rgyun bshags dang / sdom pa gzung ba/ sems bskyed pa phyi rol du las thams cad pa'i bum pas dbang bskur nas ci rigs par rigs drug gi snyems pa'i
<p>410b.3</p>gar kun nas bskor zhing spyod pa 'ching du bcug la/ rigs drug gi kha dog gi ras kyis gdong g.yogs la gzhug par bya'o/ /de ltar dngos grub thob par 'dod pa'i slob ma la ye shes phab nas phreng ba dor zhing bcing ba dang / gdong g.yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil
<p>410b.4</p>'khor blta bar bya'o/ /de nas yon gyi mchog blangs te/ chu dang / cod pan rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de ltar bum pa'i dbang bskur nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni/ dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa
<p>410b.5</p>gsungs te/ slob dpon dang 'dra'o/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i tshogs kyi b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor
<p>410b.6</p>lo/ /des kyang rgyas mi 'debs pa ni bde ba rtog med la rang bzhin brgyad cu'i zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /rmongs pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid rtog pa la gzung 'dzin gyi dri mas mi rmongs pa'o/ /de la gnon par mi 'gyur te/ /zhes pas sems kyi stong pa nyid dbang bzhi pa rtogs pa
<p>410b.7</p>la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rjes la/ dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag bstan pa ni/ de nas man ngag ni bsgrag par bya zhes pa gsungs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa'i zhes pa nas/ snying la khrag chen 'thung ba zhig /ces pa'i bar
<p>411a</p>
<p>411a.1</p>du man ngag bsgrags pa bstan to/ /dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa ni/ sems can khams ni ma lus don/ /zhes pa nas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de nas rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
<p>411a.2</p>bslab pa ston pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnal 'byor bcas pa ni tshogs 'khor ro/ /gsang bcas ni zhi ba'i btung ba'o/ /bdag gis phyag rgya sgrub ces
<p>411a.3</p>pa pho nya'i gtsang sbra'o/ /lha yi tshul bzhin gar byed pas/ /slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin/ /zhes pa gtsang sbra gsum gyi man ngag bstan to/ /slob ma mchog gi rnal 'byor pa de/ de phyin chad sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas/ rnam
<p>411a.4</p>snang dang sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ro dang zhes pa nas/ /bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgur mchod/ /ces pa'i bar gyis gal te bdag nyid dga' bral du song na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
<p>411a.5</p>mchod par bya'o/ /de yang bde mchog las/ rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bdag nyid gtsang sbra gsum bsgrubs nas kun gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas nas rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba rtog med
<p>411a.6</p>kyi bde ba stong pa nyid la ji lta bu'i tshul gyis slob ma 'jug pa la bden pa'i chos zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'o/ /da ni rnam snang gi gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul/ /
<p>411a.7</p>zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi bsgrub cing rtog pa kun gyi lhar sgom pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po byed par 'dod pas bsnyen sgrub bzhi sna tshogs kyi las kyi sbyor ba dang / chags lam grol lam gyis 'dul ba'i bdag nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs pas/ 
<p>411b</p>
<p>411b.1</p>sems can gyi mos pa mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de las gzhan pa rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyis zhi ba'i skus 'dul ba'i thar pa thams cad sbyangs nas/ grol ba'i mkha' 'gro rnam snang gi
<p>411b.2</p>dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rnal 'byor pho mo rang gi lha dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs te/ mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi phyag rgya dang ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs 'khor dang / zhi ba'i btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sbra bsgrub par
<p>411b.3</p>bya'o/ /he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum bstan pa ni/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes gsungs te/ zhe sdang sbyang ba'i phyir he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no/ /pad+ma gar gyi gtsang sbra ni/ /gzhan ni shin tu rnal 'byor ma/ /zhes pa la sogs
<p>411b.4</p>pa gsungs te/ log ltas kun nas bslang ba'i 'dod chags sbyong ba'i phyir skal pa bzang po mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa la pad+ma gar dbang gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa ni/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /
<p>411b.5</p>zhes gsungs te/ ser sna can sbyang ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no/ /rta mchog gi gtsang sbra ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes gsungs te/ drag shul can gyi gang zag sbyang ba'i phyir rta mchog gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin
<p>411b.6</p>no/ /de ltar gtsang sbra bshad nas rtag pa drug gi rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dpa' bo gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bsgoms la rang gi las kyi phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/ rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/ /rang gi byin gyis
<p>411b.7</p>brlabs bsgrubs pa/ /gzugs brnyan ngo bo sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba gar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ lha brgya rtsa brgyad [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]nga rgyal byas nas rang gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhi ba btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i dam tshig rnam pa sna
<p>412a</p>
<p>412a.1</p>tshogs kyis de ltar dga' bzhi spyad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>412a.2</p>dkyil 'khor shar du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor/ nub tu pad+ma gar dbang gi /lhor rdo rje nyi ma'i/ byang du rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhag la sgrub pa'am/ yang na he ru ka'am/ pad+ma gar dbang ngam/ rdo rje nyi ma gzhag par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/ kun du kun nas
<p>412a.3</p>thams cad du/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gnas kun du dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor thams cad bdag nyid thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam pa kun du sangs rgyas la so sor 'khor lo rten gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin dang / 
<p>412a.4</p>g.yo ba lha'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dbus su rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni/ dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnam snang gi dkyil
<p>412a.5</p>'khor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis so/ /lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rnam snang gi bdag nyid kyi rnam 'phrul ston pa dang / 'khor gyi lha mo gling bu ma dang / me tog ma la sogs pa/ rta gdong ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis kyis phyi rol
<p>412a.6</p>gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa sangs rgyas sprul pa 'grub par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku ma rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba bzhag la/ 'khor gyi lha mo bcu
<p>412a.7</p>gnyis ni thun mong du gzhag pa yin no/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su pad+ma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni/ pad+ma sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ /zhes pa la sogs pa yin no/ /lho phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni khams
<p>412b</p>
<p>412b.1</p>gsum pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/ /byang phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni/ khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /bdag gdul spyod pas zhes gsungs so/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad gang rung
<p>412b.2</p>dbus su gtso bor byas pa ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa yin no/ /dpal dgyes rol pa'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhes pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas sprul pa'o/ /sna tshogs kun gyis rnam par rol/ /zhes pa 'dul byed kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'o/ /rnam pa sna
<p>412b.3</p>tshogs skal bzang po/ /zhes pa gdul bya sna tshogs pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /zhes gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum sna tshogs pa'o/ /gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs/ /zhes pas mchog tu grub pa'i rnal 'byor
<p>412b.4</p>pa mtha' yas pas rtog med du bsgrubs pa'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pas rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / dpa' bo re re bsgom pa dang / rtog pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas
<p>412b.5</p>pa bsgoms pas thams cad kyi bdag nyid grub pa gsungs so/ /brtag pa drug pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar gleng gzhi de kho na nyid snang ba'i yul la 'jug pas zhes pas gnas lugs bstan nas/ thabs mang ba dang / zab pa dang / dbang po rnon
<p>412b.6</p>po'i dbang du byas pa'i le'u gsum gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i thabs kyis mtshan ma thob par byas nas/ dbugs dbyung ba rtog pa drug gi sngon byung sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa dang mthun par/ rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
<p>412b.7</p>dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms la/ las dang po pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'ang rung / mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang rung / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'ang rung ste/ dbugs dbyung drug gi grangs dang / dus dang
<p>413a</p>
<p>413a.1</p>mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa bya ba bstan nas/ bsnyen pa grub pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma lha'i cha byad du byas pas las bsgrub par bya ba dang / dngos grub len pa dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa yin no/ /da ni gzugs
<p>413a.2</p>brnyan lugs su blugs pa'am/ 'bur du brkos pa'am ri mor bris pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mos pa'i ngor dbugs dbyung ba drug gi bsnyen pa byas nas/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /zhes pa la
<p>413a.3</p>sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs kun gyi mchog gi 'khor lo drug gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bzhed pas/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa rdul tshon gyi bdag nyid du bstan pa yin no/ /gsang ba dpal he ru ka mchog ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang
<p>413a.4</p>phyug dgyes pa rdo rje nyi ma ste/ bdag gi rta mchog gi brtag pa rnam par snang mdzad de/ rjes su bsgrub pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs pas/ rdul tshon drug gi bsgrub pa yin no/ /de la yang bye brag gi rigs gnas gsungs pa ni/ dben pa zhes pa nas/ ci bde bar ni
<p>413a.5</p>bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gsungs pa yin no/ /rten dang dgon pa zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi gnas gsungs pa'o/ /dur khrod ces pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i gnas gsungs pa'o/ /pad+ma zhes
<p>413a.6</p>pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi gnas gsungs so/ /rgyal po zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas gsungs pa'o/ /'khor ni zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi gnas gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar
<p>413a.7</p>dkyil 'khor bzhi'i gnas bshad nas/ rnal 'byor pa'i cha lugs dang rdzas bsags pa bstan pa ni/ cha lugs zhes pa nas/ rta mchog rdo rje can gyis so/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis ston to/ /gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra ba/ /zhes pa gnas kyi rten gyi 'khor lo drug
<p>413b</p>
<p>413b.1</p>go/ /'khor gyi rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor pa rigs su bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ma byas na rigs drug la lha brgya rtsa brgyad yin no/ /rigs bsdus byas na phyogs bzhir gtso bo dgu dgu sum cu rtsa drug yin la/ 'khor gling bu ma la sogs pa dang / me tog ma la sogs
<p>413b.2</p>pa dang / rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi yang drug drug dgod pas lha bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya rtsa brgyad 'phel ba yin no/ /phrin las bzhi ni rta mchog dang / yab yum gsum so sor bgrangs pa'i brtsi bar mi bya'o/ /bkod pa ni dbyibs yin te/ gzhal
<p>413b.3</p>yas khang gi dbyibs dang lha'i sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan gyi dbyibs yin no/ /bkod pa rigs drug gi gtso bo ste ci 'dra ba zhes pa dang sbyar na bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor nas ni sngon byung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog mdzad
<p>413b.4</p>ces pa gzugs brnyan bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo sprul pa'i sku mthong ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par bris pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsod nams su 'gyur zhes pa gzugs brnyan gyi
<p>413b.5</p>dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa bshad pa'o/ /de ltar dgos pa bshad nas/ thig gi cho ga ni/ dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ gang gis gdab ce na dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ces gsungs te drug gi'o/ /su zhig gis she na/ shes rab can gyis
<p>413b.6</p>so/ /ji ltar bsam pas she na/ phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas so/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cha du bya zhe na/ shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /ces gsungs te/ ka ba brgyad kyi thig btab pas/ cha
<p>413b.7</p>brgyad dang dbus ma dang dgur 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji tsam zhe na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ci 'dra ba yin pa brtag par mi nus so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor drug ni rang gi lha yang mang nyung gi bye brag gis
<p>414a</p>
<p>414a.1</p>de ni tshad kyi dkyil 'khor mos pas brtags na yang 'grub bo/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma dang ma tshang ba ji ltar dag par 'gyur zhe na/ bdag nyid ces pa nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis ston te/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /zhes pa rgyu'i
<p>414a.2</p>rgyud do/ /kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /zhes pa thabs kyi rgyud do/ /kun du sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir/ /zhes pa nas mar tshigs bcad phyed 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor la khyad med kyang nang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu zhe na/ rnam snang gi dkyil
<p>414a.3</p>'khor dkar po/ ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa rdo rje phreng ba zlum pos bskor ba'o/ /he ru ka'i nag po zla gam dgus bskor ba'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi bar du pad+ma'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa/ kha dog dmar po la pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma ni rin
<p>414a.4</p>po che'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa zur brgyad pa rtse mo rin po che'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /rta mchog gi ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i rta mchog dpa' bo gcig pu'am/ lha bcu dgu pa'am bsdus pa'i
<p>414a.5</p>dkyil 'khor lha brgya bco lnga pa bri'o/ /ci 'byor pa ni rdzas dang yo byad che chung ngo / /ji lta bu'i dus zhes bya ba/ zhi ba tho rangs kyi dus su zhi ba'i rta mchog dbus su gzhag pa dang / rgyas pa snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i rta mchog gzhag pa dang / mngon spyod nyi ma phyed na mngon
<p>414a.6</p>spyod kyi rta mchog gzhag pa dang / dbang srod la dkyil 'khor dbus su dbang gi rta mchog go/ /ci bde bar zhes pa snga ma bzhin bsnyen sgrub bzhir bsgoms la/ bdag nyid rta mchog tu byang chub pas bskyed nas/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor skad cig bskyed de pU dza la sogs
<p>414a.7</p>pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du gnas zhes pa bsdus pa'i rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab cing bris nas rdzas btags te/ lhag chad bskangs nas/ bum pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas bcug ste/ tshogs 'khor du zhugs pa bzhin du
<p>414b</p>
<p>414b.1</p>bdag nyid zhugs nas/ phyis 'byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' bcug la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur te mchod pa rgyas pa byas pas slob dpon gyi las rdzogs nas da ni slob ma'i las bshad par bya'o/ /dor bar bya ba'i rten
<p>414b.2</p>gyi gang zag ni tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to/ /tshigs bcad gcig gis dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan to/ /kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /zhes pa nas/ thub pa thams cad skal ngan pa/ /zhes pa tshigs bcad bzhi yis blang bya'i rten gyi gang zag drug bshad do/ /bde ba
<p>414b.3</p>thams cad ces pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gnyis kyis dngos grub len pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad do/ /dngos grub len pa'i slob ma'i mchog ni/ kun gyi slob dpon zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ kun gyi slob dpon la gnas pas/ /
<p>414b.4</p>zhes pa dkyil 'khor drug gi gtso bor bsgom pa'o/ /slob dpon 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na/ /zhes pa slob ma drug go/ /de'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i slob ma la dkyil 'khor drug gi/ 'jig rten dang thun mong dang / mchog gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba yang dag pa mtha'
<p>414b.5</p>yas mchog tu ci la dga' zhes slob ma la dri bar bya'o/ /slob mas kyang 'dod ces smra bar bya'o/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas gsang ba bzhi'i mtshan ma yang dag par shes nas dngos grub 'di su ji ltar 'dod pa la rab tu 'jug go/ /de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i
<p>414b.6</p>slob ma'i cho ga bshad nas las dang po pa'i cho ga bshad pa ni/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes na/ /yon phul nas ni 'jug par bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ slob mas gsol ba btab nas/ rgyun bshags dgu dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang / byang chub tu
<p>414b.7</p>sems bskyed pa dang / lhar bskyed pa dang / phyi rol bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba'i rjes la slob dpon la yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas zhes pa nas rta mchog gi yon yin no zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcus yon dbul
<p>415a</p>
<p>415a.1</p>ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to/ /de ltar sgo nas zhugs nas lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang / slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags pa dang / ye shes dbab pa dang / phreng ba 'dor ba dang / gdong g.yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil 'khor blta ba ni tshogs kyi
<p>415a.2</p>'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa bzhin byas la/ bsnyen sgrub bzhis slob ma lhar bskyed nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang / /zhes pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i cod pan bzhi'o/ /srog ni ba so dang rus pa la sogs pa las byas pa'o/ /
<p>415a.3</p>rtsa ba ni tsan+dan dang rgya shug la sogs pa las byas pa'o/ /thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan can/ /zhes pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan la thod pa'i phra bkod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /ces pa spyi gtsug tu rnam snang byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can gzhag par bya'o/ /kun du
<p>415a.4</p>sna tshogs bla ma ni/ /zhes pa rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor drug gi slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /kun gyi slob dpon ni dkyil 'khor drug gi'o/ /kun la zhes pa gtso mo bsgom pa la/ rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i rgyal srid ces
<p>415a.5</p>pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'o/ /yang na gang la me tog phog pa bde mchog ma la sogs pa 'khor gyi lhar bsgom pa'i tshe'o/ /rin po che yi ngo mtshar gcig las byas/ /zhes pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa thob pa spongs pa'i rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur
<p>415a.6</p>la/ de'i steng du rdo rje rin po che pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis kyi dbang bskur ba dang / shar phyogs pa la sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs pa la rin po che dang / nub phyogs pa la pad+ma dang / byang phyogs pa la sna tshogs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya ba yin pas na/ de bzhin sna
<p>415a.7</p>tshogs rgyan gyis spras/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo dbang bskur bas/ /slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba bshad nas/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba bshad pa ni/ rin po che'i rdo rje phyed pas
<p>415b</p>
<p>415b.1</p>mtshan pa'o/ /he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ni khro bo'i rdo rje lnga'o/ /lte ba la sangs rgyas lnga bzhugs pa'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi ni pad+ma 'dab ma gnyis kyi dbus su snang ba mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i ni rin po che chu'i'o/ /rta mchog gi ni sangs rgyas rin
<p>415b.2</p>po che pad+ma rdo rje nor bu'i phreng ba lngas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ni/ brdungs pa'i byas pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan to/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'am/ mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub
<p>415b.3</p>len pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gi lha rnams kyi phyag mtshan bzung nas sgrub pa dang gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang phyag rgya chen po 'di ltar bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /zhes pa dngos grub
<p>415b.4</p>len pa'i slob ma dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi lag na 'dug /sna tshogs skal ba bzang gis bcings/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes
<p>415b.5</p>pas lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o/ /de su'i phyag rgya yin zhe na/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo thams cad bde ba'i mchog /ces gsungs so/ /mda' dang gzhu ni bde mchog ma'o/ /skal bzangs de bzhin skal ba
<p>415b.6</p>bzang / /zhes pa pad+ma dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar bde ba ma'i'o/ /thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang / rdo rje rgya gram ni/ snang mdzad ma'i'o/ /pad+ma rgya gram dang / tshe dpag med kyi sku ni slob ma'i'o/ /mda' gzhu dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo bzhi ni sangs rgyas byang chub ma'i'o/ /'khor lo rtsibs
<p>415b.7</p>brgyad pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i'o/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang tri shU la ni khams gsum rnam rgyal ma'i'o/ /dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma ni 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i'o/ /pad+mo dang / rta mgrin dang / mnyam pa'i lcags kyu 'phang mtho ba ni rta gdong ma'i'o/ /phag gi mche ba ni zhags
<p>416a</p>
<p>416a.1</p>pa ma'i'o/ /nyi zlas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog ni lcags sgrog ma'i'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu dang thod pa'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi sku lnga bzhu ba'i bcud kyis len pa ni dril bu ma'i'o/ /gling bu ni shar lho'i'o/ /pi wang ni lho nub bo/ /mu kun da ni nub byang ngo / /mu
<p>416a.2</p>ra dza ni byang shar ro/ /me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi ni phyi'i mtshams bzhir ro/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog ni 'khor gtso bo byas nas/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ba la dgongs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs bshad nas/ rnam snang
<p>416a.3</p>gi phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs ni/ chos gos lhung bzed 'khar gsil glegs bam bzhi ni gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs so/ /kun snying ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la phyogs bzhir dgod ces zer ro/ /lce ni rgyas 'debs ma'i'o/ /cha lang ni dpa' bo ma'i'o/ /
<p>416a.4</p>rdo rje ni kun bzang ma'i'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i gzugs brnyan ni skur ldan ma'i'o/ /me long dang rlung yab ni zhal bzangs ma'i 'o/ /rdo rje ser ba ni sgron sprin ma'i 'od zer ma'i'o/ /mig ni nam mkha'i spyan ma'i'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtul zhugs bshad nas he ru ka'i
<p>416a.5</p>brtul zhugs ni g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba/ g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa bsnams pa ni he ru ka'i'o/ /dmar chen snying chen po yang thod pa'i nang du gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi'o zhes kun snying zer ro/ /mda' ni gau rI/ 'dren pa'i lcags kyu ni tsau rI/ cha lang pra mo hA/ chu be
<p>416a.6</p>tA lI/ lcags kyu ni puk+ka sI/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras sar pa tsaN+Da lI/ me'i snod 'bar ba bsnams pa g+hasma rI/ he ru ka'i phyag mtshan dang 'dra ba ni Dom+bi nI ste/ nges brjod las phyag mtshan mthun pas he ru kar snang ba ma zhes bshad do/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi brtul
<p>416a.7</p>zhugs bshad pa ni/ pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs pa ni b+ha ga can gyi'o/ /pad+ma snying po ni rnam gzigs ma'i'o/ /chos 'byung gru gsum ni sgrol ma'i'o/ /'khor lo ni rgyal mtshan ma'i'o/ /gsal shing ni khro gnyer ma'i'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i brtul zhugs ni/ mda' gzhu ral
<p>416b</p>
<p>416b.1</p>gri 'bar ba me bzhi ni gtso bo'i'o/ /dbu rgyan ni dbang bskur ma'i'o/ /bum pa ni ting 'dzin ma'i'o/ /rgyal mtshan ni rtog ldan ma'i'o/ /me tog gi mchod pa ni mtshang chen ma'i'o/ /rta mchog gi brtul zhugs ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i'o/ /rdo rje rgya gram gcig gnyis kyis rgyal
<p>416b.2</p>srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par yum ral gri'i phyag mtshan yang rdo rje dang pad+ma yin no/ /bzhi pa rtog pa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar rdul tshon gyi 'khor lo dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi cho ga bshad nas/ da
<p>416b.3</p>ni dkyil 'khor bzhi la mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa bshad pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu b+ha ga wAn rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs drug gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
<p>416b.4</p>mchod pa thams cad sprul par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag dang / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi mthe chung gnyis mthe bos mnan nas lus 'gying ba
<p>416b.5</p>dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i mig gis blta zhing gar byas la bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs rnams la phyag bya ba yin no/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten
<p>416b.6</p>pa'i lha drag po ma hA de ba dang / dbang po brgya byin dang / nye dbang khyab 'jug dang / nyi zla dang gshin rje la sogs pa phyogs skyong rnams dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag byas pas zhi ba/ rgyas pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>416b.7</p>pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni/ rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo sbyor/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje thal mo bcings la gar byas te/ snying gar bzhag la dpral ba sa la gtug par bya'o/ /he ru ka'i phyag 'tshal ba'i rdo rje thal mo ni gar byas la/ spyi bor bzung nas/ 
<p>417a</p>
<p>417a.1</p>smin ma g.yo ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'degs shing ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes dgod pa dang bcas pas phyag bya'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni/ thal mo pad+ma kha dbye 'bus bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ thal mo
