<p>417a.2</p>pad+ma kha 'bus pa bzhin byas pa las mthe bo mthe chung bzhi bsnyams nas phyag bya'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag 'tshal ba'i rdo rje thal mo ni/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad sa la bsnyal nas phyag bya'o/ /rta mchog gi phyag bya
<p>417a.3</p>ba'i thal mo ni/ dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thal mo zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dzum pa'i mig gis blta zhing gar byas la phyag bya'o/ /thams cad kyi thun mong gi phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags ni/ oM na mo te hUM/ na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM/ zhes brjod pas bya'o/ /de ltar phyag
<p>417a.4</p>'tshal ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar byas nas mchod pa bya ba bstan pa ni/ gar gyi nyams dgu ji snyed dang / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung bas sku'i nyams/ dgod pa gshe ba rngam pa gsung gi nyams/ 
<p>417a.5</p>snying rje zhi ba ngo mtshar ba thugs kyi nyams so/ /de yang 'gying ba'i nyams dang bcas pas gar bskor nas dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar gtso bo'i gar bshad nas/ 'khor gyi gar gsungs pa ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 
<p>417a.6</p>g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas la gar bya ba ni bde mchog ma dang / ngo mtshar bde ma dang / snang mdzad ma dang / slob ma mo rnams kyi nyams kyi tshul du gar bya'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa'i gar bya ba ni/ snyems 'dzin chen mo bcangs pa'i zhes
<p>417a.7</p>pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ snyems pa dang bcas pas gar byas la thal mo 'gram pa gnyis dang spyi bor bzhag ste/ de yang phab nas gling bu ma nas thal byed ma'i bar gyi lha mo bcu gnyis kyis gar bya ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar ni/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag
<p>417b</p>
<p>417b.1</p>pa yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gar bya'o/ /he ru ka'i gar ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje khu tshur
<p>417b.2</p>gnyis kyis gar byas la rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas bkrol te/ he ru ka'i lha thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya gar gyi tshul du byas pa yin no/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi gar ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ pad+mo'i khu tshur gnyis
<p>417b.3</p>kyis gar byas la pad+ma'i thal mo bskor nas gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi pU dza'i phyag rgyas gar gyis bya ba yin no/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i gar ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rin po che'i khu tshur bcings
<p>417b.4</p>nas gar bya ste/ rin po che'i thal mo bskor la rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis gar gyi mchod pa bya'o/ /rta mchog ni las kyi khu tshur las byung ba'i gar byas la las kyi thal mo bskor bas gar gyi phyag rgyas bya ba yin no/ /
<p>417b.5</p>dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyi gar ni gyen du 'thor ba me tog ma'i'o/ /thur du 'debs pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o/ /bskor ba mar me ma'i'o/ /byug pa dri chab ma'i'o/ /lag pa gang yang rung ba ston pa na me tog la sogs ci 'byor pas lag pa bkang ste/ rang gi lha'i
<p>417b.6</p>dam tshig dang mnyam par gar gyi sgrub pas mchod pa byas na mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings na ni/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis phyag rgya bcings pa'i bar gyi phan yon bstan to/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /zhes
<p>417b.7</p>pa nas/ de yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /ces pa'i bar gyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas mchod pa byas na/ des dngos grub gsum po mi 'grub pa gang yang med do/ /de yang / ji ltar chu la chu gzhag dang / /ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du/ /rang gis rang gi ye shes
<p>418a</p>
<p>418a.1</p>ni/ /legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin/ /zhes bshad do/ /rtog pa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar las dang po pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bshad nas/ da ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pa ye shes cung zad tsam la
<p>418a.2</p>dbang ba/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub 'gro ba rigs drug gi yon tan dang / thun mong gi dngos grub bsam gtan dang / gzugs med kyi yon tan brgyad dang / mchog gi dngos grub bcu gcig pa bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad
<p>418a.3</p>gsungs pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ bsgrub pa'i yan lag thabs nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag gi ston pa po gang / gnas ni gang du/ 'khor ni su dang lhan cig /dus ni nam gyi tshe/ dam pa'i chos ni ci zhig bshad ce na/ 
<p>418a.4</p>rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa nas/ bde ba che zhes pa'i bar gyis ston pa pos bstan to/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa zhes pas gnas bstan to/ /thams cad bdag nyid ces pas 'khor bstan to/ /rtag tu zhugs zhes pas dus bstan to/ /bde ba kun la chags
<p>418a.5</p>pa dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas chos bstan to/ /bde ba kun zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor lha'i sku la zhen pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir ni stong pa nyid kyis btab na bde ba chen po rtogs pa'o/ /de gang yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /ces gsungs
<p>418a.6</p>te/ bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni/ zla ba ltar dkar rtsa dmar sku/ /zhes pa nas dbu rgyan gyi dam pas mdzes zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya chen po cod pan dang bcas pa bstan to/ /gzhan
<p>418a.7</p>gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa/ /zhes pa gzhan gyi nor ma yin pa ni thod pa'o/ /mi 'phrogs pa ni gzhan la nye bar mi mkho bas so/ /thod pa'i snod kyi nang gang gi lha'i chu dag pa dang bcas pa ste zhes pa nas/ de grub pa po'i zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gcig gis chu'i dbang
<p>418b</p>
<p>418b.1</p>bskur ba'i rtags phyogs bzhir thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / spyi gtsug tu sangs rgyas kyis gzhag pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten stong sum bcu gsum pa mi mjed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi/ /
<p>418b.2</p>zhes pa nas/ mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub/ /ces pa'i bar sh+lo ka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa' lha mos bskor ba bshad pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang nyi ma khams gsum pa'i gdul bya rnams rgyas btab pas dbang byas pa dang / rmongs pas
<p>418b.3</p>longs spyod pa dang / thim pas blangs nas slar gsol te/ srog byin nas las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed pa yin no/ /de ltar mdzad pa su zhig yin zhe na/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku lha mos bskor ba'i sprul skus gdul bya la
<p>418b.4</p>rgyas btab nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rkang pa yis/ /phyag rgyas bcings nas dngos grub 'grub pa bshad pa ni/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /zhes gsungs te/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis so/ /rdo rje sems
<p>418b.5</p>dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa nas/ yum bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni/ zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /zhes pa nas/ mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de bye brag tu bde mchog ma'i phyag rgya bya ba ni sgeg pa'o/ /zlog pa ni dpa'
<p>418b.6</p>ba'o/ /'phrog pa ni 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /lhag par mdzad pa ni gar gyi nyams gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag thams cad phrog pa 'grub/ /ces gsungs so/ /sgrub pa po'i 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur
<p>418b.7</p>te mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas/ /rol pa zhes bya'i phyag rgya bzhin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag dang ling+ga 'khyud pa'i ngo mtshar bde ba mo'i phyag rgya bstan to/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /zhes pa nas/ bde mchog rol pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /zhes pa'i
<p>419a</p>
<p>419a.1</p>bar gyis g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ snang mdzad ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub ces pa nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang g.yon pa kham phor bsnams pa slob ma mo'i
<p>419a.2</p>phyag rgya bstan to/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa lha mo de rnams kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / rkang pa'i phyag rgya dang / mig gi phyag rgya dang / ngag gi phyag rgya la sogs pa mtha' yas kyang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdag
<p>419a.3</p>nyid kyis ye shes phab par 'gyur ro/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas rtsa ba zhes gsungs so/ /gtsug lag ji ltar rjes mthun srog /ces pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas byang chub kyi phyag rgya
<p>419a.4</p>gsungs pa yin no/ /rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs so/ /bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas khams gsum rnam rgyal ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so/ /lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas/ /
<p>419a.5</p>zhes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i phyag rgya gsungs so/ /myang ba rngub pa ltar byas pas/ /zhes pa la sogs pas rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs so/ /sna yi myang bas rngub pa yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pas phag gdong ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so/ /mig tshur zhen par lta ba
<p>419a.6</p>yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa lcags sgrog ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so/ /thams cad bdag nyid myang ba'o/ /zhes pa la sogs pas thal byed ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so/ /gling bu ma/ pi wang ma/ cang te'u/ rdza rnga ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni ming gis gsal bar bstan te/ phyag rgya gar
<p>419a.7</p>gyi mchod pa yis/ /zhes pa nas/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ces pa'i bar gyis sh+loka gcig gis me tog mar me dri chab ma rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byas/ /zhes pa la sogs pa nas/ thams cad bdag nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /
<p>419b</p>
<p>419b.1</p>zhes pa'i bar gyis lha mo de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i phan yon bstan to/ /de ltar dngos grub len pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ da ni lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi thun mong gi glu bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes pa nas/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub
<p>419b.2</p>thob/ /ces pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi glu bstan to/ /de nas zhes pa la sogs pa sh+loka gcig gis phrin las 'grub pa'i phan yon bstan to/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen zhes pa nas gzung du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi glu bstan to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
<p>419b.3</p>mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pas/ thun mong gi sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya dang glu bshad nas/ da ni rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs pa ni/ rnal
<p>419b.4</p>'byor de nyid b+ha ga wAn/ /zhes pa nas/ dpal dam tshig shes pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis chos gos lhung bzed gseg shang bsnams pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan to/ /de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /g.yas pa'i yan lag 'dus pa yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pas rnam
<p>419b.5</p>snang gi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bstan to/ /rnam snang gi phyag rgya bstan nas/ sangs rgyas dbyangs ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to/ /dpa' bo ma'i phyag rgya ni/ de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka /zhes pa la sogs
<p>419b.6</p>pas bstan to/ /kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma bud med ces pa la sogs pas bstan to/ /zad med pa yi phyag rgya ni/ /rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang / /zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to/ /skur ldan ma'i phyag rgya ni/ sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /zhes pa la
<p>419b.7</p>sogs pas bstan to/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'i bud med kyi phyag rgya bcings nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to/ /sprin chen ma'i phyag rgya ni/ rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang / /zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to/ /nam mkha' spyan ma'i phyag rgya ni/ dpal grub
<p>420a</p>
<p>420a.1</p>spyan gyi phyag rgya yang / /zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to/ /de nas thun mong du mtshan brgyad gsungs pa ni/ dang po sangs rgyas kun bla ma/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i sh+loka gnyis kyis gsungs so/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu glu
<p>420a.2</p>gsungs pa ni/ phyag rgya zhes pa 'di dag gi /zhes pa la sogs pas tshigs bcad gnyis kyis glu blang ba'i thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pas bstan to/ /de las rdza ni drug ldan no/ /de ba ta zhes pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mo til mchog dang rim pa'i glu'o/ /sems can khams
<p>420a.3</p>mang zhes pa nas di ring 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi lha mo thams cad kyi thun mong gi glu gsungs pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i glu dang / rnam snang gi lha mo'i glus ni bdag mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la lha'i sku bstan nas/ thugs kar
<p>420a.4</p>zhugs par mdzod ces pa'i don yin no/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /zhes pa nas gdon mi za zhes pa'i bar gyis sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa yin no/ /de las bud med bzhi rnams zhes pa ni gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / rta gdong
<p>420a.5</p>ma la sogs pa bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis mchod cing / dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes pa'i don to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad nas/ da ni he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni/ 
<p>420a.6</p>rnal 'byor de nyid b+ha ga wAn/ /zhes pa nas/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de la/ dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyas gnas/ /zhes pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis chu'i dbang
<p>420a.7</p>bskur ba bstan to/ /gos chen po ni mi lpags so/ /dbang bskur chen po ni thod pa'i cod pan lnga'o/ /sha chen dang sbrang rtsi chen po ni/ phyag g.yon na bsnams pa'i sbrang rtsi ste/ sha chen po dang khrag gis gang ba'o/ /ci'i phyir b+ha ga wAn de lta bu bsnams she na/ dur khrod
<p>420b</p>
<p>420b.1</p>brgyad kyi 'byung po rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang mi bskyod pas gtsug gi nor bu byas pa'o/ /kha T+wAM bcas zhes pas phyag mtshan bstan to/ /phyag mtshan des ci zhig byed snyam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya dang / /rdo rje pad+ma nor
<p>420b.2</p>bu sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdul bya rnams dbang du bya ba gsum gyis rgyas btab pa dang / btsun mo la longs spyod pas rmongs par byas pa dang / tshogs 'khor la longs spyod pas zab pa dang / srog thim pas thal bar gyur pa'o/ /de ltar zhal bzhi phyag brgyad bshad nas/ zhal
<p>420b.3</p>gcig phyag gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir/ se ral kha'i tshul dag ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs nas/ mchan khung g.yon par kha T+wAM ga se ral khar bsnams pa/ g.yas par ba dan gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ba'o/ /
<p>420b.4</p>bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /ces pa btsun mo rin po che la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun sprul nas longs spyod pa'o/ /dbang po drag po nye dbang bsad/ /ces pa bdud bzhi dang / phyogs skyong thams cad bsad nas za bar mdzad pa'o/ /dbang po gcig pu dang
<p>420b.5</p>zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa gnyis ka'i thun mong gi gar gsungs pa ni/ g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed cing sems dpa'i phyed krung dang langs pas drag po la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dbang
<p>420b.6</p>du byas shing longs spyad nas gsol bar mdzad pa yin no/ /de nyid kyi sbyor ba yis zhes pa la sogs pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar bshig nas g.yas brkyang byas te/ bskal pa bzang po'i lha mo rnams kyi bud med kun la longs spyod pa yin no/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i
<p>420b.7</p>mthe bo sa la btsugs nas g.yon pa brla'i steng du bzhag nas rab tu brkyang ba ste/ bskyod pa dang btang ba ni byang chub sems bzlog pa ste/ lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bstan to/ /lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis lha dang mi rnams la longs spyod pa yin no/ /de ltar
<p>421a</p>
<p>421a.1</p>he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan to/ /de'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dpal ldan he ru ka dbab pa/ zhes pa/ tshogs 'khor ram gzugs brnyan gyi
<p>421a.2</p>dkyil 'khor la ye shes phab nas/ gdul bya ji ltar mos pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs gnas pa yin no/ /de la 'khor gyi nyams ni/ zhi ba ni gau rI'o/ /drag po ni tsau rI'o/ /rmongs pa ni pra mo hA'o/ /dga' ba ni be tA lI'o/ /gar byed sgyur ba ni puk+ka sI'o/ /babs pa ni tsaN+Da lI'i'o/ /shi
<p>421a.3</p>ba bzhad pa ni g+hasma rI'i'o/ /bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas pa ni Do bi nI'i'o/ /gzhan yang zhi ba'i mig dang ldan pa ni gau rI'i'o/ /drag po'i mig dang ldan pa ni cau rI'i'o/ /rmongs pa'i mig dang ldan pa ni be+e tA lI'i'o/ /gyen du lta ba ni puk+ka sI'i'o/ /chags pa'i lta ba ni pra mo hA'i'o/ /
<p>421a.4</p>gar byed pas lta ba ni tsaN+Da lI'i'o/ /khro bo'i lta ba ni g+hasma rI'i'o/ /byams pa'i lta ba ni dngos grub mchog ster Do bi nI'i'o/ /phyag mtshan bstan pa ni/ me tog ni gau rI'i'o/ /bdug pa ni tsau rI'i'o/ /chang pra mo hA'i'o/ /chu be tA lI'i'o/ /lcug ma puk+ka sI'i'o/ /ra sa tsaN+Da lI'i'o/ /
<p>421a.5</p>me ni g+hasma rI'i'o/ /grub pas 'khyud pa ni DoM bi nI'i'o/ /de rnams kyi sems kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rtse gcig pas bde ba rgyas 'debs pa ni gau rI ste dang po'i'o/ /lag pa gnyis mngon par bstod nas se
<p>421a.6</p>gol brdabs shing dbugs gyen du 'byin pas g.yon du lta zhing lag pa snying 'dren pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /'o byed pas 'khyud cing gar byed pas rmongs pa ni gsum pa'o/ /bsgrub bya za ba'i bsam pas lus 'degs pa ni bzhi pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i nang du bdud rtsi rnams
<p>421a.7</p>'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i gar byed pa ni lnga pa'o/ /de bzhin sa las 'dren pas snying phug nas rang gi phyag rgya tshul du ston pa ni bdun pa gsod byed ma'o/ /klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i zhal du gsol ba ni za ba mo'i'o/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i mes
<p>421b</p>
<p>421b.1</p>bsreg pa ni he ru ka dang DoM bi nI'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i lan gyis dngos grub sgrub pa'i lan bstan pa ni/ de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su slob dpon gyis gau rI'i phyag rgya byed pa'i tshe slob mas DoM bi nI'i phyag
<p>421b.2</p>rgya'o/ /slob dpon gyis tsau rI slob mas g+hasma rI/ slob dpon gyis pra mo hA/ slob mas tsaN+Da lI/ slob dpon gyis be tA lI/ slob mas puk+ka sI'i phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar gar dang gar gyi lan phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid nyon mongs 'joms pa'i bdag nyid phyag rgya'i khyad par bshad par bya'o/ /
<p>421b.3</p>dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong / /zhes pa/ dang po lag pa gnyis pad+mo kha bye ba lta bu'i phyag rgya byas pas rgyas btab pa dang / rmongs pa dang / zos pa dang / thal bar bsgrub pa dang 'tsho bar byed pa'o/ /las lnga phyag rgya'i lan brgyad kyis sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /de ltar las kyi phyag rgya
<p>421b.4</p>bshad nas/ he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bshad pa ni/ de nas phyag rgya shes pa'i zhes pa nas/ khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis dam bca' ba bstan to/ /gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas/ gsal bar mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i dngos grub
<p>421b.5</p>len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis phan yon bstan to/ /he ru ka'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni pad+ma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid b+ha ga wAn/ /
<p>421b.6</p>zhes pa nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya chen po gsungs so/ /g.yas pa g.yon pa sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to/ /'khor gyi lha mo'i phyag rgya ni/ snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ g.yon
<p>421b.7</p>pa snyems pas pad+ma bzung nas g.yas pas kha 'byed pa rnam par gzigs ma'i'o/ /g.yon pa snyems pas pad+ma rnon po bzung nas g.yas pa snying gar 'dren pa sgrol ma'i'o/ /g.yon snyems pas pad+ma bzung nas g.yas pas sa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni sa 'dzin ma'i'o/ /g.yon
<p>422a</p>
<p>422a.1</p>pa snyems pas pad+ma'i thang ka bzung nas g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa gar byed pa khro gnyer ma'i'o/ /g.yon pa snyems pas pad+ma ser po ci bder bzung bas g.yas pa chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas 'dzin pa gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma'i'o/ /g.yon pa
<p>422a.2</p>pad+ma dmar po bzung nas g.yas pas snying gar 'dren pa sna tshogs pad+ma'i'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'am pad+ma dmar skya 'dzin pa pad+ma nas za ma'i'o/ /pad+ma dkar sngo g.yon pas bzung nas g.yas pas snying gar 'byed pa rdo rje dbang phyug ma'i'o/ /de ltar las kyi phyag rgya bshad nas/ 
<p>422a.3</p>sku'i phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni/ rnam dag gzigs ma zhes pa nas/ lha mo chen mo rnams so zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub len pa'i glu bshad par dam bca' ba ni/ de nas phyag rgya zhes pa sh+loka gcig gis gsungs so/ /de bzhin
<p>422a.4</p>gshegs pa kun gyis so/ /zhes pa nas/ gar mdzod cig ces pa'i bar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yin/ /zhes pa sh+loka gcig gis phan yon yin no/ /de ltar pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya dang glu bshad nas/ 
<p>422a.5</p>da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs pa ni/ mnyam sbyor de nyid b+ha ga wAn/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /zhes pa/ rdo rje nyi ma cung zhig khro bo'i nyams dang bcas pa/ khro bo'i
<p>422a.6</p>gzugs dang / khro bo'i spyod lam dang / khro bo'i tshul dang gzi brjid chen po ston pa lha'i nyi ma'i gzugs can no/ /lhag ma ni go sla'o/ /rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings nas/ /zhes pa sh+lo ka gcig gis rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to/ /gtso bo bstan nas 'khor gyi ni dbang
<p>422a.7</p>bskur ba dang / gter dag dang zhes pa la sogs te/ dbang bskur ma/ gter ldan ma/ rgyal mtshan mchog ma/ mchog ldan ma'o/ /mchod tshe zhes bya bas mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa gcig dang / gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi
<p>422b</p>
<p>422b.1</p>dang / bcu gnyis mchod pa che zhes bya'o/ /ji lta'i tshul du ston pa dag /ces bya bas rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi gsungs so/ /phyag rgya bshad nas glu bshad pa ni/ de nas phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa la sh+lo ka gcig ni dam bca' ba'o/ /khams gsum kun gyi
<p>422b.2</p>rgyal srid ces pa nas thams cad 'gro zhes pa'i bar gyis dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs so/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis phan yon gsungs pa yin no/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs pa ni/ rnal
<p>422b.3</p>'byor de nyid ces pa/ rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis sku phyag rgya chen po bstan to/ /de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /rkang pa bzhis brkyang bskum gnyis su gnas pa ni/ khro
<p>422b.4</p>bo'i skyil krung ngo / /de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni sla ba la dgongs nas ma gsungs so/ /de ltar phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub kyi glu gsungs pa ni/ de nas phyag rgya ni zhes pa 'di sh+loka gcig gis dam bca' ba gsungs so/ /myos byed stong pa zhes pa tshig rkang gcig
<p>422b.5</p>gis dbang gi sku bstan to/ /stod ni gshin rje stong pas zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis mngon spyod kyi sku bstan to/ /tshangs pa stong las zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis zhi ba'i sku bstan to/ /dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis rgyas pa'i sku bstan to/ /de bstan nas
<p>422b.6</p>ci mdzad ce na/ phrin las bzhi mdzad pa yin te/ thams cad rnam par dag par mos pa'i gdul bya bzhi la/ ngo mthon stobs kyis mnan nas yi ge hi bzhis mngon sum gyi lam bstan to/ /de yang su yin zhe na dbang phyug thams cad shig zhig pas lha bzhi pa brgyal du
<p>422b.7</p>bcug pa yin no/ /de yang hu lu hu lu'i sgras dbang phyug chen po mnan nas gsum grub ma phrogs pa yin no/ /ma ta ma ta'i sgras mthu bo che/ mnan nas dpal mo phrogs so/ /sma na ta'i sgras tshangs pa mnan nas dbang mo phrogs pa dang 'dod lha mnan nas dga' ba mo phrogs so/ /
<p>423a</p>
<p>423a.1</p>rta mchog gi phrin las bzhi bstan pa nas/ lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas a la la ho zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyang khro zhing gtum pa'i stobs kyis bdag po rnams mnan nas lha mo rnams dang sbyor
<p>423a.2</p>ba'i tshe a la la ho zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas bdag po bzhi brgyal du gzhug pa'i sngags ni oM suM b+ha ni zhes pa nas hUM phaT ces pa'i bar gyis gsungs so/ /de ltar mngon spyod kyis sgrol ba dang / 'dod chags kyi sbyor bas ji ltar sangs rgyas
<p>423a.3</p>par 'gyur zhe na/ mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya ba/ /de dag yongs su rtog pa med kyang sla/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes skyes pa na/ sgyu ma lta bur nges pas mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba su zhig kyang med do/ /
<p>423a.4</p>de bzhin du rgol ba rnams sgyu ma lta bur shes nas dgra bo bya ba su yang med do/ /glu 'di blangs pa'i zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis phan yon bstan to/ /de ltar phyag rgya chen po bstan nas/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ mdzub mo mthe bo mnan nas zhes pa la sogs pa
<p>423a.5</p>gsungs te/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar la/ mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i tshigs kyi rtse mo mnan la gung mo'i rtse mo ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo
<p>423a.6</p>mnyam sbyar la/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ mthe bo'i rtse mor sbyar la thal mo'i mthe bong steng du bya'o/ /he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas/ mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug la
<p>423a.7</p>mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan te/ ngal bso bo mnan nas/ dpal mo zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin ma phrogs nas 'ongs te/ dga' ba bzhi bskyed pas bya'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas gung mo brkyang la mthe bo mthe chung gnyis pad+ma bzhi pa'i tshul du
<p>423b</p>
<p>423b.1</p>ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar la/[ (]mdzum [,]mdzub [)]mo gnyis bkug nas/ mthe bos bkab pa ni dpal gyi nor bu zhes bya'o/ /rta mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar la/ mthe chung dang srin lag gzhibs nas brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug
<p>423b.2</p>pa ni phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bsgom pa ni/ lus ngag sems ni rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag sems rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhar bsgoms la/ 
<p>423b.3</p>mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bzung nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i tshul gyis thams cad gsung gi lha'i sbyor bas bskyed la bdag nyid lhar bsgom par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor drug gi lha so so rang rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir dam tshig ces bya zhe na/ sku gsung thugs la stong pa
<p>423b.4</p>nyid kyis rgyas btab nas/ sgyu ma dang stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po zhes bya'o/ /da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig chen po bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ lha'i gzugs dang cha byad dang
<p>423b.5</p>ldan par bsgom pa'o/ /bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag /ces pa lhan cig skyes dga'i bde ba nyid kyis 'dod yon kun gyi bde ba'i bdag nyid du 'dod yon lnga la 'jug par bya'o/ /de ji ltar dam tshig chen po yin zhe na/ chags pa med cing ma chags med/ /dbu ma yang
<p>423b.6</p>ni dmigs su med/ /ces pa yul dang yul can gyi stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba'o/ /yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /ces pa sems kyi stong nyid bsgoms pa dbang bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur
<p>423b.7</p>bas/ rnam snang gi sku 'od gsal lta bu bsgoms pas/ rnam snang gi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /ces pa la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no/ /he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgoms nas sngags
<p>424a</p>
<p>424a.1</p>skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes bud med rin po che la sogs pa la longs spyod pa 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /he ru ka yi sbyor ba'o/ /ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /zhes pa la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin
<p>424a.2</p>gyi pad+ma gar dbang gi sbyor ba'o/ /shin tu gdug cing drag po la/ /zhes pa la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi snang ba ste rdo rje glu ma'i sbyor ba'o/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yi/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog gi gzugs su
<p>424a.3</p>bsgom pa ste/ rta mchog gi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de ltar dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad las phyag rgya chen po dam tshig rdul tshon bsgom pa'i dam tshig chen po'o/ /tshogs 'khor gyi lha bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes gsungs
<p>424a.4</p>pa yin no// //da ni thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ni/ sbyor ba ji snyed yod pa kun/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsnyen sgrub bzhis ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms nas phrin las bzhi'i dbye ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas
<p>424a.5</p>rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gi /zhi ba dkar/ rgyas pa ser/ dbang dmar/ mngon spyod nag po'i gdong rgyan dang bcas pa bgos gar mkhan gyi stong pa bzhin du/ lha rnams bsgom pa'i tshe cha byad spong zhing sgom pa na/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
<p>424a.6</p>pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor drug gi shin tu sbyor ba'i phrin las kyi dngos grub bstan te/ bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa dang zlog pa tshar chod pa'o/ /khyad par du 'phrog pa ni dbang phyug la
<p>424a.7</p>sogs mnan nas lha mo rnams 'phrog pa'o/ /yan lag kun du byed pa yis/ /zhes pa lus ngag yid gsum dbang du byed pa'i yan lag gi nor yang 'phrog pa'o/ /longs spyod pa ni 'o byed pa dang 'khyud pa la sogs pas khams gsum pa la rgyas 'debs pa'o/ /
<p>424b</p>
<p>424b.1</p>thim pa ni ye shes thim pas thar pa dang / srog thim pas gsod pa dang / shi ba las de ma thag slong bar byed pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi phyag rgya bshad pa'o/ /bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mdzes pa dang / bud med kun gyi sgyu ma che/ /
<p>424b.2</p>zhes pa la sogs pas/ bde mchog ma la sogs pa lha mo nyi shu'i sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum/ /zhes pa la
<p>424b.3</p>sogs pa'o/ /he ru ka'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni dgu /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni/ sgeg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs
<p>424b.4</p>pa'i kha/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /rta mchog gi ni/ 'dod chags mos pas g.yem spyo ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /bzhin gyi phyag rgya bshad nas/ 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ni/ lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog /ces pa la sogs pa'o/ /bde mchog
<p>424b.5</p>ma'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /ngo mtshar bde ba ni/ sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /ces pa la sogs pa'o/ /snang mdzad ma'i ni/ sha chen ro ni myong ba yi/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /slob ma mo'i ni/ 
<p>424b.6</p>bde ba kun kyi ro myong zhing / /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i ni/ 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/ /ces pa la sogs pa sh+lo ka phyed dang gnyis kyis thun mong du gsungs so/ /lta ba'i
<p>424b.7</p>phyag rgya'i ye shes ni/ bde ba stong pas rab 'byor ba/ /zhes pa nas 'tsho ba byed ces pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa' lta ba bstan to/ /bud med mkhas pa zhes sh+lo ka gcig bde mchog ma la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la
<p>425a</p>
<p>425a.1</p>sogs pa sh+lo ka gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer zhes pa sh+lo ka gcig gis he ru ka'i lta ba bshad do/ /khro zhing 'gyur zhes pa sh+lo ka gcig gis rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog thun mong gi lta ba bshad do/ /
<p>425a.2</p>brdeg pa la sogs pa zhes pa lta bu sh+lo ka gcig gis pad+ma gar dbang gi bstan to/ /de ltar na thams cad sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dang / bzhin gyi 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya ste rnam pa brgyad do/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ ma sku thams cad bu dre bya/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje sems
<p>425a.3</p>dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /ru ru s+phu ru zhes pa la sogs pa rnam snang gi'o/ /su ba ga ste zhes pa la sogs pa dpal chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /oM tA re zhes pa la sogs pa sgrol ma'i sngags pad+ma gar dbang gi'o/ /traM ba ba ta zhes pa
<p>425a.4</p>la sogs pa mA ma kI'i sngags ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /shrI badzra pad+ma b+ha ba ta mu kha zhes pa la sogs pa rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /glu'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni/ skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman du/ /zhes pa la sogs
<p>425a.5</p>hUM hUM zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgras yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad du 'don pa'i ka ka la zhes pa dbyangs snyan pa dang / shardza ba zhes pa la sogs pas rdza rnga la sogs pa brdung zhes blang ngo / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni/ /zhes pa/ tshangs pa'i
<p>425a.6</p>dbyangs oM yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'don/ /glu blangs shing rnga rings la sogs pa brdung bar bya'o/ /rnam snang gi'o/ /rdo rje drag mo gad mo che/ /zhes pa la sogs pa ru lu ru lu'i sgra hi dang / hUM gcig dang bcas pas glu len cing rnga bo che brdung ba he ru ka'i'o/ /te na te zhes pa
<p>425a.7</p>la sogs pa glu'i phyag rgya dang / rnga dra ba can brdung ba pad+ma gar dbang gi'o/ /hi zhes bya ba yi ge bcu drug gi tshad du 'don to/ /rnga zlum brdung ba'i glu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nyi ma'i'o/ /haM zhes pa rta mchog gi bslang ngo / /ka ka zhes pas 'gre 'gyur sum brtsegs yod pa dang / ka
<p>425b</p>
<p>425b.1</p>gnyis zhes pa 'gre 'gyur mi mthun pa yod pa dang / rab gdangs snyan pa zhes pa glu'i mtha' gsal bar 'don pa dang / ka hi la zhes pa zangs dung bzhin rgya glu len pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi glu'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni/ sil snyan gyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ gling bu dang ni
<p>425b.2</p>rgyud gcig ni/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ gling bu ni bu ga bcu'am khams lnga dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyud gcig ni 'dzeng ngo / /rgyud mangs ni dgu po rgyud mangs so/ /rgyud stug po ni rgyud nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /sil snyan ni pi wang rdza rnga ste/ dkyil 'khor drug gi lha'i
<p>425b.3</p>cha byad bzung nas lha'i zlos gar bzhin du sil snyan brdung zhing glu blangs na dngos grub zla ba bzhis 'grub pa'am zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snying po ni rigs bzhi'i gtso bo'i sngags so/ /phyag rgya ni lha mo rnams kyi sngags so/ /sngags ni bzlas pa'i
<p>425b.4</p>sngags so/ /rig pa ni mchod pa'i sngags so/ /bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ rkang pa'i gar/ lag pa'i gar/ mig gi blta ba dang bcas pa'o/ /rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs ni/ dgod dang bltas dang / lag bcangs dang / 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i thabs so/ /
<p>425b.5</p>de ltar thun mong gi sil snyan gyi phyag rgya bshad nas/ khyad par gsungs pa ni/ dzaHhUM baM hoHruT ces pa la sogs pa nas/ rgyun gyi nga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnga brdung ba'i glu'i'o/ /aM aM zhes pa nas dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o zhes
<p>425b.6</p>pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi glu'o/ /de 'ong zhes pa nas he ru ka'i rnga'i phyag rgya'i zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma tri zhes pa nas/ thal mo brdeb pa'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi'o/ /traM traM zhes pa nas rgyal po'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje
<p>425b.7</p>nyi ma'o/ /ta ki hUM zhes pa nas myur ba'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi zhi ba'i 'gros dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'gros bstan to/ /sil snyan gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni thun mong du gsungs so/ /kun snying ltar yi ge re re dang lha re re sbyor
<p>426a</p>
<p>426a.1</p>ba'i bshad pa ni/ rgyud yod pa yong ma yin la/ ming mtshan gyi dang po dang tha ma bzung ba lta bu phan tshun mi 'gal ba'i lung gi 'thad pa yang med do/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhal snga nas glu 'di rnams kyis sil snyan brdungs la/ sgra yi rdo rje nyams las gnas med dang / /
<p>426a.2</p>lhag mthong sgra yi de nyid shes pa yin/ /sil snyan sgra dang gzugs rnams la/ /gang gis stong nyid de shes pas/ /de yi mdzad pa 'dus pa yis/ /bde ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar sil snyan gyi phyag rgya ye shes bstan nas/ ye shes bsdu
<p>426a.3</p>ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor bas/ /zhes pa nas/ thal mo dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /bsdu ba byas pa'i rjes la glu dang sil snyan gar byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyams
<p>426a.4</p>dgu byas te/ dkyil 'khor re re la yang gar gyi nyams dgus mchod par bya ste zhes bstan pa yin te/ sgeg pa rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /snying rje he ru ka'o/ /dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug go/ /khro ba rdo rje'i nyi ma'o/ /'jigs pa rta
<p>426a.5</p>mchog go/ /mi sdug pa ni mi gtsang ba'i rdzas bsgoms pa ste shAkya thub po/ /ngo mtshar gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste/ rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang drug go/ /sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhes pa
<p>426a.6</p>'khor lo drug gi lha'i gar byas pas 'khor lo bzhi'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sgeg ces pa la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa ste/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg pa la/ /dpa' la dpa' bo'i de bzhin gshegs/ /zhes pa nas/ mchog tu gyur
<p>426a.7</p>pa'ang rab tu stsol/ /swA hA zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje glu blangs pa bstan pa yin no/ /de'i phan yon gsungs pa ni/ thams cad bdag nyid ces pa nas/ /dam pa ster bar 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis phyag rgya'i
<p>426b</p>
<p>426b.1</p>sbyor ba 'di dag gis zhes pa nas/ mchod pa rab tu sbyar zhes pa'i bar gyis gsungs so/ /rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de nas
<p>426b.2</p>lan du slar yang ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/ /zhes pas he ru ka'i'o/ /de nas lan yang tshul bzhin du/ /pad+ma gar byung mchog tu sgyur/ /zhes pas pad+ma gar dbang gi'o/ /de nas slar yang lan du ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu sgyur/ /zhes pas rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /
<p>426b.3</p>de nas slar yang sgyur bas zhes pa rta mchog gi'i'o/ /de nas slar yang nas/ bdag nyid byung bar rab tu 'grub/ /ces pas thun mong gi dngos grub bstan to/ /de ltar sil snyan med kyang gar gyi nyams dgu mchod par bsnan pa ni/ de nas phyag rgya zhes pa yis/ /sdom pa thams
<p>426b.4</p>cad rab ston pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /zhes pa dang bcas pas bstan to/ /glu gang zhe na/ la lar dri med ces bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam snang gi glu bshad do/ /la lar rab tu 'jigs zhes pas he ru ka'i glu bstan to/ /la
<p>426b.5</p>lar mdangs bzangs zhes pas pad+ma gar dbang gi bstan to/ /la lar 'gro ba thams cad ches pas rdo rje nyi ma bstan to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa'i phyir/ /zhes pas rta mchog gi bstan to/ /rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzod/ /ces pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor
<p>426b.6</p>drug gi 'khor bstan to/ /'di dag glu ni blangs pa yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pas phan yon bstan to/ /de ltar rab tu gar byas te/ /zhes pa la sogs pas/ gar ma shes na pham pa dang ltung bar 'gyur ba yin pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i zas dang / g.yog dang bcas
<p>426b.7</p>pa dbul bar bya'o/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis/ /zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i rigs bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang po dang rnal 'byor ma bkod la mchod pa'am/ yang na dri'i thig le'am/ me tog gi tshom bu dang / yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya chen po
<p>427a</p>
<p>427a.1</p>bkod la las dang po pas mchod pa byas nas/ sdig pa kun las thar ba dang / bsod nams thams cad 'phel lo zhes nges brjod las kyang gsungs so/ /chos kyi phyag rgya dang / glu'i phyag rgya dang / sil snyan gyi dang / gar gyi phyag rgya zhes pa ste bcu
<p>427a.2</p>gnyis so/ /phyag rgya bshad pa ni rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas/ a la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro zhes pa nas gdon mi za ba zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi glu'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus
<p>427a.3</p>pas na/ /zhes pa nas/ rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'o/ /la lar rab tu dran zhes pa nas/ grub pa ston zhes pa'i bar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi glu'o/ /thams cad dbang bskur zhes pa nas/ grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar
<p>427a.4</p>gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i glu'o/ /la lar mkhas pa'i zhes pa sh+loka gcig gis rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi glu'o/ /glu'i mchod pa'i ye shes bstan nas/ me tog la sogs pa'i ye shes bstan pa ni/ me tog dkar dang dmar ba la/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 
<p>427a.5</p>rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi me tog bdug pa mar me dri chab dri dang ldan pa'i zhal zas kyi gong bu bstan pa yin no/ /me tog dmar po zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya bstan nas/ tshogs 'khor gyi dus su gtor ma la sogs pa'i rdzas bstan pa ni/ 
<p>427a.6</p>sgeg mo dang ni chu dang zhes pa la sogs pas ston te/ phyis byung ba'i rdo rje'i ye shes dang sbyar nas sgeg mo dang ni chu la sogs pa ston te go sla'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bshos 'bul ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa nas/ rta dbul ba zhes pa'i bar
<p>427a.7</p>gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i 'khor lo lnga'i mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar gtor ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan nas/ dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya ston pa ni/ mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ mthe bong bsnol
<p>427b</p>
<p>427b.1</p>nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug /gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs mnyam par sbyar la/ lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas/ spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar gtugs nas/ rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur
<p>427b.2</p>ba dang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya ni/ sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo dang mthe bo rtse mor sbyar nas/ thod pa skam po'i kha dang mig gi
<p>427b.3</p>phug lta bur gzhag pa ni he ru ka pad+ma gar dbang / rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog gi bdag po'i rigs bsdus pa'i gtso bo'i dbang bskur yin no/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya bstan to/ /lag pa shin
<p>427b.4</p>tu brkyang ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pas he ru ka'i dbang bskur ba bstan to/ /mthe bong dpa' bo skyil mo krung / /zhes bya ba la sogs pas pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya bstan to/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ba'i
<p>427b.5</p>phyag rgya bstan to/ /sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pas rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bstan nas/ da ni rdo rje thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni/ sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje
<p>427b.6</p>thams cad yin par bshad/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa thun mong gi phyag rgya dam tshig 'byung ba'i rgyu bshad do/ /thun mong gi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ de las gung mo lcags kyu zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni/ /zhes pa la sogs
<p>427b.7</p>pa gsungs so/ /he ru ka ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje dbab pa dang / rdo rje'i snying po'i phyag rgya gnyis he ru ka'i phyag rgya yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa la sogs pa la gnas te zhes pa la sogs pas pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya bstan to/ /
<p>428a</p>
<p>428a.1</p>rdo rje'i phyag rgya pad+mor byas pa las/ /zhes pas rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya bstan to/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bcings nas zhes pa la sogs pas rta mchog gi phyag rgya bstan to/ /rdo rje thams cad kyi phyag rgya de shes pas ci zhig byed ce na/ sgrub par 'dod pa dang / 
<p>428a.2</p>dngos grub len pa'i gang zag gis rdo rje thal mo bsdams pa dang / gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa dang / mthe bo mthe chung brkyang bas ye shes 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su sgyur bas lha'i skur bsgom pa dang / gung mo lcags kyu byas pas ye shes sems dpa'
<p>428a.3</p>spyan drang ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dang bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lnga la ye shes dbab pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas lhar bsgom par blta bar bya'o/ /de yang dang po'i rdo rje sems
<p>428a.4</p>dpa' dang dbus ma'i he ru ka dang / ye shes dbab pa ye shes sems dpa' zhes gsungs so/ /bstod pa dang bcas pa'i yum gyi phyag rgya ni/ A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /kha yi thad kar 'dud par bya/ /zhes pa dbyangs yig bcu drug dang / gsal byed sum
<p>428a.5</p>cu rtsa bzhi las/ dkyil 'khor drug lha gang rung bsgoms pa la snying gar nyi zla nyis brtsegs bsam pa ni/ A li kA li mnyam sbyar nas/ /zhes bya'o/ /de la gzugs kyi rnam rtog yig 'bru dang / sgra'i rnam rtog gnyis las sgra'i rnam rtog gi dbang du byas nas/ A
<p>428a.6</p>li kA li ni 'byung rngub po/ /mnyam par gnas pa ni lte ba'i dbus kyi gnas pa'i rlung ngo / /kha yi thad kar 'dud par bya/ /zhes pa la/ lte ba snying ga lkog ma byed pa gsum gyis 'grib pa'i gling bur brdabs nas sgra'i gnas brgyad kyi byed pas phye ste/ de'i 'og tu bzhi pas
<p>428a.7</p>gzung du rung ba'i sgra'i ri mo rnams dpag bsam gyi shing gi sdong po ltar rtsa bar dgod par bya ba yin la dbyangs yig bcu drug gi gu gu lcug ma ltar byas la gsal byed kyi steng du yi ger bzhag pas mgo brtsegs mar gyur pa lcug ma las myu gu skyes pa bzhin no/ /de las me
<p>428b</p>
<p>428b.1</p>tog byung ba ltar lha'i phyed chag gi zla ba tshes pa dang / 'bras bu smin pa ltar rjes 'jug gi dbyangs kyi thig le dang / lo 'dab 'brul ba bzhin tsheg drag gnyis kyis mtshams bcad pa yin no/ /gzugs kyi rnam rtog dbyangs dang gsal byed mnyam par byas nas thams cad
<p>428b.2</p>thig gi ri mo las mi 'da' bar tshar du dkris pa ni kha'i thad kar zhes bya'o/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed thams cad snga ma la lta bas na 'dud pa bya zhes bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ri mo rnams zhes pas dbyangs gsal byed/ mtheb mdzub thabs shes rab kyi sbu gus bzung nas
<p>428b.3</p>mig gi ltar rung bar dgod do/ /gug skyed dag gis lcug mar bya/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gzugs kyi rnam rtog dang mtshungs te go sla'o/ /de yang rgyud 'bum pa las yi ge'i dbyibs gsungs pa ni/ a ni khyim bya'i mgo yi gzugs/ /i ni glang chen sna lta bu/ /I
<p>428b.4</p>ni dbang phyug chen po 'dra/ u ni rnga mo'i mgo ji bzhin/ /U ni sha ba'i kha 'dra ba/ /r-i ni ri bong mgo bo 'dra/ /yi ge r-I ni seng ge bzhin/ /yi ge l-i ni glang chen kha/ /l-I ni dbang ldan zhal dang mtshungs/ /e ni ma he'i kha 'dra ba/ /ai ni rma bya'i kha dang mtshungs/ /o ni byi la'i kha bzhin
<p>428b.5</p>no/ /au ni khyi yi kha bzhin no/ /aM ni chu srin mgo bo 'dra/ /tsheg drag aHni stag mgo bzhin/ /e zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du rus sbal dang / bung ba dang / bse dang / kang ka dag tsag sha//gdugs/ rnga/ rnga chen dang / rked nyeg /thi ba/ phu shud/ mkha' 'gro/ sbyin bdag
<p>428b.6</p>srang / pha bang mche ba can/ gzhu ma ste/ ri skegs/ khrung khrung / 'dam bya/ sgeg ga /spre'u/ phug ron/ ngur pa/ khu byug /bya rog /ri bong / zhi ba'i bya/ spyang ki /'phrog ma/ srin po'i mkha' 'gro ba dang 'dra bar gsungs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /zhes
<p>428b.7</p>pa la sogs pas gzugs kyi rnam rtog dang / sgra'i rnam rtog gsungs so/ /yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog /ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge badzra swA hA zhes pa'i mtshan bris pas yongs su grub pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo mi 'gyur ba'i mchog mtshon pas na
<p>429a</p>
<p>429a.1</p>sngags kyi yi ge a na ha ste/ mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /de ji ltar mtshon zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' brdar gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i phyi ma las/ yi ge lnga'i rang bzhin lus 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid ces gsungs so/ /
<p>429a.2</p>de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chags chen 'gro ba'i dpal zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan snying ga'i nyi zla'i steng du phyag mtshan gyi dbus su mtshan bris pas bstod na dngos grub thob bo/ /de bzhin du he ru ka'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du khro bo'i rdo rje la/ snying rje dri med
<p>429a.3</p>khro bo'i dpal/ /zhes pa'i mtshan bris nas bstod do/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi thugs kar nyi zla'i steng du/ pad+ma chags pa'i dpal dag pa/ /zhes pa'i mtshan bris la bstod do/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i thugs kar nyi zla'i steng rin po che'i dbus su/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal gdangs pa/ /zhes pa
<p>429a.4</p>bkod la bstod do/ /rta mchog gi thugs kar nyi zla'i steng gi sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su/ rta mchog pha rol gnon po'i dpal/ /zhes pa bris la bstod do/ /dngos grub myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /da ni lha gzhan dag la bsgre ba bstan pa ni/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang dag gi/ /
<p>429a.5</p>zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bde mchog ma dang / rnam snang gi sangs rgyas dbyangs dang / he ru ka'i gau rI ma dang / pad+ma gar dbang gi rnam gzigs ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ma dang / rta mchog gi zhi ba'i rta mgrin la sogs pa
<p>429a.6</p>dkyil 'khor bzhi'i slob dpon gyis lha gang dang gang la me tog phog pa de dang de'i mtshan bris nas bstod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i tshe/ slob ma 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i tha mar ming gi dbang bskur ro/ /ming de brtan par 'gyur
<p>429a.7</p>ram zhe na/ phyag rgya'i sbyor ba de dag gis/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /me tog phog pa'i pra se nas lha'i rigs su shes shing ming btags pa bzhin du dbyangs dang / gsal byed
<p>429b</p>
<p>429b.1</p>kyi yi ge sde tshan bzhi dang / sha Sha sa ha spangs pa'i sde tshan bzhi gsal byed dang / dbyangs dang po dang / tha mar mnyam pa'i sde tshan bzhi ru bris la ka gnas pa'i bar gyi sde tshan bzhi la yi ge ma tshang ba'i yi ge lnga lnga las sha Sha sa ha bzhi dang / r-i dang l-i ma ning gi yi ge rnams gnyis su
<p>429b.2</p>brtsis pas kha bskangs nas brgyad tshan bzhi ru byas la/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bkod pa la reg pa'am/ me tog 'dor bas de'i rigs su shes pa'am/ de'i ming gdags so/ /gal te kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam gyi mtshan dang
<p>429b.3</p>lus ngag yan lag gi brda shes pas kyang sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma shes pas tshogs 'khor gyi lhar bya ba dang / rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur ro/ /de skad du yang
<p>429b.4</p>chos spyod bcu pa'i mdo las/ du ba las ni mer shes shing / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /brda'i phyag rgya ji ltar shes par 'gyur snyam nas/ spyi bor byug pa gang yin pa/ /zhes pa la sogs pas tshogs 'khor byed pa'i tshe'am/ rdul tshon la mtshan
<p>429b.5</p>ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa yan lag dang nying lag la lus kyi brdar gyur pa yin no/ /tha mal pas mi brjod cing tha mal pa'i lus kyi brda yang mi bya bas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tha snyad du byed pa
<p>429b.6</p>yin no/ /brda'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ /zag med kyi tshig gi brda'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ a bi pu la sogs pa gang gi brdar gsungs so/ /a bi pu ta pra ti pu ta ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag 'tshal ba yi ni/ zag med kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i brda dang tha snyad byas pa ni/ 
<p>429b.7</p>rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /e ma ho bde ba thog mtha' med pa dang bzhi ni rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma yin no/ /bde mchog ma la rgyas 'debs ma dang mtshan gnyis so/ /e ma ho bde ba la rmongs byed ma dang mtshan gnyis so/ /snang mdzad ma la zab mo dang
<p>430a</p>
<p>430a.1</p>mtshan gnyis so/ /slob ma mo la tshe 'phel ma dang mtshan gnyis so/ /lhag ma lha mo bcu bzhi la mtshan re re'o/ /smin ma bskyod pas mda' bzhi 'dzin pa'i bde mchog ma mtshon te/ b+ha ga ling+ga bstan pas e ma'o bde ba mtshon/ thod pa kha T+wAM gas rnam
<p>430a.2</p>snang mtshon/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya thod pa gnyis sa la nas gang bas slob ma mo mtshon to/ /'khor los bstan pas dkyil 'khor mtshon to/ /sdong rgyan gon pa de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad do/ /lha thams cad kyi cha byad gyon nas skye bo dam pa rnams 'dus pa ni tshogs
<p>430a.3</p>kyi 'khor lo yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda de dag ni/ mdza' ba 'dus pa'i dus su bya ba yin par gsungs so/ /ci'i phyir dkyil 'khor yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad/ /ces pas
<p>430a.4</p>lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /lha mo thams cad skal ba bzang / /zhes pas b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /zhes pa nas/ kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad/ /ces pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bstan
<p>430a.5</p>to/ /de yang nges brjod las/ dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya bar bshad/ /ces pa la sogs pas gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor gsum la dbang ba'i slob dpon ji lta bu zhe na/ kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas zhes pa la sogs pa sh+loka gcig gis mtshan nyid gsungs so/ /
<p>430a.6</p>de'i slob ma sgrub pa'i grogs po ji lta bu zhe na/ de yi slob ma grub na ni/ /zhes pa la sogs pa sh+loka gcig gis las kyi slob dpon rgyal tshab yin par bshad do/ /slob ma lhag ma rnams ji lta bu zhe na/ de las gzhan pa'i slob ma kun/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis
<p>430a.7</p>'jig rten thun mong mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tha ma dang 'bring dang rab byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin po che/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du
<p>430b</p>
<p>430b.1</p>mtshon to/ /thod pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi cod pan gyis tshogs 'khor gyi slob dpon du mtshon to/ /snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin du grub pa gcig /pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhis dbang bskur bas pad+ma'i rigs so/ /rin po che myu gu'i cod pan gyis nor bu rigs kyi slob dpon du
<p>430b.2</p>mtshon to/ /rta mchog rigs la snying po lnga brjod nas/ nor gyi mchog phreng ba lngas bcings pas rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon du mtshon to/ /ga pur tsan+dan dmar po dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyi bdud rtsi lnga brda yin no/ /shes rab ye
<p>430b.3</p>shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ dang po mna' bsgags la dam tshig bsgrags la dbang bskur ba ni go rims yin pas/ dang po bag zan las go ku da ha na'i gzugs byas/ de'i nang khrag gis bkang nas/ phyi rol tsan+dan dmar pos byugs te/ mar la btsos pa'i rgyal po'i zan/ 
<p>430b.4</p>zhes bshad pas/ de dang mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma btang la slob ma'i lce la sha lnga'am sha lnga med na/ de'i khrag gi thig le byin la mna' bsgag go/ /de'i phyir rgyud thams cad las phyugs gsod pa'i sbyor ba zhes bag zan gyi gzugs la zer ro/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang
<p>430b.5</p>bskur ba'i lha mo la ming ji skad gdags she na/ bde mchog ma dang e ma bde ma la sogs pa'i ming bzhi gdags so/ /lha mo de rnams sngags skyes zhing skyes yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i ye shes phob la sangs rgyas kyi brda btags nas phyag rgyar byin gyis
<p>430b.6</p>brlabs te/ dga' bzhi sbyor ba thams cad rtog bral sangs rgyas kyi zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ye shes yin par bshad do/ /reg bya rdo rje ma de rtogs na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur bas phyis ye shes las skyes pa'i lha mo de nye bar longs spyod
<p>430b.7</p>pas khams gsum ma lus pa'i stong pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i brdas las kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs gdong rgyan gyon nas ri mo bris pas mtshon no/ /sgras ni glu'o/ /dris ni de'i dri'o/ /ros ni de'i lce dang mchu 'jib pa'o/ /reg
<p>431a</p>
<p>431a.1</p>pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba'o/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la phyag rgya gang gi brdas gdags she na/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi mu dra yin par bshad/ /ces gsungs pas chos kyi phyag rgya la bya'o/ /
<p>431a.2</p>gal te rtog med du ma song nas dga' bral du song na ji ltar bya snyam na/ sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis mchod par bya bar bstan to/ /de yang bde mchog las/ yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya/ /
<p>431a.3</p>rang rdzas thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin de rnal 'byor du yin zhe na/ rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis lha mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchog dga' la rjes su rnal
<p>431a.4</p>'byor zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor gang yin zhe na/ sems tsam la ni snyoms zhugs pa/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis rnal 'byor zhes pa'i dga' ba bshad do/ /shin tu sbyor ba gang yin zhe na/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan
<p>431a.5</p>lnga dang sbyar bas lhan cig skyes dga' bstan to/ /mnyam sbyor gyi brdas ni/ mchog dga' la rjes su sbyor ba/ bde ba chen po zhes bshad do/ /dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rab tu sbyor ba bshad do/ /lhan cig skyes dga' la sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bas sangs
<p>431a.6</p>rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bshad do/ /gal te yid nang du chud nas dga' bral du song ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam na/ dga' ba'i spyod pa sgrub pa bshad de zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs te/ rjes su sbyor ba'i rjes su sgrub pa ni shes rab bde bar 'gyur bas na mchog dga'o/ /skyes pa ltar byed
<p>431a.7</p>dga' spyod ces pa thabs kyi bde ba ste dga' ba'o/ /slar yang rjes su sgrub pa bshad/ /ces pa yid bde ba ste lhan cig skyes dga'o/ /lha mo kun la bde blugs pas/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis dga' bral gyi bcud kyis len gyi bde ba ste dga' bral bshad do/ /de dus nam gyi dga' bral
<p>431b</p>
<p>431b.1</p>zhes gdags she na/ thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis dga' bral zhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi brda bshad do/ /gal te dga' bral du ma song na mchog dga' lhan cig skyes dga'i rjes la ci zhig sgom snyam na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /ces pa'i sh+lo ka gnyis kyis
<p>431b.2</p>bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brdas dngos grub chen po dang / kun gyi mchog dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bde mchog dang / mnyam sbyor dang / sbyor ba'i dbang phyug dang / bde chen dang / bla na med pa zhes pa'i ming brgyad kyis bstan to/ /de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgom
<p>431b.3</p>pa'i rnal 'byor pas yid nang du chud pa'i dga' ba bzhi dang / yid phyir byung ba'i tshe longs spyod pa'i dga' ba bzhi bsgom pa yin par rgyud 'di nyid dang / dgyes rdor/ nges brjod/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro he ru ka 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod gdan bzhi las gsal bar gsungs
<p>431b.4</p>pa yin no/ /kun snying ni ma rtogs nas bskyed rim gyis lha bskyed par bshad/ longs spyod pa'i dga' ba bzhi sgom pa yin par rgyud 'di nyid dang / 'phro ba 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ /da ni de rnams kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / zhi ba'i btung ba dang / pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i
<p>431b.5</p>yan lag tu gyur pa'i pU dza'i rdzas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la 'jig rten na grags pa'i brda'i steng du zag med kyi brda dngos grub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa ni/ 'jig rten na grags pa'i khrag la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brdas me tog bshad do/ /mdangs la
<p>431b.6</p>bdug pa zhes bshad do/ /lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yi/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu dang / gang la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa zhes brdar btags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i glu
<p>431b.7</p>gar la zhi ba'i sprul pa zhes btags so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i glu gsal ma'i dbang po'i sprul pa zhes btags so/ /he ru ka'i glu gar la dur khrod kyi sprul pa zhes btags so/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi glu gar la chags pa sprul pa zhes bshad do/ /rta mchog gi glu gar la rab tu dga'
<p>432a</p>
<p>432a.1</p>ba'i sprul pa zhes btags so/ /de ltar ngag gi brda gsungs pa ni/ Ti zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i brda yin no/ /
<p>432a.2</p>he ru ka'i lha mo la a ral+li zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi la dam tshig mchog ces bshad/ rdo rje nyi ma'i badzra a ral+li zhes bya'o/ /rta mchog la yang de nyid do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor pa sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i brda ni/ sangs rgyas
<p>432a.3</p>thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa la/ skal ba bzang po zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ta ki zhes bshad do/ /he ru ka'i la ki li ki la zhes bshad do/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi la byis pa chu srin rgyal
<p>432a.4</p>mtshan zhes bshad do/ /rdo rje nyi ma la 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mchog ces bshad do/ /rta mchog gi la dbang phyug mchog ces bshad do/ /rdo rje dril bu drug la dam tshig ces bshad do/ /lus ngag yid gsum la oM b+hu khaM zhes bshad do/ /dgug gzhug bzhi la dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bshad do/ /tshur
<p>432a.5</p>gshegs ni e hi'o/ /phar bzhud pa ni a hi'o/ /u ti ta ni longs shig pa'o/ /swA hA ni drongs shig pa'o/ /khA hi ni zo shig pa'o/ /lhag ma ni go bla'o/ /bde mchog la rgyas 'debs ma zhes pa nas/ cher bstan ma zhes pa'i bar gyis bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi brda yin no/ /
<p>432a.6</p>rdo rje 'dzin dang sangs rgyas dang / /zhes pa la sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la ni shes 'gyur zhes bshad do/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dga' 'gyur zhes bshad do/ /yang sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / mkha' skyes la aM aM aM aM aM zhes bya'o/ /thams
<p>432a.7</p>cad mkhyen pa la sarba bid ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags ni ru ru 'khor ba'o/ /tiSh+Tha sid+d+haM ni mkhyen no/ /lo tsa na ni don dam nye bar zhi ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rang byung b+ha ga wAn ni sarba ar+tha'o/ /ki ta sa ni mig sa snying ngo / /ko ta ba ni rna ba phyag na rdo rje'o/ /ko ta ba ni lce spyan ras gzigs so/ /ka ti ra ka ni
<p>432b</p>
<p>432b.1</p>lus sgrib pa rnam sel lo/ /ko la sha ni gzugs sangs rgyas spyan no/ /ko la ba ni sgra mA ma kI'o/ /ko la ni dri sgrol ma'o/ /ko la ba ni gos dkar mo'o/ /ko la ma ni reg kun du bzang mo'o/ /phyag na rdo rje rang gi mtshan 'di rnams gang brjod par bya ba ni mig nas reg bya'i bar gyi yul rnams rnam shes kyi stong
<p>432b.2</p>pa nyid rtogs pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis phan yon no/ /mig dang zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis sngar gyi rang don gyi brda'i ming yin no/ /yid kyi rnam shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mtshon cha dang bi ti dang dgra bo dang lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya'o/ /
<p>432b.3</p>gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa dang dgra rnams zad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya'o/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po la he ru ka dang / thal bar 'jig dang mchog dang sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo zhes btags so/ /de'i phyir mtshan rdo rje 'bar ba la rab tu 'jig ces bshad do/ /kha T+wAM ga
<p>432b.4</p>la rgyal mtshan che/ /zhes bya'o/ /thod pa la kham phor zhes bya'o/ /khrag chen po la sbrang rtsi zhes bya'o/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad pa la dkar mo rkun mo zhes bya bar grags so/ /sgo ma bzhi la srungs shig dang / myur du dang rnam rgyal dpal dang / thal bzhi dang glog ces bya'o/ /yang na rta gdong ma ni
<p>432b.5</p>haM/ nyi zla ma la dra/ thal byed ma la hUM zhes bya'o/ /phaT ces pa rol cig pa'o/ /rang zhes pa dgongs shig pa'o/ /phaT ces pa rol cig pa'o/ /phaT ces pa sod cig pa ste he ru ka'i brda'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi brda ni/ pad+ma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /ces pa la sogs pa gsungs
<p>432b.6</p>so/ /rnam gzigs ma la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /sgrol ma la grub pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyan ldan ma la blo zhes bya'o/ /khro gnyer ma la rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o/ /na bza' ma la 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma la sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la pad+ma'i rin chen zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' snying po la
<p>432b.7</p>thams cad re re ma dang rdzogs mdzad dang / skal bzangs dang / rdo rje nyi ma nor bu che/ /zhes grags so/ /de'i 'khor ni traM gis dbang bskur ba'o/ /ba ba ma ni gter ldan ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan ma'i'o/ /tra ta tra ta ni mchod chen ma'o/ /rta mchog gi ni/ sna tshogs sangs rgyas pad+mo
<p>433a</p>
<p>433a.1</p>spyan/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ sna tshogs pad+mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /'jig rten dbang phyug byang chub kun/ /sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs rdo rje bla na med pa thams cad mos/ 'jig rten kun rab 'jigs/ rta mchog ma dpal ldan dang mtshan bcu gnyis dang ldan
<p>433a.2</p>pa ni rta mchog gi brda'o/ /de bas na phyag rgya nyi shu yin no/ /de ltar dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu bshad nas/ da ni gdong rgyan gon la mtshan ma byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes/ cha lugs chags pa bzhin byed cing / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 
<p>433a.3</p>sh+loka gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs gyon la bsam gtan dang po mtshan ma 'byin pa bstan to/ /sh+loka re res ni rnam snang la sogs pa dkyil 'khor lnga'i cha lugs bya ba bstan to/ /de ltar mthong ba dang thos pa dang reg pa'i mtshan ma'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bstan nas/ mngon shes kyi
<p>433a.4</p>phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal 'byor pa/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ yun ring du goms par byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon shes skyed pa'am/ 'khrul 'khor gyis bskyed pa'o/ /thabs bstan pa ni gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa dang / 
<p>433a.5</p>thabs kyi phyag rgya lha mor sbyor ba dang / lha'i sku mi 'gyur ba dam pa 'grub par yul kun la dngos po kun la thams cad kyi bye brag kun gyis bdag nyid la shes pa'i rnam pa kun rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /de ltar thun mong gi mngon shes bstan nas/ bye brag tu rdo rje sems
<p>433a.6</p>dpa' bstan pa ni/ mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sa phyogs ba ko tsam du byugs la bdud rtsi lnga'i thig ler byas nas mchod pa lngas mchod la/ bu mo'am khye'u gzhon nu ma grong pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa sdom pa byin la/ gnas bzhi ru rigs bzhi'i snying po bkod la dkyil
<p>433a.7</p>'khor gyi steng du thod lo kor gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris te/ yig 'bru bkod la mtshams bzhir bde mchog ma la sogs pa yum bzhi bzlas pa'i bum pa la sman lnga 'bru lnga/ rin po che lnga bcug la ras sar pas mgul pa bcings te/ ldum chags
<p>433b</p>
<p>433b.1</p>lcug mas kha brgyan la/ rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la gtso bo bkod la sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas bdag gam gzhan la mngon shes bskyed par 'dod pa de la rnam rgyal gyi chus dbang bskur zhing bsrung ba byas la dkyil 'khor de'i thog tu lha gang yin pa de'i yi ge la reg tu
<p>433b.2</p>gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i byin rlabs dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba bzhin ston par gyur cig ces byas la reg par gzhug
<p>433b.3</p>go/ /de bzhin du ma reg par me tog dor ba'am/ ral gri'am/ me long ngam/ shing leb bam/ chu dang ba dang ba chu'am/ brag ngos 'jam po'am/ gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i khyim 'jam po dag la mig byin gyis brlabs la bltar gzhug go/ /rna ba byin gyis brlabs la nyan du gzhug go/ /
<p>433b.4</p>sems byin gyis brlabs la gzhan gyi sems brtag par bya'o/ /'gro ba'i rigs bzhi'i 'khor lo snying gar bkod la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba brtag par bya'o/ /zad par dang zil gnon bsgoms la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /des 'jig rten gyi bya ba blang bya dor
<p>433b.5</p>bya dang / nor stor ba dang / ma stor ba dang / chom pos 'phrogs pa dang ma 'phrogs pa/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa/ rgyal ba dang 'pham pa/ don yod pa dang med pa/ grub pa dang mi grub pa/ bde ba dang mi bde ba/ 'dod pa gzugs/ gzugs med pa'i khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi don
<p>433b.6</p>thams cad kyang 'khrul 'khor gyi stobs kyis mngon shes lnga bskyed nas sems can gyi don byed do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mngon shes bskyed nas rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la mngon shes bskyed par bya'o/ /he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod yon
<p>433b.7</p>thams cad la bskyed par bya'o/ /rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas reg pa'am ma reg pa la sogs pa pra dbab pa'i yul bcu la snga ma ltar mngon shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar ji snyed mkhyen pa'i rnam shes kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad nas/ da ni lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa'i
<p>434a</p>
<p>434a.1</p>bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor ba/ ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas rdul tshon slob dpon bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa'am/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i slob dpon cha byad dang / rgyan btags pa'ang rung ste/ dur
<p>434a.2</p>khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba'am/ ma mo'i gnas su keng rus yun ring po lon pa'i phye ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pas sgrub pa'i dpral bar thig le bya ba'am/ yang na snying ga lkog ma dpral ba gsum du sor mo gsum pa'i ri mo byas pa bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /thal ba
<p>434a.3</p>des phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhi dang nam mkha' dang sa la gtor na bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga yang bsrung ba de nyid yin par shes par bya'o/ /thal ba de ji lta bu yin snyam na/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i thal ba la bsnyen pa byas nas/ du ba dang / rlangs pa
<p>434a.4</p>dang / 'phar ba la sogs pa'i rtags byung nas bsrung ba'i rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsrung ba'o/ /rigs bzhi'i thal ba'i bsrung ba bshad nas/ chu'i bsrung ba bshad pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te bsgom pa gdong rgyan gyon pa'i lha bzhi'i rgya
<p>434a.5</p>mtsho'am 'bab chu'i 'gram du chu la dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas/ chu gyen du 'gro ba dang mi g.yo ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ lha thams cad zhu ba'i lha rdzas kyi zhi ba'i chu'i mchog gis bdag dang gzhan la gtor ba dang / spyi bor blugs pa dang khrus bya ba dang / chu der 'bogs shing rgal nas bcud kyi 'jig
<p>434a.6</p>rten bsrung ba dang / snod kyi 'jig rten kyang snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs bzhi'i chu'i bsrung ba bshad nas/ yungs kar bskyed nas bsrung ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ snga ma ltar bsgoms pa'am/ lha rnams kyi cha byad gyon pa bskyed
<p>434a.7</p>pa nas mi'i thod pa dur khrod kyi sas bkang ba la sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis gzugs dang / mA ma kI'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chu blugs pa dang / gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang / sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la/ smin pa'i tshe dmangs
<p>434b</p>
<p>434b.1</p>rigs kyi bu mo'i lag par sprul nas/ lus sam mgul du gdags pa dang / lo mas tshod ma bya zhing yungs mar gyis mgo la bsku ba dang / phyogs mtshams kyang snga ma bzhin bsrung ba bya'o/ /de ltar rigs rnams kyi yungs kar gyi bsrung ba bshad nas/ rigs rnams kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
<p>434b.2</p>bsrung ba bshad pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mig tu ma dang Ta las nyi zla bskyed la mig 'bras la hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed de/ glog lta bu'i rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar smra bar bya'o/ /rdo rje
<p>434b.3</p>phra mo'i mthong ba mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe ma mchu sos mnan la rdo rje dril bu bzung nas g.yon du 'gyings pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis 'gro zhing gsal ba'i lta bas phyogs bcur bskor zhing / steng 'og byin gyis brlabs la sa 'og sa bla sa stengs gsum rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
<p>434b.4</p>gdul bya dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rkang pa'i rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyang snod du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhi la yang shes par bya'o/ /thun mong gi phyag rgya gsungs nas bye brag gsungs pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /zhes gsungs te/ bud med bcu bzhi lha mo'i cha byad du byas la
<p>434b.5</p>de'i dbus su bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin du bdag kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i cha byad du byas nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te/ lha mo'i phyag rgya lta ba 'dug stangs dang phyag rgya'i gar dang sngags zlos shing che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha byas nas bdag dang gzhan phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa
<p>434b.6</p>bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i cha byad byas/ bud med bcu bdun gyis bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar lha'i cha byad byas nas lta ba dang / lag pa rkang pa sngags 'don pa dang bcas pas snga ma ltar bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /he ru ka'i rnal
<p>434b.7</p>'byor pas/ he ru ka'i rnam par 'phrul pas bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin byas na bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi rnal 'byor pas/ ji lta ba'i gzugs dang dbyibs dang zhing pad+ma kha 'byed pas bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar cha byad byas na snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>435a</p>
<p>435a.1</p>rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pas 'bar ba'i rdo rje lta ba'i tshul bzhin bzhugs/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i cha byad bar ti ltar byas na snga ma ltar bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas ji lta ba'i rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bzhin byas la rta
<p>435a.2</p>mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te haM khaM las go cha bskyed de/ snying gar mdud pa lan gsum nu ma dang lkog mar lan gnyis gnyis mdud la/ lan cig dpral bar/ lan cig rna ba gnyis kyi ltag par ze ka bcings nas lhag ma sbyangs pa ni go cha'i tshul du zhes bya'o/ /de
<p>435a.3</p>nas spyi bo dang dpral ba dang glo g.yas g.yon dang rgyab tu rdo rje phreng ba bcings la dar 'ching ba bzhin du phreng ba yang bcings nas bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba dang phyogs bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dngos grub len pa'i bsrung ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ da ni nad zhi bar byas nas tshe 'phel ba'i
<p>435a.4</p>phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad pa ni/ ches sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing / /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ bsnyen sgrub gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed la/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la nad pa'i lus las rims mig gsum pa lag pa gsum pa rkang pa gsum pa kha dog nag pa
<p>435a.5</p>ste/ nad dang sdig sbrul dang / sprul pa dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gzugs bsams te/ khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgya bcings la mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pas nad dang dug bsal ba de nyid smin mtshams su bzhag na bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis kyi
<p>435a.6</p>rtse mo bkug la sbrum ma'i gsus pa la btsugs na bu 'byung ba dang / lhog pa dang / skran dang / dmu rdzing la sogs pa la btsugs nas sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na zug rngu sos par 'gyur ro/ /mig gso ba ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ba mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtsa bar bkug nas mthe
<p>435a.7</p>bong dang gung mo rtse sbyar ba ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ sngags 'bum bzlas nas mig phyis na long bas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /klad nad gso ba ni bdag nyid lha rnams kyi sbyor ba dang / rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / khro bo'i khu tshur dang / pad+ma'i dang / rin po che dang / las kyi khu tshur
<p>435b</p>
<p>435b.1</p>gyis klad pa'i nad drangs nas kha'i phyogs su byung ba ltar byas na klad nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba gso ba ni hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po gnyis rna bar bskyed la bdag nyid kyi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la de rna bar ta thA ga ta hUM zhes 'bum bzlas la rna bar phus gdab par bya'o/ /
<p>435b.2</p>byis pa gso ba ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis brkyang la mthe bo mthe chung so sor brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo byis pa'i spyi bor bzhag nas sum+b+has gtsug tor bcings na byis pa'i nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /dug gso ba ni lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
<p>435b.3</p>bsams la/ de las byung ba'i sor mo lnga sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka bsams nas sgrub pa'i rkang par yaM las rlung / lte bar raM las me/ de'i steng du ra nag po la zhon pa'i skyes bu'i gzugs can nag po bsams nas me 'bar bas bsregs pa dang / dug bkug nas gdul ba dang / dug 'od zer gyi lcags
<p>435b.4</p>sgrog gis bcing ba dang me lhas zos par bsams la/ gdug pa'i mche ba la sogs pas zin pa'i 'dug stangs stag dang gos kyi dgon zan gyi dug ste brtson pa rnams sos par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gso ba ni/ khro bo'i sdigs mdzub kyis g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang / gung mo gnyis mig lta bur
<p>435b.5</p>byas nas g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis yang de bzhin du byas te/ g.yas g.yon gyi gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i rgyab sbyar te/ mthe bo dang mdzub mo so sor bcad pas mdzub mo dang gung mo bar du gru gsum dang / gung mo gnyis mthe bo'i tshigs dang por bzhag pas mdzub mo
<p>435b.6</p>gung mo mthe bo gnyis kyi bar gru bzhi byas nas zhi rgyas mngon spyod kyi phyag rgya bcings la gdon dang dug sel bar 'gyur ro/ /shi ba slong ba'i phyag rgya ni he ru ka'i phyag rgya 'dzin byas la ba dan gsum pa gnyis bcings te/ nang zlog pa gung mo gnyis mdud nas/ mdzub mo gnyis dang / 
<p>435b.7</p>mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud de/ g.yas pa'i srin lag dang / g.yon pa'i mtheb mo g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / g.yas pa'i mthe bong rtse mo sbyor bas rtse mo lnga pa zhes bya ba smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu ru bzhag pas ma mo thams cad 'dul ba dang / 'jig rten gsum rgyas gdab pa
<p>436a</p>
<p>436a.1</p>dang / rmongs pa dang thal bar byas pas slar 'tsho bar byed do/ /rta gso ba'i mu dra ni/ traM las rta rnams bskyed la/ hrI las stan pad+mar bskyed la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ hUM las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'am rta mchog tu bskyed na nad med cing nyams skye
<p>436a.2</p>bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po gso ba ni/ hUM ga hUM zhes pa las glang po bskyed la pad+ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed de/ rigs bzhi'i lha bskyed nas bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsams na glang po'i nyams stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bya gso ba ni/ hri maM hri zhes pas bya bskyed la shrI badzra satwa s+t+waM a gi ho zhes
<p>436a.3</p>pas rna bar bzlas na nad med pa dang mi skad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ljon shing bskyed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor byas la hUM maM hUM zhes pa las skar ma rgyal gza' phur bu'i zhing thams cad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis bskyed la/ mA ma kI'i sngags
<p>436a.4</p>kyis bcu pa dang / sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang / gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang / gnod mdzes la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs na nad med cing me tog dang 'bras bu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gso ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs nas mtshon
<p>436a.5</p>cha'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad pa ni/ 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs pa ni mda'o/ /ma 'phangs pa ni mdung / lag pas 'phangs pa ni 'khor lo 'phangs nas slar bzung ba ni mda' mdung dang zhags pa'o/ /stobs
<p>436a.6</p>'gyed pa ni lag stobs/ de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni/ dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dag /ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ de la 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'i sbyor ba dang / kun du sbyor ba dang / 'dren par 'gyur ba dang / 'gengs pa dang / gsal ba dang 'phel lo/ /de dag gi bshad pa ni/ 
<p>436a.7</p>rkang pa gshibs nas mnyam pa'i stang stabs bya ba dang / rkang pa 'gyes pas sa ga bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor de dag kyang zhes pa zlum pos sa gnon dang / brkyang bskum gyis kyang zhes g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de la bde blag gi rgya cher bshad pa ni/ 
<p>436b</p>
<p>436b.1</p>dpung pa g.yon pa mi lhod par bsgoms pa dang / 'ben la gtad na sran gzugs pa dang / lag pa g.yas pa bskum pas brten pa dang / rna ltag tu 'phen pas yan lag brten pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /zhes bya ste lhag ma ni phan yon no/ /de la sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ rang gi snying gar
<p>436b.2</p>'dren tshul du/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis kun du sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang pa/ /zhes pa sh+lo ka gcig gis 'dren pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum por ni/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis 'gengs pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ ji ltar rig pa drangs
<p>436b.3</p>nas ni/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis myur ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ 'das pas 'ben la bsgrib par bya/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig go/ /'phen pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ de gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ g.yas phyogs mda' bskor nas 'gengs nas sa la smad pa
<p>436b.4</p>dang 'ben nam sa la gtod pa dang / rkang pa g.yon pa'i pus mo bkug g.yas pa'i brang bas sa la btsugs pa ni/ dmigs pas mnan zhes bya'o/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgyal mchog gis/ /zhes pa g.yas pa'i sor mo sangs rgyas lngar bskyed de/ phyag rgya'i mchog des phung po lnga dang / 
<p>436b.5</p>dbang po lnga la mda' phog par bsam mo/ /gsal ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni/ mtshon cha lnga po thun mong gi cho ga bstan pa yin te/ rab tu 'phangs pa dang / mnyam pa dang rab tu 'phangs pa la sogs pa lnga thabs kyi phyag rgya dang / nyam nga la gams dang bde sogs/ /zhes pa ni zlos pa'i phyag rgya lnga
<p>436b.6</p>dang / thams cad 'degs dang nges par 'degs/ /zhes pa phreng ba'i phyag rgya lnga dang / kun du kun nas thams cad du/ /zhes pa rus pa la sogs phyag rgya lnga dang / nyi shu ni dgra cha thams cad gsal bar rtog pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /mtshon cha de rnams ni dngos grub len pa'i tshe mdun gyi lha dang bar
<p>436b.7</p>chad kyi bdud la 'phen pa dang / phrin las byed pa'i tshe g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar mtshon cha'i phyag rgya bstan nas las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje khu tshur dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo'i pad+ma'i rin
<p>437a</p>
