<p>437a.1</p>po che'i las kyi khu tshur rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / mtshan ma thob nas las rnams bya'o/ /de ltar lag pa'i mu dra'i ye shes bshad nas/ dpal ldan rdo rje las kyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan pa ni/ rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang / /zhes pa la
<p>437a.2</p>sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la dngos grub len pa dang / las rnams byed pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyod pa'i brtul zhugs byed pa'i tshig rkang pa brgyad pa g.yas kyi phyed krung dang / gnon pa g.yon gyi phyed krung bskums nas 'degs pa'i
<p>437a.3</p>rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gzugs brnyan mnan nas skad phyung ba'i tshe bka' bsgo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam snang rnal 'byor pas dpal mnan pa rdo rje skyil mo krung dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru kas g.yon brkyang ba dang / pad+ma gar dbang gi pad+ma'i skyil krung gis mnan pa dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i rin po che'i skyil krung
<p>437a.4</p>gis mnan pa dang / rta mchog gi las kyi skyil mo krung gis mnan pa'o/ /mnan nas su dag longs spyod snyam na/ dbang phyug mnan nas dngos grub gsum ma bkug pa dang / khyab 'jug mnan nas dpa' mo bkug pa dang / tshangs pa mnan nas grol ma bkug pa dang / 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas dga'
<p>437a.5</p>ma bkug pa dang / de'i 'khor ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams longs spyad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du ku be+e ra mnan nas rig pa 'grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bkug pa dang / mi'i rgyal po mnan nas btsun mo bkug la longs spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar rkang pa'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ sgrub pa'i yan lag
<p>437a.6</p>sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam shes nas yan lag dang nying lag gi brda bya ste/ sgrub pa'i yan lag tu shes nas/ dgug pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bcings/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /thun mong gi phyag rgya
<p>437a.7</p>bshad nas/ bye brag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo dgug pa ni/ g.yon 'gying tshul sh+lo ka gcig gis so/ /rnam snang gi ni dpal ldan sna tshogs 'dzin zhes pa gcig go/ /he ru ka'i ni/ g.yon pa'i dril bu sgra sgrogs shing / /zhes pa gcig go/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi ni/ g.yon pa'i brla la gzhag ces
<p>437b</p>
<p>437b.1</p>pa gcig go/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i ni/ bdag snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul du zhes pa gcig go/ /rta mchog gi ni/ bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig go/ /de ltar rtog pa dgu pa ni phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bsgrub pa'i yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas na/ las dang po pa bsgrub pa'i
<p>437b.2</p>tshe dang / mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe dang / dpe gnyis la/ mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub len pa'i tshe dang / dngos grub thob pas ye shes la dbang ba'i rnal 'byor pas sems can gyi don du las rnams byed pa'i tshe dag cing rigs par yan lag tu gyur pa yin no/ /brtag
<p>437b.3</p>pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar brtag pa dgu bshad nas/ da ni phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la mos pa bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang mnyam par sbyor nas/ mngon sum gyi lam bsgom pa bshad pa ni/ de nas sna tshogs kun du ni lha
<p>437b.4</p>drug tu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug go/ /phyag rgya zhes pa'i sgrub pa 'di/ /zhes pa rigs drug phyag rgya bzhi'i bye brag go/ /kun du sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa phyag rgya bzhi la dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes bskyed pa'o/ /kun du sna tshogs bshad par bya/ /zhes pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i phyag
<p>437b.5</p>rgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sbyor ba'o/ /de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni/ smin ma mig dang sna dang mchu/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya drug yum gyi smin ma dang mig dang so la sogs pa cha lugs su byas la phyag rgya thams cad kyis 'khyud pa dang / 'o bya ba la sogs
<p>437b.6</p>pa rnam par smin pa bkrol nas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa bkrol nas mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /de yang rnam par shes pa bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i lha mo drug gi dbang du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis dga' ba'i mtshan
<p>437b.7</p>nyid bshad do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /zhes pas mchog dga'i mtshan nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis lhan cig skyes dga'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid du bstan to/ /de ltar zhi gnas kyi bde ba bstan nas/ lhag mthong gi bde ba bstan pa ni/ rdo rje
<p>438a</p>
<p>438a.1</p>sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /zhes pa sh+lo ka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba bsgom pa'o/ /lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku/ /zhes pa'i sh+loka gcig gis rnam snang gi bde ba chen po bstan to/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis he
<p>438a.2</p>ru ka'i bde ba chen po bstan to/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yi/ /zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig gis rdo rje nyi ma'i bde ba bstan to/ /dpal ldan yon tan 'gying dang bcas/ /zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis pad+ma gar dbang gi bde ba chen po bstan to/ /gyen du 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang / /zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis rta
<p>438a.3</p>mchog gi bde ba chen po 'od gsal bstan te/ lha mo rnams kyis ji ltar phyag rgya bya zhe na/ /kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa gsal nas/ a wa d+hU tI kha sbyar na dpal rdo rje pad+mo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba/ rigs bzhi'i srog a wa d+hU tIr 'jug pa'i
<p>438a.4</p>thabs kyi phyag rgya drug la shes rab kyi phyag rgya drug gi lan du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rtog pa bcu pa'i don bshad nas/ de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku dpag tu med pa dang ldan zhing
<p>438a.5</p>nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i dus su bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa mu med pa na rgyud sde bzhi'i rtog pa thams cad dang / rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i mthu dang / sgra'i rnam rtog gi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>438a.6</p>cad kyis gang du yang gsung bar mi nus so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byin rlabs kyi lam gyi mthu dang / mngon sum lam gyi rang bzhin dag 'grub pa dang / sems 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'grub pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong so sor grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu yin yang / 
<p>438a.7</p>ci'i phyir gsung bar mi nus she na/ 'di ni gsang ba mchog gi mchog//ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ don rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i brjod bya ma yin pas mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i don dga' ba ni gsang ba dang / mchog dga' ni mchog dang / lhan cig skyes dga' yin pas mchog gi dang / 
<p>438b</p>
<p>438b.1</p>bde ba chen po yin pas bde mchog go/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la longs sku dang sprul skus ji ltar chos bstan zhe na/ sems can don phyir lam rnams sbyong ba dang / /rnam par dag pa rgyal bas yod mi mdzad/ /ces gsungs te/ nyan thos ltar phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das
<p>438b.2</p>par mi mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams la ye shes kyi rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi sku'i rnam pa dang / las dang po pa'i so so'i skye bo la gsung gi rnam par snang ba yin no/ /don dam par mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la gsung mi mnga'o/ /ci'i phyir mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la bar chad med
<p>438b.3</p>pa yin zhe na/ 'di la bgegs byed bdud kyang yod ma yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dri ma dag pa dang ma dag pa ci'i phyir med snyam na/ rtog pas mi 'grub brdar bas yod mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /ci'i phyir glo bur dang 'dres pa ma yin zhe na/ mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur/ /zhes bshad
<p>438b.4</p>do/ /rtsa ba'i chos kyi sku sems rang rig 'od gsal ci'i phyir mi ston zhe na/ brtan pa'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms/ /zhes gsungs so/ /don dam par mkhyen pa med kyang kun rdzob tu ji ltar lam rtogs she na/ gang zhig rang gi bde bas bde grub pa/ /dngos grub mchog ni rten par mdzad/ /
<p>438b.5</p>de ltar 'bras bu'i rgyud gsungs nas/ rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa ni/ sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ sna tshogs pas de skad gsungs pa ni/ rigs drug gi ston pa drug go/ /b+ha ga wAn/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dgyes/ /zhes pa nyan pa po'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung
<p>438b.6</p>gi bye ma snyed rtag tu dgyes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi ri la gsungs pa zhes pa rigs drug gi gzugs kyi rtog pa bshad nas/ sgra'i rnam par rtog pa drug ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs zhes pa'i don to/ /rnam par rtog cing rab tu dgyes par 'gyur zhes pa
<p>438b.7</p>gzugs kyi rnam rtog bsdus pa la bstod pa dang / sgra'i rnam rtog bshad zin pa la sogs bstod pa'o/ /'dis ma 'ongs pa'i sngags pa gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa rnams dkyil 'khor bsdus pa la bstod pa dang ches bshad pa'i rjes la rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa'o/ /de ltar
<p>439a</p>
<p>439a.1</p>rjes su yi rang bstod pa'i rjes la dbang po rnon po rnams kyis rtog pa bcu'i don cig car rtogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni/ rnam mang rjes chags dga' bas mchod pa dang / /zhes pa dga' ba gsum gyi zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /rta mchog gi rnal 'byor bde bas gsal
<p>439a.2</p>bar rjes su gsal bar mchod na ni/ bde ba chen po grub par mngon sum du bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don yin no/ /rab tu bde ba rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzangs dga' ba'i mchog /ces bya ba rang lhag par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa bde ba chen po cig car sgoms shig ces pa'i don to/ /rab mchog
<p>439a.3</p>bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig rjes su grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pa bde ba chen po sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do/ /de ltar cig car bsgom pa'i don bstan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nye bar bsdu ba byas pa'i rjes la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar gyis zhes pa'o/ /
<p>439a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so zhes pa lag na rdo rje'i tshig yin no/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ye shes kyi yul dang / mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs pa/ mngon sum lam gyis sgyu ma yis/ /zag pa med pa bde ba'i mchog / 
<p>439a.5</p>ces bya ba rtog pa bcu'i mtshan yin no/ /rtog pa bcu pa 'dis ni rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba dbang bzhi pa chen po bsgom pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /brtag pa bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o/ /'grel pa dag gis mnyam sbyor ni/ /ma lus gsal
<p>439a.6</p>bar ma 'grol zhes/ /mnyam sbyor rgyud las bdag gis ni/ /gtam du dris pa bzhin du thos/ /bdag gis rtogs dka' yin na yang / /bla ma'i zhabs kyis byin brlabs pas/ /de don rtsom phyir nyes pa med/ /de phyir rgyud rgyal rtog pa'i don/ /gsal byed ngag gi 'od zer 'di/ /'phags pa'i shes rab
<p>439a.7</p>bskyed pa'i phyir/ /dge ba cung zad gang bsags pa/ /de yis kun mkhyen thob par shog /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gi 'grel pa mnyam sbyor gyi rgyan zhes bya ba rab dga' rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
